 320.2. Hwi ofer criste on culfran hiwe? Hwi ofer cristes hirede on
fyres gelicnysse? On bocum is geredd be þam fugelcynne þæt his gecynd is
swiðe bylewite and unscæðði and gesibsum;
 320.5. Se hælend is ealles mancynnes dema: ac he ne com na to
demenne mancynn swa swa he sylf cwæð. ac to gehælenne;
 320.7. Gif he þa wolde deman mancynn þa ða he ærest to
middanearde com: Hwa wurde þonne gehealden? ac he nolde mid his tocyme þa
synfullan fordeman: ac wolde to his rice gegadrian;
 320.10. Ærest he wolde us mid lyðnysse styran þæt he
syððan mihte on his dome us gehealdan;
 320.11. For þi wæs se halga gast on culfran anlicnysse gesewen
bufon criste. for þan ðe he wæs drohtniende on ðisre worulde mid
bilewitnysse. and unscæððinysse. and gesibsumnysse;
 320.14. He ne hrymde. ne biterwyrde næs: ne he sace ne astyrede:
ac forbær manna yfelnyssa þurh his liðnysse;
 320.16. Ac se þe on þam ærran tocyme liþegode þam
synfullum to gecyrrednysse: se demð stiðne dom þam receleasum. æt
þam æftran tocyme;
 320.19. Se halga gast wæs gesewen on fyrenum tungum bufon þam
apostolon for þan ðe he dyde þæt hi wæron byrnende on godes willan.
and bodiende ymbe godes rice;
 320.21. Fyrene tungan hi hæfdon þa ða hi mid lufe godes
mærþa bodedon. þæt þæra hæðenra manna heortan þe cealde
wæron þurh geleafleaste. and flæsclicum gewilnungum. mihton beon
ontende to þam heofonlicum bebodum;
 320.25. Gif se halga gast ne lærð ðæs mannes mood
wiðinnan: on idel beoð ðæs bydeles word wiðutan geclypode;
 320.27. Fyres gecynd is þæt hit fornymð swa hwæt swa him
gehende bið;
 320.28. Swa sceal se lareow don se þe bið mid þan halgan
gaste onbryrd. ærest on him sylfum ælcne leahter adwæscan: and
syððan on his underþeoddum;
 320.31. On culfran anlicnysse. and on fyres hiwe wæs godes gast
æteowod. for þan ðe he deð þæt ða beoð bylewite on
unscæððinysse. and byrnende on godes willan þe he mid his gife
gefylð;
 320.34. Ne bið seo bylewitnys gode gecweme buton snoternysse: ne
seo snoternys buton bylewitnysse: swa swa gecweden is be þam eadigan iob.
þæt he wæs bylewite and rihtwis;
 322.3. Hwæt bið rihtwisnyss buton bilewitnysse? oððe
hwæt bið bylewitnys buton rihtwisnysse? ac se halga gast þe tæcð
rihtwisnysse and bylewitnysse sceolde beon æteowod æigðer ge on fyre ge
on culfran. for þan ðe he deð þæra manna heortan þe he onliht mid
his gife þæt hi beoð liðe þurh unscæðþinysse. and onælede
þurh lufe and snoternysse;
 322.8. God is swa swa paulus cwæð fornimende fyr: he is
unasecgendlic fyr and ungesewenlic;
 322.10. Be þam fyre cwæð se hælend;
 322.11. Ic com to ðy þæt ic wolde sendan fyr on eorþan.
and ic wylle þæt hit byrne;
 322.12. He sende þone halgan gast to eorþan. and he mid his
blæde onælde eorðlicra manna heortan;
 322.14. Ðonne byrnð seo eorðe: þonne þæs eorðlican
mannes heorte bið ontend to godes lufe: seo ðe ær wæs ceald þurh
flæsclicum lustum;
 322.17. Nis na se halga gast wuniende on his gecynde swa swa he
gesewen wæs: for þan ðe he is ungesewenlic;
 322.18. Ac for þære getacnunge swa we ær cwædon he
wæs æteowod on culfran and on fyre;
 322.20. He is gehaten on greciscum gereorde paraclitus þæt is
froforgast. for þi ðe he frefrað þa dreorigan þe heora synna
behreowsiað: and sylð him forgyfenysse hiht and heora unrotan mod
geliðegað;
 322.23. He forgifð synna and he is se wegi to forgyfenysse ealra
synna;
 322.24. He sylð his gife þam þe he wile: sumum menn he
forgifð wisdom. and spræce. sumum good ingehid. sumum micelne geleafan.
sumum mihte to gehælenne untruman: sumum witegunge. sumum toscead goddra
gasta and yfelra: sumum he forgifð mislice gereord. sumum gerecednysse
mislicra spræca;
 322.29. Ealle þas ðing deð se halga gast todælende
æighwylcum be ðam þe him gewyrð. for þan ðe he is ælmihtig
wyrhta: and swa hraðe swa he þæs mannes mod onliht. he hit awent fram
yfele to gode;
 322.33. He onlihte dauides heortan þa ða he on geogoðe
hearpan lufode. and worhte hine to sealmwyrhtan;
 322.34. Amos hatte sum hryþerhyrde. þone awende se halga gast
to mærum witegan;
 324.1. Petrus wæs fiscere. þone awende se ylca godes gast to
apostole;
 324.2. Paulus ehte cristenra manna þone he geceas to lareowe
eallum þeodum;
 324.3. Matheus wæs tollere þone he awende to godspellere;
 324.4. Ða apostoli ne dorston bodian ðone soðan geleafan for
ogan iudeisces folces. ac syððan hi wæron onælede þurh ðone
halgan gast hi forsawon ealle lichamlice pinunga: and orsorhlice godes
mærða bodedon;
 324.8. Ðises dæges wurþmynt is to mærsigenne: for þan
ðe se ælmihtiga god þæt is se halga gast gemedemode hine sylfne
þæt he wolde manna bearn on þissere tide geneosian;
 324.11. On cristes acennednysse wearþ se ælmihtiga godes sunu
to menniscum men gedoon: and on þysum dæge wurdon geleaffulle men godas:
swa swa crist cwæð: ic cwæð ge sind godas. and ge ealle sind bearn
þæs hextan;
 324.14. Ða gecorenan sind godes bearn. and eac godas. na
gecyndelice ac þurh gife þæs halgan gastes;
 324.16. An god is gecyndelice on þrim hadum: fæder and his
sunu. þæt is his wisdom. and se halga gast se ðe is heora begra lufu and
willa: heora gecynd is untodæledlic æfre wuniende on anre godcundnysse:
se ylca cwæð þeahhwæðere be his gecorenum: ge sind godas þurh
cristes menniscnysse wurdon men alysde fram deofles þeowte. and þurh tocyme
þæs halgan gastes mennisce men wurdon gedone to godum;
 324.23. Crist underfeng menniscnysse on his tocyme and menn
underfengon god þurh neosunge þæs halgan gastes;
 324.25. Se man þe næfð godes gast on him. nis he godes;
 324.26. Ælces mannes weorc cyðað hwilc gast hine wissað;
 324.27. Godes gast wissað symle to halignysse and godnysse:
deofles gast wissað to leahtrum. and to mandædum;
 324.30. Se halga gast becom tua ofer þam apostolum;
 324.30. Crist ableow þone halgan gast uppon þam apostolon ær
his upstige. þus cweðende. onfoð haligne gast;
 324.32. Eft on þysum dæge asende se ælmihtiga fæder. and
se sunu heora beigra gast. to þam geleaffullan heape;
 324.34. On þisre worulde wuniende. Se hælend ableow his gast
on his gingrum for þære getacnunge þæt hi and ealle cristene menn.
sceolon lufian heora nextan swa swa hi sylfe;
 326.2. He sende eft. swa swa he ær behet þone ylcan gast of
heofonum: to þi ðæt we sceolon lufian god ofer ealle oþre ðing;
 326.4. An is se halga gast. þeah ðe he tua become ofer þam
apostolon;
 326.5. Swa is eac an lufu: and twa bebodu þæt we sceolon
lufian god and men;
 326.6. Ac we sceolon leornian on mannum hu we magon becuman to
godes lufe: swa swa iohannes se apostol cwæð. se ðe ne lufað his
broþor þone ðe he gesihð: hu mæg he lufian god þone ðe he ne
gesihð lichamlice;
 326.11. We wurþiað þæs halgan gastes tocyme mid lofsangum
seofon dagas. for þan ðe he onbryrd ure mod mid seofonfealdre gife.
þæt is mid wisdome. and andgite mid geþeahte and strencðe. mid
ingehide. and arfæstnysse: and he us gefylð mid godes ege;
 326.15. Se ðe þurh godum geearnungum becymð to ðisum
seofonfealdum gifum þæs halgan gastes: he hæfð þonne ealle
geðincþe;
 326.17. Ac se þe wyle to þyssere geþincðe becuman he sceal
gelyfan on þære halgan þrynnysse and on soþre annysse. þæt se
fæder and his sunu. and heora begra gast sindon þry on hadum. and an god
untodæledlic. on anre godcundnysse wuniende;
 326.21. Ðisne geleafan getacnodon þa ðreo ðusend þe
ærest gebugon to geleafan: æfter þæs halgan gastes tocyme;
 326.23. Swa swa þa þreo ðusend wæron an werod. swa is seo
halige þrynnys an god;
 326.24. And þæt werod wæs swa anmod. swilce him eallum
wære an heorte and an sawul: for þan ðe þære halgan þrynnysse is
an godcundnyss. and an gecynd. and an willa. and an weorc. unascyrigendlice;
 326.28. Ða geleaffullan brohton heora feoh. and ledon hit æt
þæra apostola foton;
 326.29. Mid þam is geswutelod þæt cristene menn ne sceolon
heora hiht besettan on woroldlicum gestreonum: ac on gode anum;
 326.31. Se gitsere þe besett his hiht on his goldhorde he bið
swa swa se apostol cwæð. þam gelic ðe deofolgild begæð;
 326.34. Hi heoldon þæt gold unwurðlice for þan ðe seo
gitsung næfde nænne stede on heora heortan;
 326.35. For þi hi dydon heora þing him gemæne. þæt hi
on soþre sibbe buton gitsunge beon mihton;
 328.2. Hi setton heora handa ofer geleaffullum mannum. and him com
to se halga gast. þurh heora biscepunge;
 328.3. Biscopas synd þæs ylcan hades on godes gelaðunge. and
healdað þa gesetnysse on heora biscopunge. swa þæt hi settað heora
handa ofer gefulludum mannum and biddað þæt se ælmihtiga wealdend him
sende þa seofonfealdan gife his gastes. se þe leofað and rixað a buton
ende AMEN;

 328.24. Nu wenað sume menn þæt nan pleoh ne sy on

mid godewebbe geglenged;
 328.28. Ne cepð nan man deorwurðra reafa buton for ydelum

 330.11. Eac wære þam earman leohtre on mode gif he þæs

 330.15. Genoh wære þam wædlan his untrumnyss þeah ðe he

 330.17. Ac seo menigfealde earfoðnys wæs his sawle

 330.21. Ac þa ða he wæs fram mannum forsewen þa

 330.22. Hundes liccung gehælð wunda;

 330.28. He bæd þa abraham mid earmlicere stemne þæt

 330.31. His tungan he mænde swiþost: for þan ðe hit is

 332.1. Se heahfæder abraham him cwæð to þu min bearn beo

 332.7. Ða underfeng se welega his gesælðe to edleane. to

 332.15. Hawiað be gehwylcum. for þan ðe oft getimað yfelum

 332.21. Eac þa halgan beoð mid heora scyppendes rihtwisnysse

 332.27. Syððan se rica wearð orwene his agenre alysednysse

 332.31. Ne lufað se hine sylfne se þe hine mid synnum bebint;
 332.32. He oncneow lazarum þone ðe he ær forseah: and he

 334.3. Ða synfullan geseoð nu hwiltidum þa gecorenan on
wuldre. þe hi forsawon on worulde. þæt seo angsumnyss heora modes þe
mare sy. and þa rihtwisan symle geseoð þa unrihtwisan on heora tintregum
cwylmigende. þæt heora blis þe mare sy: and lufu to heora drihtne þe
hi ahredde fram deofles anwealde. and fram þam manfullum heape;
 334.8. Ne astyrað þæra rihtwisra gesihð him nænne ogan:

þæra manfulra yrmðe: ac heora tintrega becymð þam gecorenum to maran
blisse. swa swa on metinge bið forsewen seo blace anlicnys: þæt seo
hwite sy beorhtre gesewen;
 334.13. Ða gecorenan geseoð symle heora scyppendes beorhtnysse:
and for þi nis nan þing on gesceaftum him bediglod;
 334.16. Se welega nolde on life gehyran þone lareow moysen ne

swa he dyde: and gyrnde for þi þæt lazarus hi moste warnian. þæt hi
ne becomon to his susle;
 334.19. Se heahfæder him andwyrde: gif hi forseoð moyses æ.

arise;
 334.22. Ða þe forgymeleasiað þa eaðelican beboda

 334.25. Ic bidde eow mine gebroþra þæt ge beon gemyndige

tæhte: tiliað eow freonda on godes þearfum þæt hi on eowrum

 334.29. Manega lazaras ge habbað nu licgende æt eowerum gatum.

þeahhwæþere hi beoð eft eowre þingeras wið ðone ælmihtigan;
 334.32. Soðlice we sceoldon beodan þam þearfum þæt hi us

 334.34. Ne sceole we forseon heora wacnysse: for þan þe criste

 336.2. Me hingrode. and ge me gereordodon;
 336.3. Me þyrste and ge me scencton;
 336.3. Ic wæs nacod. and ge me scryddon;

 336.14. Yrnað earma and undoþ þæs mynstres geat ardlice:

 336.20. Þa cwæð se hælend mid ðam upstige. martiri. ne

 336.23. Broðor min. hwær is se ðe ðu feredest? He

 336.23. Gif ic wiste hwæt he wære. Ic wolde licgan æt his

 336.24. Þa ða ic hine bær. ne gefredde ic nanre byrðene

 336.25. Hu mihte he gefredan æniges hefes swærnysse? ða
ða he ðone ferode ðe hine bær;
 336.27. Nu cweð se halga gregorius. þæt se hælend ða
geseðde ðone cwyde þe he sylf cwæð;
 336.28. Þæt þæt ge doð þearfum on minum naman.
þæt ge doð me sylfum;
 336.30. Hwæt is on menniscum gecynde swa mærlic. swa cristes

 338.4. Se ðe rixað on ecnysse mid þam ælmihtigan fæder.
and þam halgan gaste. hi ðry on anre godcundnysse wunigende butan anginne
and ende. a. on worulde: amen;

oþrum bodian mid gastlicre lare hi beoð getealde to heahenglum. þæt is
to healicum bodum;
 344.25. Ða halgan þe on life wundra wyrcað. beoð
geendebyrde betwux þam heofonlicum mihtum. þe godes tacna gefremmaþ;

geendebyrde buton to þam heofonlicum anwealdum: þe gewyldaþ ða
feondlican costneras;
 344.31. Ða gecorenan þe ðurh healicum geearnungum þa
læssan gebroþru oferstigað mid ealdorscipe: þa habbað eac heora
dæl betwux þam heafonlicum ealderdomum;
 344.34. Sume beoð swa geþungene þæt hi wealdað mid heora
hlafordscipe ealle uncysta and leahtras on him sylfum: swa þæt hi beoð
godas getealde þurh ða healican clænnysse;
 346.1. Be þam cwæð se ælmihtiga to moysen: ic þe
gesette þæt ðu wære pharaones god: þas godes þegnas þe beoð
on swa micelre geþingðe. on gesihþe þæs ælmihtigan: þæt hi
sind godas getealde: hwyder gescyt þonne heora endebyrdnys? buton to þam
werode þe sind hlafordscipas gecwedene. for þan ðe him oðre englas
underþeodde beoð;
 346.8. On sumum gecorenum mannum þe mid micelre gymene on
andwerdum life drohtniað. bið godes gastes gifu swa micel. þæt he on
heora heortan swilce on þrymsetle sittende toscæt. and demð wunderlice
oþra manna dæda;
 346.11. Hwæt sind þas buton þrymsetl heora scyppendes. on
þam þe he wuniende mannum demð;
 346.13. Seo soðe lufu is gefyllednys godes æ. and se þe on
his þeawum hylt godes lufe. and manna. he bið ðonne cherubim rihtlice
gehaten. for þan ðe eall gewit and ingehid is belocen on twam wordum.
þæt is godes lufu and manna;
 346.17. Sume godes þeowan sind onælede mid swa micelre
gewilnunge heora scyppendes neawiste. þæt hi forseoð ealle woruldlice
ymbhydignysse: and mid byrnendum mode ealle ða ateorigendlican geþincðu

ontendað. and mid larlicre spræce getrymmað: hu magon þas beon
gecigede buton seraphim: þonne hi ðurh þone micclan bryne godes lufe sind
toforan oþrum eorðlicum. his neawiste gehendost;
 346.25. Nu cwyþ se eadiga gregorius. wa þære sawle þe
orhlyte hyre lif adrihð þæra haligra mihta. þe we nu sceortlice eow
gerehton;
 346.27. Ac seo þe bedæled is þam godnyssum. heo geomrige:
and gewilnige þæt se cystiga wealdend þurh his gife hi geþeode. þam
hlyte his gecorenra;
 346.29. Nabbað ealle men gelice gife æt gode: for þan ðe
he forgifð þa gastlican geþincþu. ælcum be his gecnyrdnyssum;
 346.31. Se þe læssan gife hæbbe. ne andige he on þam
foreþeondum: for þan ðe þa halgan þreatas þæra eadigra engla
sind swa geendebyrde. þæt hi sume mid underþeodnysse Oþrum
hyrsumiað. and sume mid oferstigendre wurðfulnysse. þam oþrum sind
foresette;
 348.1. Micel getel is þæra haligra gasta: þe on godes rice
eardiað;
 348.2. Be þam cwæð. se witega daniel;
 348.2. Ðusend þusenda þenodon þam heofonlican wealdende.
and tyn þusend siðan. hundfealde þusenda him mid wunedon;
 348.4. Oþer is ðenung: oþer is midwunung;
 348.5. Ða englas þeniað gode. þe bodiað his willan
middanearde: and þa ðing gefyllað þe him liciað;
 348.6. Ða oþre werod þe him mid wuniað brucað ðæra
incundan ymbwlatunge his godcundnysse: swa þæt hi nateshwon fram his
andwerdnysse asende ne gewitað;
 348.9. Soðlice þa ðe to us asende becumað. swa hi
gefremmað heora scyppendes hæse wiðutan: þæt hi ðeahhwæðere
næfre ne gewitað fram his godcundre myrhðe: for þan ðe god is
æighwær þeah ðe se engel stowlic sy;
 348.13. Nis se ælmihtiga wealdend stowlic. for þan ðe he is
on ælcere stowe. and swa hwider swa se stowlica engel flihð. he bið
befangen mid his andwerdnysse;
 348.16. Hi habbað sume synderlice gyfe fram heora scyppende: and
þeahhwæþere heora wurðscipe him bið eallum gemæne: and þæt
ðæt gehwilc on him sylfum be dæle hæfð. þæt he hæfþ on
oþrum werode fulfremodlice;
 348.19. Be þam cwæð se sealmwyrhta: drihten þu þe sitst
ofer cherubin: geswutela þe sylfne;
 348.22. We sædon lytle ær on þisre rædinge þæt
ðæs ælmihtigan þrymsetl wære betwux þam werode þe sind þroni
gecigede: ac hwa mæig beon eadig buton he his scyppendes wununge on him
sylfum hæbbe;
 348.25. Seraphim sind ða gastas gecigede. þe beoð on drihtnes
lufe byrnende: and þeahhwæðere eall þæt heofonlice mægen samod
beoð onælede mid his lufe;
 348.28. Cherubim is gecweden gefyllednyss ingehydes. oððe
gewittes: and þeah hwylc engel is on godes andweardnysse þe ealle þing
nyte? Ac for þi is gehwylc þæra weroda þam naman geciged. þe ða
gife getacnað. þe he fulfremedlicor underfeng;
 348.32. Ac uton suwian hwæthwega be þam digelnyssum þæra
heofonlicra ceastergewarena. and smeagan be us sylfum: and geomrian mid
behreowsunge ure synna. þæt we þurh drihtnes mildheortnysse þa
heofonlican wununga: swa swa he us behet. habban moton;
 350.1. He cwæð on sumere stowe: on mines fæder huse. sind
fela wununga: for þan gif sume beoð strengran on geearnungum. sume
rihtwisran. sume mid maran halignysse geglencgede: þæt heora nan ne beo
geælfremod fram þam micclan huse. þær þær gehwylc onfehð
wununge be his geearnungum;
 350.7. Se miltsienda drihten cwæð. þæt micel blis wære
on heofenum be anum dædbetan: ac se ylca cwæð þurh his witegan: gif
se rihtwisa gecyrð fram his rihtwisnysse. and begæð unrihtwisnysse
arleaslice: eall his rihtwisnyssa ic forgite;
 350.11. And gif se arleasa behreowsað his arleasnysse: and
begæð rihtwisnysse: ne gemune ic nanra his synna;
 350.12. Behreowsiendum mannum he miltsað: ac he ne behet þam
ælcygendum gewis lif oð merigen;
 350.14. Nis for þi nanum synfullum to yldigenne agenre
gecyrrednysse: þy læs þe he mid sleacnysse forleose þa tid godes
fyrstes;
 350.16. Smeage gehwylc mann his ærran dæda: and eac his
andwerdan drohtnunge: and fleo to þam mildheortan deman mid wope: þa hwile
þe he andbidað ure beterunge. se þe is rihtwis and mildheort;
 350.19. Soðlice behreowsað his gedwyld: se ðe ne
geedlæcð þa ærran dæda;
 350.20. Be þam cwæð se hælend. to þam gehæledan
beddredan;
 350.21. Efne nu þu eart gehæled. ne synga þu heononforð:
þy læs ðe þe sum þing wyrse gelimpe;
 350.24. Geleaffullum mannum mæg beon micel truwe and hopa: to
þam menniscum gode. criste: se þe is ure mundbora and dema: se þe
leofað and rixað mid fæder: on annysse þæs halgan gastes. on ealra
worulda woruld. AMEN;

teolunge his and his geferena neode foresceawode;
 392.23. His lara and his drohtnunga sind us unasmeagendlice: ac se
bið gesælig þe his mynegungum mid gecnyrdnysse gehyrsumað;
 392.28. He forlet ealle woruldþing and þam hælende anum
folgode: swa swa þis godspel cwyð. þe ge nu æt þysre þenunge
gehyrdon;
 392.31. On þære tide cwæð petrus se apostol to þam
hælende: efne we forleton ealle woruldþing and þe anum fyliað. hwæt
dest þu us to leane;
 392.33. <foreign>Matt 19</foreign> se hælend him andwyrde;
 392.33. <foreign>Matt 19</foreign> Soð ic secge eow. þæt ge ðe me fyliað
sceolon sittan ofer twelf domsetlum. on þære edcynninge. þonne ic sitte
on settle mines mægenþrymmes. and ge þonne demað twelf israhæla
mægðum;
 392.33. <foreign>Matt 19</foreign> And ælc þæra ðe forlæt for minum
naman: fæder oððe moder. gebroðru oððe gesweostru. wif oððe
bearn. land oððe gebytlu: be hundfealdum him bið forgolden. and he
hæfð ðærtoeacan þæt ece lif;
 392.34. Micel truwa hwearftlode on petres heortan: he ana spræc
for eallum þam heape: we forleton ealle þing: hwæt forlet petrus? He
wæs fiscere: and mid þam cræfte his teolode. and þeah he spræc mid
micelre bylde: we forleton ealle þing;
 394.4. Ac micel he forlet and his gebroþru þa ða hi forleton
ðone willan to agenne;
 394.5. Ðeah hwa forlæte micele æhta. and ne forlæt ða
gitsunge: ne forlæt he ealle ðing;
 394.6. Petrus forlet lytle þing. scip and net: ac he forlet ealle
þing þa ða he for godes lufon nan þing habban nolde;
 394.8. He cwæð. we fyliað ðe: nis na fulfremedlic fela
æhta to forlætenne. buton he gode fylige;
 394.10. Soðlice þa hæþenan uðwitan fela þing forleton
swa swa dyde socrates se þe ealle his æhta behwyrfde wið anum gyldenum
wecge. and syððan awearp þone wecg on widdre sæ. þæt seo gitsung
þæra æhta his willan ne hremde and abrude fram þære woroldlican
lare þe he lufode;
 394.15. Ac hit ne fremede him swa gedon. for þan ðe he ne
fyligde gode: ac his agenum willan. and for þi næfde þa heofenlican
edlean mid þam apostolum þe ealle woruldþing forsawon. for cristes lufon.
and mid gehyrsumnysse him filigdon;
 394.20. Petrus ða befran. hwæt sceal us getimian? we dydon swa
swa ðu us hete: hwæt dest þu us to edleane;
 394.21. Se hælend andwyrde;
 394.22. Soð ic eow secge. þæt ge þe me fyliað sceolon
sittan ofer twelf domsetlum on þære edcynninge þonne ic sitte on setle
mines mægenþrymmes: and ge þonne demað twelf israhela mæigðum;
 394.25. Edcynninge he het þæt gemænelice ærist: on þam
beoð ure lichaman geedcynnede to unbrosnunge. þæt is to ecum þingum;
 394.27. Tuwa we beoð on þysum life acennede: seo forme
acennednys is flæsclic of fæder and of meder seo oþer acennednys is
gastlic. þonne we beoð geedcynnede on þam halgan fulluhte on þam us
beoð ealle synna forgyfene þurh þæs halgan gastes gife;
 394.32. Seo þridde acennednys. bið on þam gemænelicum
æriste. on þam beoð ure lichaman geedcynnede to unbrosniendlicum
lichaman;
 394.35. On þam æriste sittað þa twelf apostoli mid criste
on heora domsettlum. and demað ðam twelf mæigðum israhela þeode;
 396.2. Þis twelffealde getel. hæfð micele getacnunge;
 396.2. Gif þa twelf mæigða ana beoð gedemede æt þam
micclum dome: hwæt deð þonne seo þreotteoðe mæigð leui? Hwæt
doð ealle þeoda middaneardes? wenst þu þæt hi beoð asyndrode fram
þam dome;
 396.6. Ac þis twelffealde getel is geset for eallum mancynne:
ealles ymbhwyrftes: for þære fulfremednysse his getacnunge;
 396.8. Twelf tida beoð on ðam dæge: and twelf monþas on
geare. twelf heahfæderas sind. twelf witegan. twelf apostoli;
 396.10. And þis getel hæfð maran getacnunga þonne þa
ungelæredan undergytan magon;
 396.11. Is nu for þi mid þysum twelffealdan getele ealles
middaneardes ymbhwyrft getacnod;
 396.14. Ða apostoli and ealle þa gecorenan. þe him
geefenlæhton beoð deman. on þam micclum dæge mid criste;
 396.15. Ðær beoð feower werod æt þam dome. twa
gecorenra manna. and twa wiðercorenra;
 396.17. Ðæt forme werod bið þæra apostola. and heora
efenlæcendra. þa ðe ealle woruldþing for godes naman forleton: hi
beoð ða demeras. and him ne bið nan dom gedemed;
 396.20. Oþer endebyrdnys bið geleaffulra woruldmanna him bið
dom geset: swa þæt hi beoð. asyndrede fram geman an þære
wiðercorenra. þus cweþendum drihtne;
 396.22. Cumað to me ge gebletsode mines fæder. and onfoð
þæt rice þe eow is gegearcod fram frymþe middaneardes;
 396.24. An endebyrdnyss bið ðæra wiðercorenra þa ðe
cyððe hæfdon to gode: ac hi ne beeodon heora geleafan mid godes bebodum:
þas beoð fordemede;
 396.27. Oþer endebyrdnyss bið ðæra hæþenra manna.
þe nane cyððe to gode næfdon;
 396.28. Ðysum bið gelæst se apostolica cwyde. þa ðe
buton godes æ. syngodon: hi eac losiað buton ælcere æ;
 396.30. To þysum twam endebyrdnyssum cweð ðonne se rihtwisa
dema: gewitað fram me ge awyriedan into þam ecum fyre þe is gegearcod
deofle. and his awyrigedum gastum;
 396.34. Ðæt godspel cwyð forð git: ælc þæra þe
forlæt for minum naman fæder oððe moder. gebroðru oððe
geswystru wif. oððe bearn. land oððe gebytlu. be hundfealdum him bið
forgolden. and he hæfð þærtoeacan þæt ece lif;
 398.3. Hundfeald getel is fulfremed. and se þe forlæt þa
ateorigendlican þing for godes naman he underfehð þa gastlican mede be
hundfealdum æt gode;
 398.6. Ðes cwyde belimpð swiðe to munuchades mannum. þa
ðe for heofonan rices myrhðe forlætað fæder and moder. and
flæsclice siblingas hi underfoð manega gastlice fæderas. and gastlice
gebroþru. for þan ðe ealle þæs hades menn þe regollice lybbað
beoð him to fæderum and to gebroþrum getealde and þærtoeacan hi
beoð mid edleane þæs ecan lifes gewelgode;
 398.12. Þa ðe ealle woruldþing be godes hæse forseoð.
and on gemænum þingum biwiste habbað. hi beoð fulfremede. and to þam
apostolum geendebyrde;
 398.15. Ða oðre þe ðas geþingþe nabbað þæt hi
ealle heora æhta samod forlætan magon: hi don þonne þone dæl for
godes naman þe him to onhagie. and him bið be hundfealdon ecelice geleanod.
swa hwæt swa hi be anfealdum hwilwendlice dælað;
 398.20. Micel todal is betwux þam gecyrredum mannum. sume hi
geefenlæcað þam apostolum. sume hi geefenlæcað iudan cristes
belæwan. sume annanian and saphiran. sume giezi;
 398.23. Ða ðe ealle gewitendlice þing to þæra apostola
efenlæcunge forseoð for intingan þæs ecan lifes: hi habbað lof. and
þa ecan edlean mid cristes apostolum;
 398.25. Se þe betwux munecum drohtniende on mynstres æhtum mid
facne swicað. he bið iudan gefera þe crist belæwde. and his wite mid
helwarum underfehð;
 398.28. Se þe mid twyfealdum geþance. to mynsterlicere
drohtnunge gecyrð: and sumne dæl his æhta dælð sumne him sylfum
gehylt. and næfð nænne truwan to þam ælmihtigan þæt he him
foresceawie andlyfene and gewæda. and oþre neoda he underfehð. þone
awyrigedan cwyde mid annanian and saphira þe swicedon on heora agenum
æhtum. and mid færlicum deaðe ætforan þam apostolum steorfende
afeollon;
 400.1. Se þe on munuclicere drohtnunge earfoðhylde bið. and
gyrnð þæra ðinga þe he on woruldlicere drohtnunge næfde. oððe
begytan ne mihte. buton twyn him genealæcð se hreofla giezi. þæs
witegan cnapan. and þæt þæt he on lichaman geþrowade þæt
ðrowað þes on his sawle;
 400.5. Se cnapa folgode þam mæran witegan eliseum. þa com
him to sum rice mann of þam leodscipe þe is syria gehaten. his nama wæs
naaman and he wæs reoflig: þa becom he to þam godes witegan eliseum on
iudea lande;
 400.9. And he þurh godes mihte fram þære coðe hine
geheælde;
 400.10. Ða bead he þam godes menn. for his hælðe
deorwurþe sceattas;
 400.11. Se witega him andwyrde. godes miht þe gehælde. na ic;
 400.12. Ne underfo ic þin feoh. þanca gode þinre
gesundfulnysse and bruc þinra æhta;
 400.14. Naaman ða gecyrde mid ealre his fare to his agenre
leode;
 400.16. Ða wæs þæs witegan cnapa giezi. mid gitsunge
undercropen. and ofarn þone þegen naaman þus mid wordum liccetende;
 400.18. Nu færlice comon tweigra witegena bearn to minum
lareowe: asend him twa scrud and sum pund;
 400.19. Se þegen him andwyrde;
 400.20. Waclic bið him swa lytel to sendenne: ac genim feower
scrud. and twa pund;
 400.21. He þa gewende ongean mid þam sceattum and bedigolode
his fær wið ðam witegan;
 400.23. Se witega him befran. hwanon come þu giezi? he andwyrde:
leof næs ic on nanre fare;
 400.24. Se witega cwæð;
 400.25. Ic geseah þurh godes gast. þa se þegen alihte of his
cræte and eode togeanes þe. and þu name his sceattas on feo. and on
reafe. hafa þu eac forð mid þam sceattum his reoflan. þu and eall þin
ofspring on ecnysse;
 400.28. And he gewende of his gesihðe mid snawhwitum hreoflan
beslagen;
 400.30. Is nu for þy munuchades mannum mid micelre gecnyrdnysse
to forbugenne þas yfelan gebysnunga: and geeuenlæcan þam apostolum.
þæt hi mid him and mid gode þæt ece lif habban moton. AMEN;

Eleventh Sunday after Pentecost: Text from Clemoes 1955-6, 411-24.



 402.1. <foreign>DOMINICA UNDECIMA POST PENTECOSTEN cum adpropinquaret iesus
hierusalem uidens ciuitatem</foreign>. Onsumere tide wæs se hælend farende to

þa weop he ofer hi þus cweþende;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> Gif þu wistest hwæt þe toweard is. þu
weope mid me;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> Witodlice on þysum dæge þu wunast on sibbe:
ac seo towearde wracu is nu bediglod fram þinum eagum;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> Se tima cymð þæt ðine fynd þe
ymbsittað mid ymbtrymminge. and þe on ælce healfe genyrwiað. and to
eorþan ðe astreccað. and þine bearn samod þe on ðe synd;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> Ne forlætað hi on ðe stan ofer stane: for
þan ðe þu ne oncneowe þone timan þinre geneosunge;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> Se Hælend þa eode into þam temple and
adræfde ut þa cypmen. þe ðærbinnon syllende and bicgende wæron:
cweþende to him;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> Hit is awriten þæt min hus is gebedhus: ac ge
hit habbað gedon sceaþum to scræfe;
 402.5. <foreign>Luke 19</foreign> þa genealæhton him to blinde and healte: and
he hi gehælde: and wæs tæcende dæighwomlice binnon þam temple;
 402.6. GREGORIVS se trahtnere. cwæð ðæt se hælend
beweope þære ceastre toworpennysse: þe gelamp æfter his þrowunge.
for þære wrace heora mandæda. þæt hi þone heofonlican
æðeling. manfullice acwellan woldon;
 402.9. He spræc mid woplicre stemne. na to þam weorcstanum.
oþþe to þære getimbrunge: ac spræc to þam ceastergewarum. þa he
mid fæderlicere lufe besargode. for þan þe he wiste heora forwyrd
hrædlice toweard;
 402.12. Feowertig geara fyrst godes mildheortnyss. forlet þam
wælhræwum ceastergewarum to behreowsunge heora mandæda. ac hi ne
gymdon nanre dædbote;
 402.15. Ac maran mandæda gefremedon. swa þæt hi oftorfodon
mid stanum þone forman godes cyþere. STEPHANVM. and iacobum. iohannes
broðer beheafdodon. eac þone rihtwisan iacobum hi ascufon of þam temple
and acwealdon: and ehtnysse on þam oþrum apostolum setton;
 402.19. Seo godes gelaðung þe on þære byrig æfter
cristes þrowunge under þam rihtwisan iacobe drohtniende wæs. ferde eall
samod of þære byrig to anre wic wið ðære ea iordanen for þan ðe
him com to godes hæs. þæt hi sceoldon fram þære manfullan stowe
faran. ær þan ðe seo wracu come;
 402.24. God þa oncneow þæt ða iudeiscan. nanre dædbote
ne gymdon: ac ma. and ma heora mandæda geihton sende him ða to romanisc
folc. and hi ealle fordyde;
 402.28. Uespasianus hatte se casere þe on þam dagum geweold
ealles middaneardes cynedome;
 402.29. Se asende his sunu titum. to oferwinnenne þa earman
iudeiscan;
 402.30. Ða gelamp hit swa þæt hi wæron gesamnode binnon
þære byrig hierusalem. six hund þusend manna swilce on anum cwearterne
beclysede: and hi wurdon þa utan ymbsette mid romaniscum here swa lange
þæt ðær fela þusenda mid hungre wurdon acwealde. and for þære
meniu man ne mihte hi bebyrigan: ac awurpon þa lic ofer þone weall;
 404.1. Sume þeah for mæglicre sibbe hi bebyrian woldon: ac hi
hrædlice for mægenleaste swulton;
 404.3. Gif hwa hwæt lytles æniges bigwistes him sylfum

 404.5. Sume hi cuwon heora gescy. sume heora hetera. sume streow

 404.7. Hit nis na gedafenlic þæt we on þisum halgum

 404.10. Wearð ða se mæsta dæl þæra arleasra mid

belaf stan ofer stane swa swa se hælend ær mid wope gewitegode;
 404.14. Ðæra cnapena þe binnon syxtyne geara ylde wæron

 404.17. Seo burh wearð syððan on oðre stowe getimbrod and

 404.19. Se hælend geswutelode for hwylcum intingan þeos

 404.21. He geneosode þa buruhware þurh his menniscnysse: ac hi

 404.23. Be þære gymeleaste spræc se witega mid ceorigendre

 404.26. Drihten cwæð to þære byrig: gif þu wistest

 404.28. Witodlice on þisum dæge þu wunast on sibbe ac þa

 404.30. Seo burhwaru wæs wuniende on woruldlicere sibbe. þa

 404.33. Gif heo þære yrmþe forewittig wære: ne mihte heo

 406.1. Drihten adræfde of þam temple. þa cypmen þus
cweþende: hit is awriten þæt min hus is gebedhus. and ge hit habbað
gedon sceaðum to scræfe;
 406.3. Ðæt tempel wæs gode gehalgod to his þenungum and

geþafedon þæt ðær cyping binnon gehæfde wære;
 406.6. Drihten þa ða he þæt unriht geseah he worhte ane

 406.8. Ðeos todræfednys getacnode þa toweardan toworpennysse
þurh romaniscum here: and se hryre gelamp swiþost. þurh gyltas þæra
ealdorbiscopa. þe binnan þam temple wuniende mid gehiwedre halignysse.
þæs folces lac underfengon: and þæra manna ehton þe buton lace
ðæt tempel gesohton;
 406.13. Hwæt wæs þæt tempel buton swilce sceaðena
scræf: þa þa ða ealdorbiscopas mid swilcere gytsunge gefyllede
wæron: and þa leaslican ceapas binnon þam godes huse geþafedon;
 406.16. Hit is on oþrum godspelle awriten. þæt ðær
sæton myneteras. and þær wæron gecype. hryþeru and sceap and
culfran;
 406.18. On þam dagum æfter gesetnysse þære ealdan æ.
man offrode gode hryþeru and scep and culfran. for getacnunge cristes
þrowunge: þa tihte seo gitsung þam sacerdum þæt man ðyllic orof
þær to ceape hæfde. gif hwa feorran come. and wolde his lac gode
offrian þæt he on gehendnysse to bicgenne gearu hæfde;
 406.23. Drihten þa adræfde þyllice cypan of þam halgan

 406.26. Him þa genealæhton. blinde. and healte. and he hi

 406.28. Se mildheorta drihten þe læt scinan his sunnan ofer

 406.33. He eac mid wundrum ða lare getrymde þæt ða

þam soðfæstan hælende gelyfan noldon;
 408.2. Nu cwyð se eadiga gregorius. þæt heora toworpennyss
hæfð sume gelicnysse to gehwylcum þwyrlicum mannum: þe blissiað on
yfeldædum. and on þam wyrstum þingum fægniað;
 408.5. Swilcera manna besargað se mildheorta drihten
dæighwomlice. se þe þa losiendlican buruhwaru mid tearum bemænde;
 408.7. Ac gif hi oncneowon þa genyþerunge þe him onsihð. hi
mihton hi sylfe mid rariendre stemne heofian;
 408.10. Soðlice þære losiendlican sawle belimpð þes
æfterfylienda cwyde;
 408.11. On þysum dæge þu wunast on sibbe ac seo towearde
wracu is nu bediglod fram þinum eagum;
 408.12. Witodlice seo þwyre sawul is on sibbe wuniende on hire
dæge. þonne heo on gewitendlicere tide blissað. and mid wurðmyntum
bið upahafen. and on hwilwendlicum bricum bið ungefoh. and on flæsclicum
lustum bið tolysed. and mid nanre fyrhte þæs toweardan wites ne bið
geegsod: ac bedigelað hire sylfre þa æfterfyliendan yrmþa: for þan
gif heo embe ða smeað. þonne bið seo woruldlice sib mid þære
smeagunge gedrefed;
 408.20. Heo hæfð ðonne sibbe on hire dæge þonne heo
nele þa andwerdan myryhðe gewæcan mid nanre care þære toweardan
ungesælðe;
 408.22. Ac gæð mid beclysedum eagum to þam witniendlicum
fyre;
 408.23. Seo sawul þe on ðas wisan nu drohtnað heo is to
geswencenne þonne ða rihtwisan blissiað. and ealle þa ateorigendlican
þing þe heo nu to sibbe. and blisse talað: beoð hyre þonne to
biternysse and to ceaste awende: for þan ðe heo micele sace wið hi sylfe
hæfð. hwi heo þa genyþerunge þe heo þonne ðolað nolde ær on
life mid ænigre carfulnysse foresceawian;
 408.29. Be þam is awriten: eadig bið se man þe symle bið
forhtiende: and soðlice se heardmoda befylð on yfele;
 408.31. Eft on oðre stowe mynegað ðæt halige gewrit;
 408.32. On eallum þinum weorcum beo þu gemyndig þines
endenextan dæges. and on ecnysse þu ne syngast;
 408.34. Seo halige ræding cwyð;
 408.34. Se tima cymð þæt ðine fynd þe ymbsittað mid
ymbtrymminge and þe on ælce healfe genyrwiað. and to eorþan ðe
astreccað. and þine bearn samod þe on ðe sind;
 410.2. Þæra sawla fynd sind þa hellican gastas. þe
besittað þæs mannes forðsið. and his sawle gif heo fyrenfull bið
to þære geferrædene heora agenre genyðerunge mid micelre angsumnysse
lædan wyllað;
 410.5. Ða deoflu æteowiað þære synfullan sawle

manfullan dæda. and hi mid menigfealdum þreatungum geangsumiað. þæt
heo on þam forþsiðe oncnawe mid hwylcum feondum heo ymbset bið. and
þeah nan utfær ne gemet: hu heo þam feondlicum gastum oðfleon mage;
 410.11. To eorðan heo bið astreht þurh hyre scylda

toworpene: swa swa se sealmsceop be þam gyddigende sang;
 410.16. Nelle ge truwian on ealdormannum ne on manna bearnvm.on

þam dæge losiað ealle heora geþohtas;
 410.20. Soðlice on þam godspelle fyligð;
 410.20. And hi ne forlætað on þe stan ofer stane;

ofer stane;
 410.23. Ac ðonne seo sawul bið to hire witnunge gelæd.
þonne bið eall seo getimbrung hire smeagunge toworpen;
 410.25. For þan ðe heo ne oncneow þa tid: hire geneosunge;

 410.31. Ðonne beoð þa hyre witneras on þære hellican

 410.34. Drihten eode into þam temple. and mid swipe þa cypan ut
adræfde;
 410.35. Ða cypmen binnon þam temple getacnodon unrihtwise

 412.2. Oxa teolað his hlaforde. and se lareow sylð oxan on
godes cyrcan gif he begæð his hlafordes teolunga þæt is. gif he
bodað godspel his underþeoddum. for eorðlicum gestreonum. and na for

 412.6. Mid sceapum he mangað: gif he dysegra manna herunga cepð
on arfæstum weorcum;
 412.7. Be swylcum cwæð se hælend. hi underfengon edlean
heora weorca. þæt is se hlisa ydelre herunge þe him gecweme wæs;
 412.10. Se lareow bið culfran cypa þe nele ða gyfe þe him
god forgeaf buton his gegearnungum: oþrum mannum buton sceattum nyt don: swa
swa crist sylf tæhte;
 412.12. Buton ceape ge underfengon þa gife. syllað hi oðrum
buton ceape;
 412.13. Se þe mid gehiwedre halignysse him sylfum teolað on
godes gelaþunge: and nateshwon ne carað ymbe cristes teolunga: se bið
untwylice mynetcypa getalod;
 412.16. Ac se hælend todræfð swylce cypan of his huse:
þonne he mid genyþerunge. fram geferrædene his gecorenra hi
totwæmð;
 412.19. Min hus is gebedhus. ge hit habbað gedon sceaðum to
scræfe;
 412.20. Hit getimað forwel oft þæt ða þwyran becumað

 412.24. Anes gehwylces geleaffulles mannes mod is godes hus: swa

 412.25. Godes tempel is halig. þæt ge sind;
 412.26. Ac þæt mod ne bið na gebedhus ac sceaþena

 412.29. And he wæs tæcende dæighwomlice. binnon þam

 412.30. Crist lærde þa ðæt folc on his andwerdnysse: and

 412.33. Ne bið na fulfremedlic þam gelyfedum þæt he yfeles

 412.34. Se eadiga gregorius cwæð;
 412.34. Mine gebroþra ic wolde eow ane lytle race gereccan: seo
mæig þearle eower mod getimbrian: gif ge mid gymene hi gehyran willað;
 414.1. Sum æþelboren man wæs on þære scire ualeria: se
wæs gehaten crisaurius se wæs swa micclum mid leahtrum afylled: swa
micclum swa he wæs mid eorðlicum welum gewelgod;
 414.4. He wæs toþunden on modignysse: and his flæsclicum

 414.6. Ac þa ða god gemynte his yfelnysse to geendigenne: þa

 414.7. Ða on þære ylcan tide þe he geendian sceolde. þa

onsigon. þæt hi his sawle. on þam forðsiðe mid him to hellicum
clysungum gegripon;
 414.10. He ongan þa biuian. and blacian and ungefohlice
swætan. and mid micclum hreame fyrstes biddan;
 414.13. And his sunu maximum þone ic geseah munuc syððan mid
gedrefedre stemne clypode and cwæð;
 414.14. Min cild maxime gehelp min onfoh me on þinum geleafan.
næs ic þe deriende. on ænigum þingum;
 414.16. Se sunu þa maximus mid micclum heofe gedrefed him to
com;
 414.17. He wand ða swa swa wyrm ne mihte geþolian þa

 414.19. He wende hine to wage þær hi him æt wæron. he
wende eft ongean þær he hi funde;
 414.20. Ða þa he swa swiðe geangsumod. his sylfes orwene
wæs: þa hrymde he mid micelre stemne and þus cwæð. lætað me
fyrst oðð to merien huruþinga fyrst oð to merien: ac mid þysum hreame
þa blacan fynd tugon þa sawle of þam lichaman and aweg gelæddon;
 414.25. Be þam is swutol þæt seo gesihð him wearð
æteowed for oþra manna beterunge na for his agenre;
 414.27. La hwæt fremode him þeah ðe he on forðsiðe þa
sweartan gastas geseah. þonne he ne moste þæs fyrstes habban þe he
gewilnode? Ac uton we beon carfulle þæt ure tima mid idelnysse ne losie.
and we þonne to weldædum gecyrran wyllað. þonne us se deað to
forðsiþe geþreatað;
 414.32. Ðu ælmihtiga drihten gemiltsa us synfullum and urne
forðsið swa gefada. þæt we gebettum synnum æfter þysum
fræcenfullum life þinum halgum geferlæhte beon moton;
 414.34. Sy þe lof and wuldor on ealra worulda woruld. AMEN;

DæGE þæs wælhreowan caseres. wæs se halga biscop sixtus on romana

 416.4. Syxtus þa unforhtmod to his preostum clypode;

 416.14. Se casere decius him cwæð to: geoffra þine lac þam

Assumption of the Virgin: Text from Clemoes 1955-6, 444-59.



 436.4. <foreign> 18 KALENDAS SEPTEMBRIS ASSVMPTIO SANCTE MARIE VIRGINIS </foreign>
HIERONIMVS se halga sacerd awrat ænne pistol be forðsiðe þære
eadigan marian godes cennestran to sumum halgan mædene hyre nama wæs
eustochium: and to hyre meder paulam. seo wæs gehalgod wydewe;
 436.9. To þysum twam wifmannum awrat se ylca hieronimus
menigfealde trahtbec. for þan ðe hi wæron haliges lifes menn and swiðe
gecneordlæcende on boclicum smeagungum;
 436.12. Ðes hieronimus wæs halig sacerd and getogen on
hebreiscum gereorde. and on greciscum. and on ledenum fulfremedlice and he
awende ure bibliothecan of hebreiscum bocum to leden spræce;
 436.15. He is se fyrmesta wealgstod betwux hebreiscum. and grecum.
and ledenwarum. twa and hundseofontig boca þære ealdan æ. and þære
niwan he awende on leden to anre bibliothecan buton oþrum menigfealdum
trahtbocum þe he mid gecneordum andgite deopþancellice asmeade;
 436.20. Ða æt nextan he dihte þisne pistol to þære
halgan wydewan paulam. and to þam godes mædene eustochium hyre dehter and
to eallum þam mædenlicum werode þe him mid drohtniende wæron. þus
cweðende;
 436.25. Witodlice ge neadiað me þæt ic eow recce hu seo
eadige maria on þysum dæigþerlicum dæge to heofonlicere wununge
genumen wæs þæt eower mædenlica heap hæbbe þas lac ledenre
spræce hu ðes mæra freolsdæig geond æighwylces geares ymbrene beo
aspend mid heofonlicum lofe and mid gastlicere blisse gemærsod sy: þy
læs ðe eow on hand becume. seo lease gesetnyss. þe ðurh gedwolmannum
wide tosawen is. and ge ðonne þa gehiwedan leasunge for soðre race
underfoð;
 438.3. Soðlice fram anginne þæs halgan godspelles ge
leornodon hu se heahengel gabrihel þam eadigan mædene marian þæs
heofonlican æþelinges acennednysse gecydde. and þæs hælendes
wundra. and þære gesæligan cennestran þenunge. and hyre lifes dæda
on þam feower godspellicum bocum ge swutellice oncneowon;
 438.8. Iohannes se godspellere awrat on cristes þrowunge.
þæt he sylf and maria stodon mid dreorigum mode wið ðære halgan
rode þe se hælend on gefæstnod wæs;
 438.11. Ða cwæð he to his agenre meder. þu fæmne. efne
her is þin sunu;
 438.12. Eft he cwæð to iohannem. loca nu. her stent þin
moder;
 438.13. Syððan of ðam dæge hæfde se godspellere
iohannes gymene þære halgan marian. and mid carfulre þenunge swa swa
agenre meder gehyrsumode;
 438.17. Drihten þurh his arfæstnysse betæhte þæt
eadige mæden his cennestran þam clænan men iohanne se ðe on clænum
mæigðhade symle wunode: and he for þy synderlice þam drihtne leof
wæs. to þan swiðe. þæt he him þone deorwurðan maðm ealles
middaneardes cwene betæcan wolde;
 438.23. Gewislice þæt hire clænesta mæigðhad: þam
clænan men geþeod wære. mid gecwemre geferrædene. on wynsumre
drohtnunge;
 438.24. On him bam wæs an miht ansundes mæigðhades: ac
oþer intinga on marian;
 438.25. On hire is wæstmbære mæigðhad: swa swa on nanum
oðrum;
 438.26. Nis on nanum oþrum menn mæigðhad gif þær bið
wæstmbærnys: ne wæstmbærnys gif þær bið ansund
mæigðhad;
 438.28. Nu is for þi gehalgod æigðer ge marian mæigðhad
ge hyre wæstmbærnys þurh ða godcundlican acennednysse. and heo ealle
oþre oferstihð on mæigðhade and on wæstmbærnysse;
 438.31. Ðeahhwæþere þeah heo synderlice iohannes gymene
betæht wære hwæþere heo drohtnode gemænelice æfter cristes
upstige mid ðam apostolicum werode. infarende. and utfarende betwux him: and
hi ealle mid micelre arwurðnysse and lufe hire þenodon;
 438.35. And heo him cuðlice ealle þing ymbe cristes
menniscnysse gewissode: for þan ðe heo fram frymþe gewislice þurh
ðone halgan gast hi ealle geleornode and mid agenre gesihðe geseah. þeah
ðe þa apostoli þurh ðone ylcan gast ealle þing undergeaton. and on
ealre soðfæstnysse gelærede wurdon;
 440.5. Se heahengel gabrihel hi ungewemmede geheold and heo wunode
on iohannes and on ealra þæra apostola gymene on þære heofenlican
scole ymbe godes æ smeagende: oð ðæt god on þysum dæge hi genam
to þam heofonlican þrymsetle and hi ofer engla weredum geufrode;
 440.11. Nis geræd on nanre bec nan swutelre gewissung be hire
geendunge buton þæt heo nu todæig wuldorfullice of þam lichaman ge
wat;
 440.13. Hyre byrigen is swutol eallum onlociendum oð þysne
andweardan dæg on middan þære dene iosaphat: seo dene is betwux
þære dune sion. and þam munte olifeti. and seo byrigen is æteowod
open and æmtig. and þæronuppon on hire wurðmynte is aræred mære
cyrce mid wunderlicum stangeweorce;
 440.18. Nis nanum deadlicum men cuð. hu oððe on hwilcere tide
hyre halga lichama þanon ætbroden wære: oððe hwider he ahafen sy:
oððe hwæðer heo of deaðe arise;
 440.21. Cwædon þeah gehwylce lareowas þæt hyre sunu. se
þe on þam ðriddan dæge mihtilice of deaðe aras. þæt he eac his
moder lichaman of deaðe arærde. and mid undeadlicum wuldre on heofenan
rice gelogode;
 440.24. Eac swa gelice forwel menige lareowas on heora bocum setton
be þam geedcucedum mannum þe mid criste of deaðe arison þæt hi
ecelice arærede sind;
 440.27. Witodlice hi andetton þæt ða aræredan menn
næron soðfæste gewitan cristes æristes buton hi wæron ecelice
arærede;
 440.29. Ne wiðcweþe we be þære eadigan marian þa ecan
æriste þeah for wærscipe gehealdenum geleafan us gedafenað þæt
we hit wenon swiþor þonne we unrædlice hit geseþan. þæt ðe is
uncuð buton ælcere fræcednysse;
 440.33. We rædað gehwær on bocum þæt forwel oft englas
comon to goddra manna forðsiþe. and mid gastlicum lofsangum heora sawla to
heofenum gelæddon;
 440.35. And þæt gyt swutelicor is: men gehyrdon on þam

 442.2. On þam is cuð þæt ða halgan menn þe to godes

heora sawla underfoð. and mid micelre blisse to reste gelædað;
 442.5. Nu gif se hælend swilcne wurðmynt on his halgena

 442.13. Nis nan twynung þæt eall heofonlic þrym þa mid

 442.16. Witodlice he wolde gefyllan þurh hine sylfne þæt he

 442.18. Arwurþa ðinne fæder. and þine moder;

gearwurþode swa swa he cwæð. to þam iudeiscum;
 442.20. Ic arwurðie minne feder. and ge unawurðiað me;

 444.9. He cwæð;

 446.2. Godes gecorenan scinað on heofonlicum wuldre ælc be his

 448.1. Herian eac and wurþian þa ðe on sinscipe wuniað: for

 452.1. Ða eode se biscop into þære oþere cyrcan þær

 454.10. <foreign> 8 KALENDAS SEPTEMBRIS PASSIO SANCTI BARTHOLOMEI APOSTOLI
</foreign> Wyrdwriteras secgað þæt þry leodscipas sin gehatene india: seo forme
india lið to þæra silhearwena rice: seo oþer lið to medos. seo
þridde to þam micclum garsecge þeos ðridde india hæfð on anre
sidan þeostru and on oþre ðone grimlican garsecg;
 454.16. To þyssere becom godes apostol bartholomeus: and eode
into þam temple to þam deofolgilde astaroð. and swa swa ælþeodig
þær wunode;
 454.18. On þam deofolgylde wunode swilc deofol þe to mannum
þurh ða anlicnysse spræc: and gehælde untruman. blinde and healte
þa ðe he sylf ær awyrde;
 454.21. He derode manna gesihþum: and heora lichaman mid mislicum
untrumnyssum awyrde. and andwyrde him þurh ða anlicnysse. þæt hi him
heora lac offrian sceoldon. and he hi gehælde: ac he him ne heolp mid nanre
hæle: ac þa ða hi to him bugon þa geswac he þære lichamlican
gedrecednysse. for þan ðe he. ahte þa heora sawla. þa wendon dysige men
þæt he hi gehælde: þa ða he ðære drecednysse geswac;
 454.29. Ða mid þam þe se apostol into þam temple eode þa
adumbode se deofol astaroð and ne mihte nanum þæra ðe he awyrde
gehelpan for þæs halgan godes þegenes neawiste;
 456.2. Ða lagon þær binnon þam temple fela adligra manna.
and dæghwomlice. þam deofolgylde offrodon: ac þa ða hi gesawon
þæt he heora helpan ne mihte. ne nanum andwyrdan. ða ferdon hi to
gehendre byrig þær ðær oþer deofel wæs gewurþod þæs nama
wæs berið and him offrodon. and befrinon hwi heora god him andwyrdan ne
mihte;
 456.7. Se deofol þa berið andwyrde. and cwæð;
 456.8. Eower god is swa fæste mid isenum racenteagum gewriþen
þæt he ne gedyrstlæcð. þæt he furþon orþie oððe sprece.
syððan se godes apostol bartholomeus binnon þam temple becom;
 456.11. He axodon;
 456.12. Hwæt is se bartholomeus? Se deofol andwyrde;
 456.13. He is freond þæs ælmihtigan godes. and þy he com
to þyssere scire þæt he aydlige ealle ða hæðengyld. þe þas
indiscan wurðiað;
 456.15. Hi cwædon;
 456.15. Sege us his nebwlite þæt we hine oncnawan magon;
 456.16. Berið him andwyrde;
 456.16. He is blæcfexede. and cyrps hwit on lichaman. and he
hæfþ steape eagan and medemlice nosu. and side beardas. hwon harwenge.
medemne wæstm. and is ymbscryd mid hwitum oferslype and binnon six and
twentig geara næs his reaf horig ne tosigen ne his scos forwerode;
 456.21. Hund siðon he bigð his cneowa on dæge. and hund
siþon on nihte. biddende his drihten;
 456.22. His stemn is swilce ormæte byme: and him farað mid
godes englas þe ne geþafiað. þæt him hungor derige. oððe ænig
ateorung;
 456.25. Æfre he bið anes modes. and glæd þurhwunað;
 456.26. Ealle þing he foresceawað and wat: and ealra ðeoda
gereord he can;
 456.27. Nu iu he wat hwæt ic be him sprece. for þan ðe godes
englas him þeowiað and ealle þing cyþað;
 456.28. Ðonne ge hine secað gif he sylf wyle ge hine gemetað.
gif he nele. soðlice ne finde ge hine;
 456.30. Ic bidde eow þæt ge hine geornlice biddon. þæt he
hider ne gewende. þy læs ðe godes englas þe him mid sind me gebeodon
þæt hi minum geferan astarað gebudon;
 456.33. And se deofol mid þysum wordum suwade;
 456.34. Hi gecyrdon ongean and sceawedon ælces ælþeodiges
mannes andwlitan and gyrlan. and hi nateshwon binnon twegra daga fæce hine
ne gemetton;
 458.1. Ða betwux þysum hrymde sum wod man þurh deofles gast.
and cwæð;
 458.2. Eala þu godes apostol bartholomee. þine gebedu
geangsumiað me and ontendað;
 458.4. Se apostol þa cwæð;
 458.4. Adumba þu unclæna deofol. and gewit of þam men: and
þærrihte wearð se man geclænsod fram þam fulan gaste and
gewittiglice spræc: se þe for manegum gearum awedde;
 458.8. Þa geaxode se cyning polimius be þam witseocum menn. hu
se apostol hine fram þære wodnysse ahredde. and het hine to him gelangian.
and cwæð;
 458.10. Min dohter is hreowlice awed: nu bidde ic þe ðæt
ðu hi on gewitte gebringe. swa swa þu dydest seustium se þe for manegum
gearum mid egeslicre wodnysse gedreht wæs;
 458.13. Ða þa se apostol þæt mæden geseah mid heardum
racenteagum gebundene for þan ðe heo bat and totær ælcne þe heo
geræcan mihte and hire nan man genealæcan ne dorste. þa het he hi
unbindan;
 458.16. Ða ðenas him andwyrdon;
 458.17. Hwa dear hi hreppan;
 458.17. Bartholomeus andwyrde;
 458.18. Ic hæbbe gebunden þone feond þe hi drehte. and ge
gyt hi ondrædað? gað to and unbindað hi. and gereordiað. and on
ærnemerigen lædað hi to me;
 458.20. Hi þa dydon be þæs apostoles hæse. and se
awyrigeda gast ne mihte na leng hi dreccan;
 458.23. Ða þæs on merien se cyning polimius gesymde gold and
seolfor and deorwurþe gymmas and pællene gyrelan uppon olfendum. and sohte
þone apostol. ac he hine nateshwon ne gemette;
 458.26. Eft þæs on merien com se apostol into þæs cinges
bure beclysedre dura and hine befran;
 458.27. Hwi sohtest þu me mid golde and mid seolfre and mid
deorwurðum gymmum and gyrelum? þas lac behofiað þa ðe eorðlice
welan secað. ic soðlice nanes eorþlices gestreones ne flæsclices
lustes ne gewilnige;
 458.31. Ac ic wylle þæt ðu wite þæt þæs
ælmihtigan godes sunu gemedemode hine sylfne. þæt he ðurh
mædenlicum innoðe acenned wearð: se þe geworhte heofonas and eorþan.
and ealle gesceafta;
 458.34. And he hæfde angin on þære menniscnysse. se þe
næfre ne ongan on godcundnysse ac he sylf is angyn. and eallum gesceaftum
ægðer ge gesewenlicum ge ungesewenlicum angyn forgeaf;
 460.2. Ðæt mæden þæt hine gebær forhogode ælces
weres gemanan: and þam ælmihtigan gode hire mæiðhad behet;
 460.4. Hyre com to godes heahengel gabrihel. and hyre cydde
þæs heofonlican æþelinges tocyme. on hyre innoþe. and heo his
wordum gelyfde. and swa mid þam cilde wearð;
 460.8. Se apostol þa þam cinge bodade ealne cristendom and
middaneardes alysednysse. þurh ðæs hælendes tocyme. and hu he ðone
hellican deofol gewylde and him mancynnes benæmde. and cwæð;
 460.11. Drihten crist se ðe þurh his unscyldigum deaðe þone
deofol oferswiðde sende us geond ealle þeoda. þæt we todræfdon
deofles þenas. þa ðe on anlicnyssum wuniað: and þæt we ða
hæþenan þe hi wurþiað of heora anwealde ætbrudon. and we ne
underfoð gold ne seolfor ac forseoð. swa swa crist forseah: for þan ðe
we gewilniað þæt we rice beon on his rice on þam næfð adl ne
untrumnyss ne unrotnyss. ne deað nænne stede: ac þær is ece sælð
and eadignys. gefea buton ende mid ecum welum: for þi ic ferde to eowerum
temple. and se deofol þe eow þurh ða anlicnysse geandwyrde. þurh godes
englum þe me sende is gehæft. and gif þu to fulluhte gebihst. ic do
þæt ðu þone deofol gesihst and gehyrst mid hwylcum cræfte he is
geþuht ðæt he untrumnysse gehæle;
 460.24. Se awyrigeda deofol syððan he ðone frumsceapenan man
beswac. syððan he hæfde anweald ofer ungelyfedul mannum. on sumum maran
on sumum læssan;
 460.27. On þam maran þe swiþor syngiað: on þam læssan
ðe hwonlicor syngiað;
 460.28. Nu deð se deofol mid his lotwrencum þæt ða earman
men geuntrumiað: and tiht hi þæt hi sceolon gelyfan on deofolgyldum.
þonne geswicð he þære gedrecednysse and hæfð heora sawla on his
anwealde þonne hi cweðað to þære deofollican anlicnysse þu eart
min god;
 460.32. Ac þes deofol þe binnon eowrum temple wæs is
gebunden. and ne mæg nateshwon andwyrdan. þam ðe him to gebiddað;
 460.34. Gif þu wilt afandian ðæt ic soð secge. ic hate
hine faran into þære anlicnysse. and ic do þæt he andet þis ylce.
þæt he is gewriþen. and nane andsware syllan ne mæg;
 462.3. Ða andwyrde se cyning;
 462.3. Nu to merigen hæfð þis folc gemynt þæt hi heora
lac him offrian. þonne cume ic þærto þæt ic geseo þas wunderlican
dæda;
 462.5. Witodlice on þam oþrum dæge com se cyning mid
þære burhware to þam temple: and þa hrymde se deofol mid egeslicere
stemne ðurh ða anlicnysse. and cwæð;
 462.8. Geswicað earma geswicað eowera offrunga þy læs ðe
ge wyrsan pinunge þrowian þonne ic;
 462.9. Ic eom gebunden mid fyrenum racenteagum fram cristes
englum.þone ðe þa iudeiscan on rode ahengon. wendon þæt se deað
hine gehæftan mihte;
 462.12. He soðlice þone deað oferswiðde. and urne ealdor
mid fyrenum bendum gewrað. and on þam þriddan dæge sigefæst aras
and sealde his rodetacen his apostolum. and tosende hi geond ealle þeoda: an
þæra is her þe me gebundenne hylt: ic bidde eow þæt ge me to him
geþingian. þæt ic mote faran to sumere oþre scire;
 462.18. Ða cwæð se apostol bartholomeus. þu unclæna
deofol:;
 462.19. Andete hwa awyrde þas untruman men? se unclæna gast
andwyrde;
 462.20. Ure ealdor swa gebunden swa he is. sent us to mancynne
þæt we hi mid mislicum untrumnyssum awyrdon: ærest heora lichaman for
þan ðe we nabbað nænne anweald on heora sawlum buton hi heora lac us
geoffrian;
 462.23. Ac þonne hi for heora lichaman hælðe us offriað
þonne geswice we þæs lichaman gedrecednysse. for þan ðe we habbað
syððan heora sawla on urum gewealde;
 462.26. Þonne bið geþuht swilce we hi gehælon. þonne we
geswicað þæra awyrdnyssa. and men us wurþiað for godas. þonne we
soðlice deoflu sind: þæs ealdres gyngran. þe crist þæs mædenes
sunu gewrað;
 462.29. Fram þam dæge þe his apostol bartholomeus hider com.
ic eom mid byrnendum racenteagum þearle fornumen. and for þi ic sprece þe
he me het: elles ic ne dorste on his andweardnysse sprecan: ne furþon ure
ealdor;
 462.34. Ða cwæð se apostol;
 462.34. Hwi nelt þu gehælan þas untruman swa swa þin
gewuna wæs;
 462.35. Se sceocca andwyrde;
 462.35. Ðonne we manna lichaman deriað. buton we þære
sawle derian magon þa lichaman þurhwuniað on heora awyrdnysse;
 464.2. Bartholomeus cwæð;
 464.3. And hu becume ge to þære sawle awyrdnysse? Se deofol
andwyrde;
 464.4. Ðonne hi gelyfað þæt we godas sind. and us
offriað þonne forlæt se ælmihtiga god hi. and we þonne
forlætað þone lichaman ungebrocedne and cepað ðære sawle þe us
to gebeah. and heo þonne on ure anwealde bið;
 464.9. Ða cwæð se apostol to eallum þam folce: efne nu ge
habbað gehyred hwilc þes god is þe ge wendon þæt eow gehælde;
 464.11. Ac gehyrað nu þone soþan god eowerne scyppend þe on
heofenum eardað. and ne gelyfe ge heononforð on ydelum anlicnyssum;
 464.13. And gif ge wyllað þæt ic eow to gode geþingie: and
þæt ðas untruman hælðe underfon: towurpað þonne þas
anlicnysse. and tobrecað;
 464.15. Gif ge þis doð. þonne halgie ic. þis tempel on
cristes naman. and eow þæroninnan mid his fulluhte fram eallum synnum
aþwea;
 464.17. Ða het se cyning þa anlicnysse towurpan;
 464.18. Hwæt ðæt folc þa caflice mid rapum hi bewurpon.
and mid stengum awegdon: ac hi ne mihton for þam deofle þa anlicnysse
styrian;
 464.21. Ða het se apostol tolysan þa rapas and cwæð to
þam awyrigedan gaste þe hire on sticode;
 464.22. Gif þu wille þæt ic þe on niwelnysse ne asende:
gewit of þissere anlicnysse and tobrec hi. and far to westene þær nan
fugel ne flyhð. ne yrðling ne erað. ne mannes stemn ne swegð;
 464.25. He þærrihte ut gewat. and sticmælum tobræc þa
anlicnysse. and ealle þa græftas binnon þam temple tobrytte;
 464.27. Ðæt folc þa mid anre stemne clypode: an ælmihtig
god is þone þe bartolomeus bodað;
 464.29. Se apostol ða astrehte his handa wið heofenas weard
þus biddende;
 464.30. Þu ælmihtiga god on þam ðe abraham gelyfde. and
isaac and iacob. þu ðe asendest þinne ancennedan sunu. þæt he us
alysde mid his deorwurþum blode fram deofles þeowdome. and hæfþ us
geworht þe to bearnum;
 464.34. Ðu eart unacenned fæder: he is sunu of þe æfre
acenned. and se halga gast is æfre forðstæppende of þe and of þinum
bearne: se forgeaf us on his naman þas mihte þæt we untrume gehælon
and blinde onlihton hreoflige geclænsian. deoflu afligan. deade aræran.
and cwæð to us. soð ic eow secge: swa hwæt swa ge biddað on minum
naman æt minum fæder. hit bið eow getiðod: nu bidde ic on his naman.
þæt ðeos untrume meniu sy gehæled: þæt hi ealle oncnawon
þæt ðu eart ana god on heofonum and on eorþan. and on sæ. þu ðe
hælðe geedstaþelast þurh þone ylcan urne drihten. se þe mid þe
and mid þam halgan gaste. leofað and rixað on ealra worulda woruld;
 466.10. Mid þam ðe hi andwyrdon amen. þa wearð eal seo
untrume meniu gehæled. and þær com þa fleogende godes engel scinende
swa swa sunne. and fleah geond þa feower hwemmas þæs temples and agrof
mid his fingre rodetacen on þam fyþerscytum stanum and cwæð;
 466.15. Se god þe me sende. cwæð þæt. swa swa þas
untruman sind gehælede fram eallum coþum. swa he geclænsode þis
tempel fram þæs deofles fulnyssum: þone þe se apostol het to westene
gewitan;
 466.18. And god bebead me þæt ic ðone deofol eowerum
gesihþum ær æteowie;
 466.19. Ne beo ge afyrhte þurh his gesihðe: ac mearciað
rodetacen on eowerum foreheafdum. and ælc yfel gewit fram eow;
 466.22. And se engel þa æteowde þam folce þone awyrigedan
gast on þyssere gelicnysse;
 466.23. He wearð ða æteowod swilce ormæte silhearwa. mid
scearpum nebbe. mid sidum bearde his loccas hangodon to þam anccleowum. his
eagan wæron fyrene spearcan sprencgende. him stod sweflan lig of þam
muðe. he wæs egeslice gefiþerhamod. and his handa to his bæce
gebundene;
 466.28. Ða cwæð se godes engel to þam atelican deofle;
 466.29. For þan ðe þu wære gehyrsum þæs apostoles
hæsum. and tobræce þas deofollican anlicnysse. nu æfter his behate
ic ðe unbinde þæt ðu fare to westene þær þær nanes mannes
drohtnung nis. and þu ðær wunie oð ðam micclum dome. and se engel
hine þa unband. and he mid hreowlicere wanunge aweg gewat. and nahwar
syððan ne æteowde;
 466.34. Se engel þa him eallum onlociendum fleah to heofenum;
 468.1. Hwæt ða se cyning polimius mid his wife. and his twam
sunum and mid eallum his leode gelyfde on þone soðan god and wearð
gefullod. and awearp his cynehelm samod mid his purpuran gyrlum. and nolde
þone godes apostol forlætan;
 468.5. Æfter þysum gesamnodon gehwylce þwyrlice wiþercoran
and wrehton þone cyning to his breþer astrigem se wæs cyning on oþrum
leodscipe. and cwædon. þin broþer is geworden anes dryes folgere: se
geagnað him ure tempel and ure godas tobrycð;
 468.9. Ða wearð se cyning astriges gehathyrt. and sende
þusend gewæpnodra cempena þæt hi ðone apostol gebundenne to him
bringan sceoldon;
 468.11. Ða þa se apostol him to gelæd wæs. þa cwæð
se cyning. hwi amyrdest þu minne broþer mid þinum drycræfte?
Bartholomeus andwyrde;
 468.14. Ne amyrde ic hine. ac ic hine awende fram hæþenum
gylde to þam soþan gode;
 468.15. Se cyning him to cwæð;
 468.15. Hwi towurpe þu ure godas? he andwyrde;
 468.16. Ic sealde ða mihte þam deoflum þæt hi tocwysdon
þa ydelan anlicnysse þe hi on wunedon þæt ðæt mennisce folc fram
heora gedwylde gecyrde and on þam ecan gode gelyfde;
 468.19. Ða cwæð se cyning swa swa þu dydest minne broðer
his god forlætan. and on þinum gode gelyfan: swa do ic eac þe
forlætan þinne god. and on minum gelyfan ða andwyrde se apostol;
 468.22. Ic æteowode þone god þe ðin broðor wurðode him
gebundenne. and ic het þæt he sylf his anlicnysse tobræce: gif þu
miht ðis don minum gode þonne gebigst þu me to þines godes bigencgum;
 468.26. Gif þu ðonne þis minum gode don ne miht. ic tobryte
ealle þine godas and þu ðonne gelyf on þam soþan gode þe ic bodie;
 468.29. Mid þam þe hi ðis spræcon þa cydde sum man þam
cyninge þæt his mæsta god baldað feolle. and sticmælum toburste;
 468.31. Se cyning ða totær his purpuran reaf. and het mid
stiþum saglum þone apostol beatan. and syððan beheafdian and he þa on
ðysum dæge swa gemartyrod to þam ecan life gewat;
 468.34. Witodlice æfter þysum com se broðer mid his folce
and þone halgan lichaman mid wulderfullum lofsangum aweg ferodon: and
getimbrodon mynster wunderlicere micelnysse. and on þam his halgan reliquias
arwurðlice gelogodon;
 470.3. Eornostlice on þam þreotteoþan dæge se cyning
astries þe ðone apostol ofslean het wearð mid feondlicum gaste gegrypen.
and egeslice awedde;
 470.5. Swa eac ealle þa ðwyran hæþengyldan. þe ðone
apostol mid niðe to ðam cyninge gewregdon aweddon samod mid him: and urnon
hi and he to his byrgene. and þær wedende swulton;
 470.8. Ða asprang micel oga and gryre ofer eallum þam
ungeleaffullum. and hi þa gelyfdon and gefullude wurdon æt ðæra
mæssepreosta handum þe se apostol ær gehadode;
 470.11. Ða onwreah se apostol bartholomeus be þam geleaffullan
cyninge polimius þæt he biscophad underfenge. and þa godes þeowan and
þæt geleffulle folc hine anmodlice to þam hade gecuron;
 470.14. Hit gelamp þa æfter þære hadunge þæt he
worhte fela tacna on godes naman þurh his geleafan and þurhwunode twentig
geara on þam biscopdome. and on goddre drohtnunge. and fulfremedum
geðincðum gewat to drihtne. þam is wurðmynt and wuldor a. on worulde;
 470.19. We magon niman bysne be ðære apostolican lare.
þæt nan cristen man ne sceal his hæle gefeccan buton æt þam
ælmihtigum scyppende. þam ðe gehyrsumað lif and deað. untrumnys and
gesundfulnys. se þe cwæð on his godspelle þæt an lytel fugel ne
befylð on deaðe buton godes dihte;
 470.23. He is swa mihtig þæt he ealle þing gediht and
gefadað buton geswince: ac he beswincð mid untrumnyssum his gecorenan swa
swa he sylf cwæð;
 470.26. Þa ðe ic lufie ða ic þreage and beswinge;
 470.27. For mislicum intingum beoð cristene men geuntrumode:
hwilon for heora synnum. hwilon for fandunge: hwilon for godes wundrum. hwilon
for gehealdsumnysse goddra drohtnunga: þæt hi þy eadmoddran beon: ac on
eallum þysum þingum is geþyld nydbehefe;
 470.31. Hwilon eac þurh godes wrace becymð þam arleasan men
swiðe egeslic yfel. swa þæt his wite onginð on þyssere worulde: and
his sawul gewit to ðam ecum witum for his wælhreawnysse. swa swa herodes.
þe ða unscæððigan cild acwealde. on cristes acennednysse. and manega
oþre toeacan him;
 472.2. Gif se synfulla bið gebrocod for his unrihtwisnysse.
þonne gif he mid geþylde his drihten herað and his miltsunge bit: he
bið ðonne aþwogen fram his synnum þurh ða untrumnysse: swa swa horig
hrægel. þurh sapan;
 472.6. Gif he rihtwis bið he hæfð þonne maran
geþingcðe þurh his brocunge gif he geþyldig bið;
 472.7. Se þe bið ungeþyldig and mid gealgum mode ceorað
ongean god on his untrumnysse. he hæfð twyfealde genyþerunge. for þan
ðe he geycð his synna mid þære ceorunge and þrowað na þe
læs;
 472.12. God is se soða læce þe ðurh mislicum swincgelum
his folces synna gehælð;
 472.13. Nis se woruldlæce wælhreow þeah ðe he þone
gewundodan mid bærnette oððe mid ceorfseaxe galacnie;
 472.15. Se læce cyrfð oððe bærnð and se untruma
hrymð þeahhwæþere ne miltsað he þæs oþres wanunge. for þan
gif se læce geswicð his cræftes: þonne losað se forwundoda;
 472.18. Swa eac god gelacnað his gecorenra gyltas mid mislicum
brocum;
 472.19. And þeah ðe hit hefityme sy þam ðrowiendum
þeahhwæðere wyle se goda læce to ecere hælðe hine gelacnian;
 472.21. Witodlice se þe nane brocunge for þysum life ne
þrowað. he færð to þrowunge;
 472.22. For agenum synnum bið se man geuntrumod: swa swa drihten
cwæð to sumum bedredan þe him to geboren wæs;
 472.24. Min bearn. þe sind þine synna forgyfene. aris nu and
ber ham þin legerbed;
 472.26. For fandunge beoð sume men geuntrumode swa swa wæs se
eadiga iob. þa ða he wæs rihtwis and gode gehyrsum. þa bæd se
deofol þæt he his fandian moste: and he þa anes dæges ealle his
æhta amyrde. and eft hine sylfne mid þam mæstan broce geuntrumode swa
þæt him weollon maþan geond ealne ðone lichaman: ac se geþyldiga iob
on eallum þysum ungelimpum ne syngode mid his muþe. ne nan þing
stuntlices ongean god ne spræc: ac cwæð;
 472.33. God me forgeaf þa æhta and hi eft æt me genam: sy
his nama gebletsod;
 472.35. God eac ða hine gehælde. and his æhta mid
twyfealdum him forgeald;
 474.1. Sume men beoð geuntrumode for godes tacnum swa swa crist
cwæþ be sumum blindan men þa ða his leorningcnihtas hine axodon þurh
hwæs synnum se man wurde swa blind acenned: þa cwæð se hælend
þæt he nære for his agenum synnum ne for his maga blind geboren: ac for
þy þæt godes wundor þurh hine geswutelod wære: and he þærrihte
mildheortlice hine gehælde. and geswutelode þæt he is soð scyppend
þe ða ungesceapenan eaghringas mid his halwendum spatle geopenode;
 474.10. For gehealdsumnysse soþre eadmodnysse beoð forwel oft
godes gecorenan geswencte. swa swa paulus be him sylfum cwæð: me is
geseald sticels mines lichaman þæt se sceocca me geearplæt. þæt
seo micelnys godes onwrigenyssa me ne onhebbe: for þan ic bæd þriwa
minne drihten þæt he afyrsode þæs sceoccan sticcels fram me ac he me
andwyrde;
 474.16. Paule. þe genihtsumað min gifu: soðlice mægen
bið gefremod on untrumnysse;
 474.17. Nu wuldrie ic lustlice on minum untrumnyssum þæt
cristes miht on me wunie;
 474.19. Se cristena man þe on ænire þyssere gelicnysse bið
gebrocod and he þonne his hælðe secan wile æt unalyfedum tilungum
oððe æt awyrigedum galdrum oððe æt ænigum wiccecræfte
þonne bið he þam hæðenum mannum gelic þe ðam deofolgylde
geoffrodon for heora lichaman hælðe and swa heora sawla amyrdon;
 474.24. Se þe geuntrumod beo: bidde his hæle æt his
drihtne. and geþyldelice þa swingla forbere. loce hu lange se soða
læce hit foresceawie. and ne beceapie na þurh æninne deofles cræft
mid his sawle þæs lichaman gesundfulnysse;
 474.28. Bidde eac goddra manna bletsunge. and æt halgum
reliquium his hæle gesece;
 474.29. Nis nanum cristenum men alyfed þæt he his hæle
gefecce æt nanum stane: ne æt nanum treowe buton hit sy halig rodetacen.
ne æt nanre stowe buton hit sy hali godes hus. se þe elles deð he
begæð untwylice hæþengyld;
 474.33. We habbað hwæðere þa bysene on halgum bocum
þæt mot se ðe wyle mid soþum læcecræfte his lichaman getemprian:
swa swa dyde se witega isaias þe worhte þam cyninge ezechie cliðan to his
dolge and hine gelacnode;
 476.3. Se wisa agustinus cwæð þæt unpleolic sy þeah hwa
læcewyrte þicge: ac þæt he tælð to unalyfedlicere wigelunge. gif
hwa þa wyrt on him becnytte buton he hi to þam dolge gelecge;
 476.6. Ðeah hwæðere ne sceole we urne hiht on læcewyrtum
besettan: ac on þam ælmihtigum scyppende þe ðam wyrtum þone cræft
forgeaf;
 476.8. Ne sceal nan man mid galdre wyrte besingan ac mid godes
wordum hi gebletsian and swa þicgan;
 476.11. Wite þeahhwæðere gehwa þæt nan man buton
earfoðnyssum ne becymð to þære ecan reste. þa ða crist sylf nolde
his agen rice buton micelre earfoðnysse astigan;
 476.13. Swa eac his apostoli. and þa halgan martyras mid heora
agenum feore þæt heofonlice rice beceapodon;
 476.15. Syððan eac halige andetteras mid micelre drohtnunge on
godes þeowdome. and þurh micclum forhæfednyssum and clænnysse halige
wurdon;
 476.17. Hwæt wylle we endemen þyssere worulde gif we for urum
synnum gebrocode beoð buton herian urne drihten and eadmodlice biddan
þæt he us þurh þa hwilwendlican swingela. to þam ecum gefean
gelæde;
 476.21. Sy him wuldor and lof on ealra worulda woruld. AMEN;

 502.1. <foreign> 3 KALENDAS OCTOBRIS DEDICATIO ECCLESIE SANCTI MICHAHELIS
ARCHANGELI </foreign> MANEGVM IS CVÐ seo halige stow sancte michaeles on þære

wið ðære sæ adriaticum twelf mila on upstige fram anre byrig þe is

 520.13. God cwæð þurh his witegan;
 520.14. Heofon is min setl;
 520.14. Salomon cwæð. rihtwises mannes sawul is wisdomes
setl;
 520.14. Paulus se apostol cwæð þæt crist is godes miht
and godes wisdom;
 520.15. Swutelice we magon understandan þæt gehwylces
rihtwises mannes sawul is heofon. þonne crist is godes wisdom. and rihtwises
mannes sawul is þæs wisdomes setl. and seo heofon is his setl;
 520.19. Be þisum cwæð se sealmscop. Heofonas cyþað godes
wuldor;
 520.20. Godes bydelas he het heofonas;
 520.20. Eornostlice haligra manna gelaþung is heofenan rice. for
þan ðe heora heortan ne beoð begriwene on eorþlicum gewilnungum: ac hi
geomeriað to þam upplican. and god nu geu rixað on him swa swa on
heofenlicum wunungum;
 520.25. Se cyning þe worhte his suna gifta is god fæder þe
ða halgan gelaþunge geþeodde his bearne þurh gerino his
flæsclicnysse;
 520.27. Seo halige gelaþung is cristes bryd: þurh ða he
gestrynð dæighwomlice gastlice bearn: and heo is ealra cristenra manna
moder. and þeahhwæþere ungewemmed mæden;
 520.30. Ðurh geleafan and fulluhte we beoð gode gestrynede. and
him to gastlicum bearnum gewiscede. þurh cristes menniscnysse and þurh gyfe
þæs helgan gastes God sende his ærendracan. þæt he gehwylce to
þyssum gyftum gelaþode;
 522.1. Æne he sende. and eft: for þan ðe he sende his
witegan þe cyddon his suna menniscnysse towearde: and he sende eft syððan
his apostolas þe cyddon his tocyme gefremmedne swa swa ða witegan hit ær
gewitegodon;
 522.4. Ða ða hi noldon cuman to þam gyftum. þa sende he eft
þus cweðende: secgað þam gelaðodon: efne ic gegearcode mine god ic
ofsloh mine fearras. and mine gemæstan fugelas and ealle mine þing ic
gearcode cumað to þam gyftum;
 522.9. Ða fearras getacniað þa heahfæderas þære
ealdan æ þe moston þa beleafe þære ealdan æ on fearres wisan
heora fynd ofslean;
 522.11. Hit is þus awriten on þære ealdan æ lufa þinne
freond. and hata ðinne feond;
 522.12. Þus wæs alyfed þam ealdum mannum þæt hi moston
godes wiþerwinnan and heora agene fynd mid stranglicere mihte ofsittan. and
mid wæpne acwellan: ac se ylca god þe ðas leafe sealde þurh moyses
gesetnysse ær his tocyme. se ylca eft þa ða he sylf þurh menniscnysse
to middanearde com. awende þone cwyde þus cweþende;
 522.18. Ic bebeode eow. lufiað eowre fynd. and doð tela þam
þe eow hatiað. and gebiddað for eowerum ehterum þæt ge beon bearn
þæs heofonlican fæder. se þe læt his sunnan scinan ofer gode and
yfele. and he sylð renscuras and wæstmas rihtwisum and unrihtwisum;
 522.22. Hwæt getacniað þa fearras buton fæderas þære
ealdan æ;
 522.23. Hwæt wæron hi buton fearra gelican þa ða hi mid
leafe þære ealdan æ heora fynd mid horne lichamlicere mihte potedon;
 522.26. Ða gemæstan fugelas getacniað þa halgan lareowas
þære niwan gecyðnysse;
 522.27. Ða sind gemæste mid gife þæs halgan gastes to
þan swiðe þæt hi wilniað þæs upplican færeldes mid fiþerum
gastlicere drohtnunge;
 522.29. Hwæt is þæt man besette his geþanc on
nyþerlicum þingum buton swilce modes hlænnys;
 522.31. Se ðe mid fodan þære upplican lufe bið gefylled he
bið swilce he sy. mid rumlicum mettum gemæst;
 522.32. Mid þyssere fætnysse wolde se sealmwyrhta beon
gemæst. þa ða he cwæð;
 522.34. Beo min sawul gefylled swa swa mid rysle and mid ungele;
 524.1. Hwæt is: mine fearras sind ofslegene. and mine
gemæstan fugelas. buton swilce he cwæde. behealdað þæra
ealdfædera drohtnunga. and understandað þæra witegena gyddunge and
þæra apostola bodunga ymbe mines bearnes menniscnysse. and cumað to
þam gyftum. þæt is cumað mid geleafan and geþeodað eow to
þære halgan gelaþunge þe is his bryd and eower moder hi hit
forgymeleasodon and ferdon sume to heora tunum sume to heora ceape;
 524.9. Se færð to his tune and forsihð godes gearcunge. se
þe ungemetlice eorðlice teolunge begæð to þan swiþe þæt he
his godes dæl forgymeleasað;
 524.11. Se færð ymbe his mangunge se þe mid gytsunge
woruldlicera gestreona cepð swiþor þonne ðæs ecan lifes welan;
 524.13. Eornostlice þonne hi sume mid eorðlicum teolungum
ungefohlice hi gebysgiað. and sume mid woruldlicum hordum. þonne ne magon
hi for þære bysga smeagan ymbe þæs hælendes menniscnysse. and eac
him bið swiðe hefigtyme geþuht þæt hi heora þeawas be his regole
geemnettan;
 524.18. Sume eac beoð swa þwyrlice gemodode þæt hi ne
magon godes bodunge gehyran. ac mid ehtnysse godes bydelas geswencað swa swa
þæt godspel herbæftan cweð;
 524.21. Sume hi gelæhton þa bydelas and mid teonan gewæhton
and ofslogon;
 524.22. Ac se cyning þa ða he þis geaxode sende his here to
and þa manslagan fordyde and heora burh forbærnde;
 524.25. Ða manslagan he fordyde. for þan ðe he þa arleasan
ehteras hreowlice acwealde: swa swa we gehwær on martyra þrowungum
rædað;
 524.27. Nero se wælhreowa casere het ahon petrum. and paulum
beheafdian: ac he wearð færlice of his rice aflymed. and hine wulfas
totæron;
 524.29. Herodes beheafdode þone apostol iacob and petrum gebrohte
on cwearterne. ac god hine ahredde of his hæftnede. and þa ða se cyning
smeade hu he of þam cwearterne come. þa æfter þan him com to godes
engel and hine to deaðe gesloh;
 524.33. Astriges se indisca cyning þe bartholomeum ofsloh awedde.
and on þam wodan dreame gewat;
 524.35. Ealswa egeas þe andream ahencg. þærrihte on wodan

 526.1. Langsum bið us to gereccenne ealra þæra arleasra
ehtera geendunga: hu gramlice se ælmihtiga god his halgena þrowunga on him
gewræc;
 526.3. Ðæt godspel cwyð. þæt he heora burh
forbærnde. for þan þe hi beoð ægðer ge mid sawle ge mid lichaman
on ecere susle forbærnde;
 526.6. He sende his here to: for þan ðe he þurh his englas
þa manfullan fordeð;
 526.7. Hwæt sind þæra engla werod buton here. þæs
heofonlican cyninges: he is gehaten dominus sabaoð þæt is heres hlaford
oððe weroda drihten;
 526.10. Se cyning cwæð ða to his þegnum;
 526.10. Ðas gyfta sind gearowe: ac þa ðe ic þærto
gelaðode næron his wyrðe: farað nu to wega utscytum and swa hwylce swa
ge gemetað laþiað to þam gyftum;
 526.13. Wegas sind mislice manna dæda: utscytas þæra wega
sind ateorunge woruldlicra weorca. and þa forwel oft becumað to gode þe
on eorðlicum weorcum hwonlice speowð;
 526.16. Hwæt ða ðæs cyninges ærendracan ferdon geond
wegas gadrigende ealle þa ðe hi gemetton ægðer ge yfele ge gode and
gesetton þa gifta endemes;
 526.18. On þyssere andwerdan gelaðunge sind gemengde yfele and
gode: swa swa clæne corn mid fulum coccele: ac on ende þyssere worulde se
soða dema hæt his englas gadrian þone coccel byrþenmælum and
awurpan into ðam unadwæscendlicum fyre;
 526.23. Byrþenmælum hi gadriað þa synfullan fram þam
rihtwisum. þonne ða manslagan beoð togædere getigede innon þam
hellicum fyre. and sceaþan mid sceaþum. gytseras mid gytserum. forliras mid
forlirum. and swa gehwylce manfulle geferan on þam ecum tintregum samod
gewriþene cwylmiað: and se clæna hwæte bið gebroht on godes berne
þæt is þæt ða rihtwisan beoð gebrohte to þam ecan life:
þær ne cymð storm ne nan unweder þæt ðam corne derie;
 526.30. Ðonne ne beoð þa godan nahwar buton on heofenum. and
þa yfelan nahwar buton on helle;
 526.33. Mine gebroþra gif ge gode sind þonne sceole ge emlice
wiþercorenra manna yfelnysse forberan: swa lange swa ge on þisum andweardan
life wuniað: ne bið se god se þe yfelne forberan nele;
 528.2. Be þisum cwæð godes stemn: to þam witegan
ezechiel;
 528.3. Ðu mannes bearn. ungeleaffulle. and yfeltihtende sind mid
þe and þu wunast mid þam wyrstan wyrmcynne;
 528.5. Eft paulus se apostol geleaffulra manna lif herode. and
getrymde þus tihtende;
 528.6. Gewuniað betwux þwyrum mancynne: scinað betwux þam
swa swa steorran. lifes word healdende;
 528.9. Se cyning eode inn. and gesceawode þa gebeoras. þa
geseah he þær ænne mann þe næs gescryd mid gyftlicum reafe;
 528.11. Þæt giftlice reaf getacnað þa soþan lufe godes
and manna;
 528.12. Þa lufe ure scyppend us geswutelode þurh hine sylfne
þa ða he gemedemode þæt he us fram þam ecan deaþe mid his

 528.15. Swa swiþe lufode god þysne middaneard þæt he his
ancennedan sunu sealde for us;
 528.16. Se godes sunu þe ðurh lufe to mannum becom. gebicnode
on þam godspelle þæt ðæt giftlice reaf getacnode þa soþan
lufe;
 528.18. Ælc þæra þe mid geleafan and fulluhte to gode
