he þa soþan lufe ne hylt;
 528.21. Witodlice ge geseoð þæt gehwam sceamað gif he
gelaðod bið to woruldlicum gyftum þæt he waclice gescryd cume to
þære scortan blisse;
 528.23. Ac micele mare sceamu bið þam ðe mid horium reafe
cymð to godes gyftum þæt he for his fulum gyrelan fram þære ecan
blisse ascofen beo. into ecum þeostrum;
 528.26. Swa swa reaf wlitegað þone man lichamlice: swa eac seo
soðe lufu wlitegað ure sawle. mid gastlicere fægernysse;
 528.28. Ðeah se mann hæbbe. fullne geleafan. and ælmessan
wyrce. and fela to gode gedo eal him bið ydel swa hwæt swa he deð buton
he hæbbe soþe lufe to gode and to eallum cristenum mannum;
 528.31. Seo is soð lufu þæt gehwa his freond lufie on gode.
and his feond for gode;
 528.32. Dæghwamlice gæð se heofonlica cyning into þam
gyftum þæt is into his gelaþunge and sceawað hwæþer we beon mid
þam gyftlicum reafe innan gescrydde: and swa hwylcne swa he gemet butan
soþre lufe ðone he befrinð mid graman þus cweþende;
 530.2. Ðu freond humeta dorstest ðu gan to minre gearcunge
buton gyftlicum reafe? freond he hine het. and þeah awearp fram his
gebeorum;
 530.4. Freond he wæs ðurh geleafan. and wiþercora þurh
weorce;
 530.5. He þærrihte adumbode: for þan ðe æt godes dome
ne bið nan beladung ne wiþertalu: ac se dema þe wiðutan þreað. is
gewita his ingehides wiðinnan;
 530.8. Ðeah ðe hwa þa soþan lufe gyt fulfremedlice
næbbe. ne sceal he ðeah his sylfes geortruwian: for þan ðe se witega
be swylcum cwæð to gode;
 530.10. Min drihten þine eagan gesawon mine unfulfremednysse. and
on þinre bec ealle sind awritene;
 530.13. Se cyning cwæð to his þegenum bindað þone
misscryddan. handum and fotum and wurpað into þam yttrum þeostrum
þær bið wop and toþa gebit;
 530.15. Ða handa and þa fet ðe nu ne beoð gebundene mid
godes ege fram þwyrlicum weorcum. hi beoð ðonne þurh strecnysse godes
domes fæste gewriþene;
 530.18. Ða fet þe nellað untrumne geneosian. and þa handa
þe nan ðing þearfum ne syllað þa beoð ðonne mid wite gebundene:
for þan ðe hi sind nu sylfwilles fram godum weorcum gewriþene;
 530.21. Se misscrydda wæs aworpen on þam yttrum þeostrum;
 530.22. Ða inran þeostra sind þære heortan blindnyss: þa
yttran þeostru is seo swearte niht þære ecan genyþerunge;
 530.24. Se fordemda þonne ðrowað on þam yttrum þeostrum
neadunge for þan ðe he nu sylfwilles his lif adrihð on blindnysse his
heortan and næfð nan gemynd þæs soþan leohtes þæt is crist
þe be him sylfum cwæð;
 530.27. Ic eom middaneardes leoht: se ðe me fylið. ne gæð
he on þeostrum. ac he hæfð lifes leoht;
 530.29. On þam yttrum þeostrum bið wop. and toþa gebit;
 530.30. Ðær wepað þa eagan on þam hellicum lige þe nu
þurh unalyfedlicum gewilnungum goretende hwearftliað;
 530.31. And þa teð þe nu on oferæte blissiað sceolon
þær cearcian on þam unasecgendlicum pinungum. þe godes wiþerwinnum
gegearcod is;
 530.34. Ða eagan soðlice for swiðlicum smice tyrað: and
þa teð for micclum cyle cwaciað. for þan ðe þa wiþercoran
unacumendlice hætu þrowiað. and unasecgendlicne cyle;
 532.2. Witodlice þæt hellice fyr hæfþ unasecgendlice
hætan and nan leoht. ac ecelice byrnð on sweartum þeostrum;
 532.4. Gif hwam twynige be æriste þonne mæg he understandan
on þysum godspelle. þæt ðær bið soð ærist þær ðær
beoð eagan and teð;
 532.6. Eagan sind flæscene. and teð bænene for þan ðe
we sceolon wylle we nelle we arisan on ende þyssere worulde mid flæsce and
mid bane. and onfon edlean ealra ure dæda: oððe wununge mid gode for
godum geearnungum: oððe hellewite mid deofle for mandædum;
 532.10. Be þysum cwæð se eadiga iob;
 532.11. Ic gelyfe þæt min alysend leofað. and ic sceal on
þam endenextan dæge of eorþan arisan and eft ic beo mid minum felle
befangen. and on minum flæsce ic geseo god: ic sylf and na oþer. þæt
is nan oþer hiw þurh me. ac ic sylf hine geseo;
 532.16. Ðyses godspelles geendung is swiþe egeful;
 532.16. Fela sind gecigede and feawa gecorene;
 532.17. Efne nu ure ealra stemn clypað crist: ac ure ealra lif ne
clypað. for þan ðe manega wiðcweþað on heora þeawum þæt
ðæt hi mid heora stemne geandettað;
 532.20. Sume men habbað god angyn. sume hwile: ac hi geendiað
on yfele;
 532.21. Sume habbað yfel angin and wel geendiað þurh soþre
dædbote;
 532.22. Sume ongynnað wel and bet geendiað;
 532.23. Nu sceal gehwa hine micclum ondrædan þeah ðe he gode
drohtnunge hæbbe: and nateshwon be him sylfum gedyrstlæcan. for þan
ðe he nat hwæþer he wyrðe is into þam ecan rice;
 532.26. Ne he ne sceal be oþrum geortruwian þeah þe he on
leahtrum befealle. for þan ðe he nat þa menigfealdan welan godes
mildheortnysse;
 532.29. Cwyð nu sanctus gregorius. þæt sum broþer gecyrde
to anum mynstre þe he sylf gestaþelode: and æfter regollicre fadunge
munuchad underfeng;
 532.31. Ðam fyligde sum flæsclic broþer to mynstre: na for
gecnyrdnysse goddre drohtnunge: ac for flæsclicere lufe;
 532.33. Se gastlica broþer eallum þam mynstermunecum þearle
þurh goddre drohtnunge gelicode. and his flæsclica broðer micclum his
lifes þeawum mid þwyrnysse wiðcwæð;
 534.1. He leofode on mynstre for neode. swiðor þonne for
beterunge;
 534.2. He wæs gegafspræce. and þwyr on dædum. wel
besewen on reafe and yfel on þeawum;
 534.3. He nahte geþyld: gif hine hwa to goddre drohtnunge tihte;
 534.4. Wearð þa his lif swiþe hefityme þam gebroþrum. ac
hi hit emlice forbæron for his broþer godnysse: he ne mihte nan þing to
gode gedon: ne he nolde nan god gehyran;
 534.7. Ða wearð he færlice mid sumre coþe gestanden. and
to deaþe gebroht;
 534.9. Þa ða he to forþsiþe ahafen wæs. þa comon þa
gebroðra to þy ðæt hi his sawle becwædon;
 534.10. He læg acealdod on nyþeweardum lymum: on þam breoste
anum orþode þa gyt se gast;
 534.12. Þa gebroðru ða swa miccle geornfullicor for him
gebædon: swa micclum swa hi gesawon þæt he hrædlice gewitan
sceolde;
 534.14. He þa ferlice hrymde þus cweþende;
 534.15. Gewitað fram me: efne her is cumen an draca þe me sceal
forswelgan: ac he ne mæg for eower andwerdnysse;
 534.17. Min heafod he hæfð mid his ceaflum befangen rymað
him þæt he me leng ne geswence;
 534.18. Gif ic þysum dracan to forswelgenne geseald eom hwi sceal
ic ælcunge þrowian for eowerum oferstealle;
 534.21. Ða gebroðra him cwædon to. hwi sprecst þu mid swa
micelre orwennysse. mearca þe sylfne mid tacne þære halgan rode;
 534.23. He andwyrde be his mihte;
 534.23. Ic wolde lustbære mid tacne þære halgan rode me
bletsian: ac ic næbbe þa mihte. for þan ðe se draca me þearle
ofþrihð;
 534.25. Hwæt þa munecas þa hi astrehton mid wope to
eorþan. and ongunnon geornlicor for his hreddinge þone wealdendan god
biddan;
 534.28. Efne þa færlice awyrpte se adlia cniht. and mid
blissiendre stemne cwæð;
 534.29. Ic þancie gode: efne nu se draca þe me forswelgan wolde
is afliged þurh eowerum benum: he is fram me ascofen and standan ne mihte
ongean eowerum þingungum;
 534.32. Beoð nu mine þingeras biddende for minum synnum: for
þan ðe ic eom gearo to gecyrrenne to munuclicere drohtnunge. and woruldlice
þeawas ealle forlætan;
 534.34. His cealdan leomu þa geedcucedon and he mid ealre heortan
to gode gecyrde: and mid langsumum broce on his gecyrrednysse wearð
gerihtlæced and æt nextan on þære ylcan untrumnysse gewat;
 536.3. Ac he ne geseah þone dracan on his forðsiþe: for þan
ðe he hine oferswyðde mid gecyrrednysse his heortan;
 536.6. Ne sceole we beon ormode þeah ðe on þyssere andweardan
gelaþunge fela sindon yfele. and feawa gode: for þan ðe noes arc on
yþum þæs micclan flodes hæfde getacnunge þyssere gelaþunge. and
he wæs on nyþeweardan wid: and on ufweardan nearo;
 536.10. On þære nyþemestan bytminge wunedon þa reþan
deor and creopende wyrmas. On oðre fleringe wunedon fugelas. and clæne
nytenu On þære þriddan fleringe wunede noe mid his wife and his þry
suna mid heora þrim wifum;
 536.14. On þære bytminge wæs se arc rum þær ða
reþan deor wunodon: and wiðufan genyrewed þer þæra manna wunung
wæs: for þan ðe seo halige gelaðung on flæsclicum mannum is swiðe
brad. and on gastlicum nearo;
 536.18. Heo tospræt hire bosm þær ðær ða reþan
wuniað on nitenlicum þeawum: and heo is genyrewed. on þone ende þe ða
gesceadwisan wuniað. on gastlicum þeawum drohtniende. for þan swa hi
haligran beoð on þyssere andweardan gelaþunge swa heora læs bið;
 536.22. Micele ma is þæra manna þe lybbað be agenum
lustum: þonne ðæra sy þe heora lifes þeawas æfter godes bebodum
gerihtlæcað;

 552.30. Fela sind þa ðe ehtnysse þoliað for mislicum
intingum. swa swa doð manslagan and sceaðan and gehwylce fyrnfulle. ac seo
ehtnys him ne becymð to nanre eadinysse: ac seo ehtnys ana þe bið for
rihtwisnysse geþolod. becymð to ecere eadignysse;
 552.34. Nis to ondrædenne þwyrra manna ehtnys: ac ma to
forþyldgienne. swa swa drihten to his leorningcnihtum cwæð;
 554.1. Ne ondræde ge eow þa ðe eowerne lichaman ofsleað.
for þan ðe hi ne magon eowere sawle ofslean: ac ondrædað god þe
mæg ægþer ge sawle ge lichaman on hellesusle fordon;
 554.4. Ne sceole we þeah þa þwyran to ure ehtnysse gremian:
ac swiþor gif hi astyrede beoð mid rihtwisnysse gestillan;
 554.7. Gif hi þonne þære ehtnysse geswican nellað: selre
us bið ðæt we ehtnysse þolian þonne we riht forlæton;
 554.9. Eahta eadinyssa sind on ðisum godspelle geendebyrde;
 554.10. Is þeah gyt an cwyde bæftan þe is geþuht swilce he
sy se neogoða stæpe: ac he soðlice belimpþ to þære eahteoðan
eadignysse: for þan ðe hi butu sprecað be ehtnysse for rihtwisnysse. and
for criste;
 554.13. Ða eahta eadignyssa belimpað to eallum geleaffullum
mannum. and se æftemysta cwyde. þeah þe he synderlice to þam apostolon
gecweden wære. belimpð eac to eallum cristes lymum.for þan ðe he nis
neogoða. ac fyligð þære eahteoþan eadignysse. swa swa we ær
sædon;
 554.17. Se Hælend cwæð. eadige ge beoþ ðonne man eow
wyrigð. and eower eht. and ælc yfel ongean eow sprecð. leogende for me;
 554.20. Se bið eadig and gesælig þe for criste þolað
wyriunge and hospas fram leasum licceterum: for þan ðe seo lease wyriung
becymð þam rihtwisum. to eadigre bletsunge;
 554.23. Blissiað and fægniað for þan ðe eower med is
menigfeald on heofenum;
 554.24. Geleaffullum gedafenað þæt hi wuldrian on
gedrefednyssum. for þan seo gedrefednys wyrhð geþyld. and þæt
geþyld afandunge and seo afandung hiht;
 554.27. Se hiht soþlice ne bið næfre gescynd for þan ðe
godes lufu is agoten on urum heortum þurh ðone halgan gast. se þe us is
forgyfen;
 554.29. Be þysum cwæð se apostol iacobus;
 554.29. Eala ge mine gebroþru: wenað eow ælcere blisse.
þonne ge beoð on mislicum costnungum: for þan ðe seo afandung eoweres
geleafan is micele deorwurþre þonne gold þe bið ðurh fyre afandod;
 554.33. Eft cwyð ðæt halige gewrit. læmene fatu beoð on
ofne afandode: and rihtwise men on gedrefednysse heora costnunge;
 554.35. Be þisum cwæð eac se hælend on oðre stowe to
his leorningcnihtum;
 556.1. Gif þes middaneard eow hatað. wite ge þæt he me
hatode ær eow. and gif hi min ehton þonne ehtað hi eac eower;
 556.3. Crist sylf wæs fram arleasum mannum acweald. and swa eac
his leorningcnihtas. and martyras and ealle ða ðe gewilniað arfæstlice
to drohtnigenne on geleaffulre gelaðunge hi sceolon ehtnysse þolian
oððe fram ungesewenlicum deofle. oððe fram gesewenlicum arleasum
deofles leomum: ac þas hwilwendlican ehtnyssa. oððe gedrefednyssa. we
sceolon mid gefean. for cristes naman geþafian. for þan ðe he þus behet
eallum geþyldigum: blissiað and fægniað: efne eower med is menigfeald
on heofonum;
 556.13. We mihton þas halgan rædinge menigfealdlicor trahtnian
æfter augustines smeagunge: ac us twynað hwæðer ge magon maran
deopnysse þæron þearflice tocnawan: ac uton biddan mid inweardre
heortan. þone ælmihtigan wealdend: se þe us mid menigfealdre mærsunge
ealra his halgena. nu todæg geblissode: þæt he us getiþie
genihtsumnysse his mildsunge þurh heora menifealdum þingrædenum.
þæt we on ecere gesihðe mid him blissian. swa swa we nu mid
hwilwendlicere þenunge hi wurþiað;
 556.22. Sy wuldor and lof hælendum criste. se þe is angin and
ende. scyppend and alysend ealra halgena. mid fæder and mid halgum gaste a
on ecnysse. AMEN;

 556.25. <foreign> 9 KALENDAS DECEMBRIS NATALE SANCTI CLEMENTIS MARTIRIS </foreign>
Men þa leofostan eower geleafa bið þe trumra gif ge gehyrað be godes
halgum hu hi ðæt heofonlice rice geearnodon. and ge magon þe cuðlicor
to him clypian gif heora lifes drohtnunga eow þurh lareowa bodunge cuðe
beoð;
 556.31. Ðes halga wer clemens þe we on þysum andwerdum
freolsdæge wurðiað wæs þæs eadigan petres leorningcniht. þa
wæs he þeonde on gastlicere lare and gecneordnysse to þan swiðe
þæt se apostol petrus hine geceas to papan romaniscre leode æfter his
dæge. and ær his þrowunge hine to papan gehadode. and on biscopsetle
gesette. to þy ðæt he þæra cristenra manna gymene hæfde;
 558.7. He gehadode twegen biscopas ær þan. linum and cletum:
ac he ne sette na hi on his setle. swa swa he dyde þysne halgan wer þe we
todæig wurðiað;
 558.9. Hwæt þa clemens æfter petres þrowunge geþeah on
fægernysse goddra þeawa. swa þæt he gecweme wæs iudeiscum and
cristenum samod;
 558.12. Þam hæðenum leodum he gelicode. for þan ðe he
mid hospe heora godas ne gebysmerode. ac mid boclicum gesceade him geswutelode
hwæt hi wæron. and hwær acennede. þa ðe hi him to godum
wurþodon. and heora drohtnunge. and geendunge mid swutelum seþungum
gewissode. and cwæð þæt hi sylfe eaðelice mihton to godes miltsunge
becuman. gif hi fram heora dwollicum bigencgum eallunge gecyrdon;
 558.19. Iudeiscre þeode hylde he begeat: for þan ðe he
soðlice geseðde þæt heora forðfæderas godes frynd gecigede
wæron. and him god halige æ sette to heora lifes rihtinge: and cwæð
ðæt hi fyrmeste on godes gecorennysse wæron gif hi mid geleafan his
bebodum gehyrsumedon;
 558.23. Fram cristenum he wæs swiþost gelufod for þan þe
he gehwilce eardas namcuðlice on gemynde hæfde. and þa wanspedigan
cristenan þæra earda ne geþafode þæt hi openre wædlunge
underþeodde wurdon: ac mid dæghwomlicere bodunge he gemanode þa rican.
and þa spedigan þæt hi ðæra cristenra wædlunge mid heora spedum
gefrefrodon þy læs ðe hi þurh hæþenra manna gyfum besmitene
wurdon;
 558.31. And dionisius godes cyðere se þe ðurh paules
apostoles lare and tacnum to cristes geleafan mid haligre drohtnunge gecyrde.
gewende on þam timan fram greclande to þam halgan papan clementem. petres
æftergencga and he hine mid micclum wurðmynte underfeng. and for
arwurðnysse his halgan lifes him cuðlice tolet and mid lufe geheold;
 560.1. Eft æfter fyrste cwæþ se eadiga clemens to ðam
halgan were dionisium: si þe forgyfen miht to gebindenne and to alysenne swa
swa me is. and þu far to ðæra francena rice and boda him godspel. and
heofnan rices wuldor;
 560.5. Dionisius þa wearð his hæsum gehyrsum and mid geferum
ferde to franclande cristendom bodiende. mid micclum wundrum to þan swiþe
þæt ða reþan hæþenan swa hraðe swa hi hine gesawon oððe hi
feallende his fet gesohton. him and gode gehyrsumigende: oððe gif heora
hwylc ðwyrode þa wearþ se mid swa micelre fyrhte fornumen þæt he
þærrihte his andwerdnysse forfleah;
 560.12. Wearð ða gebiged eall francena rice to godes geleafan
þurh bodunge and wundrum þæs eadigan weres dionisii. and he eac sume his
geferan to ispanian gesende þæt hi þan leodscipe lifes word gecyddon;
 560.16. Hwæt þa clemens romana papa wearð gewreht to þam
casere trahianum for þam micclum cristendome þe he gehwær on his rice
arærde;
 560.18. Ða sende se casere trahianus gewritu ongean. þæt se
halga papa clemens to hæðengylde gebugan sceolde. oððe hine man asende
ofer sæ on wræcsiðe to sumum westene. on þam ðe cristene men for
geleafan fordemde wræcsiðodon;
 560.22. Þæs caseres hæs wearð ða forðgencge. and swa

dema his sið mid wope bemænde þus cweþende. se god þe ðu wurðast
gefrefrie þe and fultumie on ðinum wræcsiþe;
 560.26. And het ða hine to scipe lædan. and ealle his neoda

 560.30. Ða þa he to þam westene becom þa gemette he

 560.33. Efne her is ure hyrde. efne her is se frefrigend ures
geswinces. and weorces;
 562.1. Þa ða he mid tihtendlicum wordum heora gewæhtan mod

 562.2. Ða geaxode he þæt hi dæghwomlice ofer six mila him

 562.4. Ða cwæð se halga biscop. uton biddan mid fæstum

 562.7. Ða þa ðis gebed gefylled wæs þa beheold se biscop

 562.13. His geferan þa his hæse gefyldon. and þærrihte

 562.15. Hwæt hi ealle þa micclum blissodon. and gode

 562.18. Efne her is ure hyrde: efne her is se frefriend ures

 562.22. He þa hi ealle to godes geleafan gebigde and binnon

 562.28. Ða gelamp hit. þæt sume þa hæþenan wurdon mid

 562.32. Ða wearð se hæðena casere trahianus micclum

 564.1. Se arleasa cwellere þa aufidianus. þa ða he ne mihte

 564.14. Þa cwædon his twegen leorningcnihtas. febus. and

 564.15. Eala ge gebroðra uton anmodlice biddan urne drihten

 566.4. Hit gelamp ða on sumum geare on his freolstide þæt

 566.9. Heo þa sarig þa twelf monað adreah and eft embe

 566.13. Ðu drihten hælend þe ðære wydewan ancennedan

 566.16. Ða mid þyssere bene beseah heo to þære stowe

 566.18. Heo þa mid micelre blisse hit awrehte and wepende

 566.21. Modor min nyste ic hu þyses geares ymbren geendode for

 566.24. Ðæt geleaffulle folc þa micclum blissiende herode

 566.28. Oft hwonlice gelyfede men smeagað mid heora stuntum

 568.1. Hit gelamp on þam feowerteoþan geare ezechian. iudeisces

 568.8. Ne bepæce ezechias eow mid leasum hopan þæt god eow

 568.11. Hwæt is se god þe mage þas burh wið minum here

 568.14. Drihten weroda god. þu ðe gesitst ofer engla þrymme.

 568.19. Soðlice he towende þa hæþenan godas and hi

 568.29. Þa andwyrde se witega isaias þam bodum;
 568.30. Secgað eowerum hlaforde þæt he unforht sy: god
ælmihtig cwyð. ne ascyt sennacherib flan into þære byrig ihrusalem ne

 570.1. Ða on þære nihte ferde godes engel and ofsloh
þæs syrian cyninges here. an hund þusend manna. and fif and hundeahtatig
þusenda;
 570.3. Ðæs on merien aras sennacherib. and geseah þa deadan
lic. and gecyrde ongeon to þære byrig niniue;
 570.6. Hit gelamp þa þæt he hine gebæd to his

þurh godes gaste gewitegode;
 570.9. Eft syððan nabochodenossor se chaldeisca cynyng het

 570.17. Þa sceawode se cyning þæra ðreora cnihta feax. and
lichaman þus cweðende: sy gebletsod eower god se þe asende his engel and
swa mihtiglice his ðeowan of þam byrnendum ofne alysde;
 570.21. Eac syððan on cires dagum cyninges. wrehton þa
babiloniscan þone witegan danihel for þan ðe he towearp heora deofolgyld.
and cwædon anmodlice to þam foresædan cyninge cyrum;
 570.24. Betæc us danihel þe urne god bel towearp. and þone
dracan acwealde þe we on belyfdon;
 570.25. Gif þu hine forstentst. we fordyligiað ðe and þinne
hired;
 570.26. Þa geseah se cyning þæt hi anmode wæron and
neadunga þone witegan him to handum asceaf;
 570.28. Hi ða hine awurpon into anum seaðe on þam wæron
seofon leon þam man sealde dæighwomlice. twa hryþeru and twa sceap. ac
him wæs þa oftogen ælces fodan six dagas þæt hi þone godes man
abitan sceoldon;
 570.32. On þære tide wæs sum oþer witega on iudea lande
his nama wæs abacuc. se bær his ryfterum mete to æcere. þa com him
to godes engel. and cwæð;
 570.34. Abacuc ber þone mete to babylone and syle danihele se
þe sit on þæra leona seaðe;
 572.2. Abbacuc andwyrde þam engle. la leof ne geseah ic næfre
þa burh ne ic þone seað nat;
 572.3. Ða se engel gelæhte hine be þam feaxe and hine bær
to babilone and hine sette bofon þam seaþe;
 572.5. Ða clypode se abacuc. þu godes þeowa danihel: nim
þas lac þe ðe god sende;
 572.6. Danihel cwæð;
 572.6. Min drihten hælend si þe lof. and wurþmynt þæt
þu me gemundest. and he þa ðære sande breac;
 572.8. Witodlice godes engel þærrihte mid swiftum flihte
gebrohte þone discten abacuc þær he hine ær genam;
 572.10. Se cyning þa cyrus on þam seofoþan dæge eode
dreori to þæra leona seaþe. and in beseah. and efne þa danihel
sittende wæs gesundful onmiddan þan leon;
 572.13. Ða clypode se cyning mid micelre stemne: mære is se
god þe daniel on belyfð. and he ða mid þam worde hine ateah of þam
scræfe. and het in awurpan þa ðe hine ær fordon woldon. þæs
cyninges hæs wearð hrædlice gefremmed and þæs witegan ehteras
wurdon ascofene. betwux þam leon. and hi þærrihte mid grædigum
ceaflum hi ealle totæron;
 572.19. Ða cwæð se cyning forhtion and ondrædon ealle
eorðbugende danieles god. for þan ðe he is alysend. and hælend
wyrcende tacna and wundra on heofenan and on eorþan;
 572.23. On þære niwan gecyðnysse æfter cristes þrowunge
and his æriste. and upstige to heofenum wurdon þa iudeiscan mid andan
afyllede ongean his apostolum. and gebrohton hi on cwearterne;
 572.26. On þære ylcan nihte godes engel undyde þa locu
þæs cwearternes and hi ut alædde þus cweþende. gað to þam
temple. and bodiað þam folce lifes word and hi swa dydon;
 572.29. Hwæt þa iudeiscan þæs on merigen þeahtodon ymbe
þæra apostola forwyrde and sendon to þam cwearterne þæt hi man
gefette;
 572.31. Ða cwelleras þa geopenodon þæt cweartern and
nænne ne gemetton;
 572.32. Hi þa cyddon heora ealdrum;
 572.33. Ðæt cweartern we fundon fæste beclysde and þa
weardas wiðutan standende: ac we ne gemetton nænne wiðinnan;
 574.1. Eft syððan herodes iudea cyning. sette þone apostol
petrum on cwearterne mid twam racenteagum gebundenne. and weardas wiðinnan
and wiðutan gesette: ac on þære nihte þe se arleasa cyning hine on
merigen acwellan wolde com godes engel scinende of heofenum and gelædde hine
ut þurh ða isenan gatu and stod eft on merien þæt cweartern fæste
belocen;
 574.8. Domicianus se hæþena casere het awurpan þone
godspellere iohannem on weallendum ele. ac he þurh godes gescyldnysse swa
gesundful ut eode swa he in aworpen wæs;
 574.10. Ðam ylcan iohanne sealde sum hæðengylda attor
drincan ac he æfter þam drence ansund and ungederod þurhwunode;
 574.13. Paulus se apostol. awrat be him sylfum. and cwæð
þæt he ænne dæg and ane niht on sægrunde adruge;
 574.14. Eft æt sumum sæle hine gelæhte an næddre be
þam fingre: ac he ascoc hi into byrnendum fyre: and he þæs attres nan
þing ne gefredde;
 574.18. Ne mæig nan eorðlic man. mid gewritum cyþan: ne mid
tungan gereccan. hu oft se ælmihtiga wealdend his gecorenan fram mislicum
fræcednyssum ahrede to lofe and to wurðmynte his mægenþrymnysse: ac
he geþafað forwel oft þæt ða arleasan his halgan þearle
geswencað hwilon mid hefitymre ehtnysse. hwilon mid slege. þæt seo
reþe ehtnys becume þam rihtwisan to ecere reste. and þam cwellerum to
ecum wite;
 574.25. Se sealmscop cwæð;
 574.25. Fela sind þæra rihtwisra gedreccednyssa: ac drihten
fram eallum þisum hi alysð;
 574.26. On twa wison alysð god his gecorenan. openlice and
digelice;
 574.28. Openlice hi beoð alysede þonne hi on manna gesihþe
beoð ahredde. swa swa we nu eow rehton;
 574.29. Digelice hi beoð alysede. þonne hi þurh martyrdome
becumað to heofenlicum geþincþum;
 574.31. Gif hi for soþum geleafan oððe for rihtwisnysse
þrowiað. hi beoð ðonne martiras. Gif hi þonne unscyldige gecwylmede
beoð. heora unscæððinys hi gelæt to godes halgena geferrædene:
for þan ðe unscæððignys æfre orsorh wunað;
 574.34. Gif hwa þonne for synnum ehtnysse þolað. and hine
sylfne oncnæwð. swa þæt he godes mildheortnysse inwerdlice bidde.
þonne forscyt þæt hwilwendlice wite þa ecan genyþerunge;
 576.2. For mandædum wæron ða twegen sceaþan gewitnode
þe mid criste hangodon. ac heora oþer mid micclum geleafan gebæd hine to
criste þus cweþende. drihten geþenc min þonne ðu to þinum rice
becymst;
 576.6. Crist him andwyrde;
 576.6. Soð ic ðe secge nu todæg þu becymst mid me into
neorcsena wanges myrhðe;
 576.7. Unwilles we magon forleosan þa hwilwendlican god: ac we ne
forleosað næfre unwilles þa ecan god: þeah ðe se reþa reafere us
æt æhtum bereafige oððe feores benæme he ne mæg us ætbredan
urne geleafan ne þæt ece lif gif we us sylfe mid agenum willan ne
forpærað;
 576.12. Se soða drihten us ahredde fram eallum fræcednyssum.
and to þam ecan life gelæde se þe leofað and rixað a buton ende.
AMEN

oncneow crist mid soþum geleafan: þa ða he cwæð. þu eart crist
þæs lyfigendan godes sunu;
 586.17. Untwylice se ðe god rihtlice oncnæwð. and him
gehyrsumað he hylt on his drohtnunge þyssera twegra namena getacnunge;
 586.19. Gif he þegenlice for godes naman earfoðnysse forberð:
and werlice deofles costnungum wiðstent. þonne gefylð he on his þeawum
andrees getacnunge þe is gereht þegenlic;
 586.22. Iacobus is gecweden forscrencend: and se bið unleas

tihtinge forscrencþ;
 586.24. Iohannes is gecweden godes gyfv: se bið gelimplice godes

he his beboda geornlice gefylle;
 586.28. PASSIO Se apostol andreas æfter cristes þrowunge ferde
to þam lande þe is gehaten achaia: and þær bodode drihtnes geleafan.
and middaneardes alysednysse þurh his þrowunge;

 586.33. Andreas him cwæð to;
 588.1. Ðe gedafenode nu þu manna dema eart þæt ðu
oncneuwe þinne deman þe on heofenum is and hine wurðodest. se þe is
soð god: and þin mod awendest fram þam leasum godum;
 588.4. Egeas him andwyrde: eart þu andreas þe towyrpst ure goda
tempel: and tihtst þis mennisc to þære ydelan lare þe romanisce
ealdras awurpon and adwæscan heton? Andreas him andwyrde;
 588.7. Romanisce ealdras git ne oncneowon godes soðfæstnysse:

 588.14. Egeas cwæð: þas sind ydele word;
 588.15. Witodlice þa eower hælend þas word bodade: þa

 588.17. Andreas him andwyrde;

 588.20. Egeas sæde;

 588.22. Andreas andwyrde;

 588.28. Egeas cwæð;

 588.31. Andreas him andwyrde;

 590.1. Egeas andwyrde;

 590.18. Egeas befran;

 592.1. Ða cwæð andreas to ealre þære meniu;

 592.14. Ða sarnyssa þe on ðære toweardan worulde yfelum

 592.18. Eornostlice beoð swiþor gearowe to þan. þæt ge

 600.1. <foreign>dominica i in adventv domini</foreign> Þises dæges þenung and
þissere tide mærð sprecað ymbe godes tocyme;
 600.3. Ðeos tid oð midne winter is gecweden aduentus domini .
þæt is drihtnes tocyme;
 600.4. His tocyme is. his menniscnys;
 600.5. He com to us þa ða he genam ure gecynd to his
ælmihtigan godcundnysse. to þi þæt he us fram deofles anwealde
alysde;
 600.8. Nu stent se gewuna on godes gelaþunge þæt ealle godes
þeowan on cyrclicum þenungum æigþer ge on halgum rædungum ge on
gedremum lofsangum þæra witegena gyddunga: singallice on þyssere tide
reccað;
 600.11. Ða witegan þurh godes gaste witegodon cristes tocyme
þurh menniscnysse. and be þam manega bec setton. þa ðe we nu
oferrædað æt godes þeowdome: ætforan his gebyrdtide. him to
wurðmynte: þæt he us swa mildheortlice geneosian wolde;
 600.15. Crist com on þam timan to mancynne gesewenlice: ac he
bið æfre ungesewenlice mid his gecorenum þeowum. swa swa he sylf behet
þus cweðende;
 600.18. Efne ic beo mid eow eallum dagum: oð ðyssere worulde
gefyllednysse;
 600.19. Mid þysum wordum is geswutelod þæt æfre beoð
oð middaneardes geendunge him gecorene men: þe þæs wurþe beoð
þæt hi godes wununge mid him habban moton;
 600.23. Ða halgan witegan witegodon æigðer ge þone
ærran tocyme. on þære acennednysse. and eac þone æftran æt

þyssere tide þenungum for þan ðe we on urum lofsangum geandettað ure
alysednysse þurh his ærran tocyme. and we us sylfe maniað þæt we on
his æftran tocyme gearwe beon þæt we moton fram þam dome him folgian
to þam ecan life swa swa he us behet;
 600.30. Be þyssere tide mærsunge spræc se apostol paulus on

mannum þus manigende;
 600.33. Mine gebroþra: wite ge þæt nu is tima us of slæpe

 602.1. Seo niht gewat: and se dæig genealæhte;

geflite. and andan: ac beoð ymbscrydde þurh drihteN hælend crist;
 602.8. Se apostol us awrehte þæt we of slæpe ure
asolcennysse and ungeleaffulnysse æt sumum sæle arisan: swa swa ge on
þissere andwerdan rædinge gehyrdon;
 602.10. Mine gebroþra wite ge þæt nu is tima us of slæpe
to arisenne;
 602.11. Witodlice ne gedafenað us þæt we symle hnesce beon
on urum geleafan swa swa þas mearewan cild: ac we sceolon onettan to
fulfremedre geþincðe þurh gehealdsumnysse godes beboda;
 602.14. We sceolon asceacan þone sleacan slæp us fram. and
deofles we orc forlætan. and gan on leohte þæt is on godum weorcum;
 602.17. Gefyrn scean leoht ingehides geond eorþan ymhwyrft: and
forwel menige scinað on soðfæstnysse wege þa ðe farað þurh
godspellican siðfæte to þæs ecan lifes gefean;
 602.19. Efne nu ure hæl is gehendre þonne we gelyfdon;
 602.20. Ðurh þeondum ingehide. and godum willan: anum gehwylcum
is hæl gehendre þonne him wære. þa ða he æt fruman gelyfde. and
for þy he sceal symle geþeon on dæighwomlicere gecnyrdnysse. swa swa se
sealmscop cwæð be godes gecorenum: þa halgan farað fram mihte to
mihte;
 602.26. Eac is gehwylcum men his endenexta dæg near and near.
and se gemænelica dom dæghwomlice genealæcð: on þam underfehð
anra gehwilc be þam ðe he geearnode on lichaman. swa god swa yfel;
 602.29. Uton for þi ælc yfel forfleon: and god be ure mihte
gefremman: þy læs þe we þonne wyllað þonne we ne magon and we
þonne fyrstes biddan. þonne us se deað to forðsiþe geneadað;
 602.32. Seo niht gewat. and se dæig genealæhte;
 602.33. Her asette se apostol niht for þære ealdan nytennysse
þe rixode geond ealne middaneard ær cristes tocyme: ac he toscoc þa
dwollican nytennysse þurh onlihtinge his andwerdnysse: swa swa se beorhta
dæig todræfð þa dymlican þeostru þære sweartan nihte;
 604.2. Deofol is eac niht gecweden. and crist dægi. se þe us
mildheortlice fram deofles ðeostrum alysde. and us forgeaf leoht. ingehydes
and soðfæstnysse;
 604.5. Uton awurpan þeostra weorc and beon ymscrydde mid leohtes
wæpnum. swa þæt we on dæge arwurðlice faron;
 604.7. Uton awurpan þurh andetnysse and behreowsunge þa
forþgewitenan yfelu: and uton heononforð stranglice wiðstandan deofles
tihtincgum: swa swa se ylca apostol on oþre stowe his underþeoddum manode:
wiðstandað ðam deofle and he flihð fram eow. genealæcað gode. and
he genealæcð to eow;
 604.12. Leohtes wæpna sind rihtwisnysse weorc. and
soðfæstnysse mid þam wæpnum we sceolon beon ymscrydde swa þæt we
on dæge arwurðlice faron;
 604.14. Swa swa dæges leoht forwyrnð gehwylcne to gefremmenne.
þæt þæt seo niht geþafað: swa eac soðfæstnysse ingehid.
þæt is geþoht ures drihtnes willan: us ne geþafað mandæde to
gefremmenne;
 604.18. Symle we beoð fram gode gesewene æigðer ge wiðutan
ge wiðinnan. ði sceal eac gehwa se þe fordemed beon nele eallunga warnian
þæt he godes beboda ne forgæge;
 604.20. Na on oferætum and druncennyssum;
 604.21. We sceolon habban gastlice gereordunge swa swa se ylca
apostol þisum wordum tæhte. þonne ge eow to gereorde gadriað. hæbbe
eower gehwylc halwende lare on muþe. and sealmboc on handa;
 604.24. Druncennys is cwylmbære þing. and galnysse antimber;
 604.25. Salomon cwæð;
 604.26. Ne bið nan þing digele. þær ðær druncennyss
rixað;
 604.27. On oþre stowe beweop se ylca apostol. ungemetegodra manna
lif. þus cweðende;
 604.28. Heora wamb is heora god: and heora ende is forwyrd. and
heora wuldor. on gescyndnysse;
 604.29. Na on forlirbeddum. and on unclænnyssum: ac beo
arwurðe sinscip betwux gelyfedum mannum: swa þæt furþon nan forlir ne
unclænnyss. ne sy genemned on godes gelaþunge;
 604.32. Na on geflite. and andan;
 604.33. Crist cwæð be gesibsumum mannum þæt hi sind godes
bearn gecigede;
 604.34. And witodlice. þa geflitfullan: sind deofles leoma;
 604.35. Se yfela secð symle ceaste. and wælhreow engel bið
asend togeanes him;
 606.1. Anda is derigendlic leahter. and æfre bið se niðfulla
wunigende on gedrefednysse for þan þe se anda ablent his mod and ælcere
gastlicere blisse benæmð;
 606.4. Ðurh andan bepæhte se deofol þone frumsceapenan mann.
and se niðfulla is þæra deofla dælnimend;
 606.6. Seo soþe sib afligð ungeþwærnysse. and þæs
modes digelnysse onliht. and witodlice se anda gemenigfylt yrsunge;
 606.8. Se apostol beleac þisne pistol mid þysum wordu: ac
beoð ymscrydde þurh drihten hælendne crist;
 606.9. Ealle þa ðe on criste beoð gefullode hi beoð mid
criste ymscrydde. gif hi þone cristendom mid rihtwisnysse weorcum
geglengað;
 606.12. Ðas gewædu awrat se ylca apostol swutelicor on oþre
stowe þus cweþende. ymbscrydað eow swa swa godes gecorenan mid
mildheortnysse. and mid wellwillendnysse. mid eadmodnysse: mid
gemetfæstnysse. mid geþylde. and habbað eow toforan eallum þingum ða
soþan lufe. seo þe is bend ealra fulfremednyssa: and cristes sib blissie on
eowerum heortum. on þære ge sind gecigede on anum lichaman;
 606.18. Beoð ðancfulle and godes word wunige betwux eow
genihtsumlice: on eallum wisdome tæcende. and tihtende eow betweonan: on
sealmsangum and gastlicum lofsangum. singende mid gife gode on eowerum
heortum;
 606.22. Swa hwæt swa ge doð on worde oððe on weorce doð
symle on drihtnes naman þancigende þam ælmihtigan fæder. þurh his
bearne þe mid him symle on annysse þæs halgan gastes wunað;
 606.26. Uton for þi us gearcian mid þysum foresædum reafum
be þæs apostoles mynegunge þæt we to þære wunderlican gebyrdtide
ures drihtnes mid freolslicore þenunge becuman þam sy wuldor and lof a on
ecnysse. AMEN;

cnihtum. be þam tacnum þe ær þyssere worulde geendunge gelimpað;

 608.8. <foreign>Luke 21</foreign> heofon and eorðe gewitað. and mine word

 608.9. Se halga gregorius us trahtnode þises godspelles
digelnysse. þus undergynnende;
 608.10. Drihten ure alysend us gewilnað gearwe gemetan and for
þi cydde þa yfel nyssa þe folgiað þam ealdgendan middanearde þæt
he us fram his lufe gestilde;
 608.13. He geswutelode hu fela ðrowunga foresteppað þissere
worulde geendunge: gif we god on smyltnysse ondrædan nellað. þæt we
huru his genealæcendan dom mid mislicum swingelum afærede ondrædan;
 608.16. Herwiðufan on þyssere rædinge cwæð se hælend
þeod arist ongean þeode. and rice ongean rice. and micele eorðstyrunga
beoð gehwær. and cwealm and hunger: and syððan betwux þan þus
cwæð;
 608.20. Tacna beoð on sunnan and on monan. and on steorrum. and
on eorþan þeoda ofþricednys. for gemengednysse sælicra yþa and
sweges;
 608.23. Sume þas tacna we gesawon gefremmede. sume we
ondrædað us towearde;
 608.24. Witodlice on þisum niwum dagum arisan ðeoda ongean
þeodum and heora ofþryccednys on eorþan gelamp swiðor þonne we on
ealdum bocum rædað;
 608.27. Oft eorþstyrung gehwær fela burga ofhreas swa swa
gelamp on tyberies dæge þæs caseres. þæt þreottene burh. þurh
eorðstyrunge afeollon;
 608.29. Mid cwealme. and mid hungre we sind gelome geswencte. ac we
nateshwon gyta swutele tacna on sunnan and on monan and on steorran ne
gesawon;
 608.32. We rædað on tungelcræfte þæt seo sunne bið
hwiltidum þurh ðæs monelican trendles underscyte aþeostrod: and eac se
fulla mona færlice fagettað þonne he þæs sunlican leohtes
bedæled bið þurh ðære eorðan sceadewunge;
 610.1. Sind eac sume steorran leohtbeamede færlice arisende and
hrædlice gewitende and hi symle sum þing niwes mid heora upspringe
gebicniað. ac ne mænde drihten þas tacna on þære godspellican
witegunge: ac þa egefullan tacna þe ðam micclan dæge
forestæppað;
 610.6. Matheus se godspellere awrat swutelicor þas tacna þus
cweþende: þærrihte æfter þære miclan gedrefednysse bið seo
sunne aþystrod. and se mona ne sylð nan leoht and steorran feallað of
heofenum. and heofenan miht beoð astyrede. and þonne bið ætywed
cristes rodetacn on heofenum. and ealle eorðlice mæigða heofiað;
 610.11. Þære sæ gemencgednys. and þæra yþa sweg
ungewunelice gyt ne asprungon: ac þonne fela þæra foresædan tacna
gefyllede sind nis nan twynung þæt ða feawa þe ðær to lafe sind
witodlice gefyllede beoð;
 610.15. Mine gebroðra þas þing sind awritene þæt ure mod
þurh wærscipe wacele beon þæt hi ðurh orsorhnysse ne asleacian. ne
þurh nytennysse geadlian ac þæt symle se oga hi gebysgie. and seo
ymbhydinys on godum weorcum getrymme;
 610.19. Drihten cwæð. men forseariað for ogan and andbidunge
þæra ðinga þe becumað ofer ealne middaneard;
 610.20. Witodlice heofonan mihta beoð astyrode;
 610.21. Heofona miht sind englas and heahenglas. þrymsetl.
ealdorscipas. hlafordscipas. and anwealdu;
 610.23. Ðas engla weored beoð æteowode gesewenlice urum
gesihðum on tocyme þæs strecan deman þæt hi stiðlice æt us
ofgan. þæt ðæt hu se ungesewenlica scyppend emlice forberð;
 610.26. Ðonne we geseoð mannes bearn cumende on wolcnum mid
micelre mihte and mægenþrymme;
 610.27. Drihten gecigde hine sylfne mannes bearn gelomlicor þonne
godes bearn for eadmodnysse þære underfangenan menniscnysse. þæt he
us myningie mid þam gecynde þe he for us underfeng;
 610.30. He is soðlice mannes bearn . and na manna bearn. and nis
nan oþer anes mannes bearn buton crist ana;
 610.32. He bið on mihte. and on mægenþrymme geswutelod.
þam þe hine on eadmodnysse wunigende gehyran noldon þæt hi þonne
gefredon his mihte swa miccle stiðlicor. swa micclum swa hi nu heora swuran
to his geþylde nellað gebigan;
 612.2. Ðas word sind gecwedene be þam wiðercorenum: ac her
fyliað þa word þe ða gecorenan frefriað;
 612.4. Se hælend cwæð. þonne þas wundra ongynnað.
ahebbað ðonne eowre heafda and behealdað. for þan ðe eower alysednys
genealæcð;
 612.6. Swilce he swutelice his gecorenan manode. þonne
middaneardes wita gelomlæcað. þonne se oga þæs micclan domes bið
æteowod: ahebbað þonne eowre heafda. þæt is gladiað on eowrum
mode: for þi. þonne ðes middaneard bið geendod þe ge ne lufedon.
þonne bið gehende seo alysednys þe ge sohton;
 612.11. On halgum gewrite bið gelomlice heafod geset for þæs
mannes mode: for þan ðe þæt heafod gewissað þam oþrum leomum swa
swa ðæt mod gediht þa geþohtas;
 612.14. We ahebbað ure heafda þonne we ure mod arærað to
gefean þæs heofenlican eðles;
 612.16. Ða ðe god lufiað hi sind gemanode þæt hi gladian
on middaneardes geendunge. for þan ðonne he gewit þe hi ne lufedon.
þonne witodlice hi gemetað þone ðe hi lufedon;
 612.19. Ne gewurþe hit la þæt ænig geleaffull se þe
gewilnað god to geseonne. þæt he heofige for middaneardes hryrum;
 612.20. Hit is soðlice awriten: swa hwa swa wile beon freond
þyssere worulde. he bið godes feond geteald;
 612.22. Witodlice se þe ne blissað on nealæcunge
middaneardes geendunge: se geswutelað þæt he his freond wæs: and
bið ðonne oferstæled þæt he godes feond is;
 612.25. Ac gewite þises middaneardes freondscipe. fram
geleaffulra heortan. and gewite fram þam þe þæt oðer gelyfað
toweard. and hit þurh weorce lufiað;
 612.28. Ða sceolon heofian. for middaneardes toworpennysse þa
ðe heora heortan wyrtruman on his lufe aplantodon: þa ðe þæt
towearde lif ne secað. ne his furþon ne gelyfað;
 612.30. We soðlice þe ðæs heofonlican eþeles gefean
eallunga oncneowon. sceolon anmodlice to þam onettan;
 612.32. Us is to gewiscenne þæt we hrædlice to þam faron
and þurh ðone scyrtran wegi becumon: for þan ðe þes middaneard is mid
menifealdum unrotnyssum geþread: and mid þwyrnyssum geangsumod;
 614.1. Hwæt is þis deaðlice lif buton weig? understandað
nu hwilc sy on weges geswince to ateorianne: and þeah nelle þone weig
geendian;
 614.3. Drihten cwæð. behealdað ðas fictreowa and ealle
oþre treowa þonne hi spryttað. þonne wite ge þæt hit
sumorlæhð;
 614.5. Swa eac ge magon witan þonne ge þas foresædon tacna
geseoð. þæt godes rice genealæhð;
 614.7. Soðlice mid þysum wordum is geswutelod þæt ðyses
middaneardes wæstm is hryre;
 614.8. To þam he wehst þæt he fealle to þy he spryt.
þæt he mid cwyldum fornime swa hwæt swa he ær sprytte;
 614.10. Ðes middaneard is þam ealdiendan menn gelic;
 614.11. On geogoðe bið se lichama þeonde on strangum breoste:
on fullum leomum and halum: witodlice on ealdlicum gearum bið ðæs mannes
wæstm gebiged. his swura aslacod. his neb bið gerifod. and his leomu ealle
gewæhte;
 614.14. His breost bið mid siccetungum geþread. and betwux
wordum his orþung ateorað ðeah ðe him adl on ne sitte þeah forwel oft
his hæl him bið adl;
 614.17. Swa is þisum middanearde. æt fruman he wæs þeonde
swilce on geogoðhade: he wæs on lichamlicere hælðe growende. and on
speda genihtsumnysse fæt: langsum on life. stille on langsumere sibbe: ac he
is nu mid ylde ofset. swilce mid gelomlæcendum hefigtymnyssum to deaðe
geþread;
 614.23. Mine gebroðra. ne lufige ge þysne middaneard. þe ge
geseoð þæt lange wunian ne mæig;
 614.24. Be þisum cwæð se apostol;
 614.25. Ne lufige ge middaneard. ne þa ðing þe him on
wuniað. for þan swa hwa swa middaneard lufað næfð he godes lufe on
him;
 614.28. Wel is godes rice sumerlicere tide wiðmeten. for þi
ðonne gewitað þa genipu ure dreorignysse: and lifes dagas þurh
beorhtnysse þære ecan sunnan scinað;
 614.31. Ealle ðas foresædan þing sind mid micelre gewissunge
getrymde þurh ðisum æfterfyligendum cwyde;
 614.32. Soð ic eow secge. ne gewit þeos mæigð oð
ðæt ealle ðas þing gewurþað;
 614.34. Ðas word spræc drihten to iudeiscre mæigðe: and
heora cyn ne gewit þurh ateorunge ær þan ðe þes middaneard
geendað;
 616.2. Be þysum andgite cwæð se apostol paulus. þæt
drihten sylf astihð of heofenum on stemne þæs heahengles. and mid godes
byman. and þa deadan ærest arisað: syððan we þe lybbað and on
lichaman beoð gemette. beoð gelæhte forð mid þam oþrum on wolcnum
togeanes criste: and we swa symle syððan mid gode beoð: frefriað eow
mid þysum wordum;
 616.8. Eac þysum andgite geþwærlæcð se godspellere
matheus þysum wordum: drihten asent his englas mid byman and mid micelre
stemne and hi gadriað his gecorenan fram feower windum: of eallum eorþlicum
gemærum. oð ða healican heofenan;
 616.13. Se apostol cwæð. we þe lybbað: ne mænde he hine
sylfne mid þam worde. ac þa ðe on life þurhwuniað oð geendunge
þyssere worulde;
 616.15. Mid þam is eac geswutelod þæt mancynn mid ealle ne
ateorað ær þære geendunge. ac hi habbað hwæðere sceortne
deað. þa ðe þonne on life gemette beoð. for þan ðe heofenlic fyr
ofergæð ealne middaneard mid anum bryne. and þa deadan arisað of heora
byrgenum mid þam fyre. and þa lybbendan beoð acwealde þurh ðæs
fyres hætan and þærrihte eft geedcucede to ecum þingum;
 616.22. Ne derað þæt fyr nan þing þam rihtwisum þe
ær fram synnum geclænsode wæron: ac swa hwa swa ungeclænsod bið
he gefret þæs fyres æðm and we þonne ealle to þam dome
becumað;
 616.25. Ne bið se dom on nanum eorþlicum felda gedemed: ac
bið swa swa se apostol herwiðufan on þyssere rædinge cwæð.
þæt we beoð gegrypene on wolcnum togeanes criste geond þas lyft and
þær bið seo twæming rihtwisra manna. and arleasra;
 616.29. Ða rihtwisan nahwar syððan ne wuniað buton mid gode
on heofenan rice. and þa arleasan nahwar buton mid deofle on hellesuslum;
 616.32. Se Hælend beleac þis godspel mid þysum wordum;
 616.32. Heofon and eorðe gewitað. and mine word næfre ne
gewitað;
 616.34. Ne awendað heofen and eorðe to nahte ac hi beoð
awende of þam hiwe þe hi nu on wuniað: to beteran hiwe: swa swa iohannes
se godspellere cwæð;
 618.1. Ðonne bið niwe heofon. and niwe eorðe;
 618.2. Ne beoð witodlice oþre gesceapene: ac þas beoð
geedniwede;
 618.3. Heofon and eorðe gewitað and þeah ðurhwuniað: for
þan ðe hi beoð fram þam hiwe þe hi nu habbað þurh fyr
geclænsode. and swa þeah symle on heora gecynde standað;
 618.6. Ðonne bið seo sunne be seofonfealdan beorhtre þonne
heo nu sy. and se mona hæfð þære sunnan leoht;
 618.9. Dauid soðlice be cristes tocyme þisum wordum witegode;
 618.10. God cymð swutelice and he ne suwað;
 618.10. Fyr byrnð on his gesihðe and on his ymhwyrfte bið
swiðlic storm;
 618.11. Se storm aþwyhð swa hwæt swa ðæt fyr
forswælð;
 618.12. Be þam dæge cwæð se witega sophonia. se miccla
godes dæig is swiðe gehende. and þearle swift;
 618.14. Biter bið ðæs dæges stemn þær bið se
stranga gedrefed;
 618.15. Se dæig is yrres dæig. and gedrefednysse dæig. and
angsumnysse;
 618.16. Yrmðe dæg. and wanunge;
 618.17. Ðeostra dæig. and dimnysse . byman dæig. and
cyrmes;
 618.18. Mine gebroðra settað þyses dæges gemynd ætforan
eowerum eagum: and swa hwæt swa nu bið hefigtyme geþuht eall hit bið
on his wiðmetennysse geliðegod;
 618.20. Gerihtlæcað eower lif: and awendað eowere þeawas;
 618.21. Witniað mid wope eowere yfelan dæda: wiðstandað
deofles costnungum;
 618.22. Bugað fram yfele and doð god: and ge beoð swa micclum
orsorgran on tocyme þæs ecan deman: swa micclum swa ge nu his strecnysse.
mid ege forhradiað;
 618.25. Se witega cwæð. þæt se miccla godes dæig is
swiþe gehende. and þearle swift;
 618.26. Ðeah ðe gyt wære oþer þusend geara to þam
dæge nære hit langsum: for þan swa hwæt swa geendað. þæt
bið sceort and hræd. and bið swilce hit næfre ne gewurde. þonne hit
geendod bið;
 618.30. Hwæt þeah hit langsum wære to þan dæge swa hit
nis þeah ne bið ure tima langsum. and on ure geendunge us bið gedemed
hwæþer we on reste oððe on wite þone gemenelican dom andbidian
sceolon;
 618.33. Uton for þi brucan þæs fyrstes þe us god forgeaf.
and geearnian þæt ece lif mid him se þe leofað and rixað on ealra
worulda woruld. AMEN;

 1.29. <foreign>INCIPIT PRAEFATIO HUIUS LIBRI. IN NOMINE CHRISTI
OMNIPOTENTIS</foreign>. Ic ælfric munuc awende þas boc of ledenum bocum to
engliscum gereorde þam mannum to rædenne þe þæt leden ne cunnon;
 1.31. Ic hi genam of halgum godspellum. and æfter geðungenra
lareowa trahtnungum hi asmeade. þæra lareowa naman ic awrat on ðære
ærran bec. on ðære ledenan forespræce;
 2.33. Ic gesette on twam bocum þa gereccednysse ðe ic awende.
for ðan ðe ic ðohte þæt hit wære læsse æðryt to
gehyrenne. gif man ða ane boc ræt on anes geares ymbryne. and ða oðre
on ðam æftran geare;
 2.37. On ægðer þæra boca. sind feowertig cwyda buton
ðære forespræce. ac hi ne sind na ealle of godspellum genumene. ac sind
forwel fela of godes halgena life oððe þrowunge gegaderode. þæra
anra þe angelcynn mid freolsdagum wurðað;
 2.41. Ætforan ælcum cwyde we setton ða swutelunge on leden.
mæg swa ðeah se ðe wile þa capitulas æfter ðære forespræce
geendebyrdian;
 2.43. Nu bidde ic and halsige on godes naman gif hwa ðas boc
awritan wylle. þæt he hi geornlice gerihte. be ðære bysne þe læs
ðe we ðurh gymeleasum writerum geleahtrode beon;
 2.46. Micel yfel deð se ðe leas writ buton he hit gerihte.
swilce he gebringe ða soðan lare to leasum gedwylde;
 2.47. For ði sceal gehwa gerihtlæcan þæt þæt he
ær to woge gebigde. gif he on godes dome unscyldig beon wile;

 3.1. <foreign> INCIPIT LIBER SERMONUM CATHOLICORUM ANGLICE IN ANNO SECUNDO;
CATHOLICUS SERMO DE NATALE DOMINI AD POPULUM EXCERPTUS DE TESTIMONIIS
PROPHETARUM. 8. KALENDAS. IANUARII. NATIVITAS DOMINI: </foreign>. MINE GEBROÞRU ða
leofostan on þisum dæge we wurðiað ures hælendes acennednysse
æfter þære menniscnysse;
 3.2. He wæs todæg acenned of ðam halgan mædene MARIAN
mid lichaman. and mid sawle. se ðe wæs æfre mid ðam fæder
wunigende on þære godcundnysse;
 3.5. He is tuwa acenned. and ægðer acennednys is wundorlic.
and unasecgendlic;
 3.6. He wæs æfre of ðam fæder acenned. for ðan þe he
is þæs fæder wisdom. þurh ðone he geworhte. and gesceop ealle
gesceafta;
 3.8. Nu is ðeos acennednys buton anginne. for ðan þe se
fæder wæs æfre god. and his wisdom. þæt is his sunu wæs
æfre of him acenned. buton ælcere meder;
 3.11. Þeos acennednys þe we nu todæg wurðiað wæs of
eorðlicere meder buton ælcum eorðlicum fæder. se fæder ðurh hine
gesceop us. and eft ða ða we forwyrhte wæron. þa asende he þone
ylcan sunu to ðisum life to ure alysednysse. for ðan þe adam se forma
mann. agylte wið god. and his scyppendes bebod tobræc. and deofles lare
gehyrsumode. and wearð deofle betæht. he and eal mancynn into helle wite;
 3.18. Þa æfre smeade god fram frymðe middaneardes. hu he
mihte mancynnes gehelpan. and fram deofles anwealde ahreddan;
 3.20. Þa nolde he asendan to ure alysednysse. naðor ne engel.
ne heahengel. ne witegan. ne apostolas. Ac sende se fæder his ancennedan
sunu to þrowunge and to cwale. for mancynnes alysednysse;
 3.23. Ða geswutelode god hu miccle lufe he hæfde. and
hæfð to us. þa ða he asende his agen bearn to slege for us;
 4.24. Hwa dorste þæs gewilnian þæt se ælmihtiga cyning
sceolde besceofan to cwale his ancennedan æðeling and swa ahreddan þone
ðeowan? Næs se sunu na genyd þæt he mann gewurde. and siððan for
us ðrowian sceolde. ac he wæs gehyrsum his fæder æfre oð deað;
 4.29. He wæs ancenned mid his fæder on heofonum. ða nolde
he ana beon ac wolde habban gebroðru. and com to us for ði þæt he
wolde us to his rice gebringan. þær we to gesceapene wæron;
 4.32. Þa gif he come on ðære godcundnysse buton
menniscnysse. þonne ne mihte ure tyddernys aberan his mihte;
 4.33. Ne seo godcundnys ne mihte nan ðing þrowian. for ðan
þe heo is unðrowigendlic;
 4.35. Þa genam se ælmihtiga godes sunu ða menniscnysse of
anum mædene. and wearð gesewenlic mann and þrowigendlic;
 4.37. And swiðe gedafenlic hit wæs ða ða he mann wolde
beon þæt he ne geceas na him wif to meder. ac geceas clæne mæden;
 4.39. And eac ða ða mæden acennan sceolde. þæt heo
acende god ælmihtigne. se ðe is ægðer ge God ge mann an crist;
 4.41. He ongann beon þæt he næs. ac he ðurhwunode
þæt he ær wæs;
 4.42. He ongann on ðære menniscnysse. se ðe æfre wæs.
and æfre bið god;
 4.43. Nis na hwæðere gerunnen togædere seo godcundnys. and
seo menniscnys. ac seo godcundnys is ymbscryd mid þære menniscnysse swa
þæt ðær nys naðor gemencgednys ne todal;
 4.47. Marian mægðhad wæs menigfealdlice getacnod on
þære ealdan æ;
 4.48. God bebead moysen þam heretogan þæt he gename twelf
drige gyrda æt þam twelf mægðum israhela ðeoda. and alede hi
ætforan ðam halgan scrine binnon ðam micclan getelde. and he wolde
ðurh ða gyrda geswutelian. hwæne he to biscope gecoren hæfde;
 4.52. Þa on ðam oðrum dæge wæs Aarones gyrd gemett
growende mid bogum. and blowende. and berende hnyte;
 4.54. Witodlice seo drige gyrd þe næs on eorðan aplantod ne
mid nanre rinde befangen. ne mid sæpe acucod. and swa ðeah greow. and
bleow. and bær hnyte. hæfde getacnunge þære eadigan Marian. þe
næfde weres gemanan. and swa ðeah þone liflican wæstm abær se ðe
is soð biscop and ure sawla alysend;
 4.59. Mennisc gesceapennys is on feower wison;
 4.59. Se frumsceapena mann adam næs gestryned ne acenned. ac god
hine gesceop;
 5.61. Seo oðer gesceapennys wæs swa. þæt god gesceop Euan
of hire weres sidan;
 5.62. Ne sind þas twa gesceapennyssa nanum oðrum gelice;
 5.63. Seo ðridde gesceapennys is þæt men beoð gestrynede
ðurh wer. and þurh wif. swa swa we dæghwomlice geseoð. and þeos an
gesceapennys is gewunelic;
 5.65. Seo feorðe gesceapennys wæs swa. þæt crist wearð
acenned of mædene buton were;
 5.66. Nis ðeos gesceapennyss. nanum oðrum gelic;
 5.67. Þa twa forman gesceapennyssa feollon on hryre. and seo
ðridde wæs on hryre acenned. ac seo feorðe alysde ða ðreo;
 5.70. Se ylca godes sunu se ðe ealle ðing gesceop. he eac
gesceop his agene moder. and on hire innoð sylf becom. and ðæron
geworhte his agenne lichaman. and wearð of hire geboren. soð man on sawle
and on lichaman. and seo modor næs na gewemmed þurh þæt cild ac
wæs gehalgod;
 5.74. Mæden heo wæs beforan ðære cenninge. and mæden
on ðære cenninge. and mæden æfter ðære cenninge. ne bið nan
mægþhad forloren on cenninge. ac bið forloren on hæmede. þonne
hwilc mæden mid luste weres bricð. þonne bið hire mægðhad æfre
siððan adylegod. hæbbe heo cild næbbe heo;
 5.79. Ac þæt clæne mæden Maria hæfde behaten hire
mægðhad gode. and wæs mid þam halgum gaste afylled. and gescyld wið
ælcere costnunge;
 5.81. Ne unlust on hire mod ne becom. ne heo weres ne breac. þa
wæs heo for ði mæden þeah ðe heo cild hæfde;
 5.83. Nis nan wifhades mann hire gelica. for ði naðer ne ær
ne siððan næs nan mæden þæt bearn gebære. and syððan
mæden þurhwunode buton hire anre;
 5.86. Sindon þeah hwæðere sume gesceafta þe tymað buton
hæmede. and bið ægðer ge seo moder mæden. ge seo dohtor þæt
sind beon;
 5.88. Hi tymað heora team mid clænnysse;
 5.88. Of ðam hunige hi bredað heora brod. and beoð acennede
þa geongan mid mægðhade. and ða yldran wuniað on mægðhade;
 5.91. Eac seo halige godes gelaðung þæt is eal cristen folc
is genemned to anum mædene. swa swa se apostol Paulus cwæð to ðam
folce þe he to gode gebigde;
 5.93. Ic beweddode eow anum were. þæt ge sceoldon gearcian
clæne mæden criste;
 5.94. Eac IOHANNES se fulluhtere þus cwæð be criste;
 5.95. Se ðe bryde hæfð. he is brydguma;
 5.96. And se sealmwyrhta Dauid sang be criste þus cweðende;
 6.97. Swa swa brydguma he gæð forð of his brydbedde;
 6.98. Ealle cyrcan on middanearde sind getealde to anre cyrcan. and
seo is gehaten godes gelaðung. for ðan ðe we sind ealle gelaðode to
godes rice;
 6.100. Nu is ðeos gelaðung cristes bryd. and þurhwunað
mæden swa swa seo halige Maria;
 6.101. Seo gelaðung is ealra cristenra manna moder. on gastlicere
acennednysse. swa swa crist sylf cwæð on his godspelle;
 6.103. Buton gehwa beo tuwa acenned. ne mæg he na faran into

 6.104. Hu bið se mann tuwa acenned? ælc man bið acenned
lichamlice of fæder and of meder. ac he ne bið na godes bearn buton he beo
eft acenned of þære gastlican meder of cristes bryde. swa swa he sylf
cwæð;
 6.108. Buton gehwa beo geedcenned of wætere and of ðan halgan
gaste. ne mæg he faran into godes rice;
 6.110. Ælc man bið mid synnum gestryned and geboren ðurh
adames forgægednysse. ac he bið eft criste acenned on ðære halgan
gelaðunge. þæt is on godes cyrcan þurh fulluht;
 6.112. Þæt wæter aðwehð þone lichaman. and se halga

þonne godes bearn gif he on riht hylt fæder and moder. þæt is crist
and his bryd seo ðe dæghwomlice acenð gastlice cild. and hwæðere
ðurhwunað on clænum mægðhade;
 6.117. Ure ealda fæder adam us gestrynde to deaðe. and crist
us gestrynð gastlice to ðan ecan life. gif we forbugað deofles lare. and
beoð urum drihtne gehyrsume on his bebodum;
 6.121. Ealle ða ðing ðe crist dyde for us. ealle hi wæron
ær gefyrn gewitegode. þæt men sceoldon gelyfan þæt he is
soðfæst. þonne he hæfð swa fela gewitan þe cyðdon his tocyme.
and hu he geboren wæs. and hu he ðrowode deað his agenes þances. and
hu he of deaðe aras. and astah to heofonum. and hu he cymð eft to ðam
micclum dome. to demenne eallum mancynne ælcum be his gewyrhtum;
 6.127. Se ælmihtiga god behet gefyrn worulde Abrahame þam
heahfædere þæt on his cynne sceolde beon eal mancynn gebletsod. and him
eac swa gelæste;
 6.130. Of abrahames cynne com se mæra cyning Dauid. and of ðam
cynecynne com seo halige maria. and of marian crist wearð acenned. and þurh
crist is eal mancynn gebletsod. þa ðe rihtlice gelyfað;
 6.134. Eft se witega hieremias cwæð be ðam hælende ðes

and þeawfæstnysse his folce Israhel;
 7.136. He wæs siððan gesewen ofer eorðan. and mid mannum

 7.137. Eft oðer witega micheas witegode be cristes tocyme. þus

 7.138. Þonne bið sib on eorðan þonne ure drihten cymð to

 7.140. Eft Isaias se witega awrat on his witegunge and þus

 7.141. Efne an mæden sceal geacnian. and acennan sunu. and his

 7.143. Eft Ezechiel witegode be ðære byrig Hierusalem. and be

 7.144. Þin cyning cymð to ðe eadmod. and geedstaðelað

 7.146. Danihel se witega sette eac on his witegunge. þæt se

 7.147. Ic eom cumen to ðe danihel to ði. þæt ic sceal ðe

 7.149. Feower hund geara and hundnigontig geara sind getealde of

 7.155. Ealle ðas ðing sind gefyllede þurh cristes
menniscnysse. æfter þam fyrste and andagan þe se heahengel gabrihel

 7.157. Þurh crist is geendod adames forgægednys. and his synn.
and crist adylegode ælce unrihtwisnysse. and astealde ða ecan
rihtwisnysse. and he gefylde ealle witegunga þurh hine sylfne. and he is
ealra halgena halga. for ðan þe he is heafod ealra haligra manna;
 7.162. Hu is he gesmyrod? Man smyrað cyning mid gehalgodum ele.
þonne man hine to cyninge gehalgað. and on ælcere hadunge ge on
diaconhade ge on preosthade. ge on biscophade æfre se ðe ðær gehadod
bið. he bið gesmyrod mid gehalgodum ele;
 7.166. Crist is soðlice ealra biscopa biscop. and ealra cyninga

þæs halgan gastes for ðan þe on criste wunað eal gefyllednys
ðære godcundnysse lichamlice;
 7.170. Eft be cristes acennednysse. dauid se sealmwyrhta sang. and
cwæð þæt he gehyrde cristes stemne þus cweðende;
 7.171. God cwæð to me. ðu eart min sunu nu todæg ic
gestrynde þe;
 8.172. Eft þæs fæder stemn be his bearne clypode and
cwæð;
 8.173. He sylf clypode to me. þu eart min fæder. and eft se
fæder be him cwæð;
 8.174. Ic beo him fæder. and he bið me sunu. and ic gesette
hine frumcennedne. and healicne toforan eallum eorðlicum cynegum;
 8.177. Isaias eft witegode be cristes acennednysse;
 8.177. Us is cild acenned. and us is sunu forgifen. and his

god. and fæder þære toweardan worulde. and sibbe ealdor. his rice. and
his anweald bið gemenigfyld. and ne bið nan ende his sibbe;
 8.182. Be ðam wundrum þe crist geworhte witegode hieremias to

 8.183. To ðe cymð þin alysend. and þis bið his tacn;
 8.184. He geopenað blindra manna eagan. and deafum he forgifð
heorcnunge. and mid his stemne he arærð þa deadan of heora byrgenum;
 8.186. And be ðam ylcan cwæð Isaias;
 8.187. Secgað þam wacmodum þæt hi beon gehyrte. and nan
ðing ofdrædde. her cymð god sylf and gehælð us;
 8.188. Þonne beoð geopenode blindra manna eagan. and deaffra
manna earan gehyrað. þonne hleapð se healta swa swa heort. and dumbra
manna tungan beoð swiðe getinge;
 8.191. Be his ðrowunge cwæð Isaias;
 8.192. He is gelæd to slege swa swa scep. and he suwade. and his
muð ne ondyde. swa swa lamb deð þonne hit man scyrð;
 8.194. And eft cwæð dauid;
 8.194. Hi þurhðydon mine handa. and mine fet. and hi dældon
min reaf betwux him;
 8.195. Be cristes deaðe witegode se ylca dauid. and cwæð be
cristes lice;
 8.196. Min lichama gerest on hihte. for ðan þe þu ne
forlætst mine sawle on helle. ne ðu ne geðafast þæt min lichama
gebrosnige;
 8.198. Ðas word crist geclypode to his fæder;
 8.199. And siððan he cwæð be his æriste;
 8.199. Ic aras of deaðe. and ic eft mid þe eom;
 8.200. Be his upstige cwæð se ylca dauid;
 8.201. God astihð up to heofonum mid micelre myrhðe;
 8.201. And eft se ylcan cwæð;
 8.202. Singað þam gode ðe astah ofer heofonas to
eastdæle;
 8.204. Be ðam þe crist sitt æt his fæder swiðran
cwæð se ylca witega;
 8.205. God cwæð to minum drihtne. site her to minum
swiðran;
 8.205. Be ðam ðe crist ealle ðing gewylt witegode se ylca
dauid;
 8.206. Ealle cyningas onbugað him. and ealle þeoda him
ðeowiað;
 8.207. Eft be his tocyme to ðam micclum dome cwæð se ylca.
God cymð swutellice. and he ne suwað. fyr byrnð on his gesihðe. and
stiðlic hreohnys bið onbuton him;
 9.210. Be mancynnes æriste. witegode Isaias;
 9.211. Þa deadan sceolon arisan. and þa ðe licgað on
byrgenum hi geedcuciað;
 9.212. Be ðam dome dauid cwæð to gode;
 9.213. Þu drihten forgyltst ælcum be his weorcum;
 9.214. Gif we willað areccan ealle ða gewitnyssa þe be criste
awritene sind. þonne gæð þær swiðe micel hwil to. ne þeah
hwæðere we ne magon hi ealle gereccan. for ði na þæt an þæt

 12.1. <foreign> UII. KALENDAS. IANUARII. NATALE SANCTI STEPHANI

 12.3. Mine gebroðra þa leofostan we truwiað þonne ge

 12.8. Sum Yponienscis mæden wearð deofolseoc. þa gesmyrode

 12.12. Heo ða gewende ongean blissigende. buton latteowe. seo

 12.25. Þa gesawon hi hine adligne. and mid wope bædon þæt

ðan þe he eallum cyðerum cristes bysne æteowode. betwux ðam he hylt
ealdordom. a buton ende;
 17.190. Nis nanum men alyfed þæt he oðerne wyrige. for ðan
þe se apostol paulus cwyð. þæt ða wyrigendan godes rice ne
geagniað;
 17.192. Ne wyrige nan man oðerne. ne yfeles ne wisce. þy læs
ðe he ðurh ða wyriunge. his sawle swilce mid deoflicum rapum gewriðe.
and ða wrace ðrowige on his gaste. þe þæt wif on lichaman ðrowade.
þe be deofles ræde hire agenne team mid wyriunge geyrmde. and hi sylfe mid
grine acwealde;
 17.196. Gyman ealle fæderas. and moddru. þæt hi heora cild
mid gramlicum wyriungum deofle ne betæcon. and warnian ða bearn þæt
hi naðer ne fæder ne moder mid teonan ne getyrion to heora wyriungum. for
ðan hit is awriten on godes . æ;
 17.200. Arwurða ðinne fæder and þine moder. þæt þu
lang lif ofer eorðan wunie;
 17.203. Ne mæg nan man oðerne wyrian. and him sylfum
gebeorgan. ac he fordeð his agene sawle mid þære manfullan wyriunge.
getimige ðam oðrum swa him getimige;
 17.205. Ure tunge is gesceapen to godes herungum. and to
gesceadwisum spræcum. na to deofollicum wyriungum;
 17.207. Ne magon we mid anum muðe bletsian. and wyrian;
 17.208. Mine gebroðra understandað þis. ne slihð se dema
þone forscyldgodan sceaðan. ac he hæt his underðeoddan hine belifian;
 17.210. Witodlice se ðe oðerne wyrigð. he set hine sylfne to
deman. and god to slagan;
 17.211. Þonne he bitt þæt god þone oðerne fordon sceole.
hwæt deð he ðonne buton swilce he deme. and god slea;
 18.213. Uton beon gemyndige hwæt drihten be ðysum tæhte;
 18.214. He cwæð lufiað eowre fynd. doð þam tela ðe eow
hatiað. and gebiddað for eowerum ehterum and tynendum. þæt ge beon

 19.1. <foreign>UIII. IDUS. IANUARII. SERMO IN AEPIPHANIA DOMINI. </foreign> ðES
DæG IS gehaten on bocum swutelung dæg. for ðan þe on ðisum dæge
wearð crist mancynne geswutelod. ærest ðam þrym cynegum þe him lac
brohton. and eft gewislicor ða ða he on ðyssum dæge gefullod wæs;
 19.4. Se ælmihtiga godes sunu. þa ða he mann beon wolde.
ða sende he his bydel toforan him IOHANNEM þone fulluhtere. þæt he
sceolde cristes tocyme mannum cyðan. þæt hi ðurh ðone bydel
gelyfdon. on ðone godcundan cyning;
 19.8. Se IOHANNES wæs acenned swa swa oðre menn beoð of
fæder and of meder. and wæs anfeald man. mære and geðungen. swa swa
Crist be him cwæð;
 19.10. Þæt on wifa bearnum næs nan mærra mann. þonne
IOHANNES se fulluhtere;
 19.12. Crist næs na of wife acenned. ac wæs of mædene. for
ði næs he geteald to ðyssere wiðmetennysse;
 19.14. Iohannes ða ða he gestiðod wæs ða wolde he
forbugan ða unðeawas þe menn begað. and ferde ða to westene. and
ðær wunode oð þæt he fullweaxen wæs. and ðær swiðe
stiðlice leofode. ne dranc he naðor ne win. ne beor. ne ealu. ne nan
ðæra wætena ðe menn of druncniað;
 19.18. Ac æt him ofet. and þæt þæt he on wuda findan
mihte;
 19.19. Eall his reaf wæs geworht of oluendes hære;
 19.20. Þa ða he geðogen wæs. þa com him to godes bebod.
þæt he sceolde faran to mannum. and bodian fulluht on synna forgifenysse.
and sceolde fullian þæt folc ðe him to come. mid his agenum fulluhte;
 19.23. On ðam fulluhte næs nan synne forgifenyss;
 19.24. And he sceolde eac cyðan ymbe cristes fulluht. þe
toweard wæs on ðam ðe beoð ealle synna forgyfene;
 19.26. Iohannes com ða swa swa him beboden wæs to ðære ea
þe is gehaten Iordanis. and clypode to eallum folce. and ðus cwæð;
 20.28. Behreowsiað eowre synna. and wyrcað dædbote. for
ðan þe godes rice genealæhð;
 20.29. Ælc treow þe nele beran godne wæstm sceal beon

 20.30. Þæt is þæt andgit þæt ælc man þe nele
wyrcan god weorc sceal beon mid deaðe forcoruen. and on helle fyre aworpen;
 20.33. Þa com þæt Iudeisce folc to Iohanne. and andetton him
heora synna. and he hi fullode on ðære ea Iordane;
 20.34. Ða axodon hi Iohannem hwæt hi don sceoldon;
 20.35. He andwyrde mid feawum wordum. and ðus cwæð;
 20.36. Se ðe hæbbe twyfeald reaf. sylle þæt oðer þam
ðe næbbe;
 20.37. Se ðe hæbbe twyfealde mettas. he do hand swa gelice;
 20.38. Þa comon eac to his fulluhte. Gerefan. and tolleras. and
cwædon him to;
 20.39. Þu lareow. sege us hwæt we don sceolon;
 20.40. Se halga wer him ða geandwyrde;
 20.40. Ne nime ge æt nanum menn na mare þonne eow geset is;
 20.41. Him comon eac to hiredmenn. and cempan. and axodon hwæt
hi don sceoldon. and he him andwyrde;
 20.43. Ne ehte ge nanes mannes. ne ge nænne mann ne ofbeatað.
ac beoð eow gehealdene on eowrum gescipe;
 20.45. Þa ðohte eal þæt folc. and wende be iohanne
þæt he wære crist. for ðan ðe crist wæs ða gyt stille betwux
mannum. and nane wundra ne worhte openlice ær ðan ðe he wæs þritig
geara on ðære menniscnysse. for ðan ðe he nolde hine sylfne mannum
cyðan. ær ðan þe he come to ðære ylde. and to þam wæstme.
þe lareow habban sceal;
 20.50. Þa cwæð Iohannes to ðam folce;
 20.50. Ne eom ic na crist. ac ic fullige eow on wætere to ði.
þæt ge sceolon eowre synna behreowsian;
 20.52. Æfter me cymð se ðe is strengra þonne ic. and ic ne

 20.55. Þas word he clypode be criste for ði. þe cristes

 20.56. Þæt wæter wiðutan. and se halga gast wiðinnan;
 20.57. Iohannes fulluht ðwoh þone mannan wiðutan. and nan

 21.61. Þa ða Crist wæs ðritig wintra. þa com he on

 21.63. Ða ða Iohannes hine geseah cumende to him. þa

 21.71. Iohannes ða geðafode þæt he Crist gefullode;

 21.85. Þis nis nu alyfed nanum men to donne. for ðan ðe

 22.96. Ða ða he into ðam wætere eode. ða wæs þæt

 22.98. Micel wæs cristes eadmodnys. ða ða he com sylf to

 22.127. Þry on hadum. and an on godcundnysse. and on gecynde. and

 23.128. Ne trucað heora nan ana ðurh unmihte. ac ðurh gecynde

manna sawla ðe him betæhte syndon. toeacan his agenre sawle;
 26.239. Þonne gif ða lareowas wel tæcað. and wel
bysniað. ðonne beoð hi gehealdene;
 26.241. Gif hi mistæcað oððe misbysniað. hi
forpærað hi sylfe;
 26.242. Be ðæs folces gehyrsumnysse cwæð crist. to his
lareowum;
 26.243. Se ðe eow gehyrsumað. he gehyrsumað me. and se ðe
eow forsihð. he forsihð me;
 26.245. Uton beon gemyndige hwæt we gode beheton. on urum
fulluhte;
 26.246. Nu cweþst ðu. hwæt behet ic ða ða ic cild
wæs. and sprecan ne mihte? We rædað on ðam ealdan gesetnyssum.
þæt ða halgan lareowas tæhton þone soðan geleafan þam mannum
þe to cristendome gebugon. and axodon hi hwæðer hi woldon wiðsacan
deofle. and on god gelyfan;
 26.250. Hi beheton þæt hi woldon swa don. and wurdon ða
gefullode on halgum fante. mid þam behate;
 26.252. Þa unsprecendan cild hi fullodon ðurh geleafan þæs
fæder. and ðære meder. and se godfæder wæs þæs cildes
forspreca. and borh wið god þæt hit heolde þone cristendom be godes
tæcunge. for ðan ðe se cwyde is swiðe egeslic þe crist cwæð.
þæt nan ungefullod mann ne becymð to ðam ecan life;
 26.257. Nu stent ðeos gesetnys on godes gelaðunge. þæt man
ða unsprecendan cild fullige. and hi beoð gehealdene þurh oðra manna
geleafan. swa swa hi wæron þurh oðra manna synna geniðerade. for ðan
ðe hit bið twylic hwæðer hit on life aðolige. oð þæt hit
þam lareowe mid geleafan andwyrdan mage;
 27.262. We habbað full swutele bysne þises ðinges;
 27.262. Sum wif wæs ðe com to criste. and bæd for hire
dehter þe læg on wodum dreame;
 27.264. Þa cwæð crist to hire þæt hit nære na
rihtlic þæt man name his cildra hlaf. and wurpe hundum;
 27.265. Heo ða andwyrde;
 27.265. Gea leof drihten. and þeah hwæðere oft ða hwelpas
gelæccað þa cruman þe feallað of þæs hlafordes beode;
 27.267. Ða andwyrde se hælend. and cwæð;
 27.268. Eala ðu wif. micel is ðin geleafa. Getimige ðe swa
swa ðu wilt;
 27.269. Hire dohtor wearð þærrihte gewittig;
 27.269. Þa wæs seo dohtor gehæled þurh geleafan ðære
meder;
 27.270. Swa beoð eac ða ungewittigan cild gehealdene on ðam
fulluhte þurh geleafan ðæs fæder. and ðære meder. and ðurh
forespræce þæs godfæder;
 27.273. Se mæssepreost axað þæt cild. and cweð;
 27.273. Wiðsæcst ðu deofle? ðonne andwyrt se godfæder
þæs cildes wordum and cweð;
 27.275. Ic wiðsace deofle;
 27.275. Þonne axað he eft;
 27.275. Wiðsæcst ðu eallum his weorcum? He cweð ic
wiðsace;
 27.276. He axað þriddan siðe;
 27.277. Wiðsæcst ðu eallum his getotum? He cwyð ic
wiðsace;
 27.278. Þonne hæfð he wiðsacen on ðisum ðrym wordum
deofle. and eallum leahtrum;
 27.279. Ðonne axað he gyt;
 27.279. Gelyfst ðu on ðære halgan ðrynnysse. and soðre
annysse? He andwyrt ic gelyfe;
 27.281. Se godes ðen befrinð þonne gyt;
 27.281. Gelyfst ðu þæt we sceolon ealle arisan mid urum
lichaman on domes dæge togeanes criste. and þæt ðær gehwa onfo
edlean ealra his weorca. swa swa he ær on life geearnode? He andwyrt ic
gelyfe;
 27.284. And se preost gefullað þæt cild mid þisum
geleafan;
 27.285. Hit wexð and gæð forð. and ne cann þyses
geleafan nan ðing;
 27.287. Is nu for ði micel neod gehwam þæt he leornige æt
his lareowe hu he his cristendom healdan sceole. mid þam soðan geleafan.
and hu he mage deofol forbugan. and helle wite. and geearnian þæt ece lif.
and ða ecan myrhðe mid gode. for ðan ðe se apostol Paulus spræc
swiðe egeslice be ungelyfedum mannum;
 27.291. He cwæð;
 27.292. Þa ðe godes . æ. ne cunnon. and buton godes . æ.
syngiað. hi eac buton godes .æ. losiað;
 27.293. And eft;
 27.293. Se mann þe god forgyt. God forgyt eac hine;
 28.294. Uton don for ði swa swa se ylca apostol tæhte.
Genealæcað to gode. and god genealæhð to eow;
 28.295. And se sealmscop us mynegað eft ðus cweðende;
 28.296. Eadig bið se wer se ðe hine ondræt god. and awent
his willan to his bebodum;
 28.297. To ðyssere eadignysse and to ðære ecan eadignysse
gebringe us se ælmihtiga god. se ðe leofað and rixað a buton ende.
