Second Sunday after Epiphany: Godden 1979, 29-40.



 29.1. <foreign> DOMINICA. II. POST AEPIPHANIA DOMINI. </foreign> <foreign>Nuptie facte sunt
In chana galileae. ET RELIQUIA;</foreign> Iohannes se godspellere cwæð on þære
godspellican race. þæt gifta wæron gewordene on anum tune ðe geciged
CHANA. on ðam galileiscan earde. and ðær wæs Maria þæs
hælendes moder;
 29.5. Se hælend wæs eac gelaðod to þam giftum. and his
leorningcnihtas samod;
 29.6. Þa gelamp hit þæt ðær ascortode win ðam
gebeorum. and þæs hælendes moder cwæð to him;
 29.7. Hi nabbað win leng;
 29.8. Þa andwyrde se hælend;
 29.8. Fæmne. hwæt is me and ðe to ðan? Ne com gyt min
tima;
 29.9. Seo eadige moder cwæð to þam ðenum. swa hwæt swa
he eow bebyt. doð þæt;
 29.10. Soðlice þær wæron gesette six stænene
wæterfatu. for clænsunge ðæra iudeiscra manna. and hi heoldon
twyfealde gemetu. oððe þryfealde;
 29.13. Drihten cwæð to þam ðeningmannum;
 29.13. Fyllað þa fatu mid wætere;
 29.14. Þa ðeningmen dydon be his hæse. and ða stænenan
fatu oð þone brerd gefyldon;
 29.15. Drihten ða þurh his mihte þæt wæter to wine
awende. and cwæð;
 29.16. Hladað nu. and berað þam drihtealdre;
 29.17. Hi hlodon. and bæron;
 29.17. Ða ða se drihtealdor þæs wines onbyrigde. and nyste
hu hit gedon wæs þa byrlas wiston. þe þæt wæter hlodon. ða
clypode he to ðam brydguman. and cwæð;
 29.20. Ælc man scencð ærest his gode win on forandæge.
and þæt waccre þonne hi druncene beoð;
 29.21. Þu soðlice heolde þæt betste win. oð þis;
 29.22. Þis tacn worhte se hælend ærest on his menniscnysse.
and geswutelode his wuldor. and his leorningcnihtas on hine gelyfdon;
 30.25. Se lareow beda cwæð þæt drihten hine sylfne
gemedemode þæt he to woruldlicum giftum gelaðod com. and hi mid þam
forman tacne his wundra gehalgode. to ði þæt he wolde geswutelian
þæt ða giftu beoð herigendlice. ðe for bearnteame beoð gefremode
swiðor þonne for galnysse;
 30.29. Æfter gastlicum andgite drihten com to giftum on ðisum
middanearde. for ðan ðe he ða halgan gelaðunge him to bryde geceas. swa
swa se apostol to geleaffullum folce cwæð;
 30.32. Ic beweddode eow anum were. þæt ge gearcian criste an
clæne mæden;
 30.33. Crist is se clæna brydguma. and his gelaðung þæt
is seo geleaffulle menigu is his bryd. seo ðe acenð dæghwomlice ða
gastlican cild þurh geleafan and fulluht. and swa ðeah ðurhwunað on
clænum mægðhade;
 30.37. Þa giftu wæron gegearcode on ðam tune þe is geciged
chana. galileiscre scire. Chana is gereht anda. and galilea oferfæreld;
 30.39. Anda is twyfeald. þæt is yfel and god;
 30.39. Yfel bið se anda þe andað ongean godnysse. and se anda
is god ðe mid lufe andað ongean yfelnysse. to ði þæt he yfel
onscunige. and god lufige;
 30.42. Þa ðe þus andiað ongean unriht. and farað fram
leahtrum to mæignum. hi belimpað to ðam gastlicum giftum. þæt is to
cristes gelaðunge. seo ðe is ure gastlice moder;
 30.45. Win ateorode æt ðam giftum to ði. þæt drihten
mid selran wine þa gebeoras gegladode. and his godcundnysse mihta mid þam
tacne geopenode;
 30.47. Drihten cwæð to his meder. Fæmne. hwæt is me and
ðe to ðan? swilce he cwæde. ne wyrcð seo menniscnyss ðe ic of ðe
genam þæt tacn þe ðu bitst. ac seo godcundnys þe ic ðe mid
geworhte;
 30.50. Þonne min ðrowungtima cymð. þonne geswutelað seo
menniscnys hire untrumnysse;
 31.52. Hydrie sind gehatene wæterfatu. for ðan ðe on
greciscum gereorde is wæter geciged ydor;
 31.53. Eornostlice wæter getacnað ingehyd haligra gewrita.
þæt aðweahð his hlysteras fram synna horewum;
 31.55. Þa stænenan wæterfatu sind estfulle heortan haligra
lareowa. þa aheardiað on stanes gecynde ongean deofellicum costnungum;
 31.58. Æt ðam giftum ascortode win. for ðan ðe seo ealde
gecyðnys ateorode on cristes andwerdnysse fram flæsclicum weorcum. and
wearð awend to gastlicum ðeawum;
 31.60. Swa micclum swa win is deorwurðre þonne wæter. swa
micclum is cristes lar þe he ðurh his andwerdnysse his apostolum tæhte
deorwurðre. ðonne wære seo ealde gesetnys. ðe he þurh Moysen
gedihte. for ðan ðe moyses .æ. wæs flæsclic. and cristes gesetnys
is gastlic;
 31.65. Seo ealde .æ. wæs swilce scadu and getacnung. Cristes
bodung is soðfæstnys. and gefylð gastlice swa hwæt swa seo ealde
gecyðnys mid mislicum gesetnyssum getacnode;
 31.68. Æt þam giftum wæron gesette six stænene
wæterfatu. æfter ðæra Iudeiscra clænsunge healdende ænlipige
twyfealde gemetu. oððe þryfealde;
 31.70. Nis gecweden on ðam godspelle þæt ða wæterfatu
sume heoldon twyfealde gemetu. sume ðryfealde. ac ænlipige hi heoldon
twyfealde gemetu. oððe ðryfealde. for ðan ðe ða halgan lareowas
hwilon sprecað be ðam ælmihtigan fæder. and his sunu. hwilon
swutollice embe ðære halgan ðrynnysse. and þeah ðe se halga gast ne
beo swutollice genemned to ðam fæder and to ðam suna. swa ðeah he
bið symle ðærto undergyten. for ðan ðe he is heora begra lufu and
willa æfre mid him bam;
 32.79. Þa Iudeiscan wæron swa geðeawode. þæt hi setton
wæterfatu on flora æt heora gebeorscipum. and sceolde ælc ðe inn
come his handa aðwean. ær ðan ðe he gesæte. gif he buton tale beon
wolde;
 32.82. Þa wæron gesette for ðam ðeawe six stænene
wæterfatu. æt ðisum giftum;
 32.83. Þa six wæterfatu getacnodon six ylda ðyssere
worulde;
 32.84. Seo forme yld wæs fram Adame. oð Noe;
 32.84. Seo oðer yld wæs fram noe. oð Abraham;
 32.85. Seo þridde yld wæs fram abrahame. oð Dauid;
 32.86. Seo feorðe fram dauide. oð þæt Nabochodonosor
hergode on Iudeiscre leode. and hi hæftlingas to babilone gelædde;
 32.88. Seo fifte yld wæs fram babiloniscre heregunge. oð
cristes acennednysse. æfter ðære menniscnysse;
 32.89. Seo sixte yld stent nu fram cristes acennednysse. mid
ungewisre geendunge astreht. oð antecristes tocyme;
 32.92. Mine gebroðra uton sceawian nu hu ðas six wæterfatu
wæron afyllede mid halwendum wætere. boclicra gewrita;
 32.93. Uton eac understandan hu þæt ylce wæter wearð
awend on wynsumum wines swæcce;
 32.95. Witodlice mihte drihten æmtige fatu mid wine afyllan. se
ðe ealle ðing of nahte gesceop. ac he wolde swiðor þæt wanne
wæter to mærlicum wine awendan. and mid þam geswutelian þæt he ne
com to ðy þæt he wolde towurpan ða ealdan. æ. oððe witegan. ac
wolde hi æfter gastlicum andgite gefyllan;
 32.100. On anginne middaneardes wæs adam. þa slep adam
þæt eua wurde of his sidan gesceapen. him to gemacan;
 32.101. Crist gewat on ðære rode. and his side wearð mid
spere geopenad. and of ðære fleowon þa gerynu þe his gelaðung
wearð mid gesceapen him to clænre bryde;
 32.104. On ðære ylcan ylde wæs Abel adames sunu rihtwis.
and gode andfenge. þone ofsloh Cain his broðor. unscyldigne þurh andan;
 32.106. Se ðe nu æfter gastlicum andgite understent be adame
swa swa we cwædon. and þæt se mægslaga cain getacnode þæra
iudeiscra geleafleaste. ðe crist mid niðe acwealdon. and þæt abeles
slege getacnode drihtnes ðrowunge. buton twyn he gemet þæt wæter to
winlicum swæcce awend;
 33.111. On ðære oðre ylde þissere worulde wearð eal
middaneard mid flodes yðum adylegod for synna micelnysse. buton ðam
rihtwisan Noe anum. and his seofan hiwon. þe on ðam arce belocene wæron
to anes geares fyrste. and hi siððan eal mancyn gestryndon;
 33.115. Gif we gleawlice æfter gastlicum andgite tocnawað.
þæt se swymmenda arc getacnode godes gelaðunge. and þæt se rihtwisa
noe getacnode crist. and þæt yðigende flod þe ða synfullan
adylegode. gebicnode þæt halige wæter ures fulluhtes. þe ure synna
adilegað. þonne gewisslice bið us awend þæt oðer wæterfæt to
wunderlicum wine. for ðan ðe we geseoð ure clænsunge and halgunge and
rihtwisnysse gewitegode on ðære ealdan gereccednysse;
 33.122. Witodlice ða eahta menn þe se arc on his bosme abær
wurdon ahredde wið þam yðigendum flode. and ealle oðre eorðlice
gesceafta þæt brade wæter adydde;
 33.125. Swa eac nu ða ðe on godes gelaðunge geleaffulle
ðurhwuniað. beoð gehealdene wið woruldlicum yðum. and dwollicere
deopnysse. ða ungeleaffullan þe buton godes gelaðunge dwollice
drohtniað. untwylice forwurðað on ecnysse;
 33.129. <foreign>Precor humiliter quosque peritos ne nos uituperent. eo
quod historiam propter ignorantes tam aperte hic ponimus;</foreign> On ðære
þriddan ylde afandode god Abrahames gehyrsumnysse. and het þæt he name
his leofan sunu Isaac and hine on anre dune him geoffrode. and ofsloge;
 33.133. Þa wæs abraham buton elcunge gearo to godes hæse.
and siðode arodlice to ðære dune ðe him god gewissode. and his sunu
samod;
 33.135. Efne ða ða he ðære dune genealæhte. þa
cwæð he to his cnihtum. andbidiað her. Ic and þis cild willað us
gebiddan æt þære stowe þe us god geswutelode;
 34.138. Isaac þa bær wudu to forbærnenne ða offrunge. and
abraham hæfde him on handa fyr and swurd;
 34.139. Isaac ða befran ðone fæder. and cwæð;
 34.140. Efne her is fyr and wudu. min fæder hwær is seo
offrung? Abraham andwyrde;
 34.141. Min bearn. god foresceawað him sylfum þære
onsægednysse offrunge;
 34.142. Hwæt ða abraham ða ða hi to ðære stowe comon
geband his leofan sunu. and his swurd ateah þæt he hine gode geoffrode;
 34.144. Efne ða godes engel clypode of heofonum. and mid hluddre
stemne cwæð;
 34.146. Abraham. ne astrece ðu ðine hand bufon ðam cilde. ne
him nane dare ne gedo;
 34.147. Nu ic oncneow þæt ðu god ondrædst. and þu ne
arodest þinum ancennedan suna for his hæse;
 34.148. Þa beseah abraham underbæc. and ðær stod an ramm
betwux þam bremelum getiged be ðam hornum;
 34.150. He ða genam ðone ramm and gode geoffrode for ðam
cilde;
 34.151. Æfter ðisum clypode eft godes engel of heofonum to
abrahame. þus cweðende;
 34.152. God cwæð. Ic swor þurh me sylfne. for ðan ðe
þu þas dæde dydest. and ðinum ancennedan bearne ne arodest. Ic
gebletsige ðe. and þinne ofspring ic gemenigfylde swa swa steorran on
heofenan. and swa swa sandceosol on sælicum strande;
 34.156. Þin sæd soðlice geagnað his feonda gatu. and on
ðinum sæde beoð gebletsode ealle eorðlice mægða. for ðan ðe
ðu gehyrsumedest minre stemne;
 34.159. Abraham ða ham gecyrde mid ansundan bearne. and mid ecere
bletsunge;
 34.161. We sceolon understandan on abrahame þone ælmihtigan
fæder. and on Isaace his leofan sunu urne hælend crist. Be ðam
cwæð se heofonlica fæder. þes is min leofa sunu ðe me wel licað.
and we sceolon tocnawan on isaaces offrunge drihtnes ðrowunge. Be ðam
cwæð se apostol paulus. þæt god fæder ne sparode his agenum
bearne. ac for us eallum hine to deaðe sealde;
 34.166. Isaac bær ðone wuda to his agenum bærnete. and his
fæder bendum ne wiðcwæð;
 35.168. Swa eac crist wæs gehyrsum his fæder oð deað. and
him sylf his rode abær;
 35.169. Næs ðeah isaac ofslegen. ac se ramm hine spelode. for
ðan ðe crist wæs unðrowigendlic on þære godcundnysse. and seo
menniscnys ana deað and sar for us ðrowade;
 35.172. Swilce se sunu wære geoffrod. and se ramm ofsniden;
 35.173. Ge sceolon eac gelyfan þæt seo bletsung ðe god behet
abrahame gæð ofer us. and we sind abrahames sæd. swa swa paulus þeoda
lareowa cwæð;
 35.175. Eornostlice gif ge cristes sind. þonne sind ge abrahames
sæd. and æfter behate yrfenuman;
 35.176. Þurh ðis deope andgit us bið awend þæt ðridde
wæterfæt to halwendum wine. mid þam we magon ure mod gastlice
gegladian;
 35.179. On ðære feorðan ylde geceas israhela folc him sylfum
SAUL to cyninge ongean godes willan. þeah ðe he hit geðyldelice
forbære. and he wearð gode ungehyrsum. and nolde faran be his dihte;
 35.182. Þa spræc god to his witegan Samuhele ðisum wordum;
 35.183. Hu lange wilt ðu bewepan Saules sið. þonne ic hine
awearp þæt he leng ofer israhela ðeoda ne rixige? Afyll ðin elefæt.
and far to ðære byrig bethleem to ISAI. ic foresceawode of his sunum me
gecorenne cyning;
 35.186. Far and gelaða ISAI mid his sunum to ðinre
onsægednysse. and ic geswutelige ðe hwilcne ðu to cyninge gehalgian
scealt;
 35.188. Samuhel ða ferde be godes hæse to bethleem. and god
geceas dauid of his seofon gebroðrum. him to cyninge ofer his folc;
 35.190. Hwæt ða Samuhel gehalgode dauid to cyninge on middan
his gebroðrum. and godes gast him wæs onwunigende. æfre of ðam
dæge;
 35.192. Witodlice godes gast gewat fram saule. and hine astyrode se
awyrigeda gast fram gode;
 35.194. Siððan æfter ðan genam saul micelne nið to ðam
gecorenan dauide. and oft hrædlice hine acwellan wolde;
 35.196. Dauid wearð þa of his earde aflymed. and saul his symle
ehte. oð þæt he on ðære dune GELBOE hine sylfne acwealde. and dauid
feng to his rice. and on ðam gode gecwemlice feowertig geara rixode;
 36.200. Æfter gastlicum andgite we magon undergytan on dauide
cristes getacnunge. On saules ehtnysse þæra ungeleaffulra Iudeiscra
ehtnysse ongean crist. and his gelaðunge. and heora eorðlice rice wearð
toworpen for heora mandædum æfter saules gelicnysse. Cristes rice and his

 46.156. Witodlice ne underfehð nan ceorigende sawul godes rice.

ceorung is to understandenne. heora gnornung þæt hi rihtlice for heofonan
rice leofodon. and swa ðeah mid langsumere elcunge hit underfengon;
 46.160. We soðlice þe to ðære endlyftan tide comon
æfter urum geswince nateshwon ne ceoriað. and we underfoð þone pening.
for ðan we ðe cumað æfter þæs hælendes menniscnysse we beoð
gelædde to his rice þærrihte æfter urum forðsiðe. gif we ær
on life rihtlice leofodon. and we ðonne buton yldinge underfoð. þæt
þæt ða ealdfæderas æfter langsumere elcunge underfengon;
 47.166. Be ðam cwæð se hiredes ealdor. Ic wille syllan
ðisum endenextan ealswa micel swa ðe;
 47.169. And for ðan þe seo onfangenes þæs rices is of
godes godnysse. rihtlice is her bæftan gecweden on endebyrdnysse þæs
godspelles;
 47.171. La hu. ne mot ic don þæt ic wille? Dyslic bið mannes
ceas ongean godes godnysse;
 47.172. Sum ceorung mihte beon. gif he his behat ne gelæste. and
nan ðeah ðe he mare ne sealde;
 47.173. Be ðam is gyt gelimplice gecweden;
 47.174. Oððe ðin eage is yfel for ðan þe ic eom god? Ne
onhebbe hine nan man on his weorcum. ne on langsumum ðeowdome. þonne seo
soðfæstnys clypað;
 47.176. Þus beoð þa endenextan fyrmeste. and þa fyrmestan
endenexte;
 47.178. Efne nu ðeah we witon hu fela god oððe hu micele we
gefremodon. nyte we ðeah gyt mid hwylcere smeaðancelnysse se upplica dema
ða afandað. and witodlice gehwilcum men is ðearle to blissigenne. þeah
ðe he endenext on godes rice sy geendebyrd;
 47.183. Þises godspelles geendung is swiðe ondrædendlic.
Fela sind gelaðode. and feawa gecorene;
 47.184. Drihten cwæð on oðre stowe. þæt fela cumað
fram eastdæle. and fram westdæle. and gerestað mid þam
heahfæderum. Abrahame. and Isaace. and Iacobe on heofenan rice;
 47.187. Hwæt eac þes ylca trahtnere Gregorius on sumes oðres
godspelles trahtnunge cwæð. þæt swa micel werod menniscra manna sceal
astigan þæt heofonlice rice. swa fela swa ðæra gecorenra engla on
heofonum belifon æfter ðæra modigra gasta hryre;
 48.191. Þeah ða gecorenan godes cempan sind feawa geðuhte on
andwerdum life betwux flæsclicum mannum ðe heora lustum gehyrsumiað. ac
hi ne beoð feawa ðonne hi gegaderode beoð;
 48.195. Ne gedafenað þam gastlicum þæt hi ðam
flæsclicum geefenlæcon. ne hi huxlice forseon. for ðan ðe we geseoð
hwæt nu todæg is. ac we nyton hwæt tomerigen bið toweard;
 48.197. Forwel oft cymð se bæftan us. þe us mid swyftnysse
godre drohtnunge forestæpð. and we earfoðlice him filiað tomerigen. se
ðe nu todæg is ure folgere geðuht;
 48.200. Witodlice ða ða se forma cyðere Stephanus for godes
geleafan gestæned wæs. Saulus heold ealra ðæra stænendra hacelan.
and swa ðeah Paulus siððan forestop Stephanum on godes gelaðunge. mid
menigfealdum geswincum. þone ðe he ær ehtende martyr gemacode;
 48.204. Twa ðing sind þe we sceolon carfullice scrutnian.
ærest þæt ure nan be him sylfum to dyrstelice ne truwige. syððan
þæt ure nan be his nextan ne ortruwige. ðeah ðe he on leahtrum

 48.210. Þyssere mildheortnysse welan besceawode se sealmscop ða
ða he to gode þus clypode;
 48.211. Min gefylsta. ðe ic singe. for ðan ðe ðu god eart

 48.213. Efne se sealmwyrhta understod on hwilcum gedeorfum þis

 48.215. He gecigde drihten his andfenga. for ðan ðe he
underfehð us into ecere reste. fram ðisum andweardum geswince;
 48.216. He beheold þæt god gesihð ure yfelnyssa. and ure
gyltas forðyldgað. and swa ðeah he sparað us arfæstlice. and ðurh
behreowsunge to ðære ecan mede gehylt;
 49.219. Ða nolde he gecigan god mildheortne. ac het hine his
mildheortnyss. þus cweðende. min god and min mildheortnyss;
 49.222. Uton gemunan ure ærran synna. and uton besceawian ða
micclan godes arfæstnysse. hu he urum gyltum miltsað. and ðærtoeacan
þæt heofenlice rice behæt. soðlice dædbetendum æfter gyltum;
 49.225. Uton for ði ealle clypian mid inweardre heortan. swa swa
se sealmscop clypode. þu eart min god. and min mildheortnys;
 49.227. Godes mildheortnys us forestæpð. and his mildheortnys
us fyligð;
 49.228. Þa ða we wel noldon. ða forhradode godes mildheortnys
us þæt we wel woldon;
 49.229. Nu we wel willað. us fyligð godes mildheortnys þæt
ure willa ydel ne sy;
 49.230. He gearcað urne godan willan to fultimigenne. and he
fylst ðam willan gegearcodne. Se ðe leofað and rixað nu and symle on
worulde;
 49.233. AMEN: We willað eow secgan be ðyssere andweardan tide.
hwi seo halige gelaðung forlæt on godes cyrcan <foreign>Alleluian.</foreign> and <foreign>Gloria in

 49.237. Sum wis lareow hatte Amalarius. se awrat ane boc be

 49.242. Septuagesima is hundseofontigfeald getel. Seo tid onginð

 50.249. Nu hylt godes gelaðung þis hundseofontigfealde getel

 50.253. Se witega hieremias witegode be ðære israhela ðeode.

 50.255. Nu on ðære gelicnysse forlætað godes ðeowas

 50.261. Ærest on ðære mæssan officio we singað

 50.265. Eft on ðære mæssan collectan we cweðað. <foreign>Qui

 50.267. Eac se apostol on ðam pistole cwæð. ælc ðæra

Sexagesima: Godden 1979, 52-9.



 52.1. <foreign> DOMINICA. IN SEXAGESIMA. </foreign> <foreign>Cum turba plurima conueniret ad
Iesum. Et reliqua</foreign> On sumere tide ða ða micel menigu samod com to ðam
hælende. and fram gehwilcum burgum to him genealæhton. þa sæde he
him þis bigspel;
 52.4. Sum sædere ferde to sawenne his sæd. and hit gelamp
ða ða he seow þæt sum dæl þæs sædes befeoll on ðam wege.
and hit wearð fortreden. and fugelas hit æton;
 52.7. Oðer dæl ðæs sædes befeoll ofer stænigum
lande. and hit mid ðam upspringe forbarn. for ðan ðe hit næfde
nænne wætan;
 52.9. Sum þæt sæd sprang betwux ðornum. and ða ðornas
samod weoxon. and þæt sæd forsmorodon;
 52.10. Sum dæl eac þæs sædes befeoll on goddre eorðan
and forgeaf upastigendne wæstm. sum be ðrittigfealdon. sum be
sixtigfealdon. sum be hundfealdon;
 52.13. Þas word drihten clypigende cwæð. Se ðe hæbbe
earan to gehyrenne. gehyre ðas word;
 52.15. Þa befrinon his leorningcnihtas. hwæt ðis bigspel
mænde;
 52.16. Þam he sylf sæde;
 52.16. Eow is forgifen þæt ge cunnon ða gerynu godes rices.
soðlice þam ðe wiðutan sind. bið on bigspellum gesæd. þæt hi
onlocigende hit ne geseon. and gehyrende hit ne understandon;
 53.19. Þis bigspel is ðus. þæt sæd is godes word;
 53.19. Se dæl ðe uppon ðam wege feoll. sind þa menn ðe
godes lare gehyrað. þonne cymð se deofol and ætbrett þæt word of
heora heortan. þæt hi gelyfende ne beoð gehealdene;
 53.22. Soðlice þæt sæd ðe bufon ðan stænigum lande
befeoll. sind ða ðe mid blisse godes word underfoð. ac hi nabbað
nænne wyrtruman for ðan ðe hi gelyfað sume hwile. and þonne seo
costnung cymð þonne gewitað hi fram gode;
 53.26. Þæt sæd þe sprang betwux ðam ðornum. þæt
sind ða ðe gehyrað godes word. ac hi sind gebysgode mid heora welum. and
mid heora lifes lustum forsmorode. and ne berað nænne wæstm;
 53.29. Þæt ðe upon godum lande befeoll. þæt sind ða
ðe godes word on godre heortan healdað. and bringað wæstm on
geðylde. sume ðrittigfealdne. sume sixtigfealdne. sume hundfealdne;
 53.33. Gregorius se trahtnere cwæð. þæt for ði wolde
drihten getrahtnian þurh hine sylfne þæt bigspel ðe he sæde.
þæt we cuðon secan oðra ðinga getacnunge on ðam ðe he nolde
þurh hine sylfne geswutelian. and þæt ge beon gewisse ðonne ure
tyddernys his worda getacnunga eow geopenað;
 53.37. Hwa wolde me æfre gelyfan gif ic wolde gereccan. þæt
ðornas getacnodon welan. ðonne ðornas priciað. and ða welan
gelustfulliað;
 53.39. Ac swa ðeah hi sind untwylice ðornas. ðonne hi ða
sawla toterað mid pricungum mislicra geðohta. and bið ðonne hi ða
sawla to synne geteoð. swilce hi mid onbeslagenre wunde hi geblodigian;
 53.43. Rihtlice se oðer gospellere matheus het hi lease welan.
for ðan ðe hi ne magon lange mid us wunian;
 53.44. Lease welan hi sind. for ðan ðe hi ne adræfað ure
saule hafenleaste;
 53.45. Ac se welega nat þæt he is wædla. for ðan ðe he
næfð rihtwisnysse speda. and þæs heofenlican wisdomes goldhordas.
þe sind soðe welan. and heora lufigendne. gemaciað weligne ecelice;
 54.49. Gif ge wilniað þæt ge rice beon. lufiað þa
soðan welan þæt sind halige mægnu;
 54.50. Gif ge geðincðe soðes wurðmyntes secað. efstað
þonne to ðam heofenlican rice. on ðam ge beoð engla geferan on
wulderfullum wurðscipe endeleaslice;
 54.53. Mine gebroðru us gedafenað þæt we mid arfæstum
geleafan underfon drihtnes trahtnunge. and ða ðing þe he læfde us to
trahtnigenne. we sceolon mid scortre race ða befon;
 54.55. Drihten sylf geopenað us þæt þæt sæd is godes
word. and þæt mislice land getacnað mislice heortan þæra
heorcnigendra manna;
 54.58. Þone sædere he belæfde us to secenne. Ac we ne magon
nænne sædere godes lare rihtlicor undergytan. ðonne hine sylfne godes
sunu. se ðe ferde to sawenne his sæd. ða ða he of his fæder bosme
forðstæppende becom to þisum middanearde. to ði þæt he gewitnesse
soðfæstnysse cydde. and mid his halgan lare middaneardlic gedwyld
adwæscte;
 54.64. Þæt sæd þe feoll be ðam wege mid twyfealdre dare
losode. ða ða wegferende hit fortrædon. and fugelas tobæron;
 54.65. Se weg is seo fortredene heorte fram yflum geðohtum. þe
ne genihtsumað to underfonne godes word. ne nænne wæstm to spryttanne.
and for ði swa hwæt swa ðæs godan sædes on swylcum wege befylð.
bið mid yfelum geðohtum oftreden. and ðurh deoflum gelæht;
 54.70. Deoflu sind fugelas gecigede. for ðan ðe hi fleoð
geond þas lyft ungesewenlice. swa swa fugelas. doð gesewenlice;
 54.72. Matheus awrat þus be ðisum sæde. ælc ðæra
ðe gehyrð þæt heofenlice word. and he hit ne understent. ðonne
cymð se yfela and gelæhð hit;
 54.74. Mid þam is geswutelod þæt ða sind wið þone weig

andgite onfon. þonne ætbret se fleogenda sceocca ðærrihte þæt
halige sæd of swilcera gedwolena heortan;
 55.79. Þæt sæd þe bufon ðam stanigum lande feol sprytte

 55.81. Swa doð sume menn þonne hi gehyrað godes word. þonne

seo costnung. and earfoðnyss. þonne abreoðað hi for ðan þe se

 55.85. Hwæt is seo stænige eorðe buton heardheortnyss.

 55.86. Hæbbe se mann heardheortnysse. and ungewyldelic mod. and

 55.90. Hwene ær we spræcon be ðam sæde. þe betwux

 55.91. Drihten sylf trahtnode be ðisum. þæt ða sind þe

 55.94. Woruldcara and welan. and flæsclice lustas forsmoriað

 56.106. Se dæl þæs sædes ðe on godre eorðan befeol.

 56.108. Soðlice geðyld is micel mægen on haligre drohtnunge.

 57.136. Ælcum menn gedafenað clænnyss. and swiðost

 57.142. Gemænes hades preostum is alyfed æfter ðæs

hæmed;
 57.146. Þreo hund biscopa. and eahtatyne gesetton ðone canon.
þæt nan mæssepreost oððe diacon on his wununge wifhades mann
næbbe. buton hit sy his moder. oððe sweoster. oððe faðu. oððe
modrie;
 57.149. And gif he dearnunga oððe eawunge wifes bruce. þæt
he his hades ðolige;
 57.150. Ne heora nan gerefscire oððe mangunge ne drife. for
ðan ðe hi sind gecorene of woruldmannum to godes teolungum. þæt hi
ðurh hyra lare. and cristendome þæt læwede folc gode gestrynan;
 57.153. We sceolon eallum godes folce samod þa boclican lare
secgan. þæt ðam godum þe hit gehealdan willað ne sy oftogen seo
gastlice deopnyss. and þa ðwyran beon geðreade. þæt hi æt suman
sæle to godes rihte gebugan;
 57.158. Se apostol Petrus hæfde wif and cild. and eac sume ða
oðre apostolas ær hi to cristes lareowdome gecyrdon. ac hi geswicon
flæsclicera lusta and dæda. siððan he hi to ðam apostolican hade
geceas. swa swa petrus to drihtne gecwæð;
 58.161. Efne we forleton ealle ðing. and ðe folgiað;
 58.162. Hwæt wille we furðor ymbe ðis smeagan. buton
þæt se hæfð þa mede ðe hi geearnað. se ðe tobrecð þa
canonican gesetnysse him is bot alyfed. and geswicenys. se ðe on
forgægednysse þurhwunað. he gemet swiðe stiðne dom. on ðam
toweardan life;
 58.167. Gregorius rehte sume bysne be ðam worde ðe drihten
cwæð. þæt seo gode eorðe hire wæstmas forðbrincð on
geðylde;
 58.168. He cwæð þæt he cuðe sumne man on romebyrig. his
nama wæs Seruulus. ðearfa on æhtum. and welig on geearnungum;
 58.170. Se læg bedryda fram cildhade. oð his geendunge;
 58.171. He læg singallice and næfre sittan ne mihte. ne hine
on oðre sidan bewendan. ne his handa to his muðe geræcan;
 58.173. Him ðenode his moder and broðer. and swa hwæt swa
him godes frynd on ælmessan forgeafon. þæt he dælde forð oðrum
ðearfum;
 58.175. Ne cuðe he boclice stafas. ac begeat him halige bec. and
gelaðode him to gelærede menn. and him olæhte þæt hi ðæra
boca andgit singallice him trahtnodon;
 58.178. And he swa becom to ðæra boca andgite. þeah ðe he
sylf nænne stæf ne cuðe;
 58.179. He symle on his legere gode ðancode. and dæges and
nihtes mid lofsangum hine wurðode;
 58.182. Þa ða se tima becom þæt his miccle geðyld wurde
gewuldrod fram gode ða awende seo sarnyss ealra his lima to ðære
heortan;
 58.184. Efne ða ða he ongeat þæt se deað him
genealæhte. þa bæd he ða ælðeodigan weras ðe on cuman hiwe him
mid wunodon. þæt hi astodon and on his forðsiðe heora sealmas sungon;
 58.187. Hwæt ða færlice ða ða he sylf mid þam
ælðeodigum preostum sang. ða clypode he mid micclum ogan. and heora sang
gestilde. and cwæð. Suwiað. Hwæt la. ne gehyre ge hu myrige lofsangas
swegað on heofonum? Efne ða mid þam þe he hlyste ðæs heofonlican
sanges. ða gewat his sawul of ðam geswenctan lichaman. to ecere reste;
 59.192. Þa wearð þæt hus afylled mid wunderlicum
bræðe. swa þæt ealle ða licmenn wurdon afyllede mid ðam wynsumum
stence. and se bræð on heora nosðyrlum ne ateorode. oð þæt se
halga lichama bebyriged wæs;
 59.195. Swa ageaf þes goda mann his wæstm gode þurh
geðyld. for ðan þe he forbær godes swingele swiðe emlice. and
siððan to edleanes æcre becom;
 59.199. Mine gebroðra understandað be ðisum. hwilce beladunge
hæbbe we æt godes dome. gif we asleaciað fram godum weorcum. we ðe
habbað ure hæle and æhta. nu þes lama wædla buton handcræfte
godes beboda gefylde? Ic bidde eow gebroðra. tihtað eower mod to
gecnyrdnysse godra weorca. þæt ge mid geðylde godne wæstm to godes
handa gebringon. þæt ge mid him and his halgum þæt ece lif habban
moton. on ealra worulda woruld;
 59.206. AMEN:

 60.1. <foreign> DOMINICA .I. IN QUADRAGESIMA. </foreign> MEN þa leofostan eow
eallum is cuð. þæt ðes gearlica ymryne us gebrincð efne nu þa

wæccum. and gebedum. and ælmesdædum fram synnum aðwean. þæt we

wurðian moton. and þæs halgan husles þigene mid geleafan underfon. us

 60.10. Witodlice þis feowertigfealde fæsten wæs asteald on

 60.13. Eft siððan se mæra witega Elias eal swa lang

cymð eft he and Enoch togeanes Antecriste. to ði þæt hi þæs
deofles leasunge mid godes soðfæstnysse oferstælan;
 60.18. Drihten eac on ðære niwan gecyðnysse fæste þurh

 60.21. Þus wæs ure lenctenlice fæsten asteald. ac we ne

 61.25. Stuntlice fæst se lenctenlic fæsten. se ðe on

 61.27. Unrihtlic bið þæt se cristena mann flæsclice

 61.31. Se ðe on oðrum dagum sleac wære to godnysse. he sceal

 61.33. Se ðe ær glædlice mid godum weorcum hine sylfne

 61.35. Ne bið nan fæsten gode gecweme. buton se mann hine

 61.38. Beoð gemyndige ðæra twegra worda. þe drihten

 61.39. He cwæð forgyfað. and eow bið forgyfen;
 61.39. Syllað. and eow bið geseald;

 61.43. And uton don þearfum. and wannspedigum sume hiððe ure

 61.46. Mildheortnyss is synna læcedom. heo alyst fram ðam ecan

 61.48. Mildheortnys ana gemundað us on ðam micclum dome. gif we

 62.50. Witodlice ðam bið dom buton mildheortnysse. se ðe nu

 62.52. Of rihtwisum gestreonum man sceal ælmessan dælan swa

 62.54. Þa ælmessan þe of reaflace beoð gesealde sind gode

 62.57. God bebyt þæt man ælmessan wyrce. and he forbead

 62.58. Se unrihtwisa berypð oðre and blissað. eft gif se

 62.61. Se ðe awent his neb fram clypigendum ðearfan. he sylf

 62.62. Ahyld ðin eare to ðæs wædlan bene. þæt god

 62.67. God forgifð ricum welan genihtsumlice. and ðam þearfum

 63.84. Hwæt hæfst ðu. gif ðu me næfst;

 63.90. He cwæð. Sum welig mann wæs on worulde. and his

 63.95. Min sawul ðu hæfst fela god to manegra geara brice;

 64.110. Swa hwæt swa we be anfealdan godes þearfum for his

 64.122. Eft on oðre stowe cwæð drihten on his godspelle;

 64.131. Witodlice mannes bearn cymð on his mægenðrymme. and

 65.138. We willað eow geswutelian nu ærest. gif eower hwilc

 65.144. Þonne cwyð se cyning Crist to ðam þe on his

 65.149. Ic wæs nacod. and ge me scryddon;

 66.171. Soð ic eow secge. swa lange swa ge forwyrndon anum of

 66.174. Þonne farað ða uncystigan. and ða unrihtwisan into

 67.1. <foreign> DOMINICA SECUNDA IN QUADRAGESIMA.</foreign> <foreign>EGressus inde IESUS.
Secessit in partes tyri et sidonis; ET RELIGUA.</foreign> Drihten hælend ðreade mid

 67.4. Þa ferde he ðanon to ðære burhscire þe is gehaten

 67.6. And efne ða ferde an Chananeisc wif of ðam gemærum

 67.8. Dauides bearn. gemiltsa me. min dohtor is yfele fram deofle

 67.9. He suwade. and hire nan word ne geandwyrde;

 67.15. Drihten leof. help min;

 67.22. Þis chananeisce wif wæs of hæðenum folce. and

 68.25. Þæt wif wæs afaren fram gemærum hire eðeles.

 68.29. Heo clypode;
 68.29. Dauides bearn. gemiltsa me. min dohtor is yfele fram deofle
gedreht;
 68.30. Hit wæs soðlice swa gedon. ac seo dohtor þe on wodum
dreame læg dweligende. getacnode þæra hæðenra manna sawle. ðe
wæron yfele þurh deofol gedrehte. ða ða hi ne cuðon heora scyppend.
ac gelyfdon on deofolgyldum;
 68.34. Seo moder cwæð dauides bearn gemiltsa min. and godes
gelaðung seo ðe is ure moder gelyfð. þæt crist is dauides bearn on
þære menniscnysse. and heo bitt us miltsunge æt him. for ðan ðe he
is god ælmihtig ure alysend;
 68.37. Æfter ðeawlicum andgite se ðe leahtras begæð
deofle to gecwemednysse his scyppende on teonan. his dohtor is untwylice awedd.
for ðan ðe his sawul is ðurh deofol gedreht. ac him is neod þæt he
his agene wodnysse tocnawe. and mid geleafan æt godes halgum þingunge
bidde. and mid micelre anrædnysse drihtnes fet gesece. biddende þæt he
his sawle fram ðam wodan dreame ahredde. swa swa he dyde þæt chananeisce
mæden;
 68.45. He ne andwyrde ðam wife æt fruman na for modignysse. ac
he nolde his cwyde awendan ðurh ðone þe he bead his leorningcnihtum ær
his ðrowunge þus cweðende;
 68.47. Ne fare ge on hæðenra manna wege. and on Samaritaniscra
burgum ne becume ge. he nolde syllan intingan þam Iudeiscum þæt he hi
forsawe. ðe godes .æ. heoldon. and þæt hæðene folc him to getuge
þe deofolgild beeodon;
 68.51. Nu suwade crist æt fruman wið þæs wifes clypunge.
for ðan ðe he ða liflican bodunge on his andwerdnysse hæðenum leodum
bedigelode;
 68.53. Witodlice æfter his æriste of deaðe he bebead his
apostolum þus cweðende;
 68.54. Farað. and lærað. ealle ðeoda. and fulliað hi on
naman þæs ælmihtigan fæder. and his suna. and þæs halgan
gastes. and lærað hi þæt hi healdon ealle ða ðing þe ic eow
bebead;
 69.58. Cristes leorningcnihtas to him genealæhton. and ðam
wife to him geðingodon. þus cweðende;
 69.59. La leof. forlæt hi. for ðan ðe heo clypað æfter
us;
 69.60. Swilce hi cwædon forlæt ðone gylt. and forgif hire
þine miltsunge. for ðan ðe heo urne fultum mid inweardre heortan sehð;
 69.62. Ne clypode heo synderlice to Petre. ne heo ne namode
Andream. ne heora nænne synderlice. ac eal þæt apostolice werod samod
mid micelre anrædnysse bæd. þæt hi to ðam mildheortan hælende
hire geðingodon;
 69.66. Drihten andwyrde his apostolum mid þisum wordum. and
cwæð;
 69.67. Ne eom ic asend buton to ðam sceapum israhela
hiwrædene. þe losodon;
 69.68. Soðlice se ælmihtiga fæder asende his ancennedan
sunu. mid soðre menniscnysse befangenne to ðam Iudeiscum folce. þæt hi
sceoldon ærest gif hi woldon to fulluhte bugan. ðurh cristes lare;
 69.71. Him gedafenode þæt hi ærest on crist gelyfdon. for
ðan ðe hi heoldon þa ealdan .æ. and hæfdon cyððe to gode fram
ealdum dagum. ða bodade crist þurh hine sylfne ðam anum folce. and of
ðam his apostolas geceas. and fela oðre gecorene halgan;
 69.75. Ac ða ða he geseah þæt se mæsta dæl ðære
ðeode his lare forsawon. and sume eac ymbe his lif syrwdon. ða forlet he hi
on heora geleafleaste. and geceas ða hæðenan leoda þe geond ealne
middaneard on deofolgyldum gelyfdon oð þæt;
 69.80. Þæt wif com. and hi astrehte ætforan drihtne. þus
cweðende;
 69.81. Drihten leof help min;
 69.81. Þreo halige mægnu we gehyrað be ðisum wife on
ðissere rædinge. þæt is geleafa. and geðyld. and eadmodnyss;
 69.83. Geleafan heo hæfde for ðan ðe heo gelyfde þæt
drihten mihte hire aweddan dohtor gehælan;
 69.84. Geðyld heo hæfde. ða ða heo forsewen wæs. and
swa ðeah anrædlice on hire benum þurhwunade;
 69.86. Eadmod heo wæs. ða ða heo hi sylfe to hwelpum
geemnette;
 69.88. Drihten cwæð to ðam wife. Nis na god þæt man
nime his bearna hlaf. and wurpe hundum;
 70.89. Þæt israhela folc wæs gyo geteald to godes bearnum.
and hæðen folc geond ealle woruld to hundum. for heora fulum ðeawum;
 70.91. Nu is seo endebyrdnys þæra namena awend. mid ðam
geleafan;
 70.92. Hi sind gehatene hundas. and we scep;
 70.93. Witodlice se witega cwæð be cristes ehterum. ðe hine
acwealdon;
 70.94. Fela hundas me ymbe eodon;
 70.94. Se witega þurh godes gast het ða Iudeiscan cristes
slagan hundas. þe hine mid facenfullum mode ymbe eodon;
 70.96. Eft crist sylf cwæð be us. Ic hæbbe oðre scep.
þa ðe ne sind of ðyssere eowde. and ða ic sceal lædan. and hi
gehyrað mine stemne;
 70.99. Þæt wif cwæð to criste;
 70.99. Gea leof drihten;
 70.99. Swa ðeah ða hwelpas etað of ðam crumon. þe
feallað of heora hlafordes mysan;
 70.101. Swiðe getacnigendlice spræc þis wif;
 70.101. Witodlice seo myse is seo boclice lar. seo ðe us
ðenað lifes hlaf;
 70.102. Be ðære mysan cwæð se witega;
 70.103. Drihten þu gegearcodest mysan on minre gesihðe.
togeanes ðam þe me gedræfdon;
 70.104. Soðlice æfter gastlicum andgite. þa hwelpas etað
ða cruman þe of heora hlafordes beode feallað. þonne ða ðeoda þe
on hæðenscipe ær lagon. nu sind mid geleafan to heora scyppende
gebigede. and þære gastlican lare haligra gewrita brucað;
 70.108. We hedað þæra crumena ðæs hlafes. and ða
Iudeiscan gnagað þa rinde. for ðan ðe we understandað þæt
gastlice andgit þæra boca. and hi rædað þa stæflican
gereccednysse buton andgite;
 70.112. Ealle heora bec ðe se heretoga moyses. oððe witegan
be godes dihte gesetton. ealle hi sprecað ymbe cristes menniscnysse. and ymbe
cristenra manna lif mid digelum andgite. and ða Iudeiscan ne hedað na mare.
buton ðære stæflican gereccednysse;
 70.116. We cristene men soðlice licgað under godes mysan. and
etað þa cruman his gastlican lare. for ðan ðe we sind eadmodlice mid
lichaman and mid sawle godcundlicum spræcum underðeodde. to gefyllenne his
beboda. þæt he us his behat gelæste;
 70.120. Drihten andwyrde. þam chananeiscum wife. and cwæð;
 70.121. Eala ðu wif. micel is ðin geleafa. Getimige ðe swa
swa ðu wylt;
 70.122. And hire dohtor wearð þa gehæled of ðære tide;
 70.122. For ðam micclum geleafan þære meder. forlet se
deofol ða dohtor;
 71.123. Mid ðam is geseald bysen urum fulluhte. þæt ða
unsprecendan cild beoð gehealdene on ðam fulluhte ðurh geleafan þæs
fæder. and ðære moder. and þæs foresprecendan godfæder. ðeah
ðe þæt cild nyten sy;
 71.127. Cristenra manna geleafan hæfð se ælmihtiga god mid
manegum tacnum gewurðod. þurh his halgan. ærest on heora life. and
siððan æt heora halgum byrgenum. þam sy wuldor and wurðmynt. A. on
ecnysse. Amen:

ÆCHom II, 9
B1.2.10.
Gregory: Godden 1979, 72-80.



 72.1. <foreign> 4. IDUS MARTII. SANCTI GREGORII PAPE. URBIS ROMANE
INCLITUS. </foreign> GREGORIUS se halga papa. Engliscre ðeode apostol. on ðisum
andwerdan dæge æfter menigfealdum gedeorfum. and halgum gecnyrdnyssum.
Godes rice gesæliglice astah;
 72.3. He is rihtlice engliscre ðeode Apostol. for ðan ðe he
þurh his ræd. and sande us fram deofles biggengum ætbræd. and to
godes geleafan gebigde;
 72.6. Manega halige bec cyðað his drohtnunge and his halige
lif. and eac historia anglorum ða ðe ælfred cyning of ledene on englisc
awende. Seo boc sprecð genoh swutelice be ðisum halgan were;
 72.9. Nu wylle we sum ðing scortlice eow be him gereccan. for
ðan ðe seo foresæde boc nis eow eallum cuð. þeah ðe heo on englisc
awend sy;
 72.12. Þes eadiga papa Gregorius wæs of æðelborenre
mægðe. and eawfæstre acenned;
 72.13. Romanisce witan wæron his magas;
 72.13. His fæder hatte Gordianus. and felix se eawfæsta papa
wæs his fifta fæder;
 72.15. He wæs swa swa we cwædon for worulde æðelboren.
ac he oferstah his æðelborennysse mid halgum ðeawum. and mid godum
weorcum geglengde;
 72.17. Gregorius is Grecisc nama. se sweigð on ledenum gereorde
<foreign>Vigilantius.</foreign> þæt is on englisc wacolre;
 72.19. He wæs swiðe wacol on godes bebodum. ða ða he sylf
herigendlice leofode. and he wacollice ymbe manegra ðeoda þearfe hogode.
and him lifes weig geswutelode;
 73.22. He wæs fram cildhade on boclicum larum getyd. and he on
ðære lare swa gesæliglice ðeah. þæt on ealre Romana byrig næs
nan his gelica geðuht;
 73.24. He gecneordlæhte æfter wisra lareowa gebysnungum. and
næs forgyttol. ac gefæstnode his lare on fæsthafelum gemynde;
 73.26. He hlod ða mid þurstigum breoste ða flowendan lare.
ðe he eft æfter fyrste mid hunigswettre þrotan þæslice bealcette;
 73.28. On geonglicum gearum. ða ða his geogoð æfter
gecynde woruldðing lufian sceolde. þa ongann he hine sylfne to gode
geðeodan. and to eðele þæs upplican lifes. mid eallum gewilnungum
orðian;
 73.32. Witodlice æfter his fæder forðsiðe. he arærde
six munuclif on Sicilia lande. and þæt seofoðe binnon romanaburh
getimbrode. on ðam he sylf regollice under abbodes hæsum drohtnode;
 73.35. Þa seofon mynstru he gelende mid his agenum. and
genihtsumlice to dæghwomlicum bigleofan gegodode;
 73.36. Þone ofereacan his æhta he aspende on godes þearfum.
and ealle his woruldlican æðelborennysse. to heofonlicum wuldre awende;
 73.38. He eode ær his gecyrrednysse geond romanaburh mid
pællenum gyrlum. and scinendum gymmum. and readum golde gefrætewod. ac
æfter his gecyrrednysse he ðenode godes ðearfum. he sylf ðearfa. mid
wacum wæfelse befangen;
 73.42. Swa fulfremedlice. he drohtnode on anginne his
gecyrrednysse. swa þæt he mihte ða gyu beon geteald on fulfremedra
halgena getele;
 73.44. He lufode forhæfednysse on mettum. and on drence. and
wæccan on syndrigum gebedum;
 73.46. Þærtoeacan he ðrowade singallice untrumnyssa. and swa
he stiðlicor mid andwerdum untrumnyssum ofsett wæs. swa he geornfullicor
þæs ecan lifes gewilnode;
 73.49. Þa undergeat se papa þe on ðam timan þæt
apostolice setl gesæt. hu se eadiga gregorius on halgum mægnum ðeonde
wæs. and he ða hine of ðære munuclican drohtnunge genam. and him to
gefylstan gesette. on diaconhade geendebyrdne;
 74.53. Ða gelamp hit æt sumum sæle. swa swa gyt foroft
deð. þæt englisce cypmenn brohton heora ware to romanabyrig. and
Gregorius eode be ðære stræt to ðam engliscum mannum heora ðing
sceawigende;
 74.56. Þa geseah he betwux ðam warum. cypecnihtas gesette. þa
wæron hwites lichaman. and fægeres andwlitan menn. and æðellice
gefexode;
 74.59. Gregorius ða beheold þæra cnapena wlite. and befran
of hwilcere þeode hi gebrohte wæron;
 74.60. Þa sæde him man þæt hi of engla lande wæron.
and þæt ðære ðeode mennisc swa wlitig wære;
 74.62. Eft ða gregorius befran. hwæðer þæs landes folc
cristen wære. ðe hæðen;
 74.63. Him man sæde. þæt hi hæðene wæron;
 74.64. Gregorius ða of innweardre heortan langsume siccetunge
teah. and cwæð;
 74.65. Walawa. þæt swa fægeres hiwes menn. sindon ðam
sweartan deofle underðeodde;
 74.66. Eft he axode hu ðære ðeode nama wære. þe hi of
comon;
 74.67. Him wæs geandwyrd. þæt hi angle genemnode wæron;
 74.68. Þa cwæð he. rihtlice hi sind Angle gehatene. for
ðan ðe hi engla wlite habbað. and swilcum gedafenað þæt hi on
heofonum engla geferan beon;
 74.70. Gyt ða Gregorius befran. hu ðære scire nama wære.
þe ða cnapan of alædde wæron;
 74.72. Him man sæde. þæt ða scirmen wæron dere
gehatene;
 74.73. Gregorius andwyrde. Wel hi sind dere gehatene. for ðan
ðe hi sind fram graman generode. and to cristes mildheortnysse gecygede;
 74.75. Gyt ða he befran. Hu is ðære leode cyning gehaten?
Him wæs geandswarod þæt se cyning ælle gehaten wære;
 74.77. Hwæt ða Gregorius gamenode mid his wordum to ðam
naman. and cwæð;
 74.78. Hit gedafenað þæt alleluia sy gesungen on ðam
lande. to lofe þæs ælmihtigan scyppendes;
 74.81. Gregorius ða sona eode to ðam papan þæs apostolican
setles. and hine bæd þæt he angelcynne sume lareowas asende. ðe hi to
criste gebigdon. and cwæð þæt he sylf gearo wære. þæt weorc
to gefremmenne mid godes fultume. gif hit ðam papan swa gelicode;
 75.85. Þa ne mihte se papa þæt geðafian. þeah ðe he
eall wolde. for ðan ðe ða romaniscan ceastergewaran noldon geðafian
þæt swa getogen mann and swa geðungen lareow þa burh eallunge forlete.
and swa fyrlen wræcsið gename;
 75.89. Æfter ðisum gelamp þæt micel manncwealm becom ofer
ðære romaniscan leode. and ærest ðone papan Pelagium gestod. and
buton yldinge adydde;
 75.91. Witodlice æfter ðæs papan geendunge. swa micel
cwealm wearð þæs folces. þæt gehwær stodon aweste hus geond þa
burh. buton bugigendum;
 75.93. Þa ne mihte swa ðeah seo romana burh buton papan wunian.
ac eal folc ðone eadigan Gregorium to ðære geðincðe anmodlice
geceas. þeah ðe he mid eallum mægne wiðerigende wære;
 75.96. Gregorius ða asende ænne pistol to ðam casere
Mauricium. se wæs his gefædera. and hine halsode. and micclum bæd.
þæt he næfre ðam folce ne geðafode. þæt he mid þæs
wurðmyntes wuldre geuferod wære. for ðan ðe he ondred þæt he
ðurh ðone micclan had on woruldlicum wuldre þe he ær awearp æt
sumum sæle bepæht wurde;
 75.102. Ac ðæs caseres heahgerefa Germanus gelæhte ðone
pistol æt Gregories ærendracan. and hine totær. and siððan cydde
þam casere þæt þæt folc Gregorium to papan gecoren hæfde;
 75.105. Mauricius ða se casere þæs gode ðancode. and hine
gehadian het;
 75.106. Hwæt ða gregorius fleames cepte. and on dymhofon
ætlutode. ac hine man gelæhte. and teah to Petres cyrcan. þæt he
ðær to papan gehalgod wurde;
 75.109. Gregorius ða ær his hadunge. þæt romanisce folc
for ðam onsigendum cwealme. ðisum wordum to bereowsunge tihte;
 75.111. Mine gebroðra þa leofostan us gedafenað þæt we
godes swingle þe we on ær towearde ondrædan sceoldon. þæt we huru
nu. andwerde and afandode ondrædan;
 75.113. Geopenige ure sarnys us infær soðre gecyrrednysse. and
þæt wite ðe we ðrowiað tobrece ure heortan heardnysse;
 76.115. Efne nu ðis folc is mid swurde þæs heofonlican
graman ofslegen. and gehwilce ænlipige sind mid færlicum slihte aweste;
 76.117. Ne seo adl ðam deaðe ne forestæpð. ac ge geseoð
þæt se sylfa deað þære adle yldinge forhradað;
 76.118. Se geslagena bið mid deaðe gegripen. ær ðan ðe
he to heofungum soðre behreowsunge gecyrran mæge;
 76.120. Hogiað for ði. hwilc se becume ætforan gesihðe
þæs strecan deman. se ðe ne mæg þæt yfel bewepan ðe he
gefremode;
 76.123. Gehwilce eorðbugigende sind ætbrodene. and heora hus
standað aweste;
 76.124. Fæderas and moddru bestandað heora bearna lic. and
heora yrfenuman him sylfum to forwyrde forestæppað;
 76.126. Uton eornostlice fleon to heofunge soðre dædbote. þa
hwile ðe we moton. ær ðan þe se færlica slege us astrecce;
 76.127. Uton gemunan swa hwæt swa we dweligende agylton. and
uton mid wope gewitnian. þæt þæt we manfullice adrugon;
 76.129. Uton forhradian godes ansyne on andetnysse. swa swa se
witega us manað;
 76.131. Uton ahebban ure heortan mid handum to gode. þæt is
þæt we sceolon ða gecnyrdnysse ure bene mid geearnunge godes weorces
uparæran;
 76.133. He forgifð truwan ure forhtunge. se ðe þurh his
witegan clypað. Nylle ic þæs synfullan deað. ac ic wille þæt he
gecyrre. and lybbe;
 76.136. Ne geortruwige nan man hine sylfne for his synna
micelnysse. witodlice ða ealdan gyltas niniueiscre ðeode. ðreora daga
bereowsung adilegode. and se gecyrreda sceaða on his deaðes cwyde. þæs
ecan lifes mede geearnode;
 76.139. Uton awendan ure heortan. hrædlice bið se dema to urum
benum gebiged. gif we fram urum ðwyrnyssum beoð gerihtlæhte;
 76.141. Uton standan mid gemaglicum wopum ongean ðam onsigendum
swurde. swa miccles domes;
 76.143. Soðlice gemagnys is þam soðan deman gecweme. þeah
ðe heo mannum unðancwurðe sy. for ðan ðe se arfæsta. and se
mildheorta god wile þæt we mid gemaglicum benum his mildheortnysse ofgan.
and he nele swa micclum swa we geearniað us geyrsian;
 76.147. Be ðisum he cwæð þurh his witegan;
 76.147. Clypa me on dæge ðinre gedrefednysse. and ic ðe
ahredde. and ðu mærsast me;
 77.149. God sylf is his gewita. þæt he miltsian wile him to
clypigendum. se ðe manað þæt we him to clypian sceolon;
 77.151. For ðy mine gebroðra þa leofostan. uton gecuman on
ðam feorðan dæge þysre wucan on ærnemerigen and mid estfullum mode
and tearum singon seofonfealde Lætanias. þæt se streca dema us gearige.
þonne he gesihð þæt we sylfe ure gyltas wrecað;
 77.156. Eornostlice ða ða micel menigu ægðer ge
preosthades ge munuchades menn. and þæt læwede folc æfter ðæs
eadigan gregories hæse on þone wodnesdæg to ðam seofonfealdum
letanium gecomon. to ðam swiðe awedde se foresæda cwealm. þæt
hundeahtatig manna on ðære anre tide feallende of life gewiton. ða hwile
þe þæt folc ða letanias sungon;
 77.161. Ac se halga sacerd ne geswac þæt folc to manigenne
þæt hi ðære bene ne geswicon. oð þæt godes miltsung þone
reðan cwealm gestilde;
 77.164. Hwæt ða gregorius siððan he papanhad underfeng.
gemunde hwæt he gefyrn Angelcynne gemynte. and ðærrihte þæt
luftyme weorc gefremode;
 77.166. He na to ðæs hwon ne mihte þone romaniscan
biscopstol eallunge forlætan. ac he asende oðre bydelas geðungene godes
ðeowan to ðysum iglande. and he sylf micclum mid his benum and tihtingum
fylste. þæt ðæra bydela bodung forðgenge. and gode wæstmbære
wurde;
 77.170. Þæra bydela naman sind þus gecigede. AUGUSTINUS.
MELLITUS. LAURENTIUS. PETRUS. IOHANNES. IUSTUS. ðas lareowas asende se eadiga
papa Gregorius mid manegum oðrum munecum to angelcynne. and hi ðisum wordum
to ðære fare tihte;
 77.175. Ne beo ge afyrhte ðurh geswince þæs langsuman
færeldes. oððe þurh yfelra manna ymbespræce. ac mid ealre
anrædnysse and wylme þære soðan lufe þas ongunnenan ðing þurh
godes fultum gefremmað;
 77.178. And wite ge þæt eower med on ðam ecum edleane swa
miccle mare bið. swa micclum swa ge mare for godes willan swincað;
 77.180. Gehyrsumiað eadmodlice on eallum ðingum Augustine.
þone ðe we eow to ealdre gesetton. hit fremað eowerum sawlum. swa hwæt
swa ge be his mynegunge gefyllað;
 78.183. Se ælmihtiga god þurh his gife eow gescylde. and
geunne me þæt ic mote eoweres geswinces wæstm on ðam ecan eðele
geseon. swa þæt ic beo gemet samod on blisse eoweres edleanes. ðeah ðe
ic mid eow swincan ne mæge. for ðon ðe ic wille swincan;
 78.188. Augustinus ða mid his geferum þæt sind gerehte
feowertig wera. ferde be gregories hæse. oð þæt hi to ðisum iglande
gesundfullice becomon;
 78.190. On ðam dagum rixode æþelbyrht cyning on
cantwarebyrig riclice. and his rice wæs astreht fram ðære micclan ea
humbre. oð suð sæ;
 78.192. Augustinus hæfde genumen wealhstodas of francena rice.
swa swa Gregorius him bebead. and he ðurh ðæra wealhstoda muð þam
cyninge. and his leode godes word bodade. hu se mildheorta hælend mid his
agenre ðrowunge þysne scyldigan middaneard alysde. and geleaffullum mannum
heofonan rices infær geopenode;
 78.198. Þa andwyrde se cyning æðelbriht Augustine. and
cwæð þæt he fægere word and behat him cydde. and cwæð
þæt he ne mihte swa hrædlice þone ealdan gewunan ðe he mid
angelcynne heold forlætan. cwæð þæt he moste freolice ða
heofonlican lare his leode bodian. and þæt he him and his geferan
bigleofan ðenian wolde. and forgeaf him ða wununge on cantwarebyrig. seo
wæs ealles his rices heafodburh;
 78.205. Ongann ða Augustinus mid his munecum to geefenlæcenne
þæra apostola lif mid singalum gebedum. and wæccan. and fæstenum
gode ðeowigende. and lifes word þam ðe hi mihton bodigende. ealle
middaneardlice ðing swa swa ælfremede forhogigende. ða þing ana þe
hi to bigleofan behofedon underfonde. be ðam ðe hi tæhton sylfe
lybbende. and for ðære soðfæstnysse ðe hi bodedon. gearowe wæron
ehtnysse to ðoligenne. and deaðe sweltan gif hi ðorfton;
 78.212. Hwæt ða gelyfdon forwel menige. and on godes naman
gefullode wurdon. wundrigende þære bilewitnysse heora unscæððigan
lifes. and swetnysse heora heofonlican lare;
 79.216. Ða æt nextan gelustfullode ðam cyninge
æðelbrihte heora clæne lif. and heora wynsume behat. þa soðlice
wurdon mid manegum tacnum geseðde. and he ða gelyfende wearð gefullod.
and micclum ða cristenan gearwurðode. and swa swa heofonlice ceastergewaran
lufode;
 79.220. Nolde swa ðeah nænne to cristendome geneadian. for
ðan ðe he ofaxode. æt ðam lareowum his hæle þæt cristes
ðeowdom ne sceal beon geneadad. ac sylfwilles;
 79.223. Ongunnon ða dæghwomlice forwel menige efstan to
gehyrenne ða halgan bodunge. and forleton heora hæðenscipe. and hi sylfe
geðeoddon cristes gelaðunge on hine gelyfende;
 79.226. Betwux ðisum gewende Augustinus ofer sæ. to ðam
ercebiscope Etherium. and he hine gehadode angelcynne to ercebiscope. swa swa
him gregorius ær gewissode;
 79.228. Augustinus ða gehadod cyrde to his biscopstole. and
asende ærendracan to rome and cydde ðam eadigan gregorie þæt
angelcynn cristendom underfeng. and he eac mid gewritum fela ðinga befran. hu
him to drohtnigenne wære betwux ðam nighworfenum folce;
 79.232. Hwæt ða gregorius micclum gode ðancode. mid
blissigendum mode þæt angelcynne swa gelumpen wæs swa swa he sylf
geornlice gewilnode. and sende eft ongean ærendracan to ðam geleaffullum
cyninge æþelbrihte mid gewritum and menigfealdum lacum. and oðre gewritu
to augustine mid andswarum ealra ðæra ðinga þe he hine befran. and
hine eac ðisum wordum manode;
 79.239. Broðer min se leofosta. ic wat þæt se ælmihtiga
god fela wundra þurh ðe þære ðeode ðe he geceas geswutelað.
þæs ðu miht blissigan. and eac ðe ondrædan;
 79.241. Þu miht blissigan gewisslice þæt ðære ðeode
sawla þurh ða yttran wundra beoð getogene to ðære incundan gife;
 79.243. Ondræd ða swa ðeah. þæt ðin mod ne beo ahafen
mid dyrstignysse on ðam tacnum þe god ðurh ðe gefremað. and þu
ðonon on idelum wuldre befealle wiðinnan. þonon ðe ðu wiðutan on
wurðmynte ahafen bist;
 80.247. Gregorius asende eac augustine halige lac. on
mæssereafum. and on bocum. and ðæra apostola. and martyra reliquias
samod. and bebead þæt his æftergengan symle ðone pallium. and ðone
ercehad æt ðam apostolican setle. romaniscre gelaðunge feccan sceoldon;
 80.251. Augustinus gesette æfter ðisum biscopas of his geferum
gehwilcum burgum on engla ðeode. and hi on godes geleafan ðeonde
ðurhwunodon. oð ðisum dægðerlicum dæge;
 80.254. Se eadiga gregorius gedihte manega halige trahtbec. and mid
micelre gecnyrdnysse godes folc to ðam ecan life gewissode. and fela wundra
on his life geworhte. and wuldorfullice þæs papan setles geweold.
ðreottyne gear. and six monðas. and tyn dagas. and siððan on ðisum
dæge gewat to ðam ecan setle heofenan rices. on ðam he leofað mid gode
ælmihtigum. a. on ecnesse Amen:

ÆCHom II, 10
B1.2.11.
Cuthbert: Godden 1979, 81-91.



 81.1. <foreign> 13 KALENDAS APRILIS. DEPOSITIO SANCTI CUTHBERHTI EPISCOPI.</foreign>
CUTHBERHTUS se halga biscop scinende on manegum geearnungum and healicum
geðincðum. on heofenan rice mid þam ælmihtigum scyppende on ecere
blisse rixiende wuldrað;
 81.3. Beda se snotera engla ðeoda lareow þises halgan lif.
endebyrdlice mid wulderfullum herungum. ægðer ge æfter anfealdre
gereccednysse. ge æfter leoðlicere gyddunge awrat;
 81.7. Us sæde soðlice beda. þæt se eadiga Cuðberhtus
ða ða he wæs eahta wintre cild. arn swa swa him his nytenlice yld tihte
plegende mid his efenealdum. Ac se ælmihtiga god wolde styran þære
nytennysse his gecorenan cuðberhtes þurh mynegunge gelimplices lareowes.
and asende him to an ðrywintre cild. þæt hit his dyslican plegan mid
stæððigum wordum wislice ðreade;
 81.13. Soðlice þæt foresæde ðrywintre cild. þone
gæmnigendan cuðberhtum befran;
 81.14. To hwi underþeodst þu ðe sylfne þisum ydelum plegan.
þu ðe eart fram gode gehalgod mid roderlicum wurðmynte? Ne gedafenað
biscope þæt he beo on dædum folces mannum gelic;
 81.17. Geswic la leof swa unðæslices plegan. and geðeod þe
to gode. ðe ðe to biscope his folce geceas. þam ðu scealt heofonan
rices infær geopenian;
 81.19. Hwæt ða cuthberhtus þa gyt mid his plegan forð arn.
oð þæt his lareow mid biterum tearum dreoriglice wepende ealra ðæra
cildra plegan færlice gestilde;
 81.22. Witodlice eall se cildlice heap wolde þæs anes cildes
dreorignysse gefrefrian. ac hi ealle ne mihton mid heora frofre his
dreorignysse adwæscan. ær ðan þe cuðberhtus hit mid arfæstum
cossum gegladode. and he sylf siððan æfter þæs cildes mynegunge. on
healicere stæððignysse symle ðurhwunode;
 82.28. Æfter ðisum wearð þæs eadigan cuðberhtes cneow
mid heardum geswelle alefed. swa þæt he mid criccum his feðunge
underwreðode;
 82.30. Þa gesæt he sume dæge under sunnbeame ana on
sundran. and his sceancan beðode. him com ða ridende to sum arwurðe ridda
sittende on snawhwitum horse. and he sylf mid hwitum gyrlum befangen wæs.
and he ðone halgan mid gesibsumum wordum swæslice grette. biddende
þæt he him dægwistes gedafenlice tiðode;
 82.35. Cuðberhtus ða to ðam engle anmodlice cwæð;
 82.36. Ic wolde ðine ðenunge sylf nu gearcian. gif ic me mid
feðunge ferian mihte;
 82.37. Min adlige cneow is yfele gehæfd. þæt ne mihte nan
læcewyrt awiht geliðian. ðeah ðe heo gelome to geled wære;
 82.39. Þa gelihte se cuma. and his cneow grapode. mid his
halwendum handum and het hine geniman hwætene smedeman. and on meolce
awyllan. and swa mid ðære hætan þæt toðundene lim gewriðan.
and æfter ðisum wordum his hors bestrad. on ðam siðfæte ðe he
ðider com aweg ferende;
 82.44. Hwæt ða cuðberhtus æfter þæs engles lare his
cneow beðode. and he sona gesundfull his færeldes breac. and ongeat
þæt god þurh his engel hine geneosode. se ðe giu ær þone blindan
Tobian ðurh his heahengel Raphahel mihtelice onlihte;
 82.48. Eft se halga cuðberhtus ða ða he wacode mid
hyrdemannum on felda on his geogoðe. geseah heofonas opene. and englas
gelæddon Aidanes biscopes sawle mid micclum wuldre into þære
heofonlican myrhðe;
 82.51. Hwilon eac cuðberhtus ferde geond land bodigende godes
geleafan. ða for unwedre gecyrde he to sumes hyrdes cytan. þe stod weste on
ðam westene ðe he oferferde. and getigde his hors ðær binnon;
 82.54. Ða mid ðam þe he his gebedu sang. ða tær þæt
hors þæt ðæc of ðære cytan hrofe. and þær feoll adune
swilce of ðam hrofe wearm hlaf mid his syflinge;
 82.57. He ða geðancode gode þære sande. and mid þære
hine sylfne gereordode;
 82.59. Se eadiga cuþberhtus æfter ðisum ealle woruldðing
eallunge forlet. and mid halgum ðeawum hine sylfne to munuclife geðeodde.
and he hrædlice siððan he munuc wæs wearð geset cumena ðen.
þæt he cumena huses gymde. and mynsterlicum cumum geðensum wære;
 83.63. Þa æt sumon sæle on wintres dæge him com to godes
engel on cuman hiwe. and cuðberhtus hine mid ealre cumliðnysse underfeng;
 83.65. Þa gecyrde he ut ymbe þæs cuman ðenunge. ac he ne
gemette nænne cuman ða ða he inn com. ac lagon ðry heofenlice hlafas
on lilian beorhtnysse scinende. and on hrosan bræðe stymende. and on
swæcce swettran þonne beona hunig;
 83.69. Þa sceawode se halga cuðberhtus on ðam snawe
gehwær. hwyder se cuma siðigende ferde. ac ða ða he nane fotswaðe on
þam snawe ne geseah. ða ongeat he þæt se cuma wæs engel and na
mann. se ðe ðone heofenlican fodan him brohte. and ðæs eorðlican ne
rohte;
 83.74. Þes foresæda halga wer wæs gewunod þæt he wolde
gan on niht to sæ. and standan on ðam sealtan brymme oð his swyran.
syngende his gebedu;
 83.76. Þa on sumere nihte hlosnode sum oðer munuc his
færeldes. and mid sleacrre stalcunge his fotswaðum filigde. oð þæt
hi begen to sæ becomon;
 83.78. Ða dyde cuþberhtus swa his gewuna wæs. sang his
gebedu on sælicere yðe. standende oð þone swyran. and syððan his
cneowa on ðam ceosle gebigde. astrehtum handbredum to heofenlicum rodore;
 83.81. Efne ða comon twegen seolas of sælicum grunde. and hi
mid heora flyse his fet drygdon. and mid heora blæde his leoma beðedon.
and siððan mid gebeacne his bletsunge bædon. licgende æt his foton on
fealwun ceosle;
 83.85. Þa cuðberhtus ða sælican nytenu on sund asende. mid
soðre bletsunge. and on merigenlicere tide mynster gesohte;
 83.87. Wearð þa se munuc micclum afyrht. and adlig on
ærnemerigen. hine geeadmette to ðæs halgan cneowum. biddende þæt
he his adl eallunge afligde. and his fyrwitnysse fæderlice miltsode;
 83.90. Se halga ða sona andwyrde. Ic ðinum gedwylde dearnunge
miltsige. gif ðu ða gesihðe mid swigan bediglast. oð þæt min sawul
heonon siðige. of andwerdum life gelaðod to heofonan;
 83.93. Cuðberhtus ða mid gebede his sceaweres seocnysse
gehælde. and his fyrwites ganges gylt forgeaf;
 84.95. Fela wundra wurdon geworhte ðurh ðone halgan cuðberht.
ac we wyllað for sceortnysse sume forsuwian. ðy læs ðe ðeos racu eow
to lang ðince;
 84.97. Witodlice cuþberhtus ferde swa swa his gewuna wæs. ymbe
geleaffulre bodunge. þæt he ðam ungelæredum folce. lifes weig
tæhte;
 84.99. Þa fleah sum earn ætforan him on siðe. and he his
geferan befrinan ongann. hwa hi to ðam dæge afedan sceolde;
 84.101. Ða cwæð his gefera þæt he gefyrn smeade.
hwær hi bigleofan biddan sceoldon. ða ða hi ða fare ferdon buton
wiste;
 84.103. Cuðberhtus ða him togeanes cwæð;
 84.103. La hwæt se ælmihtiga god mæg foreaðe unc þurh
ðisne earn. æt foresceawian. se ðe giu ær Elian afedde. þurh ðone
sweartan hremm. ær he to heofonan siðode;
 84.106. Hi ða ferdon forð siðigende. and efne se earn on
ðam ofre gesæt mid fisce geflogen. þone he ðærrihte gefeng;
 84.108. Þa cwæð se halga to his geferan. yrn to ðam earne
and him of anim. þæs fisces dæl ðe he gefangen hæfð. unc to
gereorde. Sy lof ðam ælmihtigan þe unc ðurh ðisne fugel fedan
wolde;
 84.111. Syle swa ðeah sumne dæl ðam earne to edleane his
geswinces;
 84.113. Hi ða æfter gereorde on heora weg ferdon. and
cuðberhtus ðam folce fægere bodade. þæt hi wære wæron wið
deofles syrwum. ðy læs ðe he mid leasunge heora geleafan awyrde. and
fram ðære bodunge. heora mod abrude;
 84.116. Þæt folc ða færlice ongann forð aræsan.
betwux þyssere minegunge micclum bepæht. þæt hi ðære lare to lyt
gymdon;
 84.118. Hwæt se swicola feond hi swiðe bedydrode. swilce
ðær sum hus. soðlice forburne. brastligende mid brandum. gedwymorlice
swa ðeah;
 84.120. Þa wolde þæt folc þæt fyr adwæscan. gif hit
ænig wæta wanian mihte;
 84.121. Ac ðæs halgan andwerdnyss eaðelice acwencte þæs
deofles dyderunge. þe hi dwollice filigdon. and ðæs lifes word lythwon
gymdon;
 84.124. Þæt folc ða ofscamod ongean cyrde to ðære lare
ðe hi ær forleton. biddende æt ðam lareowe. liðe miltsunge.
þæt hi his lare ær to lyt gymdon. ða ða he ða fræcednysse him
foresæde;
 84.127. Cuðberhtus swa ðeah. on oðrum timan. eallbyrnende
hus. ana ahredde. wið fyres dare. mid halgum benum. and ðone windes
blæd. aweg fligde. se ðe ær foroft. ða ættrigan flan. deoflicere
costnunge. on him sylfum adwæscte. þurh gescyldnysse. soðes drihtnes;
 85.131. He wolde gelome. leodum bodian. on fyrlenum lande.
unforhtigende;
 85.132. Hwæt ða him geuðe. se ælmihtiga god. fægre
getingnysse. ðam folce to lare. and him men ne mihton. heora mod behydan. ac
hi eadmodlice. him geandetton. heora digelnyssa. and elles ne dorston. and be
his dihte. digellice gebetton;
 85.137. Sum eawfæst man. eac swilce hæfde. micele cyððe.
to ðam halgan cuðberhte. and gelomlice his lare breac. þa getimode his
wife. wyrs ðonne he beðorfte. þæt heo ðurh wodnysse. micclum wæs
gedreht;
 85.140. Þa com se eawfæsta. to ðam eadigan cuðberhte. and
he wæs on ðam timan. to prafoste geset. on ðam munuclife. þe is
lindisfarnea gehaten. þa ne mihte he for sceame. him openlice secgan.
þæt his eawfæste wif. on ðære wodnysse læg. ac bæd þæt
he asende sumne broðer. þe hire gerihta. gedon mihte. ær ðan ðe heo
of life. gelæd wurde;
 85.145. Ða wiste cuðberhtus eal be ðam wife. and wolde þurh
hine sylfne. sona hi geneosian. for ðan ðe heo ær ðon. eawfæst
leofode. ðeah ðe se unsið. hire swa gelumpe;
 85.148. Þa begann se wer. dreorig wepan. anðracigende. þæs
ungelimpes;
 85.149. Cuðberhtus hine ða mid wordum gefrefrode. cwæð
þæt se deofol. þe hire derigan wolde. on his geneosunge. forlætan
sceolde. and mid micelre fyrhte aweg fleon. and þæt wif mid gewitte. wel
sprecende. him togeanes gan. and his bridel onfon;
 85.153. Hit ða gelamp. be ðæs lareowes wordum. þæt
þæt wif gewittig. hine mid wordum gegrette. bæd þæt heo moste him
mete gearcian. and cydde hu se deofol. hi dearnunge forlet. and swiðe
forhtigende. fleames cepte. ða ða se halga þider siðode;
 85.158. Cuðberhtus se halga. siððan gefremode. mihtiglice
wundra. on ðam mynstre wunigende;
 85.159. Begann ða on mode. micclum smeagan. hu he ðæs folces
lof. forfleon mihte. þy læs ðe he wurde. to hlisful on worulde. and
þæs heofenlican lofes. fremde wære;
 85.162. Wolde ða anstandende. ancerlif adreogan. and on
digelnysse. eallunge drohtnian;
 86.163. Ferde ða to farne. on flowendre yðe. þæt igland is
eal beworpen. mid sealtum brymme. on sæ middan. þæt wiðinnan eall.
ær ðam fyrste. mid sweartum gastum. swiðe wæs afylled. swa þæt
men ne mihton. þa moldan bugian. for ðeowracan. sweartra deofla. ac hi
ealle ða. endemes flugon. and þæt igland. eallunge rymdon. ðam
æðelan cempan. and he ðær ana wunode. orsorh heora andan. þurh
ælmihtigne god;
 86.171. Þa wæs þæt igland. mid ealle bedæled.
wæteres wynsumnysse. on ðam westum cludum. ac se halga wer. ða sona het.
þa heardnesse. swiðe holian. on middan ðære flore. his fægeran
botles. and ðær wæter æddre ða wynsum asprang. werod on swæcce.
þam were to brice. se ðe hwilon wæter. to winlicum swæcce. wundorlice
awende. ða ða hit wolde god;
 86.176. Se halga ða het. him bringan sæd. wolde on ðam
westene. wæstmes tilian. gif hit swa geuðe. se ælmihtiga god. þæt
he mid his foton. hine fedan moste;
 86.179. He seow ða hwæte. on beswuncenum lande. ac hit to
wæstme. aspringan ne moste. ne furðon mid gærse. growende næs;
 86.181. Þa het he him bringan. bere to sæde. and ofer ælcne
timan. ða eorðan aseow;
 86.182. Hit weox ða mid wynne. and wel geripode;
 86.184. Þa woldon hremmas. hine bereafian. æt his gedeorfum.
gif hi dorston. ða cwæð se halga. to ðam heardnebbum. gif se
ælmihtiga eow. ðises geuðe. brucað þæra wæstma. and me ne
biddað;
 86.187. Gif he ðonne eow. ðises ne getiðode. gewitað aweg.
wælhreowe fugelas. to eowrum eðele. of ðisum iglande;
 86.188. Hwæt ða hremmas ða. ricene flugon. ealle tosomne.
ofer ðone sealtan brym. and se halga ða. his geswinces breac;
 86.190. Eft ða siððan oðre twegen swearte hremmas siðlice

 87.218. For nahte bið geteald anes geares lust. þær ðær

 88.252. On ðam ylcan geare wearð eac ofslegen ecgfridus se

 89.267. He nolde awendan his gewunelican bigleofan. ne his

 90.308. Þa wunode sum sacerd. swiðe gelyfed. on ancersetle.

hohful on mode;
 90.310. Cuðberhtus ða sona. hine onsundron gespræc.

ÆCHom II, 11
B1.2.12.
Benedict: Godden 1979, 92-109.



 92.1. <foreign> 12. KALENDAS APRELIS. SANCTI BENEDICTI ABBATIS. </foreign>
BENEDICTUS. Se halga abbud. on ðisum andwerdum dæge gewat of ðisum
deadlicum life. to ðam ecan ðe he ær deoplice mid haligre drohtnunge
geearnode;
 92.3. He wæs of eawfæstum magum æðellice geboren. and hi
hine on cildhade to lare befæston on romebyrig. gelæredum uðwitum;
 92.5. Þa ða he on wisdome wel ðeonde wæs. ða begann he
to onscunigenne woruldmanna unðeawas. and sceoc digellice of ðære byrig.
and him folgode his fostermoder. oð þæt hi becomon to ðære stowe
ðe is efide gehaten. and eawfæste menn hine ðær sume hwile geletton;
 92.11. Ða abæd his fostermoder an hridder. and hit tobærst
on emtwa on ðære læne;
 92.12. Seo fostormodor ða sarlice weop for ðære awyrdan
læne. ac se eawfæsta Benedictus besargode his fostormoder sarnysse
swiðe arfæstlice. and genam ða sticcu þæs toclofenan hriddores. and
mid wope on his gebedum cneowode;
 92.16. Ac ða ða he of ðam gebedum aras. ða gemette he
þæt fæt wið hine licgende. swa gehal þæt ðær nan cinu on
næs gesewen;
 92.18. Þa wearð þis wundor on ðære stowe sona
gewidmærsod. and hi for wundrunge þæt hridder upahengon æt heora
cyrcan geate. þæt men mihton tocnawan þæs mæran Bendictes
mærða. hwylce geðincðe he hæfde ætforan gode ða giu on his
cildhade;
 92.23. Ac benedictus gewilnode swiðor to ðoligenne
earfoðnyssa. and geswinc for gode. þonne he cepte woruldlice herunga.
oððe þises lifes hlisan. and forfleah þa dearnunga þa fostormodor to
anre westenre stowe. þe is sublacus gecweden. feowertig mila fram romebyrig
þær hine afedde sum eawfæst munuc romanus hatte. þreo gear. and him
to munuclicum gyrlum fylste;
 93.29. Þa aheng se munuc ane lytle bellan on ðam stanclude
þæt benedictus mihte gehyran þurh þære bellan sweg. hwænne he
his bigleofan þær feccan sceolde. for ðan þe se romanus ne mihte him
to gegan for ðam stanclude;
 93.32. Þa sume dæge se niðfulla deofol þe andode on
ðæs munuces soðan lufe. and on ðæs oðres bigleofan. wearp þa
ænne stan to ðære bellan þæt heo eall tosprang;
 93.35. Ac se æðela munuc ne geswac na ðe raðor þam
oðrum to þenigenne on gedafenlicum tidum;
 93.37. Æfter þysum geswutelode se ælmihtiga god sumum
arwurðan mæssepreoste be ðam halgan benedicte. and se preost þa hine
gesohte on eastertide mid lacum. swa swa him beboden wæs;
 93.40. He ða hine gemette on ðam halgan easterdæge on anum
scræfe. and hine gespræc. and he wearð þa cuð hyrdemannum and his
nama geond eall sprang;
 93.42. Hwæt þa forwel mænige hine geneosodon. and him
lichamlice bigleofan brohton: and he him of his muðe. þa heofonlican lare.
forgeaf heora sawle to bigleofan;
 93.45. On sumum dæge þa ða he ana wæs. þa com him to se
costnere;
 93.46. Witodlice an blac þrostle. flicorode ymbe his neb. swa
gemahlice þæt he hi mid his handa gefon mihte gif he swa wolde. ac he hine
bletsode mid þære halgan rodetacne. and se fugol sona aweg gewat;
 93.49. Þa gestod hine swa micel lichamlic costnung. þæt he
uneaðe þære lichamlican ontendnysse wiðstandan mihte;
 93.51. Þa beðohte he hine sylfne. and unscrydde hine ealne. and
wylode hine sylfne on ðam þiccum bremlum. and þornum. and netelum. þe
þær on ðam westene þicce stodon. swa lange þæt he eall toclifrod
aras. and swa þurh þære hyde wunda adwæscte his modes wunda for ðan
þe he awende þone unlust to sarnysse. and þurh þa yttran ontendnysse
acwencte þa inran;
 93.57. Witodlice he oferswiðde þa synne. for ðan þe he
awende þa ontendnysse;
 93.58. Soðlice of ðære tide swa swa he sylf syððan
sæde: ælc gallic ontendnys wearð eallunga on him adwæsced. and he
næfre syððan naht ðyllices on him sylfum ne gefredde;
 94.61. Þa wæs þær gehende sum munuclif: and heora abbud
wæs þa niwan forðfaren;
 94.62. Þa comon hi ealle to ðam halgan benedicte. and mid
micelre anrædnysse. bædon þæt he heora abbud beon sceolde;
 94.64. He þa wiðcwæð mid langsumere elcunge. and sæde
þæt heora þeawas ne mihton his dihte geðwærlæcan ac ða ða hi
anrædlice on ðære bene þurhwunodon. þa æt nextan getiðode he
him. and on heora mynstre regollice drohtnunge astealde;
 94.68. Hi ða gesawon þæt heora wohnys on ðam regole. his
rihtwisnysse ætspearn. for ðan þe hi ne moston þurh unalyfedlice weorc
faran swa swa hi ær gewunode wæron;
 94.70. Þa begunnon hi to cidenne ærest him betwynan þæt
hi his ealdordomes bædon. and þa æt nextan ræddan þæt hi mid
attre hine acwealdon;
 94.73. Gemengdon þa unlybban to his drence. and se þen stod
feorran mid anum glæsenum fæte on ðam wæs wines drænc mid þam
cwelmbærum attre gemænged;
 94.75. Se ðen þa æfter mynsterlicum þeawe to his bletsunge
mid þam fæte aleat. and he mid rodetacne þæt fæt of his setle
bletsode and hit þærrihte þurh þa bletsunge tobærst. swilce he for
rodetacne sumne stan þær on bewurpe;
 94.79. Þa ongeat se halga wer þæt se drænc deadbæra
wæs. þa ða he ne mihte lifes tacn aberan. and þærrihte aras. and
mid glædum mode þa gebroðra gespræc;
 94.81. Gebroðru miltsige eow se ælmihtiga god. hwi wolde ge me
þas þing gebeodan? Ne sæde ic eow on ær þæt me and eow ne mihte
gewurðan? Farað nu and secað eow ealdor. æfter eowerum þeawum. for
ðan þe ge ne magon me heononforð habban. and he þa gecyrde to ðam
westene. and his sylfes gymde;
 94.87. Hwæt þa him fleowon to forwel mænige. and hi
gegaderodon to þeowdome þæs ælmihtigan godes be his lareowdome
drohtnigende. swa þæt he getimbrode on ðære stowe þurh cristes
fultum twelf mynstru. on ðam ænlipium he gesette twelf munecas. and ane
feawa he geheold mid him sylfum;
 94.92. Ongunnon þa ða æðelborenan on romebyrig him to
befæstene heora cild to godes lareowdome. of ðam wæs sume gehaten
placidus. and sum oðer maurus;
 94.94. Þa sceolde se placidus. feccan wæter æt þære
ea. and befeol ofer þam stæðe into þam streame;
 94.96. Þa wiste se halga wer benedictus þurh godes gast
þæt þæt cild on micelre frecednysse wæs. and cwæð to maure;
 95.97. Broðor maure yrn ricene for ðan þe se stream berð
aweg placidum;
 95.99. Maurus þærrihte abæd his bletsunge. and arn uppon
þam streame unmyndlunge. swylce he on fæstre eorðan urne. and gelæhte
þæt cild be ðam loccum. and mid swyftum ryne to lande arn. and undergeat
þa æt nextan þæt he uppon ðam wætere arn. and þæs micclum
wundrode;
 95.103. Þa cydde he his lareowe hu him getimode: and benedictus
sæde þæt him swa getimode þurh godes mihte for his gehyrsumnysse: and
maurus sæde þæt hit for his hæse swa gewurde: and þæt cild
placidus cwæð þæt he gesawe bufon his heafde benedictes cæppan.
and him wæs geðuht þæt seo cæppe hine atuge of ðam streame;
 95.109. Sum munuc wæs unstæððig on godes lofsangum. and
ne mihte his tidsangas gestandan mid his gebroðrum. ac eode him ut
worigende;
 95.111. Þa geseah se halga wer Benedictus þæt se deofol on
anes blacan cildes hiwe teah ut ðone munuc. be ðam fnæde his gyrelan;
 95.113. Eft on oðrum dæge gemette Benedictus ðone munuc fram
his tidsange. and gesloh hine mid his gyrde for ðære blindnysse his
heortan. and se feond ne mihte hine syððan of ðære cyrcan lædan.
swylce he sylf mid þære gyrde geslegen wære;
 95.118. Of ðam twelf mynstrum þe he gestaðolode. wæron
ðreo asette on healicum muntum. and wæs ðam gebroðum micel frecednys
to astigenne dæghwomlice of þam cludum to wæterscipe;
 95.121. And comon ða to ðam halgan were. biddende þæt he
ða mynstra gehendor ðam wæterscipe timbrian sceolde;
 95.122. He ða geswæslice hi gefrefrode. and on ðære ylcan
nihte astah mid ðam cilde placide þe we ær ymbe spræcon up to ðam
munte. and ðær langlice on his gebedum læg. and mearcode ða stowe.
and eode digellice to mynstre. and het ða gebroðru siððan þær
adelfan ænne gehwædne pytt. ðær ðær he ær gemearcode.
cwæð þæt se ælmihtiga god mihte on ðæs muntes cnolle him
wæter forð ateon. and heora geswinc him ætbredan;
 95.129. Ða gebroðra ða eodon be his hæse to ðam
mercelse. and gemetton ðone clud ða iu swætende. and hi ða
hwæthwega holodon. and ðærrihte þæt wæter swa genihtsumlice ut
fleow. þæt hit arn streamrynes of ðam munte. and næfre siððan ne
geswac his genihtsumnysse;
 96.135. Hwilon eac befeoll an siðe of ðam snæde. into anum
deopan seaðe;
 96.136. Þa eode benedictus to and wolde gefrefrian ðone wyrhtan
ðe þæt tol amyrde. and heold ða þone snæd bufon ðam wætere
ðær þæt isen asanc. and ðærrihte hit becom swymmende to ðam
snæde. and to ðam ðyrle þe hit ær of asceat;
 96.140. Þa wæs sum mæssepreost þær on neawiste mid
niðe afylled ongean ðone halgan wer. his nama wæs florentius. se wolde
habban swilcne hlisan swa Benedictus. ac he nolde herigendlice lybban;
 96.143. Wolde ða hine mid attre acwellan. and asende him ænne
focan to lace mid attre gemencged;
 96.144. Ða wæs sum wilde hrem gewunod þæt he
dæghwomlice fleah fram wuda to mynstre. and gefette his bigleofan æt
benedictes handum;
 96.146. He ða wearp ðam hremme þone geættrodan hlaf. and
bebead him on godes naman þæt he ðone cwelmbæran hlaf awegbære.
and on swilcere stowe awurpe. ðær hine nan man findan ne mihte;
 96.149. Se fugol wearð gehyrsum his hæsum. and mid þam hlafe
to wuda tengde. and syððan ymbe ðreora tida fæce. fette his bigleofan.
swa his gewuna wæs;
 96.153. Þa undergeat se preost þæt he ne mihte ðone halgan
wer lichamlice acwellan. and wolde ða his leorningcnihta sawla fordon. and
gemacode þæt seofon nacode wimmen urnon plegende on heora gesihðum.
þæt heora mod wurde ontend to galnysse. þurh ðæra scylcena plegan;
 96.157. Þa geseah se halga wer þæs arleasan preostes
niðfullan ehtnysse. and wende ða aweg mid his gebroðrum fram ðære
stowe. þy læs ðe ænig his leorningcnihta þurh his andan losian
sceolde;
 96.160. Hwæt ða se preost stod on his upflora micclum
fægnigende ðæs oðres framfæres. ac seo upflering tobærst
þærrihte under his fotum. and hine egeslice acwealde. and þæt hus eal
ansund aðolode. buton ðære anre fleringe ðe ðone godes feond
ofðrihte;
 97.164. Ða geaxode maurus hu ðam preoste getimode. and he mid
blissigendum mode cwæð to his lareowe. Gecyrr ongean. for ðan ðe se
preost þe ðin ehte is adwæsced;
 97.167. Benedictus ða mid swærlicum heofungum. bemænde
þæt his leorningcild maurus ðæs oðres deaðes fægnian sceolde.
and tæhte him þæs dædbote. bebeodende þæt he on his feondes
forwyrde fægnian ne sceolde;
 97.171. Benedictus þa ferde to ðam munte þe is gecweden
Casinum. se astihð up ðreo mila on heannysse;
 97.172. Ðær wæs gewurðod fram ealdum dagum sum
hæðengild. þæt wæs gehaten apollo;
 97.173. Þa towende se halga wer þæt deofolgild grundlunge.
and arærde ðær cyrcan sancte martine to wurðmynte. and oðer
gebedhus ðam halgan fulluhtere Iohanne to lofe. and þæt hæðene
landfolc to cristes geleafan mid singalre bodunge gebigde;
 97.177. Þa ne mihte se ealda deofol þas dæda mid swigan
forberan. ac mid openlicere gesihðe hine æteowode ðam halgan were on
atelicum hiwe. mid byrnendum muðe. and ligenum eagum wedende him togeanes.
and mid micclum hreame his sið bemænde. swa þæt ða gebroðru ða
deofellican stemne swutellice gehyrdon;
 97.182. Æt fruman he hine clypode be his naman. Benedicte.
þæt is gebletsod. ða suwade se halga wer. and se deofol þærrihte
eft clypode. <foreign> maledicte. Non benedicte.</foreign> þu awyrigeda. and na gebletsod.
Hwæt witst ðu me. Hwi ehtst ðu min? Þær læg ða sum ormæta
stan on middan þam getimbrungum. ðone woldon ða wyrhtan to ðam weorce
ahebban. ac hi ealle ne mihton hine awecgan. for ðan ðe se ungesewenlica
deofol þær on uppan sæt;
 97.190. Ða wyrhtan ða clypedon ðone halgan wer. and he com
sona. and mid gebede þone deofol afligde. and his bletsunge sealde. and hi
ðone stan swa leohtlice ahofon. swilce he buton hefe wære;
 97.193. Se halga wer ða het delfan ða eorðan þær se stan
læg. and hi gemetton þær ane ærene anlicnysse. þe se deofol
þær gefriðode;
 97.195. Þa wurpon hi ða anlicnysse innto heora kycenan. and
færlice ða wearð him eallum geðuht. swilce fyr eode of ðære
anlicnysse. swa þæt seo kycene eal forburne. ac hit næs swa him
geðuht wæs. ac wæs þæs deofles dydrung;
 98.199. Hi urnon to ablicgede. and woldon þæt fyr mid
wætere ofgeotan;
 98.200. Se halga wer com ða. and geseah hu se awyrigeda gast hi
bedydrode. and cneowode þærrihte on his gebedum. and gedyde þæt ða
gebroðra þe wæron mid ðam gedwymorlicum fyre gebysgode. gesawon ða
soðlice þæt seo kycene gehal stod. ætforan heora gesihðum;
 98.205. Eft sume dæge stod se eadiga benedictus on his gebedum.
and þa gebroðra eodon to ðam weallweorce;
 98.206. Þa æteowode se deofol hine þam halgan were. and
cwæð mid olle þæt he wolde æt ðam weorce gecuman;
 98.208. Ða sende benedictus swiðe hrædlice and warnode ða
gebroðra wið þæs deofles tocyme. ac ær se ærendraca mihte to
ðam gebroðrum becuman. ær hæfde se deofol towend þone weall and
wearð mid þam hryre sum munuc cild eall tocwysed;
 98.212. Þa het benedictus beran þa tocwysedan lima on anum
hwitle into his gebedhuse. and beclysedre dura anrædlice on his gebedum
læg. oð þæt tocwysede cild þurh godes mihte geedcucode;
 98.215. Wunderlic ðing. on ðære ylcan tide se halga wer
asende ðone cnapan ansundne eallum limum to ðam weallweorce. mid ðæs
deaðe se deofol wolde þone halgan wer gebysmrian;
 98.219. Hwæt ða se halga wer benedictus wæs ðeonde on
witegunge. swa þæt he ðurh godes gast mihte towearde ðing cyðan. and
ða ðing geseah ðurh witegunge. ðe him bæftan gefremede wurdon;
 98.222. Hit wæs swa gewunelic on his munuclife. þæt ða
gebroðra ðe on sumum ærende ut gewendon. þæt hi ne moston buton his
leafe metes ðicgan. gif hi igdæges to mynstre gecyrran mihton;
 98.225. Þa on sumum dæge ferdon twegen gebroðra ymbe
þæs mynstres neode. and tobræcon ðone regol swa þæt hi butan
leafe mid sumum eawfæstum wife hi gereordodon. and swa to mynstre gecyrdon;
 98.228. Þa befran se halga wer on hwæs gesthuse hi metes
onbirigdon. hi cwædon þæt hi nanes ætes on ðære fare ne
onbirigdon;
 98.230. Ða genemnode se halga wer þæt eawfæste wif ðe
hi gelaðode. and ða sanda tealde ðe heo him gebær. and eac hu oft hi
druncon him soðlice sæde;
 99.232. Hi ða feollon to his fotum afyrhte. gecnæwe heora
gyltes. and him miltsunge bædon;
 99.234. On ðam timan rixode sum reðe cyning se wæs Totilla
gehaten. se ferde sume dæge wið þæs halgan weres mynster. and sende
his forridel het cyðan his tocyme ðam halgan were;
 99.237. Þa wolde se wælhreowa fandian hwæðer benedictus
