his cynelicum gyrelum. mid his ðegnum to ðam mynstre. swilce he hit sylf
wære;
 99.240. Þa gesæt benedictus forn ongean ðam riggon þe mid
ðam leaslicum getote inneode. ðearle ðrutigende;
 99.242. Ða clypode se eadiga godes ðeow him togeanes. and
cwæð;
 99.243. Min bearn. do ða gyrlan ðe fram þe ðu berst. ne
sind hi na ðine;
 99.244. Þa astrehte se riggo hine to eorðan mid eallum his
geferum. swiðe forhtigende þæt hi his fandian dorston. and gecyrdon to
heora hlaforde forhtmode cyðende hu hrædlice hi arasode wurdon;
 99.247. Totilla ða sylf to mynstre eode. and swa hraðe swa he
ðone halgan feorran sittende geseah. swa astrehte he hine sylfne to eorðan
wið his weard;
 99.250. Benedictus hine het arisan. ac he ne dorste ætforan
ðam halgan were on his fotum gestandan;
 99.251. Þa eode se halga to ðam astrehtan cyninge. and hine
uparærde. and hine for his weorcum mid wordum ðreade. and mid witegunge
gewislice sæde. hu him on his life gelimpan sceolde;
 99.254. He cwæð fela yfela ðu wyrcst. and fela ðu
worhtest. geswic nu eallunge ðinre unrihtwisnysse;
 99.256. Witodlice ðu becymst to romebyrig. ofer sæ ðu
seglast. Nigon gear ðu rixast. on ðam teoðan þu swyltst;
 99.257. Þa wearð se cyning ðearle afyrht. þurh ðas
witegunge. and bæd ða his bletsunge. and of ðære tide be dæle his
reðnysse geswac;
 99.259. Him aeode swa se halga him gewitegode. þæt he on ðam
teoðan geare his cynerices. and his lifes ðolode;
 99.262. On ðære ylcan tide awedde sum preost aquinenscisre
gelaðunge. and he wearð on ðære wodnysse gelæd to þam eadigan
benedicte;
 100.264. He ða þurh halgum benum þone deofol adræfde of
ðam ofsettan preoste. and hine ðisum wordum gespræc;
 100.266. Far nu. and of ðisum dæge ne genealæc ðu godes
ðenungum. ne ðu flæscmettas ne ðicge. and gif ðu æfre
gedyrstlæhst þæt ðu godes ðenungum genealæce. ðonne bist ðu
eft þæs deofles anwealdum betæht;
 100.269. Se preost ða þis bebod to langum fyrste heold. and swa
ðeah æt nextan ðæs halgan weres hæse forseah. and mid dyrstignysse
haligne had underfeng;
 100.272. Hwæt ða se deofol ðe hine ær unðances forlet.
hine sona gelæhte. and oð deað gedrehte;
 100.274. Sum eawfæst man sende ðam halgan were twegen butrucas
mid wine to lace. be anum cnapan. ða behydde se cnapa þone oðerne be
wege. and ænne ðam halgan were gebrohte;
 100.276. He underfeng ða lac mid ðancunge. and cwæð to
ðam cnapan;
 100.278. Min bearn. beo ðe wærr þæt ðu ne drince of
ðam wine þe ðu be wege hyddest. ac ahyld hit wærlice. þonne gesihst
ðu hwæt ðær oninnan sticað;
 100.280. He gecyrde ða mid sceame. and ahylde þæt win
wærlice. and ðær gewende ut of ðam fæte an fah næddre;
 100.283. Fela ðing sæde se halga wer ðurh haligre witegunge.
ðe us sind langsume to gereccenne. and eow to gehyrenne on ðyssere
scortnysse;
 100.286. Sum æðelboren cild heold leoht ætforan his mysan.
and ongann modigian þæt hit on swa waclicum ðingum him wicnian sceolde;
 100.288. Se halga ða sona undergeat his modignysse ðurh godes
gast. and hine ðearle ðreagende cwæð;
 100.289. Broðor. bletsa ðine heortan. and het animan þæt
leoht him of. and hine sittan. and he sæde his gebroðrum ðæs cildes
modignysse geendebyrdlice;
 100.292. On sumere tide com micel hungor on ðam lande. and
gehwær þæt landfolc micclum geangsumode;
 100.293. Þa getimode swa micel hafenleast on benedictes mynstre.
þæt ða gebroðra næfdon buton fif hlafas to heora ealra gereorde;
 100.295. Se halga wer ða benedictus mid geswæsum wordum his
gebroðra unrotnysse gefrefrode. and cwæð;
 100.297. Nu todæg we habbað hwonlice behlaf. ac tomerigen we
sceolon habban genihtsumlice;
 100.298. Hwæt ða þæs on merigen wurdon gemette ætforan
heora gedyrum twa hund mittan meluwes on fætelsum. ða se ælmihtiga god
his ðeowum asende. ac swa ðeah næs nanum men cuð hu hi ðider comon;
 101.302. Sum eawfæst ðegen bæd ðone halgan wer þæt
he mid his munecum on his lande him munuclif aræran sceolde. and he
lustbære ðæs getiðode. and cwæð to ðam gebroðrum þæt he
wolde sylf on ðam dæge ðe he gecwæð ðær gecuman. and þæs
mynstres getimbrunge gedihtan;
 101.306. Ða munecas ða ferdon be his hæse and bletsunge to
ðæs ðegenes lande. and georne ðæs andagan cepton;
 101.308. Þa æteowode se halga wer benedictus on swefne hine

his profoste samod. and hi gewissode swiðe smeaðancellice ymbe ðæs
mynstres gebytlungum. on þære nihte þe se andaga on merigen wæs;
 101.312. Þa ða hi awocon se ealdor and his profost. ða rehte
heora ægðer oðrum hwæt hi on swefene gesawon. and þæs micclum
wundrodon;
 101.314. Eft siððan þa se andaga agan wæs. and se halga
wer ne com swa swa he gecweden hæfde. ða comon hi eft wið his. þus
cweðende;
 101.317. We andbidodon ðin halga fæder þæt ðu us
þæs mynstres gebytlu dihtan sceoldest. and þu ne come swa swa ðu us
behete;
 101.319. Ða andwyrde se halga. and cwæð;
 101.319. Mine gebroðra. hwi secge ge þæt ic ne come? Hwæt
la. ne æteowode ic inc bam slapendum. and ealle ða gebytlunge gewisslice
tæhte? Farað nu. and arærað þæt mynster swa swa ic eow on swefne
dihte;
 101.323. Hi ða mid micelre wundrunge to ðam lande gewendon. and
swa ða gebytlunge gefadedon. swa swa him on swefene æteowod wæs;
 101.326. Nu segð se halga Gregorius se ðe þisne cwyde on
leden awrat. þæt god ælmihtig getiðode his leofan benedicte þæt
he ðurh gast ferde to ðam slapendum gebroðrum. and him to ðam gastlican
life gewissode. se ðe giu ær ðurh his engel ðone witegan Abbacuc
lichamlice fram Iudea lande to chaldea rice swyftilice ferode. þæt he
lichamlicne bigleofan þam hungrian Danihele brohte. se ðe betwux leonum
unscyldig ascofen wæs;
 102.334. Twa mynecena wæron drohtnigende on gehendnysse his
mynstres of æðelborenre mægðe asprungene. þam gewicnode sum
eawfæst wer on woruldcarum;
 102.336. Þa wæron hi æfter æþelborennysse oferhydige

 102.338. Ða cydde se eawfæsta wer þam eadigan benedicte. hu

 102.340. Se halga wer asende ða to. and him ðisum wordum

 102.341. Gerihtlæcað eowere tungan. gif ge ne doð. ic eow

 102.342. Hi swa ðeah ðurhwunedon on heora teonfullum wordum.
and wurdon ða færlice forðferede. and binnon ðære cyrcan

 102.344. Þa wæs hit gewunelic on ðam dagum. þæt se

huselganges unwurðe sy. gange ut of ðære cyrcan;
 102.347. Ða wæron þa amansumedan mynecena binnon ðære

on manna gesihðum. and uteodon be ðæs diacones hæse. for ðan ðe
hi wæron fram ðam halgum husle ascyrede;
 102.351. Þa gelamp him swa æt ælcere mæssan. þæt hi
ne mihton wunian binnon ðære cyrcan æt ðam huselgange. æfter
þæs diacones clypunge;
 102.353. Ða wearð þis gecyd þam halgan benedicte. mid
micelre dreorignysse;
 102.354. Benedictus þa sona asende ane ofeletan. and het mid
þære mæssian. for ðam mynecenum. cwæð þæt hi siððan
unamansumode wæron;
 102.356. His hæs wearð gefylled. and þa mynecena næfre
siððan ne wurdon gesewene utgangende æt ðæs diacones clypunge. for
ðan ðe hi underfengon þa halgan mænsumunge æt gode þurh his
ðeowan benedicte. þe hi ær for heora stuntum wordum ðiwde to
amansumigenne;
 102.362. Sum munuc cild drohtnode on his mynstre. and hæfde
micele lufe to his fæder and to his meder. swiðor for ðære sibbe
þonne for godes dæle. wearð þa oflangod ungemetlice. and arn buton
bletsunge of mynstre to his magum. and swa hraðe swa he him to com ydæges
swa gewat he of ðisum andwerdum life;
 102.367. Þa he bebyriged wæs. ða ne mihte seo byrgen hine
gehealdan. ac wearð his lic on merigen afunden bufon þære byrgenne;
 103.369. His magas hine eft bibirigdon. and he wearð eft up
aworpen. and swa gelomlice;
 103.370. Þa magas ða comon and mid micclum wope þæs halgan
weres fet gesohton. his gife biddende;
 103.371. Se halga benedictus him sealde godes husel mid his agenre
handa. and cwæð;
 103.373. Lecgað þis halige husel uppon his breoste. and
bebyriað hine swa;
 103.374. Ða þis gedon wæs. ða heold seo eorðe þone
lichaman. and syððan ne awearp;
 103.376. Sum oðer munuc wearð unstaðolfæst on his mynstre.

halga wer him forwyrnde. and swiðe mid wordum ðreade his

 103.379. Æt nextan ða ða he swa fus wæs. ða wearð se

 103.381. Hwæt ða se munuc ut gewat. and gemette sona ænne
dracan him togeanes standende. mid gynigendum muðe. þæt he hine
forswulge;
 103.383. Se munuc ða swiðe bifigende. and forhtigende hrymde;
 103.384. Yrnað. yrnað. for ðan ðe þes draca me forswelgan
wile;
 103.385. Þa mynstermunecas urnon to. and swa ðeah nateshwon

hi læddon ðone munuc swa bifigendne binnon ðam mynstre;
 103.388. He ða sona behet. þæt he næfre siððan of
ðam mynstre sceacan nolde. and he eac on ðam behate symle ðurhwunode;
 103.390. Þurh benedictes gebedum him wæs se ungesewenlica
draca æteowod. ðam ðe he ær filigde. na geseonde;
 103.393. Benedictus eac gehælde ænne cnapan mid his gebedum
on micelre hrædnysse. fram ðam mæstan broce þe is gecweden
<foreign>elefantinus morbus</foreign>;
 103.396. Sum hafenleas mann sceolde agyldan healf pund anum menn.
and wæs oft gemanod. and ðearle geswenct for ðære læne;
 103.398. Ða bæd he ðone halgan wer þæs feos. and

þæt he næfde þæt feoh him to alænenne. ac het hine cuman binnon
ðrim dagum eft to him;
 103.401. He ða soðlice swa his gewuna wæs gebysgode hine
sylfne on his gebedum. on eallum ðam fyrste;
 103.403. Se hafenleasa com on ðam ðriddan dæge. and efne

hwyccan;
 103.405. Se eadiga benedictus ða het him syllan þæt healfe
pund. þæt he his læne forgulde. and forgeaf him ða twentig penega to
his agenum bricum;
 104.408. Sumum men wæs unlybba geseald. ac hit ne mihte hine
adydan. ac awende his hiw to wunderlicere fagnysse. swa þæt he wearð on
his lice reoflium menn gelic;
 104.410. Þa becom he to ðam halgan benedicte. and swa hraðe
swa he hine gehrepode. swa underfeng he his hælðe. and eal seo fagnys aweg
gewat;
 104.413. An subdiacon bæd þone halgan wer sumne dæl eles to
his bricum. for ðan ðe hi ðicgað on ðam earde ele on heora bigleofum.
swa swa we doð buteran;
 104.415. Þa hæfde se halga wer gedæled þæs mynstres
ðing hafenleasum mannum. for ðam hungergeare to ðan swiðe. þæt him
næs nan ele belæfed to his gebroðra bricum. buton on anum lytlan
glæsenan fæte;
 104.418. Ða het he his hordere þæt glæsene fæt syllan
ðam biddendan subdiacone;
 104.420. Se hordere cwæð him to andsware. gif he ðone
gehwædan dæl þæs eles ðam biddendum sealde. þæt he nan ðing
næfde his gebroðrum to syllenne;
 104.422. Se halga wer ða wearð astyred on mode. and het
oðerne munuc awurpan ut þæt glæsene fæt mid ele mid ealle. ðy
læs ðe hit þurh ungehyrsumnysse þærinne belife;
 104.425. Þa wearp se broðor þæt glæsene fæt ut æt
ðam ehðyrle uppon ðam heardan stane. ac hit ne mihte toberstan. ne ðone
ele ageotan;
 104.427. Ða het benedictus eft ahebban þæt elefæt. and
syllan ðam subdiacone. ðe his ær bæd. and ðearle ðone
ungehyrsuman hordere ðreade. and cneowode siððan on his gebedum mid his
mynstermunecum;
 104.430. Þa stod ðær an æmtig cyf oferwrogen. and ongann
to flowenne mid ele. swa þæt hi brudon of ðone clað. and se ele fleow
ofer innto ðære flore;
 104.432. Benedictus ða aras of his gebedum. and se ele geswac
ðære fledinge;
 104.434. Sume dæge eode se halga wer to cyrcan. and gemette
þone deofol. and befran hwider he wolde;
 104.435. Se deofol cwæð þæt he wolde beran drincan his
gebroðrum;
 104.436. Se halga wer ða hine ardlice gebæd. and gecyrde
ongean. and efne ða se awyrigeda gast gemette ænne ealdne munuc wæter
hladende. and gewearp ðone munuc to eorðan. and hine mid wodnysse þearle
drehte;
 105.440. Se eadiga benedictus þa sloh ðone munuc under þæt
wencge. mid anre handa. and se fula deofol þærrihte him fram gewat. and
næfre siððan him genealæcan ne dorste;
 105.443. Sum gedwolman ðe salla hatte. ehte cristenra manna on
ðam timan mid ormætre reðnysse. swa þæt gif ænig preosthades
mann oððe munuchades him genealæhte. ne mihte his handum cucu
ætwindan;
 105.446. He ða æt sumon sæle gelæhte ænne cristenne
mannan. and hine mid mislicum tintregum cwylmde. and ðurh gytsunge
ontendnysse mid þam tintregum wolde his æhta æt him ofgan;
 105.449. Se cristena man ða cwæð. þæt he hæfde his
ðing and hine sylfne betæht þam halgan were benedicte;
 105.450. Se wælhreowa ehtere thesalla þa geswac ðæra
tintregena. and geband hine mid strangum bendum. and draf hine ætforan him
ridendum. þæt he him geswutelode hwæt se benedictus wære ðe his
ðing underfangen hæfde;
 105.454. Hi ða becomon to ðæs mynstres geate þæs halgan
weres. and hine gemetton æt his rædinge sitton;
 105.456. Þa cwæð se wælhreowa þesalla mid micelre
reðnysse to ðam halgan were;
 105.457. Aris. aris. and agif ðises ceorles yddysce;
 105.458. Ða beseah se halga wer wið his clypunge. and beheold
ðone gebundenan mann. and his bendas sona wurdon alysede. mid
unasecgendlicere hrædnysse;
 105.460. Hwæt ða thesalla ðurh ðas micclan mihte wearð
afyrht. and his wælhreowan hneccan to ðæs halgan weres fotswaðum
gebigde. biddende his miltsunge. and ðingrædene;
 105.463. Benedictus swa ðeah nateshwon fram his rædinge ne
aras. ac het his gebroðru hine to cyrcan lædan. and bletsunge syllan;
 105.465. Se eadiga benedictus ða æfter ðære bletsunge
manode þone reðan ehtere. þæt he ðære wodlican reðnysse
geswice. and he ða þearle ablicged aweg tengde. and æt ðam cristenan
menn nan ðing habban ne dorste. ðone ðe se eadiga benedictus na
handlunge. ac on beseonde fram his bendum alysde;
 105.470. An geleafful yrðling bær his deadan suna lic to
benedictes mynstre.and mid dreorigum wope. hrymde to ðam halgan were. agif me
minne sunu. agif ne minne sunu;
 105.472. Se halga wer andwyrde. Hwæt la. ætbræd ic ðe
þinne sunu? Se yrðling andwyrde;
 106.474. La leof he is dead. gang to and arær hine;
 106.474. Se eadiga wer cwæð to his gebroðrum. Gað aweg.
nis ðis na ure dæd. ac is ðæra halgena apostola;
 106.476. Þa ðurhwunode se ceorl on his bene. swerigende
þæt he aweg ne cyrde. buton se halga his sunu arærde;
 106.478. Hwæt ða benedictus eode to ðæs cnapan lice. and
ðær on uppon gelæg. and aras. and his handbredu astrehte wið heofonas
weard. þus cweðende;
 106.480. Min drihten ne beheald þu mine synna. ac geleafan
ðises mannes. se ðe bitt aræran his sunu. and agif nu drihten ða
sawle. ðe ðu name into ðisum lichaman;
 106.483. Sona ða æfter ðisum gebede geedcucode se deada
cnapa. and se halga wer hine betæhte ansundne his fæder;
 106.486. Se halga wer hæfde ane eawfæste swustor SCOLASTICA
gehaten. seo wæs fram cildhade gode gehalgod on mægðhade him
ðeowigende. on gehendnysse his mynstres wunigende. þa geneosode se halga
wer symle æne ymbe geares ymbrene;
 106.490. Þa gecom he sume dæge to hyre cytan æfter gewunan
mid sumum his gebroðrum. and hi ealne ðone dæg on godes herungum. and
halgum spræcum adrugon;
 106.492. Efne ða on æfnunge ða ða hi æt gereorde
sæton. cwæð þæt halige mæden. to hire arwurðfullan breðer;
 106.494. Ic bidde ðe broðer min. ne forlæt ðu me on
þissere nihte. þæt wit magon smeagan ymbe gefean þæs heofenlican
lifes. oð merigen;
 106.496. Ða andwyrde se arwurða broðor;
 106.497. Hwæt cweðst þu sweoster? Ne mæg ic nateshwon
buton mynstre nihtes wunian;
 106.498. And wæs ða swa stille weder. þæt nan wolcn
næs on ðære lyfte gesewen;
 106.499. Hwæt ða seo mynecynu ða ða heo his andsæc
gehyrde. beclypte hire neb mid handum. and ahylde hire heafod to ðære
mysan biddende þone ælmihtigan drihten;
 106.502. Þa mid ðam ðe heo hire heafod of ðære mysan
ahefde. ða abærst swa micel ðunor. and liget. and swilc storm yðigende
feoll. swa þæt se halga wer and his gebroðra ne mihton for ðam
ormætan gyte heora fet of ðære cytan astyrian;
 106.505. Ða cwæð se halga wer to his sweoster. Arie ðe se
ælmihtiga god sweoster. Hwæt hæfst þu gedon? Heo andwyrde;
 106.507. Efne ic bæd þe. and þu me noldest tiðian. ða
bæd ic minne drihten. and he me gehyrde;
 107.509. Gang nu to mynstre gif ðu mage. and me ana forlæt;
 107.510. He ða ne mihte buton ðam hrofe acuman. ac ðær
wunode þa niht unwilles. se ðe sylfwilles nolde;
 107.511. And hi ealle ða niht mid halgum spræcum þæs
gastlican lifes ðurhwacole aspendon;
 107.512. Eft siððan ymbe ðry dagas stod se halga wer on his
gebedum. and beseah ut. and geseah ðære ylcan mynecene. his sweoster sawle
lædan to heofenan. on anre culfran hiwe;
 107.515. He ða hire wuldres blissigende ðam ælmihtigan gode
þancode. and hire forðsið his gebroðrum cyðde. and sende hi
ðærrihte þæt hi hire lic to mynstre feredon. and on his agenre
byrgene þær he sylf licgan wolde mid arwurðnysse bebyrigdon. þæt
heora lichaman on anre byrgene hi gereston. swa swa heora mod on annysse symle
gode ðeowode;
 107.522. Eft on oðrum timan stod se halga wer on his gebedum
uppon anre upflora. þær his bed inne wæs. þa gestod he æt anum
ehðyrle. oð forðnihtes. þone ælmihtigan god biddende;
 107.524. Þa færlice asprang micel leoht beortre ðonne
ænig dæg. swa þæt se halga wer oferseah ealne middaneard. and ofseah
betwux ðam micclum leoman lædan mid engla werode anes biscopes sawle to
heofenum. his nama wæs Germanus;
 107.528. Ða wolde se halga habban him gewitan. þære
wunderlican gesihðe. and ofclypode his diacon him hrædlice to. and he ða
geseah sumne dæl þæs leohtes;
 107.531. Þa sende se halga wer swyftne ærendracan to þæs
biscopes ceastre. þæt he sceolde geaxian hwæðer he lifes wære;
 107.533. Se ærendraca ða hine gemette deadne. and smealice
ymbe his forðsið befran. and geaxode ða þæt he on ðære tide
gewat. ðe se halga benedictus his sawle to heofenan ferian geseah;
 107.536. Wunderlic gesihð. þæt an deadlic man mihte ealne
middaneard oferseon;
 107.537. Þeah gif se man gesihð godes leoht. þonne bið
þæt gesceaft swiðe nearu geðuht. and ðæs mannes sawl bið on
gode mid þam leohte tospræd. swa þæt heo oferstihð middaneard. and
eac hi sylfe;
 107.540. Hwilc wundor wæs ðeah se halga wer ealne middaneard
ætforan him gesawe. ða ða he wæs ahafen on his modes leohte ofer
middanearde;
 107.542. Witodlice þæt leoht þe he wiðutan geseah wæs
on his mode scinende. and his mod to ðam upplican abræd. and him
æteowode hu nearowe ealle ða niðerlican gesceafta him wæron
geðuhte. þurh ormætnysse þæs godcundlican leohtes;
 108.547. Þes eadiga wer benedictus awrat muneca regol mid micclum
gesceade. mid beorhtre spræce. on ðam mæg gehwa tocnawan ealle dæda
his lareowdomes. for ðan ðe se halga swa leofode swa swa he tæhte;
 108.550. Se eadiga wæs bliðe on andwlitan. mid hwitum hærum
fægere gehiwod. and mid micelre lufe on mode afylled. swa þæt he on
heofonlicum eðle eardigende wæs. þeah ðe he on eorðan ða gyt
wunode;
 108.554. Þæs geares ðe he gewat. he cyðde his forðsið
on ær. sumum his leorningcnihtum mid him drohtnigendum. and sumum oðrum on
fyrlenum stowum wunigendum;
 108.556. Seofon nihtum ær he gewite he het his byrgene
geopenian. and he ðærrihte mid stiðlicum fefore geond ða seofon niht
þearle gedreht wearð;
 108.559. On ðam sixtan dæge his legeres he het hine beran into
cyrcan. and þær hine gehuslian;
 108.560. He ða astod betwux his gebroðra handum. astrehtum
handum wið heofonas weard. and betwux his gebedum his gast ut ableow;
 108.562. On ðam ylcan dæge wearð æteowod his twam
leorningcnihtum an weg. fram ðam huse þe he on gewat on ðam eastdæle.
astreht oð heofonan;
 108.564. Se weg wæs mid pællum gebricgod. and mid ungerimum
leohtfatum scinende;
 108.566. Ðær on uppon stod sum arwurðe wer mid beorhtum
gyrlum. axigende hwæs se weg wære. þe hi beheoldon;
 108.567. Hi cwædon þæt hi nyston;
 108.568. Þa cwæð se engel him to;
 108.568. Ðis is se weg ðe godes dyrling Benedictus to heofenum
on astah;
 108.570. His halga lichama wearð ða bebyriged to his sweoster
lice Scolastican. swa swa he sylf bebead binnon Iohannes cyrcan þæs halgan
fulluhteres. on ðam munte Casino. ac he wæs siððan æfter manegum
gearum geferod to francena rice. to þam mynstre ðe we hatað Florege. on
ðære stowe his ban restað on micclum wurðmynte. and on wundrum
scinende. and his sawl symle gesælig rixað mid gode on heofenum. for godum
geearnungum;
 109.577. Þæt scræf ðe he ærest on drohtnigende wæs.
gyt oð ðis on wundrum scinende ðurhwunað;
 109.578. Witodlice sum gemyndleas wif ferde worigende geond wudas.
and feldas. and ðær gelæg þær hi seo teorung gelette;
 109.580. Ða beeode heo sume dæge þurh nytennysse into ðam
scræfe þæs eadigan benedictes. and þær hi gereste. and aras
ðæs on merigen swa gewittig. swilce heo næfre on nanre wodnysse
nære. and swa siððan symle ðurhwunode;
 109.585. Hwa mæg on worulde ealle ða wundra gereccan. ðe se
ælmihtiga scyppend ðurh ðisne æðelan wer middanearde geswutelode;
 109.587. Sy him wuldor and lof. A. on ecnysse mid eallum his
halgum. se ðe ana is unasecgendlic God. Amen:

 110.1. <foreign> DOMINICA. IN MEDIA QUADRAGESIME </foreign> MEN ÐA LEOFOSTAN we
rædað nu æt godes ðenungum ymbe gesetnysse þære ealdan .æ. Nu
wylle we eow sume geswutelunge be ðære gecyðnysse sceortlice secgan.
þæt ge eallunge þæs andgites orhlyte ne syn. for ðan ðe ure
mæð nys. þæt we eow be fullum andgite hi geopenian magon. ne ge eac
nateshwon hire deopan digelnysse fulfremedlice understandan ne magon;
 110.7. Þry timan sind on þyssere worulde. <foreign> Ante legem. Sub
lege. Sub gratia; </foreign> Þæt is ær .æ. under .æ. under godes gife;
 110.8. Se tima is ær æ gecweden þe wæs fram Adam buton
.æ. oð Moysen. ða gesette God .æ. ðurh moysen. and se tima wæs
gecweden under .æ. oð cristes tocyme on menniscnysse;
 110.11. Ða awende crist ða ealdan .æ. to gastlicere
getacnunge;
 110.12. Nu is se tima fram cristes ðrowunge gehaten under godes
gife. for ðan ðe his gifu gewissað ða gecorenan symle to
soðfæstnysse and to lifes bebodum þæt hi ða ðing gastlice
gehealdon ðe seo ealde æ. lichamlice bebead;
 110.17. Abraham hatte se heahfæder. ðe ærest æfter ðam
micclum flode to gode cyððe hæfde;
 110.18. He wæs godes gespreca. and his bebodum þearle
gehyrsumode. þa forgeaf se ælmihtiga god him and his ofspringe þone eard
to bogienne þe is gehaten Iudea land. on ðam is seo burh hierusalem ðe
crist on ðrowode. ðeah ðe heo nu on oðre wisan getymbrod sy;
 110.22. Þa cwæð se ælmihtiga god to abrahame. wite ðu
þæt ðin cynn sceal ælðeodig wunian. on oðrum earde feower hund
geara. and hi hi on ðeowte gebrincað and micclum swencað;
 110.25. Soðlice ic deme ðam folce. and ðin mægð
siððan mid micclum æhtum of ðam lande færð. and on ðam
feorðan cneowe hi gecyrrað hider ongean;
 111.28. Abraham siððan gestrynde sunu Isaac. and se isaac
gestrynde twegen. Iacob. and Esau;
 111.29. Se iacob wæs gode gecoren. and gestrynde twelf suna.
ða sind gehatene twelf heahfæderas;
 111.30. Þa becom se mæsta hunger ofer eallum middanearde
seofon gear tosomne. buton on egypta lande. on ðam anum wæs corn swa hit
gecweden is. swa fela swa bið sandceosol on sæ;
 111.34. Ða ferde se iacob mid his twelf sunum. and his suna sunum
ealles hundseofontig manna to egypta lande þær ðær hi bigleofan
fundon. and þær eardodon feower hund geara. swa swa se ælmihtiga god
abrahame sæde;
 111.37. Þa æt nextan aras Pharao se egyptisca cyning. and
þæt israhela folc eall on ðeowte gebrohte. het hi wyrcan his
burhweallas. and hi bysmorlice geswencte. and het acwellan ælc hyse cild of
ðam cynne;
 111.41. Betwux ðisum asprang moyses. and his broðer aaron. of
ðære ylcan mægðe;
 111.42. To ðam moyse spræc se ælmihtiga god. þisum
wordum;
 111.43. Ic geseah mines folces geswinc on egypta lande. and heora
hream ic gehyrde. and ic niðer astah. þæt ic hi ahredde of egyptiscra
manna handum. and ic hi gelæde of ðam earde to godan lande and bradum.
þæt ðe fleowð mid meolce and mid hunige;
 111.47. God cwæð þa to moysen. far to ðam cyninge pharao.
and beod him þæt he min folc forlæte of his leode faran;
 111.49. Moyses ða and his broðor aaron ferdon to pharao. mid
ærende þæs ælmihtigan godes. and cwædon;
 111.50. Þus cwyð drihten israhela god. forlæt min folc
þæt hit me lac offrige on westene. swa ic him gewissige;
 111.52. Pharao him andwyrde;
 111.52. Hwæt is se drihten þæt ic his stemne gehyran
sceole. and Israhel forlætan? Nat ic ðone drihten. and ic israhel ne
forlæte;
 111.55. Ða sende se ælmihtiga tyn cynna wita ofer ðam
ðwyran cyninge. and ofer his leode. ær ðan ðe he þæt folc
forlætan wolde;
 111.57. Moyses ðurh godes mihte awende eal heora wæter to
readum blode. and he afylde eal heora land mid froggon. and siððan mid
gnættum. eft mid hundes lusum ða flugon into heora muðe and heora
næsðyrlum. and se ælmihtiga ðone modigan cyning mid þam eaðelicum
gesceaftum swa geswencte. se ðe mihte hine mid wildum berum and leonum
gewyldan. gif he swa wolde. and nan ðyssera geswencednyssa ne becom on ðam
ende þæs eardes ðe þæt godes folc on eardode;
 112.64. Þæt fifte wite wæs cwealm on heora orfe. swa
þæt on ðam lande fornean nan orf ne belaf. buton israheles þe ansund
gestod;
 112.66. Þæt sixte wite wæs þæt mislice geswel and
blædran asprungon on heora lichaman. on eallum his folce;
 112.68. Þæt seofoðe wite wæs þæt swa micel ðunor
and hagol becom on ðam leodscipe. þæt ælc ðing wæs adyd þe ute
wearð gemet. and ælc treow on ðam earde tobærst;
 112.70. Þæt eahteoðe wite wæs. þæt gærstapan
ofereodon eall þæt land. swilce swa næfre ær ðan næron. ne eft
næfre ne gewurðað. and hi forgnogon swa hwæt swa se hagol belæfde.
oððe on treowum. oððe on oðrum wæstmum;
 112.74. Þæt nigoðe wite wæs. þæt becomon ðicce
ðeostru. and egeslice ofer eallum egypta lande. swa þæt heora nan binnon
ðrim dagum oðerne ne geseah. ne hi of ðære stowe styrian ne mihton.
and on israhela ðeode wæron gewunelice dagas;
 112.78. Þæt teoðe wite wæs. þæt on ælcum huse
ealre ðære ðeode. on anre nihte læg an dead mann. and þæt wæs
se frumcenneda. and se leofosta þam hlaforde;
 112.81. Þa æt nextan forlet pharao Israhela folc of his earde
siðian. mid micclum æhtum. and god gesette ðone foresædan moysen his
folce to heretogan. and his broðer aaron to sacerde. and hi læddon
þæt folc to ðære readan sæ. mid micelre fyrdinge þæt wæron
six hund þusenda wigendra manna. buton wifum and cildum;
 112.86. Ða ofðuhte pharao þæt he þæt folc swa
freolice forlet. and tengde æfter mid eallum his here. and offerde hi æt
ðære readan sæ;
 112.88. Þa cwæð se ælmihtiga to moysen. astrece ðine
hand ofer ða sæ. and todæl hi;
 112.89. And moyses ða sloh þære sæ ofer mid his gyrde.
and seo sæ toeode on twa. and eal þæt israhela folc eode ofer ða
sæ. be drium grunde. and þæt wæter stod him on twa healfa swilce
oðer stanweall;
 112.92. Pharao ða him filigde æt ðam hon mid his gebeotlicum
crætum. and gilplicum riddum;
 112.93. Þa cwæð se ælmihtiga god to moysen. astrece
ðine hand ofer ða sæ. þæt þæt wæter gecyrre to ðam

 113.96. Moyses ða astrehte his hand ongean ðære sæ. and

 128.50. Þa iudeiscan wæron fram gode. and hi næron fram
gode;
 128.51. Hi wæron fram gode gesceapene. ac hi wæron
geleahtrode þurh deofol. and ðurh mandædum hi wæron deofles bearn.
swa swa crist on ðisum godspelle herbufan him to cwæð;
 129.54. Ge sind deofles bearn. and ge willað eoweres fæder
willan wyrcan;
 129.55. He wæs manslaga fram frymðe. and he ne wunode on
soðfæstnysse. for ðan ðe nan soðfæstnys nis on him;
 129.57. Ða iudeiscan noldon gehyran cristes soðfæstnysse.
for ðan ðe hi wæron afyllede mid heora fæder yfelnysse and leasunge;
 129.59. Ac swa swa heora fæder þurh andan ofsloh ða
frumsceapenan men. swa eac ða Iudeiscan smeadon niðfullice ymbe cristes
cwale. geeuenlæcende heora fæder. þæt is deofol ðe fram frymðe
wæs manslaga. na ðurh wæpnum. ac ðurh yfelre tihtinge;
 129.63. Wite gehwa se ðe oðerne to leahtrum forspenð.
þæt he is manslaga. þonne he ðæs oðres sawle forpærð. þurh
his yfelum tihtingum;
 129.66. Ælc gesceaft is god on gecynde. ac hit bið geleahtrod
þurh yfelnysse;
 129.67. Þa iudeiscan wæron gode on gecynde. and on gebyrde.
for ðan ðe hi wæron abrahames ofspring. ac hi wæron yfele and deofles
bearn ðurh euenlæcunge. na ðurh gecynde;
 129.70. Hit is gewunelic on halgum gewritum. þæt gehwam bið
fæder genamod be his geefenlæcunge;
 129.71. Gif he geeuenlæcð gode on godum weorcum. he bið
þonne godes bearn geciged;
 129.72. Gif he geeuenlæcð deofle on manlicum dædum. he
bið ðonne deofles bearn þurh his yfelan geeuenlæcunga. na
gecyndelice;
 129.74. Drihten cwæð on ðyssere ylcan rædinge. her
wiðufan to ðam iudeiscum;
 129.76. Soð soð ic eow secge. ælc ðæra ðe synne
wyrcð. he bið þonne ðære synne ðeow;
 129.77. Witodlice se synfulla ðeowað þam wyrstum ðeowte.
þeah ðe he bruce brades rices;
 129.78. He is earm ðeowtling. na anes hlafordes. ac swa manegum
leahtrum swa he gehyrsumað. swa manega deofla him beoð to hlafordum
gesette;
 129.81. Gehwa mæg hine sylfne tocnawan on ðam wordum þe
drihten cwæð. se ðe is fram gode. he gehyrð godes word;
 130.82. God ælmihtig bebytt mannum þæt hi sceolon heofonan
rices eðel symle gewilnian. and þyssere worulde ydelnysse forseon. oðres
mannes æhta ne gewilnian. his agen cystelice dælan. soðfæstnysse and
rihtwisnysse mid anrædum mode symle healdan;
 130.87. Smeage nu gehwa on his mode. gif ðas beboda and oðre
þillice habbað ænigne stede on his heortan. ðonne tocnæwð he
hwæðer he is fram gode;
 130.89. Witodlice se is fram gode þe godes beboda mid gehyrsumum
eare gehyrð. and gecneordlice hi mid weorcum gefylð;
 130.91. Se þe ne mæg lustlice godes word gehyran. ne nele hi
on weorcum awendan. he bið ðæra arleasra iudeiscra efenhlytta. be ðam
þe crist cwæð;
 130.93. For ði ge nellað gehyran. for ðan ðe ge ne sind
fram gode;
 130.95. Þa iudeiscan cwædon to criste. þæt he wære
Samaritanisc. and hæfde deofol on him;
 130.96. Samaria hatte an burh. ða burh forsawon þa Iudeiscan to
ðan swiðe. þæt swa hwilcne swa hi to hospe habban woldon. ðonne
cwædon hi be ðam þæt he wære samaritanisc;
 130.99. Twa bysmorlice word hi cwædon to criste. An is þæt
he wære samaritanisc. oðer þæt he deofol on him hæfde. þæt we
cweðað on englisc be wodum menn. þu eart wod;
 130.101. Þa wiðsoc crist swiðe rihtlice. þæt he deofol
on him næfde. ac he ne wiðsoc þæt he nære samaritanisc. for ðan
ðe samaritanisc is gecweden hyrde. and he is se soða hyrde. swa swa se
witega cwæð;
 130.105. Buton drihten ða burh gehealde. on ydel waciað ða
hyrdas þe hi healdað;
 130.106. Eft cwæð se ylca witega. Ne slæpð. ne ne
hnappað. se ðe hylt Israhel;
 131.107. An ðæra hospworda he forbær suwigende. þæt
þæt he be him sylfum oncneow. þæt oðer he soðlice wiðsoc.
þæt he deofol on him næfde. ac hi wæron witodlice mid deofle
afyllede. ða ða hi swa wodlice to ðam welwyllendan hælende
spræcon;
 131.111. He nolde secgan þæt soð wæs. þæt hi wode
wæron. þy læs ðe hit wære geðuht þæt he hi for his teonan
wode hete. na æfter soðum ðincge;
 131.113. Mid ðam geðylde he sealde cristenum mannum soðe
bysne. þæt hi sceolon forsuwian heora geferena unðeawas. ðonne hi fram
him getyrigde beoð. ðy læs ðe hi ðurh heora soðsegene
ungeðyldige beon. gif hi heora hosp mid soðe. sæmtinges wrecað;
 131.118. Drihten cwæð. Ic arwurðige minne fæder. and ge
unarwurðiað me;
 131.119. Swilce he cwæde. Nelle ic me sylfne arwurðian on
eowere gesihðe. þy læs ðe ic beo gylpende geðuht;
 131.120. Ic arwurðige minne fæder. and ge woldon me
arwurðian. gif ge me rihtlice oncneowon;
 131.122. Ne sece ic min wuldor. se is ðe secð. and toscæt;
 131.123. Drihten nis na oðrum mannum to wiðmetenne. ðeah ðe
he mann sy geworden. ac his heofenlica fæder hine wurðode. toforan eallum
his dælnymendum on ðære menniscnysse. þe he for manna alysednysse
underfeng;
 131.126. We menn beoð mid synnum acennede. ne we ne beoð be
agenum dihte acennede. ne we ne lybbað swa lange swa us lyst. ne we swa ne
sweltað swa we sylfe geceosað;
 131.129. Soðlice crist. ær ðan ðe he acenned wære
geceas him mæden to meder. and wæs buton ælcere synne acenned. and mid
wundrum geswutelode þæt he god is. and swa lange leofode on ðisum
deadlicum life. swa he sylf wolde. and be his agenum dihte deað geceas. and
gewat ða ða he wolde;
 131.134. On ðære byrgene he læg swa lange swa he wolde. he
aras of ðære byrgene ða ða he wolde swilce of anum bedde;
 131.137. Eal ðis belimpð to ðære menniscnysse. seo
godcundnys is unasmeagendlic. and unasecgendlic;
 131.138. Micel is betwux cristes wuldre æfter ðære
menniscnysse. and betwux oðra manna wuldre;
 132.140. Be his menniscum wuldre he cwæð. Ic ne sece min
wuldor. is swa ðeah se ðe secð. and toscæt;
 132.141. Se heofenlica fæder wuldrað his bearn. and toscæt
his wuldor fram oðra manna wuldre. ðearle unwiðmetenlice;
 132.143. Be ðam godcundum wuldre cwæð crist to ðam
iudeiscum;
 132.144. Soð soð ic eow secge. swa hwa swa min word hylt. Ne
gesihð he deað on ecnysse;
 132.145. Her sealde crist bysne eallum lareowum. þæt hi ne
sceolon for yfelra manna ðwyrnysse. heora bodunge alecgan. ac swiðor
geeacnian. swa swa se hælend dyde. ða ða he ðæra iudeiscra hospword
gehyrde;
 132.150. Þa iudeiscan cwædon. Nu we oncnawað. þæt ðu
eart wod;
 132.151. Abraham forðferde and witegan. and ðu segst swa hwa
swa min word hylt. ne onbyrigð he deaðes on ecnysse;
 132.152. Crist mænde ðone ecan deað. to þam ne becumað.
þa ðe his bebodu healdað. and ða iudeiscan mændon þisne andweardan
deað. ðam ne ætwint nan eorðlic mann;
 132.155. Hwæt is godra manna deað buton awendednys. and
færr fram deaðe to ðam ecan life? Se lichama awent to eorðan. and
anbidað æristes. and on ðam fyrste nan ðing ne gefret;
 132.158. Seo clæne sawul anbidað eac þæs ecan æristes.
ac heo wunað on wuldre. on ðære hwile mid halgum;
 132.159. Þæs manfullan mannes deað is. þæt his sawul
færð fram ðissere scortan blisse to ðam ecum witum. on ðam heo sceal
ecelice cwylmian. and swa ðeah næfre ne ateorað;
 132.162. Ðisum deaðe genealæhton ða iudeiscan. and ða
giu hi wæron deade. þa ða hi to criste hosplice word wedende
spræcon;
 132.164. Se bið dead ecum deaðe. se ðe is forestiht to ðam
ecum deaðe;
 132.165. He leofað on lichaman. and is swa ðeah soðlice
dead;
 132.166. Abraham forðferde and witegan gemænelicum deaðe. ac
hi lybbað on ecnysse mid gode;
 132.169. Hi befrunon crist. hwilcne wyrcst ðu ðe sylfne?
Drihten andwyrde;
 132.170. Gif ic me sylfne wuldrige. þonne bið min wuldor naht;
 132.171. Min fæder is ðe me wuldrað. be ðam ge secgað
þæt he eower god sy. and ge hine ne oncneowon;
 132.172. His wuldor he tealde to his fæder. of ðam ðe he is.
eall þæt he is;
 133.173. He wuldrað his fæder. and se fæder wuldrað hine.
for ðan ðe him is an wuldor gemæne. and an godcundnyss. mid ðam halgum
gaste;
 133.176. He cwæð be his fæder. ge secgað þæt he
eower god sy. and ge hine ne oncneowon;
 133.177. Gif hi soðlice þone halgan fæder oncneowon. ðonne
underfengon hi mid geleafan his ancennedan sunu. þe he asende to
middanearde;
 133.179. He cwæð ic hine cann. and gif ic secge þæt ic
hine ne cunne. þonne beo ic leas eow gelic;
 133.181. Þas word mihton beon geðuhte flæsclicum mannum.
swylce hi mid gylpe geclypode wæron;
 133.182. Witodlice gylp is to forbugenne. ac swa ðeah na swa
þæt soð sy forlæten;
 133.184. Drihten cwæð;
 133.184. Abraham eower fæder blissode þæt he minne dæg
gesawe. and he geseah. and þæs fægnode;
 133.185. Abraham se heahfæder underfeng þry englas on his
gesthuse. on hiwe ðære halgan ðrynnysse. to ðam he spræc swa swa to
anum. for ðan ðe seo halige ðrynnyss gecyndelice wunað on anre
godcundnysse. æfre an god untodæledlic;
 133.189. Þa geseah abraham drihtnes dæg. þa þa he ðas
gerynu tocneow;
 133.190. Eft is oðer ðing. þe abraham mid micelre getacnunge
gedyde;
 133.191. Ða ða he ealdode. and his sunu wifian sceolde. þa
clypode he his yldestan cniht him to. and het hine settan his hand under his
ðeoh. and swerian ðurh ðone heofenlican god. þæt he næfre ne
geðafode þæt his sunu Isaac. on hæðenre mægðe wifian sceolde.
ac of ðam geleaffullum folce þe abraham on afedd wæs;
 133.196. Hwæt belamp abrahames ðeoh to ðam heofenlican gode?
Oððe hwæt mænde se að swa gesworen buton þæt mid ðære
dæde wæs getacnod se heofenlica god toweard on lichaman of abrahames
cynne;
 133.199. Witodlice þæt ðeoh getacnode his cynn. and abraham
ðurh witegunge stafode þone að. þa ða he geseah drihtnes dæg
toweard of his sæde;
 133.202. His sæd he getacnode mid þam worde ðe he cwæð.
sete ðine hand under minum ðeo;
 133.203. His drihten he getacnode þa þa he cwæð. swera
ðurh ðone heofenlican god;
 134.205. Hwæt ða iudeiscan yrsigende cwædon to criste;
 134.205. Hwæt la. Git ðu ne eart fiftig geara. and gesawe ðu
abraham? Drihten him andwyrde;
 134.207. Soð soð ic eow secge. ær ðan abraham gewurde. Ic
eom;
 134.208. Abraham wearð gesceapen. swa swa gesceaft. Crist hine
gesceop swa swa scyppend. se ðe toweard wæs on flæsce of abrahames
ofspringe;
 134.210. Ne cwæð se hælend. ær ðan ðe abraham
wære ic wæs. ac he cwæð. ær ðan þe abraham gewurde. Ic eom;
 134.212. Þæt word belimpð synderlice to gode anum. Ic eom.
for ðan ðe he is ana buton anginne. and ende. swa swa he sylf cwæð to
moysen;
 134.214. Ic eom. se ðe eom. and sege Israhela bearnum. se ðe
is. sende me to eow;
 134.215. Gesceafta sind þæt þæt hi sind. ac ðis word ne
mæg soðlice beon be him gecweden. ðonne hi nabbað nane wununge þurh
hi sylfe. ac ðurh god. se ðe ana is þurh hine sylfne wunigende. and ealle
gesceafta healdende buton geswince;
 134.219. He mæg soðlice cweðan. Ic eom. þæt is on
leden. <foreign> Ego sum;</foreign> Hi ða namon stanas. þæt hi hine torfodon;
 134.221. Hi hæfdon stænene heardnysse on heora heortan. and
for ði to ðam stanum urnon ðam ðe hi gelice wæron;
 134.223. Se hælend soðlice hine behydde. and eode of ðam
temple;
 134.224. He forbeah heora stanas. swa swa mann. swa swa eadmod. se
ðe mihte þurh his godcundnysse gedon. þæt seo eorðe hi forswulge.
oððe þæt hi færlice feallende swulton. ac his geðyld wæs to
ðan micel. þæt he nolde nænne dom ða gesetton ða ða he to
ðrowigenne com;
 134.228. Eac is sum ðing digele on þære dæde;
 134.229. He behydde hine lichamlice wið þæra iudeiscra
stæninge. and he behydde hine gastlice fram heora stænenum heortum;
 134.231. Lucas se godspellere awrat on oðre stowe. þæt ða
Iudei læddon crist æt sumum sæle to anum clife. and woldon hine
niðer ascufan. ac he eode betweonan heora handum aweg. swa þæt heora nan
nyste hwær he becom;
 134.234. He nolde ðone deað þrowian ðe hi gecuron. ac
ðone ðe ær gewitegod wæs. and ðone ðe he sylf gecwæð;
 135.237. Iohannes se godspellere awrat þæt drihten cwæde to
Nichodeme. an ðæra Iudeiscra ealdra. ða ða he mid geleafan his lare
sohte;
 135.239. Swa swa moyses ahof ða næddran on ðam westene. swa
gedafenað þæt ic beo ahafen. þæt ælc ðæra þe on me
gelyfð ne losige. ac þæt he hæbbe þæt ece lif;
 135.241. On ðisum wordum is micel getacnung. ac eow eallum nis
cuð. naðor ne seo getacnung. ne hu hit gedon wæs;
 135.243. Þæt Israhela folc. ða ða hit ferde fram egypta
lande wearð on ðam westene wiðerræde ongean god. þa sende he betwux
him fyrene næddran. þa totæron ðæs folces fela manna and to
deaðe geættrodon;
 135.246. Þa clypode þæt folc to moysen ðisum wordum;
 135.247. We syngodon ongean god. and ongean ðe. bide for us
þæt se ælmihtiga god þæs næddran fram us afyrsige;
 135.249. Hwæt ða moyses for ðam folce gebæd. and God
þærrihte bebead moyse þæt he geworhte ane ærene næddran. and
sette up to tacne. and þæt he manode þæt folc þæt swa hwa swa
fram ðam næddrum abiten wære. besawe up to ðære ærenan
næddran. and he wurde gehæled;
 135.253. Hit wearð swa gedon;
 135.254. Ða næddran hi totæron. and hi besawon to ðære
ærenan næddran. and hi wurdon gehælede fram ðam deadbærum attre.
þæra fyrenra næddryna;
 135.257. Hwæt getacnodon þa terendan næddran. buton synna
on urum deadlicum flæsce;
 135.258. Hwæt wæs seo upahafene næddre. buton cristes
deað on rode;
 135.259. Seo ærene næddre hæfde næddran gelicnysse. ac
heo wæs buton ælcum attre;
 135.260. Swa eac crist hæfde ure gelicnysse. ac he næfde nane
synne on his leomum. ac ðurh his upahafennysse on ðære rode he
gehælde ure synna;
 135.262. Þurh næddran us becom deað. and for ði wæs
þurh ðære næddran gelicnysse cristes deað getacnod;
 135.264. Ðæra nædrena geslit wæs deadlic. Cristes deað
wæs liflic;
 135.265. Nu behealde we ða næddran. þæt seo næddre us
ne derige;
 135.266. Hwæt gemænð þæt? We behealdað cristes
deað. þæt us se deað ne derige. þe of ðære næddran asprang.
seo ðe Adam forspeon;
 135.268. Hwæs deað behealde we? Lifes deað;
 135.269. Hwa is lif buton crist? Se ðe cwæð. Ic eom
ærist. and lif. se ðe gelyfð on me. þeah ðe he dead beo. he
leofað. and ælc ðæra þe leofað and on me gelyfð. ne swelt he on
ecnysse;
 136.272. Crist is lif. and swa ðeah he wæs on rode ahangen;
 136.273. He is soð lif. and swa ðeah he wæs dead on
ðære menniscnysse. na on godcundnysse;
 136.274. On cristes deaðe wæs se deað adydd. for ðan þe
þæt deade lif acwealde ðone deað. and he wæs fornumen on cristes
lichaman;
 136.277. Mine gebroðru uton behealdan þone ahangenan crist.
þæt we beon fram ðam ættrigum synnum gehælede;
 136.278. Witodlice swa swa þæt israhela folc besawon to
ðære ærenan næddran. and wurdon gehælede fram ðæra
næddrena geslite. swa beoð nu gehælede fram heora synnum þa ðe mid
geleafan behealdað cristes deað. and his ærist;
 136.282. Hi wæron gehælede fram deaðe to hwilwendlicum
life. and her is gecweden þæt we sceolon habban þæt ece lif;
 136.284. Swa micel is betwux þære gehiwodan anlicnysse. and
ðam soðan ðinge;
 136.285. Seo gehiwode anlicnys getiðode þam toslitenum mannum
hwilwendlic lif. þæt soðe ðing þe ðurh ða ærenan næddran
getacnod wæs. þæt is cristes deað getiðað us þæt ece lif;
 136.288. Þurh treow us com deað. þa ða adam geæt þone
forbodenan æppel. and ðurh treow us com eft lif. and alysednyss. ða ða
crist hangode on rode for ure alysednysse;
 136.290. Ðære halgan rode tacn. is ure bletsung. and to
ðære rode we us gebiddað. na swa ðeah to ðam treowe. ac to ðam
ælmihtigum drihtne. ðe on ðære halgan rode for us hangode. Sy him lof
and wuldor his ormætan eadmodnysse. on ealra worulda woruld;
 136.294. Amen:

ÆCHom II, 14.1

Palm Sunday: Godden 1979, 137-49.



 137.1. <foreign>DOMINICA PALMARUM DE PASSIONE DOMINI.</foreign> DRIHTNES ðrowunge
we willað gedafenlice eow secgan on engliscum gereorde. and ða gerynu
samod. Na swa ðeah to langsumlice. gif we hit swa gelogian magon;
 137.3. Crist foresæde gefyrn. mid feawum wordum. his agene
ðrowunge. ær ðan ðe hit gewurde. for ðan ðe he ealle ðing
eallunge wiste. ær ðan ðe ðeos woruld wurde gesceapen;
 137.6. Moyses and Elias eac swilce sædon his ðrowunge on ær
uppon anre dune. ðe se hælend astah. mid ðrim leorningcnihtum. and his
ansyn ætforan him eal scean swa swa sunne. and his gewæda scinon on
snawes hwitnysse;
 137.10. Þa wolde petrus slean. sona ðreo geteld. for ðære
gesihðe. ac ðær swegde ða stemn. ðæs heofonlican fæder.
healice of wolcne. ðes is min leofa sunu. on ðam me wel licað. gehyrað
hine. and þæt wolcn ða toglad;
 137.14. Þa genealæhte se dæg. his deorwurðan ðrowunge.
and ða iudeiscan ealdras. geornlice smeadon. hu hi hælend crist. acwellan
mihton;
 137.16. Ondredon him swa ðeah. þæs folces foresteall;
 137.17. Hwæt ða se deofol. into iudan bestop. an ðæra
twelfa. drihtnes ðegena. and he sona eode. to ðæra iudeiscra ræde.
and openlice befran. hwæt hi him feos geuðon. gif he ðone hælend him
belæwan mihte;
 138.20. Hi ða þæs fægnodon. and þæt feoh gesetton.
on ðrittig scillingum. gif he ðone unscæððigan belæwde;
 138.23. Þa com se hælend. on assan sittende. into hierusalem.
ær ðam symbeldæge. and geheold ða eastertid. æfter ðære
ealdan .æ;
 138.25. On æfnunge hi æton. ealle ætsomne. on ðam fiftan
dæge. ðe ge ðunres hatað. þa aras drihten of ðam gereorde. and
awearp his reaf swiðe ricene. wearð þa bewæfed. mid anre
wæterscytan. and his gingrena fet. eadmodlice aðwoh. and eft his reaf.
ardlice genam. and hi sittende. ðisum wordum gespræc;
 138.30. Ic gesette eow nu. soðe gebysnunge. þæt eower ælc
sceole. oðres fet aðwean. swa swa ic lareow. eow liðebig aðwoh;
 138.31. Se hælend hi aðwoh. mid þweale wiðutan. fram
fenlicere fulnysse. mid his fægerum handum. and wiðinnan eac. heora andgit
aðwoh. fram eallum horwum. healicra leahtra. and het gehwilcne. oðerne
aðwean. fram fulum synnum. mid foreðingunge. and eac wiðutan. eadmodnysse
cyðan. mid geswæsre ðenunge. symle gebroðrum;
 138.38. He eode eft sittan. siððan mid his ðegnum. and on his
gereorde. hi geunrotsode. cwæð þæt heora an. hine belæwan wolde;
 138.40. Hi ða ealle mid angsumum mode ænlipige cwædon. Eom
ic hit drihten;
 138.41. Þa andwyrde se hælend. him sona ðus;
 138.42. Se ðe bedypð on disce mid me his hlaf on læpeldre.
he is min læwa;
 138.43. Wa ðam men. þe me belæwð. betere him wære.
þæt he geboren nære;
 138.44. Þa befran iudas. gif he hit wære;
 138.44. Ða cwæð se hælend. ðu hit sædest;
 138.45. Drihten sæde mid soðum worde. mihte ic hæbbe mine
sawle to syllenne. and ic eaðelice mæg. hi eft genyman;
 139.47. He genam ða hlaf. and hine liflice gehalgode. todælde
his ðegnum. and hi ðicgan het. cwæð þæt hit wære his agen
lichama. to husle gehalgod. him to alysednysse;
 139.49. Eft swa gelice gelæhte ænne calic. senode mid
swiðran. and sealde his gingrum. of to supenne. æfter gereorde. sæde
þæt hit wære soðlice his blod. ðære niwan gecyðnysse. þæt
he for mannum ageat. on synna forgyfenysse. ðær ðær se geleafa
bið;
 139.54. Drihten cwæð soðlice be ðam swicelan iudan.
þæt him selre wære. þæt he geboren nære;
 139.55. Nis þæt na to understandenne ænigum gesceadwisum
swilce he awar wære. ær ðan ðe he geboren wære;
 139.57. Ac hit is anfealdlice gecweden. þæt him betere
wære. þæt he næfre nære. ðonne he yfele wære;
 139.58. Forwel fela manna onscuniað iudan belæwinge. and swa
ðeah nellað forwandian þæt hi ne syllon soðfæstnysse wið
sceattum;
 139.60. Se hælend sylf is. eal soðfæstnys. and se ðe
soðfæstnysse beceapað wið feo. he bið iudan gefera. on fyrenum
witum. se ðe crist belæwde. for lyðrum sceatte;
 139.63. Æfter gereorde. crist bletsode husel. for ðan ðe he
wolde. ða ealdan. æ. ær gefyllan. and siððan ða niwan
gecyðnysse halwendlice onginnan;
 139.65. Hi æton þæt lamb. æfter ðam ealdan gewunan.
and he syððan sona senode husel. se ðe hine sylfne for urum synnum
geoffrode. liflice onsægednysse. his leofan fæder;
 139.69. Eft se hælend sæde. soðlice his gingrum;
 139.69. Ealle ge me æswiciað. on ðissere anre nihte;
 139.70. Hit is soðlice awriten. Ic ofslea ðone hyrde. and ða
scep siððan sona beoð tostencte;
 139.71. Æfter ðan ðe ic arise of deaðe gesund. ic eow eft
gemete. on galileiscum earde;
 139.73. Þa andwyrde petrus ana mid gebeote. Ic ðe næfre ne
geæswicige. ðeah ðe ealle oðre don;
 140.74. Drihten eft andwyrde. anrædlice petre. þu me
wiðsæcst ðriwa. on ðissere nihte. ær ðan ðe se hana.
hafitigende crawe;
 140.76. Petrus cwæð þæt he nolde hine næfre
wiðsacan. ðeah ðe he sceolde samod mid him sweltan. and ealle ða
oðre. eal swa cwædon;
 140.78. Iudas se swicola. swiðe hraðe eode. to ðam arleasum
ehterum. þe he ær gespræc. and genam him fultum. æt ðam phariseum.
and hi ða eodon ealle gewæpnode. and mid leohtfatum to ðam lifigendum
drihtne;
 140.82. Þa cwæð se læwa. to ðam laðum flocce. swa
hwilcne swa ic cysse. cepað his sona. and he ða mid cosse crist
belæwde;
 140.84. Hwæt ða se hælend. him togeanes stop. and unforht
axode. hwæne hi sohton;
 140.85. Hi ða cwædon. þæt hi crist sohton;
 140.85. Ða sæde he him. ic hit soðlice eom;
 140.86. Hi ða mid þam worde. wendon underbæc. feallende to
eorðan. mid fyrhte fornumene;
 140.87. Eft þa siððan axode se hælend. hwæne hi sohton
swa swiðe gewæpnode;
 140.89. Hi eft andwyrdon mid ðam ærran worde. cwædon
þæt hi ðone hælend. habban woldon;
 140.90. Þa andwyrde he. mid þam ylcan worde. Ic eow sæde
ær þæt ic se eom;
 140.91. Gif ge me secað. lætað mine gyngran aweg;
 140.92. Ða abræd petrus. bealdlice his swurd. and gesloh heora
anum þæt swiðre eare of. ac crist him styrde mid stiðum wordum. and
het hine hydan þæt hearde isen;
 140.95. Cwæð þæt he mihte ða. ma ðonne twelf eoroda
heofenlicra engla. æt his fæder abiddan. gif hit weorðan ne sceolde.
swa swa witegan cwædon. and se hælend ðærrihte. þæt eare
gehælde;
 140.98. Wise men tealdon an eorod to six ðusendum. and twelf
eorod sind. twa and hundseofontig ðusend;
 140.99. Swa fela ðusend engla. mihton eaðe bewerian crist.
wið þam unmannum. mid heofenlicum wæpnum. gif he ðrowian nolde.
sylfwilles for us;
 140.101. Ne he nolde ða gyt. his gingrena deað. ac heold hi to
lareowum. eallum leodscipum. and het ða ehteras. hi ealle forlætan. He
geswutelode his mihte. on ðam manfullum. ða ða he mid anum worde hi ealle
astrehte. forhte to eorðan feallende underbæc. and þæs arleasan eare.
eaðelice gehælde. to geswutelunge. his unscæððignysse. and to
seðunge soðre godcundnysse;
 141.107. Næs petrus gewunod to nanre wæpnunge. ac ðær
wæron twa swurd. siðlice gebrohte. to ðam wiðerstealle. gif hit swa
crist wolde;
 141.109. Ac he forbead þæt gewinn. mid wordum ðearle.
þæt nan godes ðeow ne sceolde. on him sylfum truwian. ne mid wæpnum
winnan wið woruldlicum cempum. gif he cristes fotswaðum filigan wile;
 141.114. Se hælend ða geðafode. þæt hi hine namon. and
gelæddon on bendum to heora ealdorbiscope. and his geferan ða. mid fleame
ætburston. ac petrus him filigde. feorran sarig;
 141.116. Ða heoldon ða Iudei. þone hælend ofer niht. and
mid anum wæfelse his neb bewundon. sleande mid handbredum. huxlice and
gelome. and heton hine rædan. hwa hine hrepode. and mid menigfealdum hospe
hine gegremedon. and mid leasum gewitum. forleogan woldon;
 141.121. Þa axode hine. se ealdorbiscop and mid aðe gehalsode.
þæt he openlice sæde. gif he godes sunu. soðlice wære;
 141.123. Se hælend him cwæð to. Ic eom swa ðu sædest.
and ic sittende beo æt mines fæder swiðran. and on wolcnum ic cume. on
ðissere worulde geendunge;
 141.125. Ða cwæð se ealdorbiscop. mid orgel worde. hwæt
ðincð eow nu be ðissere segene? Hi ealle andwyrdon mid anre stemne.
þæt he scyldig wære. witodlice to deaðe. and hi hine bespætton.
huxlice sprecende;
 141.128. Drihten soðlice us sealde hælu. þurh ðam
earplættum. and ece alysednysse. and ða spætlu aðwogon. ure sweartan
gyltas;
 141.131. Petrus stod ofcalen. on ðam cauertune. æt micclum
fyre. mid manegum oðrum;
 141.132. Ða cwæð him an wyln to. þæt he wære mid
criste. ac he sona wiðsoc þæt hit swa nære;
 141.133. Þa eft ymbe hwile. cwæð sum oðer wyln. þæt
he mid ðam hælende. on hyrede wære. and he eft wiðcwæð. þæt
he hine ne cuðe;
 142.135. Þa genealæhton ma. hine meldigende. ac petrus
wiðsoc. gyt ðriddan siðe. and se hana sona. hlud swege sang;
 142.137. Ða becyrde se hælend. and beseah to petre. and he
sona gemunde. his micclan gebeotes. and mid biterum wope. his wiðersæc
behreowsode;
 142.139. Hwi wolde æfre geðafian. se ælmihtiga wealdend.
þæt his gecorena ðegen. þe he eallum gesette. geleaffullum leodum.
lareow and hyrde. þæt he hine for yrcðe. swa oft wiðsoce? Ac se
mildheorta crist. wolde him æteowian. on his agenum gylte. hu he oðrum
sceolde. mannum gemiltsian. on mislicum gyltum. nu he eallunge hæfð.
heofonan rices cæge. þæt he nære to stið. unstrangum mannum. ac
gemiltsode oðrum. swa swa se ælmihtiga him;
 142.148. Eft ða on dægerede. drihtnes ehteras comon. ealle
tosomne. to heora sunderspræce. and hine þa læddon. to ðære leode
ealdre. mid micelre wrohte. hine wregende;
 142.150. Ac se hælend nolde. hine betellan. mid nanre
soðsegene. ðeah ðe he unscyldig wære;
 142.152. Iudas ða geseah. ðone reðan dom. and gebrohte
þæt feoh. þe he mid facne genam. to ðam ealdorbiscopum. gebolgen
swiðe. and hine sylfne aheng. sona mid grine. and rihtlice gewrað. ða
forwyrhtan ðrotan. seo ðe lytle ær. belæwde drihten;
 142.155. Ða noldon ða Iudei þæt feoh gelecgan. on heora
fætelsum. swilce hi fæcne næron. ac gebohton ænne æcer
ælðeodigum to byrgelsum. þæt ðæs witegan word. wurdon gefyllede.
þe ær be ðam feo eal swa witegode;
 142.159. Yfele behreowsode. se arleasa læwa. his manfullan
dæda. mid his agenum deaðe;
 143.160. On criste he syngode. and swiðor on him sylfum. for
ðan þe agenslaga. on ecnysse ðrowað;
 143.162. Se gebohta æcer. belimpð to us. we ðe on ðyssere
worulde. ælðeodige wuniað. we us gerestað. on ðam liflicum wurðe.
and Iudas ne moste. ðæs landes brucan. ac tobærst on emtwa. and his
innoð tofleow. nateshwon gelogod. on nanre byrgene;
 143.167. Se hælend ða stod. on ðam domerne gelædd. þa
axode pilatus. hine orgollice. gif he iudeiscre ðeode cyning. on eornost
wære;
 143.169. Ða andwyrde se hælend. ðu hit sædest;
 143.169. Þa gemunde se ealdormann þæt herodes wæs on
ðære scire ða. and asende crist him to;
 143.171. Herodes soðlice. wæs swiðe geblissod. mid ðære
gesihðe. for his swiðlicum tacnum. and wolde geseon. sum wundor fram him.
ac crist him nolde. nan ðing to gecweðan. ne on ðam timan nane tacna
wyrcan;
 143.174. Ða forseah herodes. hine swiðe mid his hirede. and be
his hwitum reafum. huxlice spræc. and asende hine sona. to ðam
foresædan pilate. and hi wurdon ða gefrynd. for ðære dæde. swa swa
hi næron. næfre ær on life;
 143.178. Þa clypode pilatus. eft to ðam folce. cwæð be
ðam hælende. þæt he unscyldig wære. for ðan ðe herodes. ne he
eac ne mihte. nænne gylt on him. to deaðe afindan. cwæð þæt he
wolde. hine beswingan. and to life alætan. gif him swa gelicode;
 143.183. Ða heoldon ða iudei. on healicum gewunan. þæt hi
ælce geare ænne scyldinne abædon. æt ðam ealdormenn. to heora
eastertide. and hæfdon ða on bendum. ænne bealdne ðeof. BARRABAN
gecigedne. for manslihte to slege;
 143.186. Þa befran pilatus. þæs folces menigu. hwæðerne
hi gecuron. hælend oððe barraban;
 143.188. Þæt folc him to cwæð. þæt hi gecuron
barraban;
 143.188. Ða axode pilatus eft æt ðam folce hwæt he be
drihtne gedon sceolde;
 143.190. Þa cwædon hi ealle mid anre stemne. Sy he ahangen. on
healicere rode;
 143.191. Ða geseah pilatus. ðæra Iudeiscra gehlyd. and
aðwoh his handa on heora gesihðe. cwæð þæt he unscyldig. his
sleges wære;
 144.193. Þa cwædon ða iudei. him to andsware. beo his blodes
gyte. ofer urum bearnum. and eal seo wracu. on us wunigende;
 144.195. Ða het pilatus ðone hælend beswingan. and
betæhte hine ða. to heora benum swa. þæt he wælhreawlice. wurde
ahangen;
 144.197. Hwæt ða his cempan. hine gelæhton. on ðam
domerne. mid dyrstigum anginne. and hine unscryddon. his agenum gyrelum. and
mid wolcnreadum wæfelse. hine bewæfdon. and mid þyrnenum helme. his
heafod befengon. and for cynegyrde. him hreod forgeafon. bigende heora cneowu.
and cweðende mid hospe. Sy ðu hal leof. iudeiscra leoda cyning;
 144.202. Hi ða hrædlice. eft hine unscryddon. þam readan
wæfelse . and his reaf him on dydon. and woldon þærrihte. hine to rode
gelædan;
 144.205. Þæt iudeisce cyn. is yfele bebunden. mid þam ðe
hi cwædon. be cristes blode. þæt seo wracu wære. on him wunigende.
and on heora bearnum. nu bið hit eac swa;
 144.207. Ær hi sind gebundene. ær hi beon geborene;
 144.208. Hi gecuron manslagan. na metoda drihten. for ðan hi
habbað nu. þone hetolan deofol. him to hlaforde. na ðone lifigendan
crist;
 144.210. Þæra cempena hosp. hæfde getacnunge. on gastlicum
ðingum. þæt hi him to gamene gedydon;
 144.211. Se wolcnreada wæfels. wislice getacnode. ures drihtnes
deað. mid ðære deage hiwe;
 144.213. Soðlice ðurh ðornas synna beoð getacnode. swa swa
ælmihtig god to adame cwæð;
 144.214. Ðornas. and bremelas. þe sceolon wexan. for ðan ðe
ðu wære þinum wife gehyrsum. swiðor þonne me. mihtigum drihtne;
 144.216. Nu wurdon ure synna. eft adylegode. ðurh ðone
ðyrnenan helm. on ðone hælend beslagen;
 145.218. Hi cwædon mid hospe. þæt he cyning wære. se
ðe soðlice is þeoda wealdend;
 145.219. Hi hine unscryddon. and eft gescryddon. for ðan ðe he
wolde. his lichaman forlætan. and siððan undeadlicne. eft aræran;
 145.222. Hwæt ða cempan ða. hine gelæddon. to ðære
cwealmstowe. þær man cwealde sceaðan. and him budon drincan. gebitrodne
windrenc. ac he hit asceaf. sona fram his muðe. nolde his onbyrian. for
ðære biternysse;
 145.225. Þes gebiteroda drenc. hæfde getacnunge. his deaðes
biternysse. ðe he ða onbyrigde. ac he hine hrædlice. mid his æriste
awearp;
 145.227. Ðær wæron gelædde. mid ðam lifigendan
drihtne. twegen scyldige sceaðan. for heora synnum to honne;
 145.229. Þa hengon ða cempan. crist on ælemiddan. and þa
twegen sceaðan. him on twa healfa. and pilatus awrat. þæs wites
intingan. on anre tabelan. mid þrim gereordum. Ebreiscum. and Greciscum. and
Ledenum samod;
 145.232. Þes is se hælend. Iudeiscra cyning. and asette ðis
gewrit. sona to ðære rode. bufon cristes heafde. healice to tacne.
þæt ðær hangode se hælend on rode. iudeiscra cyning. welhreawlice
gefæstnod;
 145.236. Þa dældon ða cwelleras. cristes reaf on feower.
heora ælcum his dæl. swa him demde seo ta. and heoldon his tunecan.
untoslitene. for ðan ðe heo wæs. eal buton seame. and seo getacnode ða
soðan annysse ðære halgan gelaðunge. seo ðe æfre bið. wið
gedwolmannum. þurh drihten gescyld;
 145.241. Drihten wæs gefæstnod. mid feower nægelum. to
westdæle awend. and his wynstra heold. ðone scynendan suðdæl. and his
swiðra norðdæl. eastdæl his hnol. and he ealle alysde middaneardes
hwemmas. swa hangiende;
 145.244. Ða reðan iudei. beheoldon feorran. and mid hospe
clypodon. to hælendum criste. gif ðu godes sunu sy. ga of ðære rode.
and we siððan swa. on ðe gelyfað;
 146.247. Se mildheorta drihten. cwæð to his fæder;
 146.247. Min heofenlica fæder. ic ðe nu bidde. forgif ðas
dæde. þisum gedwolmannum for ðan ðe hi nyton. hwæt hi nu doð;
 146.249. An ðæra sceaðena. eac swilce clypode. Gif ðu
hælend crist sy. gehæl ðe and us;
 146.250. Þa andwyrde se oðer. hine ðreagende;
 146.251. Hwæt ðu la earming. ne ondrætst ðu ðe god. wit
synd gewitnode. for welhreawum dædum. and þes halga hælend. hangað
her unscyldig;
 146.253. Eft ða se ylca. clypode to criste. Gemun ðu min
drihten. þonne ðu mihtig becymst. to ðinum agenum rice. roderes
wealdend;
 146.255. Se hælend him cwæð to. mid soðum behate. nu
todæg ðu bist. on neorxena wange mid me;
 146.257. Þes sceaða gesælig. siðode to heofenum. and se
oðer gewende. welhreaw to helle;
 146.258. On ðisum twam sceaðum. wæron getacnode. seo
Iudeisce ðeod. and þæt hæðene folc;
 146.260. Þæt iudeisce folc. nolde on crist gelyfan. ðone
ðe hi mid hospe. on hengene fæstnodon. and þæt hæðene folc. on
hine gelyfde. þreagende ða oðre. þearle mid geleafan;
 146.263. Seo halige Maria þæs hælendes moder. stod wið
ða rode. ðearle dreorig. and Iohannes samod. hire swuster bearn;
 146.264. Ða clypode drihten. to his dreorian meder;
 146.265. Efne her hangað nu. ðin sunu fæmne;
 146.266. Swilce he cwæde. þis is ðin gecynd. ðus
ðrowigendlic. ðe ic of ðe genam;
 146.267. He cwæð to Iohanne. her stænt ðin modor;
 146.268. Þa hæfde Iohannes. hire siððan gymene. mid
geswæsum ðenungum. a on ðisum life;
 146.269. Eft ða cwæð se hælend. þæt him hearde
ðyrste. ða arn to ðam ecede. sum arleas cempa. and bedypte ane spincgan.
and bær to his muðe;
 146.271. Hwæt ða ymbe midne dæg. wearð middaneard
aðeostrod. and seo sunne behydde hire hatan leoman. oð ða nigoðan tid.
ðe we non hatað;
 146.274. Ða clypode drihten. and cwæð to his fæder;
 146.274. Ic betæce fæder. þe nu minne gast. and he ahyldum
heafde. hine sona ageaf;
 147.276. Efne ða tobærst. þæs temples wahryft. fram
ðære fyrste ufan. oð ða flor neoðan. and eal eorðe bifode. and
toburston stanas. byrgenu openodon. mid deadum banum. and halgena lichaman.
leohtlice arison. comon to ðære byrig. cuðlice æteowode. manegum
mannum. swa swa matheus awrat;
 147.280. Se hundredes ealdor soðlice clypode. æfter ðisum

 155.191. We sædon eow hwene ær. þæt crist halgode hlaf.

min blod;
 156.193. Ne ðrowode he ða gyt. ac swa ðeah he awende ðurh
ungesewenlicere mihte þone hlaf to his agenum lichaman. and þæt win to
his blode. swa swa he ær dyde on þam westene. ær ðan ðe he to men
geboren wurde. ða ða he awende ðone heofenlican mete to his flæsce.
and þæt flowende wæter of ðam stane to his agenum blode;
 156.199. Fela manna æton of ðam heofonlican mete on ðam
westene. and druncon þone gastlican drenc. and wurdon swa ðeah deade. swa
swa crist sæde;
 156.201. Ne mænde crist ðone deað þe nan man forbugan ne
mæg. ac he mænde þone ecan deað. þe sume of ðam folce for heora
geleafleaste geearnodon;
 156.203. Moyses. and AAron. and manega oðre of ðam folce þe
gode gelicodon æton þone heofenlican hlaf. ac hi næron deade þam ecum
deaðe. ðeah ðe hi gemænum deaðe forðferdon;
 156.206. Hi gesawon þæt se heofonlica mete wæs gesewenlic.
and brosniendlic. ac hi understodon gastlice be ðam gesewenlican ðinge. and
hit gastlice ðigdon;
 156.208. Se hælend cwæð. se ðe et min flæsc. and
drincð min blod. he hæfð ece lif;
 156.210. Ne het he etan þone lichaman ðe he mid befangen
wæs. ne þæt blod drincan ðe he for us ageat. ac he mænde mid þam
worde þæt halige husel þe gastlice is his lichama and his blod. and se
ðe þæs onbyrigð mid geleaffulre heortan. he hæfð þæt ece
lif;
 156.214. On ðære ealdan .æ. geleaffulle menn offrodon gode
mislice lac. ðe hæfdon towearde getacnunge cristes lichaman. ðe he sylf
for urum synnum siððan geoffrode. his heofenlican fæder to
onsægednysse;
 156.217. Witodlice þis husel ðe nu bið gehalgod æt godes
weofode is gemynd cristes lichaman. þe he for us geoffrode. and his blodes
þe he for us ageat. swa swa he sylf het. doð þis on minum gemynde;
 156.220. Æne þrowade crist ðurh hine sylfne. ac swa ðeah
dæghwomlice bið his ðrowung geedniwod þurh gerynu þæs halgan
husles. æt ðære halgan mæssan;
 156.222. For ði fremað seo halige mæsse micclum. ge þam
lybbendum. ge ðam forðfarenum. swa swa hit for oft geswutelod is;
 156.225. Us is eac to smeagenne þæt þæt halige husel is
ægðer ge cristes lichama ge ealles geleaffulles folces æfter gastlicere
gerynu. swa swa se wisa Augustinus be ðan cwæð;
 157.227. Gif ge willað understandan be cristes lichaman.
gehyrað þone apostol paulum. þus cweðende;
 157.229. Ge soðlice sindon cristes lichama. and leomu;
 157.230. Nu is eower gerynu geled on godes mysan. and ge underfoð
eower gerynu. to ðan þe ge sylfe sind;
 157.231. Beoð þæt þæt ge geseoð on ðam weofode. and
underfoð þæt þæt ge sylfe sind;
 157.233. Eft cwæð se apostol paulus be ðisum. we manega
sindon an hlaf. and an lichama;
 157.234. Understandað nu. and blissiað. fela sind an hlaf. and
an lichama on criste;
 157.235. He is ure heafod. and we sind his lima;
 157.236. Ne bið se hlaf of anum corne. ac of manegum;
 157.237. Ne þæt win of anre berian. ac of manegum;
 157.237. Swa we sceolon eac habban annysse on urum drihtne. swa swa
hit awriten is be ðan geleaffullan werode. þæt hi wæron on swa
micelre annysse. swilce him eallum wære an sawul. and an heorte;
 157.241. Crist gehalgode on his beode þa gerynu ure sibbe. and
ure annysse. se ðe underfehð þære annysse gerynu. and ne hylt ðone
bend þære soðan sibbe. ne underfehð he na gerynu for him sylfum. ac
gecyðnysse togeanes him sylfum;
 157.244. Micel god bið cristenum mannum. þæt hi gelome to
husle gan. gif hi unscæððignysse on heora heortan berað to ðam
weofode. gif hi ne beoð mid leahtrum ofsette;
 157.247. Þam yfelan menn ne becymð to nanum gode ac to
forwyrde. gif he ðæs halgan husles unwurðe onbyrigð;
 157.249. Halige bec beodað þæt man gemencge wæter to
ðam wine ðe to husle sceal. for ðan ðe þæt wæter hæfð
þæs folces getacnunge. swa swa þæt win cristes blodes. and for ði
ne sceal naðor buton oðrum beon geoffrod. æt ðære halgan mæssan.
þæt crist beo mid us. and we mid criste. þæt heafod mid þam leomum.
and ða leomu mid ðam heafde;
 157.255. We woldon gefyrn trahtnian be ðan lambe þe se ealda
Israhel æt heora eastertide geoffrodon. ac we woldon ærest eow gereccan
ymbe ðas gerynu. and siððan hu hit man ðicgan sceal;
 157.258. Þæt getacnigendlice lamb wæs geoffrod æt heora
eastertide. and se apostol paulus cwæð on ðisum dægþerlicum
pistole. þæt crist is ure eastertid. se ðe for us wæs geoffrod. and
on þisum dæge of deaðe aras;
 158.261. Israhel ðigde þæs lambes flæsc swa swa god
bebead mid þeorfum hlafum. and feldlicum lactucum. and we sceolon ðicgan
þæt halige husel cristes lichaman. and his blod buton beorman yfelnysse.
and manfulnysse;
 158.264. Swa swa se beorma awent þa gesceafta of heora gecynde.
swa awendað eac leahtras þæs mannes gecynd fram unscæððignysse to
gewemmednysse;
 158.267. Se apostol tæhte þæt we sceoldon wistfullian. na
on yfelnysse beorman. ac on þeorfnyssum. syfernysse. and soðfæstnysse;
 158.269. Lactuca hatte seo wyrt þe hi etan sceoldon mid þam
ðeorfum hlafum. heo is biter on ðigene;
 158.270. And we sceolon mid biternysse soðre behreowsunge ure mod
geclænsian. gif we willað cristes lichaman ðicgan;
 158.273. Næs þæt israhela folc gewunod to hreawum
flæsce. þeah ðe god him bebude þæt hi hit hreaw ne æton. ne on
wætere gesoden. ac gebræd to fyre;
 158.275. Se wile ðicgan godes lichaman hreawne. se ðe buton
gesceade wenð þæt he wære anfeald man us gelic. and nære god;
 158.277. And se ðe æfter menniscum wisdome wile smeagan ymbe
ða gerynu cristes flæsclicnysse. he deð swilce he seoðe þæs
lambes flæsc on wætere. for ðan ðe wæter getacnað on þyssere
stowe mennisc ingehyd;
 158.280. Ac we sceolon witan þæt ealle ða gerynu cristes
menniscnysse wæron gefadode þurh mihte þæs halgan gastes. þonne
ðicge we his lichaman gebrædne to fyre. for ðan ðe se halga gast com
on fyres hiwe to ðam apostolum. on mislicum gereordum;
 158.284. Israhel sceolde etan þæs lambes heafod. and ða fet.
and þæt innewerde. and þær nan ðing belifan ne moste ofer niht. gif
þær hwæt belife. forbærnan þæt on fyre. and ne tobræcon ða
ban;
 158.287. Æfter gastlicum andgite we etað þæs lambes
heafod. þonne we underfoð cristes godcundnysse on urum geleafan;
 158.289. Eft ðonne we his menniscnysse mid lufe underfoð.
þonne ete we þæs lambes fet. for ðan ðe crist is angynn and ende.
God ær ealle worulda. and man on þyssere worulde geendunge;
 158.292. Hwæt is þæs lambes innewerde buton cristes digelan
bebodu. ða we etað þonne we lifes word mid grædignysse underfoð;
 159.294. Nan ðing ne moste þæs lambes belifan oð merien.
for ðan þe godes cwydas sind to smeagenne mid swa micelre carfulnysse. swa
þæt ealle his beboda mid andgite. and weorce beon asmeade on nihte ðises
andwerdan lifes. ær ðan þe se endenexta dæg. þæs gemænelican
æristes æteowige;
 159.298. Gif we ðonne ealle ða gerynu cristes flæsclicnysse
ðurhsmeagan ne magon. ðonne sceole we þa lafe betæcan þæs halgan
gastes mihte mid soðre eadmodnysse. and na to dyrstelice embe ða deopan
digelnyssa ofer ures andgites mæðe smeagan;
 159.303. Hi æton þæt lamb mid begyrdum lendenum;
 159.303. On lendenum is seo galnys ðæs lichaman. and se ðe
wile þæt husel ðicgan he sceal gewriðan þa galnysse. and mid
clænnysse ða halgan ðigene onfon;
 159.306. Hi wæron eac gesceode;
 159.306. Hwæt sind gescy. buton deadra nytena hyda;
 159.307. We beoð soðlice gesceode. gif we geefenlæcað mid
urum færelde and weorce forðfarenra manna lif. þæra ðe gode
geðugon þurh gehealtsumnysse his beboda;
 159.309. Hi hæfdon him stæf on handa æt ðære
ðigene. se stæf getacnað gymene. and hyrdrædene;
 159.311. Þa ðe bet cunnon and magon. sceolon gyman oðra
manna. and mid heora fultume underwryðian;
 159.313. Ðam gemettum wæs beboden þæt hi sceoldon caflice
etan. for ðan ðe god onscunað þa sleacnysse on his ðegnum. and ða
he lufað þe mid godes cafnysse þæs ecan lifes myrhðe secað;
 159.316. Hit is awriten. ne elca ðu to gecyrrenne to gode. ðy
læs þe se tima losige. þurh ða sleacan elcunge;
 159.317. Þa gemettan ne moston þæs lambes ban scænan. ne
ða cempan ðe crist ahengon ne moston tobrecan his halgan sceancan. swa swa
hi dydon þæra twegra sceaðena. ðe him on twa healfa hangodon. Ac
drihten aras of deaðe gesund. buton ælcere forrotodnysse. and hi sceolon
geseon æt ðam micclan dome hwæne hi gewundodon. wælhreawlice on
rode;
 159.324. Þeos tid is gehaten on ebreiscum gereorde <foreign>pascha</foreign>.
þæt is on leden <foreign>transitus</foreign> . and on englisc færeld. for ðan ðe on
ðisum dæge ferde godes folc fram egypta lande ofer ða readan sæ. fram
ðeowte to ðam behatenan earde;
 159.327. Ure drihten ferde eac on þisne timan swa swa se
godspellere Iohannes cwæð. fram ðisum middanearde. to his heofonlican
fæder;
 160.329. We sceolon fyligan urum heafde. and faran fram deofle to
criste. fram ðissere unstæððigan worulde. to his staðelfæstan
rice. ac we sceolon ærest on urum andwerdan life faran fram leahtrum to
halgum mægnum. fram unðeawum to godum ðeawum. gif we willað æfter
ðisum lænan life. faran to ðam ecan. and æfter urum æriste to
hælende criste;
 160.335. He us gelæde to his lifigendan fæder. þe hine
sealde for urum synnum to deaðe;
 160.336. Sy him wuldor and lof. þære weldæde. on ealra

 161.1. <foreign>ALIUS SERMO DE DIE PASCHAE</foreign> Hit is swiðe gedafenlic.
þæt ge on ðisum drihtenlicum æriste. sume larlice word æt eowerum
lareowum gehyron;
 161.2. Lucas se godspellere awrat on cristes bec þæt on
ðisum easterlicum dæge. eodon twegen drihtnes leorningcnihtas to anre
byrig. seo wæs fif mila fram hierusalem. Emmaus gehaten;
 161.5. Þa eodon hi sprecende ymbe þæs hælendes þrowunge
him betwynan. and se hælend sylf genealæcende eode him mid. ac hi ne
mihton hine oncnawan;
 161.8. Ða befran he hi. hwæt hi him betwynan spræcon.
oððe hwi hi dreorige wæron;
 161.9. Him andwyrde ða heora oðer. his nama wæs cleophas and
cwæð;
 161.10. Eart ðu ana ælðeodig mann on hierusalem. þæt
ðu ne gehyrdest be ðam nazareniscan hælende. hu he wæs belæwed.
and to deaðe fordemed? We hopodon þæt he wære israhela alysend. nu
todæg is se ðridda dæg þe ðis gedon wæs;
 161.14. Sume wimmen of ure geferrædene eodon to his byrgene. and
þær englas gesawon. ðe cyddon þæt he leofode;
 161.16. Sume eac ure geferan to ðære byrgene comon. and swa

 161.18. Þa cwæð se hælend him to andsware;
 161.19. Eala ge stuntan. and latheortan to gelyfenne. on eallum
ðam ðingum þe witegan spræcon;
 161.20. La hu. ne gedafenode criste swa ðrowian. and swa faran

 161.21. Begann ða him to reccenne fram moyse. and eallum witegum.
ða halgan gewritu. þe be him wæron gesette;
 161.24. Ða genealæhton hi ðære byrig þe hi towearde
wæron. and hine gelaðodon to heora gesthuse. þus cweðende;
 161.25. La leof wuna mid us. for ðan ðe hit æfenlæhð.
and ðes dæg is nu ahyld;
 161.26. Þa eode he to heora inne. swa gelaðod;
 162.27. Ða ða hi to gereorde sæton. ða genam he hlaf and
bletsode. and tobræc. and sealde him;
 162.29. Þa wurdon heora eagan geopenode. and hi oncneowon ðone
hælend þe him ær bedigelod wæs;
 162.30. Drihten ða gewat of heora gesihðe. and hi siððan

 162.31. La hu. næs ure heorte byrnende on us. ða ða he us be

 162.33. Hi arison on ðære ylcan tide. and gecyrdon to

wæron. secgende þæt drihten soðlice of deaðe aras. and hine

 162.36. Hi sylfe eac cyddon þæt hi crist be wege gespræcon.

 162.39. On ðisum andwerdan dæge gelamp ðis. þeah ðe

 162.40. Gregorius se halga papa ure apostol trahtnode þis godspel
mid sceortre trahtnunge. and cwæð;
 162.41. Mine gebroðra ða leofostan. efne ge gehyrdon þæt
ure drihten æfter his æriste hine æteowode on siðfæte his twam
leorningcnihtum. na fulfremedlice be him gelyfendum. ac be him sprecendum. and
he nolde for ðære twynunge him æteowian his oncnawennysse;
 162.46. Swa dyde drihten on heora gesihðe. swa swa hi sylfe dydon

 162.47. Hi soðlice hine lufodon wiðinnan. and swa ðeah him
twynode be his æriste;
 162.48. Drihten him wæs andwerd wiðutan. and swa ðeah him ne

 162.50. He gefylde his behat. þe he ær his ðrowunge

 162.50. Swa hwær swa beoð twegen oððe ðry gegadrode on

 162.52. He ðreade heora andgites heardnysse. and him geopenode
ða halgan gewritu þe be him wæron gesette. and swa ðeah he wæs
geðuht swilce ælðeodig for ðære twynunge;
 162.55. Be ðison we magon tocnawan. þæt us is twyfeald neod
on boclicum gewritum;
 162.56. Anfeald neod us is. þæt we ða boclican lare mid
carfullum mode smeagan. oðer þæt we hi to weorcum awendan;
 162.58. Gif moyses and ealle witegan witogoden þæt crist
sceolde ðurh nearunysse his ðrowunge into his heofonlican wuldre faran.
humeta mæg ðonne se beon cristen geteald. se ðe nele be his andgites
mæðe þa boclican gewritu aspyrian. hu hi to criste belimpað. ne ðurh
nanre earfoðnysse. þæt ece wuldor mid criste geearnian;
 163.64. Hi ða gelaðodon hine to heora gesthuse. and him mete

onwrigennysse haliges gewrites oncnawan;
 163.66. Næron hi onlihte þurh þæt þæt hi godes
beboda gehyrdon. ac hi wurdon onlihte þa ða hi godes beboda to weorce
awendon. þurh ða cumliðnysse. for ðan ðe hit is awriten. þæt
ða ne beoð rihtwise getealde mid gode. þa ðe buton weorce his beboda
gehyrað. ac ða beoð rihtwise getealde. þe mid weorcum his beboda
gefyllað;
 163.72. Efne ure drihten næs oncnawen ða ða he on

oncnawen. þurh heora cumliðnysse;
 163.74. Mine gebroðra lufiað cumliðnysse. and soðre lufe

 163.76. Wunige betwux eow lufu soðre broðer rædene. and ne

 163.78. Sume gecwemdon englum on heora gesthusum underfangenum.

 163.79. Be ðisum eac cwæð se apostol petrus;
 163.80. Beoð cumliðe eow betwynan. buton ceorungum;
 163.80. Drihten sylf cwæð. Ic wæs cuma. and ge me

 163.82. Witodlice cumliðnys is swiðe hlisful ðing. and

 163.83. Sum hiredes ealdor beeode cumliðnysse mid micelre

 163.85. Hwæt ða on sumum dæge. com sum ælðeodig man

 163.88. Þa færlice fordwan se foresæda ælðeodiga of

 163.89. Eft on þære ylcan nihte. cwæð se hælend ðurh

 164.92. Smeagað nu mine gebroðra. hu micel miht stent on

 164.94. Drihten gelæste þam hiredes hlaforde. þæt

 164.98. Gelome æteowode ure drihten hine sylfne his
leorningcnihtum æfter his æriste. and mid him ðigde lichamlice
bigleofan. and hi mid his lare getrymde;
 164.100. Sume his geswutelunge we eow sædon on oðre stowe.
sume we willað eow nu secgan. nu ge her gegaderode syndon;
 164.102. We wenað þæt ge ealle on andwerdnysse her ne beon
to ðam dæge. þe we þæt godspel rædan sceolon;
 164.105. Iohannes se godspellere awrat. on þære feorðan
cristes bec. ðus cweðende;
 164.106. <foreign> Manifestauit se IESUS ad mare tyberiadis. ET RELIQUIA</foreign>.
Se hælend hine geswutelode æfter his æriste æt ðære sæ
tyberiadis. hi seofon leorningcnihtum on fixnoðe;
 164.108. Þær fixode Petrus. and Thomas. and Nathanael.
Iacobus. and Iohannes. and oðre twegen. þæra naman ne nemde se

 164.111. Hi swuncon ealle ða niht on idelum fixnoðe. and

 164.112. Ða on merigen stod se hælend on ðam strande. and

 164.113. Se hælend him cwæð to;
 164.114. Ge cnapan. hæbbe ge ænige syflinge begyten;
 164.114. Hi cwædon. Nese;
 164.115. Drihten cwæð;
 164.115. Wurpað eower net on ða swiðran healfe þæs

 164.116. Hi ða wurpon þæt net on ða swiðran healfe. and

 164.118. Þa cwæð Iohannes to petre. þæt hit wære se

 164.119. Hwæt ða petrus hine begyrde. and swam to lande. ða

 164.121. Ða gesawon hi on ðam lande licgan gleda. and fisc
onuppan. and hlaf ðær onem;
 164.122. Þa cwæð se hælend;
 164.122. Bringað of ðam fixum þe ge nu gelæhton;
 165.123. Petrus ða teah þæt net to lande. mid micclum fixum
afylled;
 165.124. Þær wæron on oðer healf hund fixa. and ðry
fixas. and þæt net swa ðeah aðolode;
 165.125. Se hælend cwæð to him;
 165.126. Cumað. and gereordiað eow. and he sealde him ða

þæs ne twynode;
 165.130. Gregorius trahtnode ðis godspel. and smeade hwi petrus
oððe heora ænig to ðan eft fenge. þe he ær forlet;
 165.131. Witodlice petrus wæs fiscere ær his gecyrrednysse.
and matheus wæs tollere;
 165.133. Petrus gecyrde eft to his fixnoðe. and matheus næfre

þæt man him ðurh fixnoðe bigleofan tilige. and oðer þæt man
ðurh toll feoh gegadrige;
 165.136. Sume teolunga sind þe man began mæg buton synnum.
sume sind ðe man earfoðlice mæg. oððe nateshwon buton synnum began;
 165.138. Is for ði neod þam ðe to gode anrædlice bihð.
þæt his mod ne geedlæce ða teolunga þe hine fram gode wemað;
 165.140. Petrus hæfde unpleolice teolunge ær his

 165.142. Se hælend stod on ðam strande ða ða he hine

ðam sælicum yðum. swa swa he dyde ær his ðrowunge;
 165.144. Seo sæ getacnað þas andwerdan woruld. and þæt
strand getacnode ða ecan staðolfæstnysse. þæs towerdan lifes;
 165.146. Hi swuncon on ðære sæ. for ðan ðe hi wæron
ða gyt on geswincfullum yðum þises deadlican lifes;
 165.148. Se hælend stod on ðam strande. for ðan ðe he

hi gespræce. nelle ic on sæ eow æteowian. for ðan ðe ic ne eom mid
eow on geswincfullum yðum andwerdre deadlicnysse;
 165.153. Heora fixnoðe gelamp micel earfoðnys. þæt cristes

 165.154. We rædað on cristes bec þæt drihten hete tuwa

 165.156. He het ær his ðrowunge wurpan. ac he ne scyrde on

 166.158. Æfter his æriste he het wurpan þæt net on ða

 166.159. Seo swiðre healf getacnað ða godan. and seo wynstre

 166.160. Se ærra fixnoð ær cristes ðrowunge. getacnode

 166.163. On ðam ærran fixnoðe wurdon swa fela gelæhte
þæt þæt net tobærst. and swa fela manna gebugað to geleafan on
ðissere andwerdan gelaðunge. þæt hi sume eft ut berstað. ðurh

 166.167. On ðam æftran fixnoðe wurdon gelæhte micele and

ætberst ut of ðære toweardan gelaðunge. siððon he to godes rice

 166.173. Petrus teah þæt net to lande. for ðan ðe him is

 166.175. He cwæð;
 166.176. Petrus. Lufast ðu me? He cwæð;
 166.176. Drihten ðu wast ealle ðing. and þu wast þæt ic

 166.178. Drihtnes scep. sindon cristene men;

 166.184. Þæt getel ðæra fixa. hæfð maran getacnunge.

 167.196. Beobread is on twam ðingum. on weaxe. and on hunie;

 169.1. <foreign>KALENDAS MAI. APOSTOLORUM PHILIPPI. ET IACOBI.</foreign> PHILIPPUS.
se godes apostol ðe we on ðisum dæge wurðiað. bodade godspel

Invention of the Cross: Godden 1979, 174-6.



 174.1. <foreign>V.NONAS.MAI. INUENTIO SANCTAE CRUCIS.</foreign> Men ða leofostan
nu todæg we wurðiað þære halgan rode gemynd. ðe ure drihten on
ðrowode. for ðan ðe heo wæs geswutelod on ðisum dæge mannum;
 174.3. Hieronimus se wisa mæssepreost awrat on ðære bec
ðe we hatað <foreign>ecclesiastica historia</foreign>. þæt sum romanisc casere wæs
Constantinus gehaten. se wæs eawfæst on ðeawum. and arfæst on
dædum. cristenra manna fultumigend. and næs ðeah gyt gefullod;
 174.7. Þa wann him ongean. sum wælhreow heretoga. Maxentius
gehaten. mid micclum ðrymme. wolde him benæman. his lifes and his rices;
 174.10. Þa ferde se casere. swiðe carful mid fyrde. and gelome
beheold wið heofonas weard. biddende georne godcundne fultum;
 174.11. Ða geseah he on swefne. on ðam scinendan eastdæle.
drihtnes rodetacn. deorwurðlice scinan. and him cwædon ða to gesewenlice
englas;
 174.14. Þu casere constantine. mid ðisum tacne oferswið
ðinne wiðerwinnan. and he awoc ða bliðe. for ðære gesihðe. and
for ðan behatenan sige. and mearcode him on heafde halig rodetacn. and on his
guðfanan gode to wurðmynte;
 174.17. He het eac smiðian of smætum golde. ane lytle rode.
ða he lædde on his swiðran. biddende georne þone ælmihtigan
wealdend. þæt seo swiðra ne wurde. æfre gewemmed. ðurh readum
blode. romaniscre leode. ðam ðe he geuðe. ælcere dugeðe. gif
maxentius ana. him wolde abugan. ðe ða burh geheold. mid hetelum
geðance;
 174.23. Þa het maxentius. mid micclum swicdome. oferbricgian ða

 180.1. <foreign>FERIA SECUNDA. LETANIA MAIORE.</foreign> Læwede menn behofiað.
þæt him lareowas secgon. ða godspellican lare. ðe hi on bocum
leornodon. þæt men for nytennysse misfaran ne scoldon;
 180.3. Ure drihten sæde. to sumum lareowe. ða ða he hine
axode. be ðam hehstan bebode. Lufa ðinne drihten mid ealre ðinre heortan.
and mid eallum mode. þis is þæt mæste bebod;
 180.6. Is eft oðer bebod. ðisum swiðe gelic. Lufa ðinne
nextan. swa swa ðe sylfne. þas twa bebodu. belucað ealle bec;
 180.8. Nis us nan gemet on ðam ærran bebode. for ðan ðe we

and ðurh cristendom. us cyððe to habbað;

ðe sind gelogode. on langsumum cwydum;

 184.134. Iacobus se apostol be ðan ylcan sæde;

 184.142. Wa ðam ðe talað mid treowleasum mode yfel to gode.

 184.151. And rihtwisra siðfæt is swilce scinende leoht. and

 185.153. Se apostol awrat be eawfæstum werum;
 185.153. Lufiað ge weras eowere wif on æwe. ne beo ge bitere

 185.157. Wif sceolon gehyrsumian. heora werum gedafenlice. and hi

 185.166. Twæming is alyfed. þam ðe lufiað swiðor. ða

 185.168. Eac hi magon on sinscipe. hi sylfe bedyglian. and hæmed

 185.170. God soðlice fordemð þa dyrnan forliras. and ða

 185.172. Ne gesceop se ælmihtiga god. men for galnysse. ac

 185.175. God forgeaf gescead. menniscum gesceafte. and

 185.182. Ne nan wer ne sceal. his wife genealæcan. siððan

 186.186. Se ðeoda lareow. lærde manna bearn. þæt hi

 186.198. Se wisdom is halig. and hine sylfne ætbret. fram modes

 188.252. Gif we untrume beoð. uton beon geðyldige. swa swa se

 188.255. Gif us ungelimpas. on æhtum getimiað. þonne sceole

 188.257. God forgeaf ða æhta. and god hi eft ætbræd. Sy

 188.259. Menigfealde beoð. þæs metodan drihtnes. egsan and

 188.262. Se ælmihtiga god. cyð his godnysse us. and hwilon us
