 188.263. Nære nan tihting. gif he us ne olæhte;
 188.264. Nære nan rihting. gif he us ne ðreade;
 188.264. Se ðe god herian wille. on his healicum weldædum.
herige eac on edleane. and on egeslicum swinglum;
 188.266. Manega tacna. and micele yrmða. becumað on
middanearde. ofer manna bearnum. maran and maran. oð þam gemænan ende;
 188.268. Se ðe æfre ðurhwunað. on anrædum geleafan. se
bið gehealden. swa se hælend sæde;
 188.271. He het us eac beon. on gebedum wacole. gelomlice us
biddende. mid bealdum geleafan. þæt we moton forfleon. ða toweardan

 188.274. Micel magon gebedu. mannum fremian. be ðam spræc se

 189.277. Helias se witega wæs us mannum gelic. ðrowiendlic swa

 189.280. He abæd eft siððan. æt ðam soðan gode.

 189.281. Gif hwilc man gebigð oðerne fram gedwylde. he alyst

 189.283. Þis is sceortlice gesæd. uton secgan forð gyt;
 189.285. Se ðeoda lareow sæde mancynne. þæt dyrne

on rodorlicere heofonan;
 189.288. Eac swylce drymen þe mid dydrunge farað. and feondlice

 189.290. Oft unmen secgað þæt hi unsynnige beon. ðeah ðe

 189.294. Nis nan man fæstende þe underfehð mid muðe

 190.1. <foreign> ITEM IN LETANIA MAIORE. FERIA TERTIA.</foreign> Men ða leofostan
Paulus se apostol ealra ðeoda lareow awrat be him sylfum þæt he wære
gelædd up to heofonum. oð þæt he becom to ðære ðriddan
heofonan. and he wæs gelæd to neorxna wange. and þær ða gastlican
dygelnysse gehyrde and geseah. ac he ne cydde na eorðlicum mannum ða ða
he ongean com. hwæt he gehyrde. oððe gesawe. ðisum wordum writende be
him sylfum;
 190.7. <foreign> Scio hominem in christo ante annos quattuor decim. Raptum
usque ad tertium celum; Et iterum; Quoniam raptus est in paradisum. Et audiuit
archana uerba. que non licet homini loqui;</foreign> Þæt is on englisc. Ic wat
ðone mann on criste. þe wæs gegripen nu for feowertyne gearum. and
gelæd oð ða þriddan heofenan. and eft he wæs gelæd to neorxna
wange. and ðær gehyrde ða digelan word þe nan eorðlic mann sprecan
ne mot;
 190.14. Humeta rædað sume men. ða leasan gesetnysse. ðe hi
hatað paulus gesihðe. nu he sylf sæde. þæt he ða digelan word
gehyrde. þe nan eorðlic mann sprecan ne mot;
 190.16. We wyllað nu eow gereccan oðres mannes gesihðe. ðe
unleas is. nu se apostol paulus his gesihðe mannum ameldian ne moste;
 190.19. Sum scyttisc preost wæs gehaten FURSEUS. æðelboren
for worulde. arwurðes lifes. and gelyfed swiðe;

dæghwomlice ðeonde;

 191.24. Æfter ðisum arærde mynster. and þæt mid

 191.36. Ða gehyrde he eft oðerne sang. swilce uncuðne.

 191.39. Hwæt ða an engel of ðam upplicum weredum bebead

gelædan sceoldon. to ðan lichaman þe heo of gelæd wæs;
 191.41. Þa cwæð se engel him to. ðe him on ða swiðran
hand fleah;
 191.42. Ðu scealt eft ðinne lichaman underfon. and agyfan gode
þinre carfulnysse weorc. and fremmincge;
 191.44. Þa cwæð se halga furseus. þæt he nolde his

 191.45. Se engel him andwyrde;
 191.46. Æfter ðinre carfulnysse godre fremmincge. we cumað

 191.47. Hi ða sungon. and seo sawul ne mihte undergitan. hu heo

 199.1. <foreign> ALIA VISIO</foreign> BEDA ure lareow awrat on ðære bec þe is
gehaten historia anglorum. be sumes mannes æriste. on ðisum iglande.
þisum wordum reccende;
 199.3. On ðam timan wæs sum ðegen drihthelm gehaten on
norðhymera lande bylewite on andgyte. gemetegod on þeawum. eawfæst on
life. and his hiwrædene to þam ylcan gewissode;
 199.6. Ða wearð he geuntrumod. and to ende gebroht;
 199.7. He ða gewat on æfnunge and his lic læg ealle þa
niht inne beset. ac he aras of deaðe on ærnemerigen;
 199.8. Ða licmen ða ealle mid fyrhte fornumene flugon aweg
buton þam wife anum. þe hine swiðost lufode. belaf ðær afyrht;

 199.11. Ne beo ðu afæred. for þam þe ic aras of deaðe;
 199.11. Me is alyfed eft to libbenne mid mannum. na swa þeah
swylcum life. swa ic ær leofode;
 199.13. He aras þærrihte. and eode to cyrcan and þurhwunode
on gebedum ealne þone merigen;
 199.14. Dælde syððan his æhta on þreo. ænne dæl

 200.24. Ða become wyt to anre dene seo wæs ormætlice deop

 200.37. Efne þa færlice æteowdon gelomlæcende ligas

 200.39. Ic þa beheold þone ormætan lig. þe of þære

 200.44. Ða ða ic þær lange stod. ormod and ungewiss mines

 200.47. Sum ðæra wæs preost. sum læwede man. sum wimman.

 200.49. Betwux ðam ascuton þa awyrigedan gastas sume of

 201.55. Efne þa færlice æteowde min latteow swa swa

 201.57. Se engel me lædde þærrihte to eastdæle on

 201.61. Binnan þam weallum wæron ungerime meniu hwittra manna

 201.63. Ic ða betwux þam werodum þam engle fyligende. þohte

 201.65. He lædde me ða gyt furðor. and ic geseah þær

 201.68. Hwæt ða min latteow lædde me ongean to þære

wæron þe ic gesewen hæfde;
 201.70. Ic cwæð þæt ic nyste;
 201.70. He andwyrde and cwæð;
 201.71. Seo mycele byrnende dene þe þu ærest gesawe is

worulde. and becumað on domes dæge ealle to heofonan rice;
 201.77. Eac hi sume þurh freonda fultum and ælmysdæda. and

 201.80. Witodlice seo swearte nywelnyss þe ðu gesawe mid þam
ormætum þeostrum and fulum stence. seo is helle muð. and se ðe æne
þæron befylð. ne wyrð he næfre on ecnysse ðanon alysed;
 202.83. Þeos wynsume and ðeos blostmbære stow. is ðæra
sawla wunung ðe on godum weorcum geendodon. and swa ðeah næron swa

hi ealle becumað to cristes gesihðe. and myrhðe. æfter ðam micclum
dome;
 202.87. Witodlice ða ðe fulfremede beoð on geðohte. on
worde. on weorce swa hraðe swa hi of worulde gewitað. swa becumað hi to
heofenan rice;
 202.89. Of ðam ðu gesawe þæt micele leoht mid ðam
wynsumum bræðe. and þonon ðu gehyrdest ðone fægeran dream;
 202.91. Þu soðlice. nu ðu to lichaman gecyrst. gif ðu wylt
ðine dæda and ðeawas gerihtlæcan. ðonne underfehst ðu æfter
forðsiðe þas wynsuman wununge. þe ðu nu gesihst;
 202.94. Ða ða ic ðe ana forlet on ðam ðeostrum. to ðy
ic dyde swa. þæt ic wolde witan ymbe ðin fær. hu se ælmihtiga embe
ðe wolde;
 202.96. Þa ða se engel ðus gereht hæfde. ða oflicode me
ðearle þæt ic eft to ðam lichaman sceolde fram ðære stowe
wynsumnysse. and ðæra halgena geferrædene. ne dorste ic swa ðeah nan
ðing wiðcweðan;
 202.99. Æfter ðisum ic wearð gebroht. and geedcucod betwux
mannum;
 202.101. Drihtelm wunode ða on ðæs mynstres digelnysse. oð
his lifes ende stiðlice drohtnigende;
 202.102. He eode gelome on winterlicum cyle to ðære ea. and
stod on his gebedum on ðam wætere. hwilon to his gyrdle. hwilon to his
swuran;
 202.104. Eode him siððan mid ðam ylcum claðum. oð
þæt hi on his lichaman wearmodon and adruwodon;
 202.106. Ða ða hine man axode hu he mihte ðone micclan cyle
forberan. he andwyrde;
 202.107. Maran cyle ic geseah. and wyrsan;
 203.108. Eft ða ða hi axodon hu he mihte swa stearce
forhæfednysse healdan. he andwyrde;
 203.109. Stiðran and wyrsan ic geseah;
 203.110. Swa he hit macode on his life. and manega oðre
gerihtlæhte. mid worde and gebysnunge;
 203.112. We rædað gehwær on bocum. þæt oft and gelome
men wurdon of ðisum life gelædde. and eft to life arærde. and hi fela
witnungstowa. and eac halgena wununga gesawon. swa swa gregorius se halga papa
awrat on ðære bec þe is gehaten dialegorum. be anum men þæt his
sawul wearð gelædd of ðisum life. and fela ðing geseah;
 203.117. Þa betwux ðam oðrum geseah he hwær man bytlode
ane gebytlu eal mid smætum golde. and ða wyrhtan worhton ða gebytlu on
ðam sæternes dæge. and wæs ða fornean geendod;
 203.120. He befran ða hwam ða gebytlu gemynte wæron. swa
mærlice getimbrode;
 203.121. Him wæs gesæd. þæt hi wæron gemynte anum
sutere on romana byrig. and hine eac namode;
 203.123. Æfter ðisum aras se deada. and axode geornlice ymbe
ðone sutere hu he geworht wære. on woruldlicere drohtnunge. and man afunde
ða þæt his gewuna wæs. þæt he worhte his weorc to seofon nihtum.
and sealde on ðone sæternesdæg. Nam ða of his cræfte him
bigleofan. and dælde ðone ofereacan þearfum mid estfullum mode. and
wæron for ði þa gebytlu on ðam dæge swiðost geworhte. ðe he
ða ælmessan gewunelice dælde;
 203.130. Micel is godes mildheortnys ofer mancynne. þam ðe wel
willað;
 203.131. We on ðisum life magon helpan þam forðfarenum ðe
on witnunge beoð. and we magon us sylfe betwux us on life ælc oðrum
fultumian to ðam upplican life. gif we ðæs cepað. and ða ðe
fulfremede wæron and to godes rice becomon. magon fultumian ægðer ge
us. ge ðam forðfarenum þe on witnunge sind. gif hi mid ealle forscyldgode
ne beoð;
 203.136. Sy wuldor and lof. ðam welwillendum gode. A. on ecnysse.

 204.138. <foreign> HORTATORIUS SERMO DE EFFICACIA SANCTAE MISSAE.</foreign> We
rædað gehwær on halgum gewritum þæt seo halige mæsse micclum
fremige. ægðer ge ðam lybbendum. ge ðam forðfarenum. swa swa Beda se
snotera lareow awrat on historia anglorum be sumum ðegene. þisum andgite
reccende;
 204.143. On ðære tide þe ehfrid norðhymera cyning. and
æðelred myrcena cyning wunnon him betwynan. ða æt sumon gefeohte
wearð an ðegen æþelredes cyninges. mid oðrum cempum afylled. se
wæs Ymma gehaten;
 204.147. Se læg dæg. and niht geswogen. betwux ðam
ofslegenum;
 204.148. He wearð ða gehyrt. and his wunda gewrað. and wolde
him sum gener secan;
 204.149. Hine gelæhton ða sume þæs norðernan folces.
and to heora ealdormen brohton;
 204.150. He ða het hine lacnian. and ða ða he hal wæs het
hine gebindan. ðy læs ðe he fleames cepte;
 204.152. Ac his bendas toburston. swa hraðe swa he gebunden
wæs;
 204.153. He hæfde ænne broðor Tuna gehaten mæssepreost
and abbud. and ða ða he his broðor slege ofaxode. þa ferde he to ðam
wæle his lic secende. and gemette ænne oðerne him swiðe gelicne.
ferode ðone to his mynstre mid arwurðnysse. and gelomlice for his sawle
alysednysse mæssan sang. and þurh ða halgan mæssan toburston þæs
broðor bendas;
 204.159. Þa axode se ealdorman þone hæftling hwæðer he
ðurh drycræft. oððe þurh runstafum his bendas tobræce;
 204.160. He andwyrde and cwæð þæt he ðæs cræftes
nan ðing ne cuðe;
 204.161. Ac ic hæbbe ænne mæssepreost to breðer on minum
eðele. and ic wat þæt he wenð þæt ic ofslagen sy. and gelome for
mine sawle mæssan singð;
 204.164. Witodlice gif ic nu on oðre worulde wære. þær
wurde min sawul fram witum alysed. þurh ða halgan mæssan;
 204.167. Æfter ðisum sealde se ealdorman hine sumum frysan of
lundene;
 204.168. Se frysa hine gewrað eft gelomlice. ac hine ne mihte
nanes cynnes hæftnung gehealdan;
 204.169. Ymbe underntid þa ða se broðor wæs gewunod to
mæssigenne. toburston ða bendas oftost;
 205.171. Se frysa ða. þa ða he hine gehæftan ne mihte. let
hine faran on his truwan æfter ðam feo ðe he him fore gesealde. and he
swa dyde;
 205.173. He ða com to his breðer. and his sið be
endebyrdnysse sæde;
 205.174. Þa tocneowon hi þæt his bendas toburston on
ðære tide þe se broðor mid estfullum mode for his sawle alysednysse
þam ælmihtigum gode þa liflican lac geoffrode;
 205.176. Eac se halga papa Gregorius awrat on ðære bec
dialegorum. hu micclum seo halige mæsse manegum fremode. Seo boc is on
englisc awend. on ðære mæg gehwa be ðison genihtsumlice gehyran. se
ðe hi oferrædan wile;

 211.169. Na hwiltidum se fæder. ne hwiltidum se sunu. ne
hwiltidum se halga gast. ac swa swa hi ðry sind an god untodæledlic. swa
is eac heora hyrdræden untodæledlic ofer us. and ofer eallum gesceaftum.
þe ðære anre godcundnysse hyrsumiað;
 211.172. On middanearde wæs se hælend andwerd his
leorningcnihtum. ða ða he ðus be his gecorenum spræc. and he astah
siððan up to his heofenlican fæder. swa swa he cwæð Ic cume to
ðe;
 211.175. He ferde to heofenum mid þam lichaman þe he on
eorðan gefette. ac he is ðurh his godcundan mihte ægðer ge her. ge
ðær. swa swa he behet ær ðan ðe he upastige;
 211.178. Efne ic beo mid eow eallum dagum. oð gefyllednysse
ðyssere worulde;
 211.180. Mine gebroðra arwurðiað þisne æfen. and ðone
mæran freolsdæg þe eow tomerigen becymð mid soðum geleafan. on
ðam dæge abær se ælmihtiga godes sunu urne lichaman to ðam
heofonlican eðle. þær ðær næfre ær ne becom nan ðing
ðæs gecyndes;
 211.184. Settað eowerne hiht on ðam hælende. and on ðam
wordum. þe he be us eallum spræc. ær ðan ðe he heonon siðode;
 211.186. Nis ðeos lar þe we eow secgað niwan aræred. ac
sind þa ylcan word þe crist mid his agenum muðe spræc. and siððan
onwreah wisum lareowum. þurh gife ðæs halgan gastes;
 212.188. Þeos lar stent on cristes bec mid ledenum gereorde eow
bidigelod. and ealle lareowas þe þæt leden cuðon. sædon godes folc
þa boclican lare. þa ðe hit ne cuðon. hi hit forsuwedon;
 212.191. Nu behofige ge læwede men micelre lare on ðisne
timan. for ðan ðe þeos woruld is micclum geswenct ðurh menigfealdum
gedrefednyssum. and swa near ende þyssere worulde swa mare ehtnys þæs
deofles. and bið unstrengre mennisc ðurh maran tyddernysse;
 212.196. Nu behofige ge ðæs þe swiðor þæs boclican
frofres. þæt ge ðurh ða lare eowere mod awendon of ðisum
wræcfullum life to ðam ecum þe we ymbe sprecað;
 212.198. Se mann ðe bið dreorig. he behofað sumes frofres.
swa eac we wyllað eow þurh ðas boclican lare gefrefrian. for ðan ðe
we geseoð þæt ðeos woruld is on micelre earfoðnysse gelogod;
 212.201. Awurpað for ði hire lufe fram eowerum heortum. and
gewilniað þæs heofonlican rices. ðe us crist on ðisum godspelle
behet. Se ðe leofað and rixað. mid fæder. and ðam halgum gaste. A on
ecnysse. amen:

 217.126. <foreign> ALIA NARRATIO DE EUANGELII TEXTU.</foreign> Mine gebroðru we

 219.192. Se ðe oft gegremað. god þurh leahtrum. and æfre

 219.194. Uton we herian. urne drihten symle. on his micclum

 221.1. <foreign> IN FESTIUITATE SANCTI PETRI APOSTOLI. 3. KALENDAS IULII.</foreign>
LUCAS se godspellere us sæde on ðissere pistol rædinge. þæt
Herodes cyning wolde æfter cristes upstige to heofenum geswencan sume of
ðære gelaðunge. and sende werod ymbe þæt;
 221.4. Þa ofsloh he IACOBUM. IOHANNES broðor þæs
godspelleres. and geseah þæt hit gelicode þam iudeiscum. and wolde
gelæccan Petrum;
 221.6. He ða hine gefeng. and on cwearterne gebrohte. and
betæhte hine on ðam hæfte sixtyne cempum to healdenne;
 221.7. Hit wæs ða eastertid. and for ði he elcode his
sleges;
 221.8. Petrus ða wæs gehæft on ðam cwearterne. and eal
seo geleaffulle gelaðung buton toforlætennysse him fore bædon;
 221.10. Þa læg petrus on ðære nihte þe herodes wolde
hine on merigen forð lædan betwux twam cempum slapende. mid twam
racenteagum getiged. and ða weardas heoldon þæs cwearternes duru swa swa
him geboden wæs;
 221.14. Efne ða com godes engel scinende. and þæt blinde
cweartern eal mid leohte afylde;
 221.15. He cnyste ða petres sidan. and cwæð;
 221.16. Aris hraðe. and ða racenteagan feollon ðærrihte of
petres handum;
 221.17. Se engel cwæð;
 221.17. Begyrd þe. and sceo ðe. and filig me;
 221.18. Petrus ða him filigde. and ðuhte him swilce hit swefen
wære;
 221.19. Hi ða ofereodon ða twa weardsetl. oð þæt hi
becomon to ðam isenan geate. and þæt tosprang þærrihte him
togeanes;
 221.20. Hi eodon forð. oð þæt hi comon to anre wic. and se
engel him gewat fram;
 222.22. Petrus ða beðohte hine sylfne and cwæð;

 231.31. Me ofhreowð þyssere menigu. for ðan ðe hi nu for

 231.32. Ðurh his soðan menniscnysse him ofhreow ðæs folces
meteleast. and þurh his ælmihtigan godcundnysse he hi eaðelice
gereordode;
 231.35. Þæt folc anbidode ðry dagas mid ðam hælende for
hælðe heora untrumra. and nu dæghwomlice godes gecorenan mid geleafan
þære halgan ðrynnysse anbidiað. biddende heora sawla hælðe. and
heora freonda. and awendað heora geðohtas. and word. and weorc to gode;
 231.39. He cwæð gif ic hi forlæte fæstende ham gecyrran.
þonne ateoriað hi be wege;
 231.40. Drihten nolde forlætan ða menigu fæstende him fram
gecyrran. ðy læs ðe hi be wege gewæhte ateorodon. for ðan ðe he
fett ða ðe ðurh dædbote him to bugað. mid bigleofan þære halgan
lare;
 231.43. Gif he hi forlæt buton ðam godspellican fodan on heora
andgite. þonne ateoriað hi be wege ðises andwerdan lifes;
 231.46. Sume hi comon feorran;
 231.46. Sume men sindon on godes gelaðunge ðe on lytlum
ðingum wið god agylton. and siððan mid soðre dædbote to gode
gecyrdon. þyllice ne comon na feorran. for ðan ðe hi ðurh heora
unscæððignysse him gehende wæron;
 231.50. Sume sindon þe æfter fyrnlicum leahtrum. sume æfter
facne and æfter leasgewitnysse. sume æfter stale. sume æfter reaflace.
sume æfter manslihte. to soðre dædbote gecyrrað. and to ðam
wynsuman geoce godes þeowdomes. þas ðyllice cumað feorran. for ðan
ðe swa hi swiðor dwelodon on ðwyrlicum dædum. swa hi swiðor fram
ðam ælmihtigan gode fyrr gewiton;
 232.55. Him bið swa ðeah foda forgifen. for ðan þe ðam
gecyrredum synfullan bið gegearcod mete ðære halgan lare. þæt hi
geedniwian magon on gode ða mægenu. þe hi on leahtrum forluron;
 232.58. Eac ða ðe of iudeiscum folce on crist gelyfdon. comon
him nean to. for ðan ðe hi wæron be him gelærede. þurh ða ealdan
.æ. and ðæra witegena cwydum;
 232.61. Þa soðlice ðe gelyfdon on crist of hæðenum
folce. ða comon him feorran to. for ðan ðe hi næron ðurh nanre
boclicere lare be his geleafan gemanode;
 232.64. Ðas seofon hlafas æt þisum gereorde sind gesette on
geryne ðære niwan gecyðnysse. for ðære seofonfealdan gife þæs
halgan gastes. þe godes gecorenum bið onwrigen. and forgifen;
 232.66. Þa seofonfealdan gife we sædon eow hwilon ær. and
gyt wyllað;
 232.68. An is se halga gast þe sylð gecorenum mannum ða
seofonfealdan gife. þæt is wisdom. and andgit. ræd. and strengð.
ingehyd. and arfæstnys. godes ege is seo seofoðe;
 232.70. Se ðe þissera gifa orhlyte eallunge bið. næfð he
gemanan mid godes gecorenum;
 232.72. Æt ðam ærran gereorde sæt seo menigu uppon ðam
gærse. and on ðisum gereorde nis þæs gærses nan gemynd. ac crist
hi het sittan uppon þære eorðan. for ðan ðe us is beboden ðurh
gewrite ðære ealdan .æ. ofsittan and fortredan ða gewilnigendlican
lustas. and on ðære niwan gecyðnysse us is beboden þæt we sceolon
forlætan þas eorðan. and ða hwilwendlican æhta. gif we willað
fulfremede beon;
 232.78. Þis is swa ðeah feawra manna dæd. þæt hi ealle
eorðlice ðing sæmninga forlætan magon;
 232.79. Se ðe eallunge ða eorðlican gestreon forlætan ne
mæg. forlæte hi swa ðeah mid his geðance swa þæt he ne besette
his hiht on ðam ateorigendlicum spedum. ac on ðam ælmihtigan drihtne.
and fremige hafenleasum mid his hæfene;
 233.83. We rædað on cristes bec. þæt sum welig mann com
to ðan hælende. and feoll to his fotum ðus cweðende;
 233.85. Eala ðu goda lareow. hwæt sceal ic don. þæt ic
hæbbe þæt ece lif;
 233.86. Drihten him andwyrde;
 233.86. Gif ðu wylt becuman to ðan ecan life. heald þas
bebodu. ne ofslih ðu mann. ne unrihthæm ðu. ne stala ðu. ne beo ðu
leas gewita. arwurða þinne fæder. and ðine modor. and lufa ðinne
nextan. swa swa ðe sylfne;
 233.90. Ða andwyrde se rica and cwæð;
 233.90. Ealle ðas ðing ic heold symle. fram minum
geogoðhade;
 233.91. Him andwyrde eft se hælend. and cwæð;
 233.92. Anes ðinges ðe is wana. far nu and beceapa wið feo
ealle ðine æhta. and dæl ðearfum. and þu hæfst ðonne þinne
goldhord on heofenan rice. and cum. and filig me;
 233.95. Þis is swa we ær cwædon feawra manna dæd. and
swa ðeah fulfremeda;
 233.97. Drihten ðancode ær ðan ðe he ða hlafas
tobræce. swuteligende hu micclum he blissað for mancynnes hælu. and us
mid ðan tihte þæt we sceolon him ðancian. swa oft swa we urne lichaman
mid eorðlicum bigleofan. oððe ure sawle mid halwendre lare gereordiað;
 233.101. Se hælend ða tobræc ða hlafas. and sealde his
leornerum. þæt hi hit ðam folce dælan scoldon. for ðan ðe he ða
gastlican lare him forgeaf. þæt hi hi dældon eallum geleaffullum
ðeodum;
 233.104. Be ðam gedale cwæð sum witega. oðrum andgite;
 233.105. <foreign> Paruuli petierunt panem. nec erat qui frangeret eis;</foreign>
Þæt is on urum gereorde. ða lytlan cild bædon him hlafes. ac þær
næs nan mann. ðe þone hlaf him betwynan tobræce;
 233.107. Þæt is. þa ungelæredan sohton ðone bigleofan
godes wordes. ac hi næfdon ðone lareow. ðe him cuðe þa digelan lare
geopenian. and hi to soðfæstnysse wege geweman;
 233.110. Hlaf is ðæs lichaman bigleofa. and lar is ðære
sawle foda;
 233.111. Þa fixas on ðisum gereorde. getacnodon ða lareowas
ðe ða larlican bec awriton. be dihte þæs halgan gastes;
 234.114. Þæt folc æt. and hi wurdon ealle gefyllede;
 234.114. Ða gereordiað of drihtnes hlafum. and beoð
gefyllede. þa ðe his lare gehyrað. and ðurh ða hi sylfe
gerihtlæcað. for ðan þe seo lar bið on ydel gehyred. buton heo beo
to weorcum awend;
 234.117. Þeah ðe þe man bere mete toforan. hwonlice ðe
fremað þæt ðu hine geseo. buton ðu his onbirige;
 234.119. Swa eac ðe ne fremað þeah ðe ðu þa halgan lare
gehyre. buton ðu hi to godum weorcum awende;
 234.121. Of ðære lafe wæron gefyllede seofan spyrtan;
 234.121. Þa seofan spyrtan habbað þa ylcan getacnunge. þe
ða seofon hlafas hæfdon;
 234.123. Spyrte bið swa swa ge sylfe witon of rixum gebroden.
oððe of palmtwygum;
 234.124. Rixe weaxst gewunelice on wæterigum stowum. and se palm
is sigebeacen. and godes gecorenum gedafenað þæt hi heora heortan
wyrtruman on ðam liflicum wylle þæt is god gelogian. þy læs ðe hi
forsearian fram his ecan lufe. and hi sceolon mid sige þæs gastlican
gecampes to him eft gecyrron. þe hi to ðam gefeohte ær asende;
 234.129. Se ðe wile campian ongean ðam reðan deofle mid
fæstum geleafan. and gastlicum wæpnum. he begyt sige ðurh godes fylste.
and se ðe feohtan ne dear mid godes gewæpnunge ongean ðone
ungesewenlican feond. he bið þonne mid ðam deofellicum bendum gewyld. and
to tintregum gelædd;
 234.134. Þær wæron gereordode feower þusend manna;
 234.135. Mid ðan feowerfealdum getele wæs getacnod. seo
feowerfealde cristes boc. þe ða geleaffullan þurh hire lare
dæghwomlice gereordað;
 234.138. Mine gebroðra ne ðince eow to hefigtyme. þæt ge
ðas godspellican lare gehyron;
 234.139. We aweriað us mid þære segene. aweriað eow mid
þære lare fremminge. þæt we ealle habban moton ða mede þe mannes
eage ne geseah. ne eare ne gehyrde. ne on mannes heortan ne astah. þa ðe
god gearcað ðam eallum þe hine lufiað. Se ðe leofað and rixað on
ealra worulda woruld. amen:

 259.134. Uton nu geornlice biddan. þa eadigan marian. þe nu
todæg wæs ahafen. and geuferod. bufon engla ðrymme. þæt heo us
ðingige. to ðam ælmihtigan gode. se ðe leofað and rixað. on ealra
worulda woruld. amen:

 268.1. <foreign> DOMINICA SEXTADECIMA. POST PENTECOSTEN: </foreign> <foreign>Nemo potest
duobus dominis seruire; Et reliqua;</foreign> Drihten cwæð on sumne timan to his
leorningcnihtum. Ne mæg nan man twam hlafordum samod ðeowian. oððe he
ðone ænne hatað. and ðone oðerne lufað. oððe he hine to ðam
anum geðeot. and ðone oþerne forsihð;
 268.5. Ne mage ge soðlice þeowian gode. and eowres feos
gestreone;
 268.6. For ði ic secge eow þæt ge to swiðe ne hogian embe
eowerne bigleofan. and eowerum scrude;
 268.8. Mare is seo sawul and betere. ðonne se mete. and se
lichama betera ðonne ða gewæda;
 268.9. Behealdað þas fugelas. þe ne sawað. ne ne ripað.
ac eower heofenlica fæder hi afet;
 268.10. La hu ne sind ge beteran þonne ða fugelas? Hwilc eower
mæg geican ane elne to his agenum wæstme. and hwi sind ge carfulle be
eowerum scrude;
 268.13. Behealdað þas lilian hu heo weaxst. heo ne swincð. ne
ne spinð;
 268.14. Ic secge eow to soðan. þæt furðon Salomon on
eallum his wuldre. næs swa fægere ymscryd. swa swa lilian beoð;
 268.15. Gif god ða wyrta þe nu todæg beoð. and tomerigen
beoð forswælede. swa fægre frætewað. hu miccle swiðor mæg he
eow scrydan;
 268.18. Eornostlice. ne beo ge hogigende and cweðende. hwæt
sceole we etan. oððe hwæt drincan. oððe mid hwam beo we ymbscrydde.
ealle ðas ðing secað þa hæðenan;
 268.20. Soðlice eower heofenlica fæder wat. þæt ge ealles
ðyses behofiað;
 268.21. Secað ærest godes rice. and his rihtwisnysse. and
ealle ðas ðing eow beoð þærto geeacnode;
 268.24. Beda trahtnode sceortlice ðis godspel. and cwæð
þæt we sceoldon ða hwilwendlican ðing to urum bricum habban. na on ure
heortan lufe healdan;
 269.26. Drihten sylf geopenode hwæt ða twegen hlafordas sind.
mid þam ðe he cwæð. ne mage ge gode ðeowian. and eoweres feos
gestreone;
 269.28. Gehyre se gytsere ðas word se ðe leaslice is cristen
gecweden. gehyre he þæt he ne mæg his gytsunge ðeowian. and criste
samod;
 269.30. Nis swa ðeah gecweden se ðe welan hæfð. ac se ðe
ðeowað ðam welum;
 269.32. Witodlice se ðe is þæra æhta ðeow. he
ðeowað him swa swa hlaforde. and se ðe is þæra æhta hlaford. he
dælð hi swa swa hlaford;
 269.34. Se ðe gytsunge him hæfð to hlaforde. se forsihð
his scyppend. and se ðe his scyppende ðeowað mid lufe swa swa hlaforde.
he forsihð ða feondlican gytsunge. seo ðe is wyrtruma ælces yfeles;
 269.37. Drihten us manode þæt we næron ealles to carfulle
ymbe urne fodan. oððe embe ure gewæda;
 269.38. We sceolon mid geswince us metes tilian. for Adames
ofergægednysse. ac we sceolon ða ymhidignysse fram us awurpan;
 269.40. Betere is seo sawul ðonne se mete. and se lichama betera
ðonne his scrud;
 269.41. Swilce he cwæde. se god ðe eow þa beteran ðing
þæt is sawle and lichaman forgeaf. and eow to men gesceop. se ylca mæg
eow eaðelice foresceawian bigleofan and hleowðe. gif ge his willan
gefremmað;
 269.45. Wite gehwa þæt seo sawul is gast. and be eorðlicum
mettum ne leofað. ac ure hwilwendlice lif bið mid mettum gefercod;
 269.47. For synnum oftihð se ælmihtiga wealdend hwilon mannum
bigleofan. ac swa ðeah se ðe hungre acwelð we gelyfað þæt he
gegæð gode. buton he þe swiðor forscyldgod wære;
 269.50. He cwæð;
 269.50. Behealdað þas fleogendan fugelas ðe ne sawað ne ne
ripað. ac eower heofonlica fæder hi afet;
 269.51. Gif ða wacan fugelas þe nu todæg beoð. and beoð
tomerigen to nahte awende. habbað butan care bigleofan ðurh heora
scyppendes foresceawunge. hu miccle swiðor wile god foresceawian urne
bigleofan we ðe sind ece on urum sawlum. and eac beoð on lichaman
unateorigendlice. æfter ðam gemænelicum æriste;
 269.56. Drihten cwæð. þæt we sind micele rottran þonne
ða fugelas. for ðan þe se man ðe gode geðihð is ealra gesceafta
rotost. and gode leofost. buton ðam heofenlicum englum þe næfre ne
syngodon;
 270.60. Mannes gecynd is micclum gewurðod. þurh þæt þe
se ælmihtiga godes sunu hine sylfne gemedemode þæt gecynd to
underfonne;
 270.62. He cwæð;
 270.62. Hwilc eower mæg geican ane elne to his lenge? Witodlice
ne become we þurh ure foresceawunge to ðam wæstme þe we on urum
lichaman habbað. uton for ði lætan þæs reafes ymhidignysse. to
ðæs dihte þe ðam lichaman ða lenge forgeaf;
 270.67. Wyrta sind eaðelice gesceafta. and ðurh winterlicne
cyle symle forseariað. swa ðeah þæs ælmihtigan cystinys. hi
geglencð mid swa wlitigum blostmum. þæt hi oferstigað. mid heora
fægernysse ealle eorðlice gebleoh;
 270.70. Ne mihte se wuldorfulla Salomon ne nan eorðlic cyning.
swa wlitige deagunge his hræglum begytan. swa swa rose hæfð. and lilie.
and fela oðre wyrta þe wunderlice scinað;
 270.73. Ða wyrta beoð nu todæg blowende on wynsumnysse. and
tomerigen beoð forbærnde;
 270.74. Merigen is geteald on bocum for toweardre tide. þeah ðe
ge ða bysne ne cunnon;
 270.76. Hwi forgifð god þam wacum wyrtum swa fægerne wlite.
and us forbyt þæt we ne sceolon hogian ymbe ure frætuwunge. buton for
ðan ðe we sceolon mid wacnysse. and soðre eadmodnysse. þa heofenlican
fægernysse and frætewunge geearnian. þe adam forleas for ðan ðe he
wolde þurh ðæs deofles tihtinge. mærra beon þonne he gesceapen
wæs;
 270.81. Ne sceole we wuldrian on woruldlicere frætewunge.for
ðan þe seo frætewung. and se lichama sind brosniendlice. swa swa
ðæra wyrta blostm;
 270.85. Drihten bead þæt we næron bysige and carfulle
cweðende. hwæt sceole we etan. oððe hwæt drincan. oððe mid hwam
beon ymscrydde. and cwæð;
 270.87. Witodlice eower heofenlica fæder wat þæt ge
þyssera ðinga behofiað;
 270.88. Secað ærest godes rice. and his rihtwisnysse. and
ealle ðas ðing eow beoð þærto geeacnode;
 270.89. We sceolon ærest secan godes rice. and his rihtwisnysse.
þæt is þæt we sceolon swiðor hogian embe þæt ece lif. þonne
ymbe ðone ateorigendlican bigleofan ðone us geeacnað god ðærto. gif
we ðæs oðres swiðor cepað;
 270.93. Ne cwæð he na þæt us beoð þa ateorigendlican
bigleofan forgyfene. ac þærto geeacnode. for ðan ðe he talað
þæt ece lif to his gife. and ðone eorðlican bigleofan to
hwilwendlicere læne. þæt ece lif us forgifð god. and ðurh his
genihtsumnysse us ðone hwilwendlican fodan ðærtoeacan wyrpð.
swuteligende þæt se foda nis na ure med. ac þæt ece lif is ures
geswinces edlean;
 271.99. Dæghwomlice we sceolon gewilnian þæs ecan lifes.
and ure synna symle wanian. for ðan ðe hi beoð gegaderode to micelre
hypan. gif we hi weaxan lætað. oft of ðinnum renscurum flewð seo
eorðe;
 271.103. Þis godspel ðincð dysegum mannum sellic. ac we hit
secgað swa ðeah. weald ðeah hit sumum men licige;
 271.104. God us gerihtlæce. and to ðam ecan life gelæde.
swa swa he behet ðam ðe hine lufiað;
 271.106. Sy him wuldor and wurðmynt. on ealra worulda woruld.

 273.44. Þa sunderhalgan and ða boceras þe beciddon þæt

us gebysmrian wile;
 277.172. Matheus ða truwigende on his drihtne lede haligreft.
ofer hire heafod. and ofer ealra ðæra mædena heafdu þe hire mid
wæron. mid þyssere bletsunge;
 277.175. God ælmihtig lichamena scyppend. and sawla blawend.
þu ðe nane ylde. ne nænne had ne forsihst. ac ðu eart ealra scyppend.
and gelice alysend. geheald þas ðine þinena wið ælcere
gewemmednysse. and gestranga hi on halgum mægnum. þæt hi mid
wulderbeage eces mægðhades to ðines suna hælendes cristes clænan
geðeodnysse becuman moton;
 278.181. Æfter þissere bletsunge and menigfealdre tihtinge.
mæssode se apostol ðam folce. and hi siððan ham gewendon. ac se
apostol belaf binnon ðam temple. hine gebiddende æt ðam halgan weofode;
 278.184. Þa sende se wælhreowa cyning Irtacus. ænne
cwellere to ðam apostole. þæt he hine acwellan sceolde;
 278.185. Witodlice ða ða he stod on his gebedum astrehtum
handum. þa ðyde se cwellere hine bæftan mid atogenum swurde. and hine
swa gemartirode;
 278.188. Þus wearð se apostol and godspellere matheus on
ðisum dæge gemartirod. and his halige sawul gewende to heofenan rice to
hælende criste;
 278.191. Ða wearð þæt cristene folc swiðe astyred for
ðæs apostoles slege. and woldon forbærnan inne þone arleasan cyning.
ac ða eawfæstan mæssepreostas and diaconas hi earfoðlice gestildon;
 278.194. Þæt halige mæden effigenia aspende hire gold and
hire seolfor. and arærde cyrcan ðam apostole to wurðmynte. and ða lafe
ðearfum dælde;
 278.196. Ða asende se cyning Irtacus æðelborene wif to ðam
mædene effigenian. þæt hi hi forspeonon to his lustum. ac ða ða hi
ne mihton hire mod to ðan gebigan. þa clypode se cyning him drymen to. and
wolde mid drycræfte hi to his willan geweman;
 278.200. Eft ða ða him þyses ne speow. ða het he ontendan
eal hire botl þær heo mid hire mædenum on gebedum ðurhwunode;
 278.202. Hwæt þæt fyr ða barn onbutan þam botle. ac
ðærrihte æteowode godes engel mid ðam apostole matheo. and cwæð
to ðam mædene. Beo ðe anræde effigenia and unforht. ðis fyr sceal
gecyrran to þam þe hit asende;
 278.205. Hwæt ða drihten arærde micelne wind. and se
gelæhte ealne ðone lig. and abær hine to ðæs cyninges botle. swa
þæt him ne belæfde nan ðing unforburnen. and he sylf earfoðlice
þam fyre ætbærst;
 279.209. Him wære swa ðeah betere. þæt he forburne
þonne he ætburste. for ðan ðe his ancenneda sunu sona awedde. and hine
sylfne gestod seo miccle coðu þe læcas hatað <foreign>elefantinus morbus.</foreign> mid
ðære he wæs ofset fram ðam hnolle ufan oð his fotwylmas neoðan;
 279.213. He geseah ða þæt hine ne mihte nan læce
gehælan. and sette his swurdes ord togenes his innoðe. and feol him
onuppon. þæt him ðurheode;
 279.215. Rihtlice swa þæt he him ætforan underfenge. æt
his agenum handum. þæt þæt he don het þam halgan apostole æt his
bæce;
 279.217. Þæt folc ða gesette effigenian broðor Ueor
gehaten to cyninge. se ðe wæs ær gebletsod æt þæs apostoles
handum;
 279.219. Se rixode on ðam cynerice. ðreo and sixtig geara. and
siððan sette his anne sunu to ealdormen. and oðerne to cyninge;
 279.221. Þæt rice wunode siððan on soðum geleafan. oð
þisne andwerdan dæg þam ælmihtigan to lofe. se ðe is ealra leoda
cyning;
 279.223. Þær beoð gefremode fela wundra gelome. ðurh
geearnunge þæs eadigan apostoles. ðurh godes mihte. mannum to frofre;
 279.225. Sy þæs gode lof. a. on ecnysse. Amen:

ÆCHom II, 38

Simon and Jude: Godden 1979, 280-87.



 280.1. <foreign>5. KALENDAS NOUEMBRIS. PASSIO SANCTORUM APOSTOLORUM
SIMONIS. ET IUDE. </foreign> Men ða leofostan we wyllað eow secgan þæra
apostola ðrowunge. ðe we nu todæg wurðiað Simones and Iudan;
 280.2. Hi ferdon ðurh wissunge þæs halgan gastes. to ðam
earde þe is gehaten persida. and þær gemetton ða twegen drymen.
Zaroen. and Arfaxað. þe ætflugon ðam apostole matheo. of ðæra
silhearwena lande. and mid mislicum scyncræfton þæt folc dwelodon;
 280.7. Þa hæfde se cyning Xerxes gecweden gefeoht ongean ða
Indiscan. and sende his ealdorman þam here togeanes;
 280.8. Se ealdorman ða offrode his lac þam hæðenum godum.
ac ða deoflu þe on ðam anlicnyssum sticodon. ne mihton nane andsware
syllan. swa swa heora gewuna wæs;
 280.11. Ða ferdon hi to oðrum deofolgilde. and þær
befrunon hwi heora godas him andwyrdan ne mihton;
 280.13. Þa andwyrde se deofol and cwæð. þæt heora godas
ne mihton him andsware syllan. for ðam twam apostolum ðe þær cumene
wæron;
 280.15. An ðæra hatte simon. oðer iudas;
 280.16. Ðas habbað swa micele mihte fram gode. þæt nan
deofol ne dear on heora andwerdnysse sprecan;
 280.18. Þa het se ealdorman Uuarardah hi him to gelangian. and hi
befran hwæt hi wæron. oððe hwanon hi comon. oþþe hwi hi ðider
comon;
 280.20. Ða apostoli cwædon;
 280.20. We sind ebreisce hælendes cristes ðeowan. and we comon
hider for eowere hæle. þæt ge eowere deofol gild forlæton. and
oncnawan þone soðan god þe on heofonum is;
 280.23. Ða dydon hi þurh þæs ealdormannes bene þæt
ða deoflu spræcon swa swa heora gewuna wæs. and sædon þæt
þær wære micel gefeoht toweard. and on ægðre healfe sceoldon
feallan;
 281.26. Hwæt ða apostoli ða hlogon þæra deofla
leasunga. and se ealdorman cwæð;
 281.27. Me stent ege þysse andsware. and ge hlihað? ða
apostoli him andwyrdon;
 281.28. Ablinne ðin ege. for ðan ðe sib com mid us to
ðissere scyre;
 281.29. Beo ðe stille dæglanges ðinre fyrdinge. and
tomerigen ymbe undern cumað þine ærendracan ðe ðu asendest. and
cyðað þe þæt ða indiscan. willað beon eower gafolgylderas. and
mid ealre sibbe eow underðeodan;
 281.33. Hwæt ða hæðengyldan ða ðe þæt tempel.
and þæra goda gymdon. cwædon to þam ealdormen mid micclum graman;
 281.35. La leof ne scealt ðu ða arwurðan godas ðe ðe
soð secgað forseon. for ðissera leasra manna and ælðeodigra segene.
ac hat hi healdan þy læs ðe hi fleames cepon;
 281.37. Þa andwyrde se heretoga. Ic hate healdan hi. and eow.
oð þæt heora sagu afandod sy. siððan we witon hwilce we sceolon
gearwurðian. hwilce fordeman;
 281.41. Hit wearð ða gelæst on merigen. swa swa ða
apostoli beheton. þæt ða bodan comon fram ðam Indiscum mid gafole. and
mid fulre sibbe;
 281.43. Þa het se ealdorman onælan ormæte ad. and wolde
ða hæðengildan forbærnan ðe ðam apostolum wiðcwædon. ac ða
apostoli begen hi astrehton æt þæs ealdormannes fotum. biddende
þæt hi næron for heora intingan acwealde;
 281.46. We comon for manna hælðe hider. nu sind we geðuhte
þæt we men acwellon;
 281.48. Hi lagon forð astrehte. and dydon dust uppon heora
heafod;
 281.49. Ða cwæð se ealdorman;
 281.49. Wundor me ðincð eower ðingræden and hi sealdon
sceattas minum ðegenum. to ði þæt ic eow cuce forbærnde;
 281.51. Þa apostoli cwædon;
 281.51. Þis is ures lareowes cristes regol;
 281.52. Oðre men hatiað heora fynd. and yfel mid yfele
forgyldað;
 281.53. We soðlice lufiað ure fynd. and þam teala doð þe
us hatiað;
 281.54. Ða andwyrde se ealdorman;
 281.54. Geðafiað huru þæt man ealle heora æhta eow
sylle. and he het ða mid þam worde sceawian heora æhta;
 281.56. Þa wurdon ðær getealde an hund ðæra
hæðengylda þe ðæs temples gymdon. and nan man ne mihte heora
æhta geriman. on golde and on seolfre. on orfe and on reafe;
 281.59. Ða bead se ealdorman ða æhta þam apostolum. ac hi
wiðsocon. ðus cweðende;
 281.60. Nis us alyfed æhta to hæbbenne ofer eorðan. for
ðan ðe ure æhta sind ece on heofonum þær ðær undeadlicnys
ricsað;
 281.62. Se ealdorman cwæð;
 281.62. Underfoð sum ðing for ðan ðe ge sind ælðeodige
and ðearfan;
 281.63. Þa apostoli andwyrdon;
 282.64. Ne sind we na ðearfan. for ðan ðe we habbað
heofenlice welan;
 282.65. Ac gif ðu wilt þæt ðis feoh becume to ðinre
sawle ðearfe. todæl hit ðonne ðearfum. and wanhalum. wydewum and
steopbearnum. and hafenleasum gafelgyldrum. we soðlice ne behofiað
þyssera eorðlicera æhta. ne hi ne magon ðam sweltendan men heonon
folgian;
 282.70. Se ealdorman ða þa apostolas mid him to ðam cyninge
Xerxes gelædde. and tealde him be endebyrdnysse hu hit gedon wæs;
 282.72. Þa wæron ða foresædan drymen ðær Zaroes. and
arfaxað. and yfele spræcon be ðam apostolum. and bædon þæt hi
moston heora mihte cyðan on sumum mannum. þæt se cyng gesawe hwæðer
hi soðfæste wæron;
 282.75. Þa het se cyning clypian him to unbesorge men. and het hi
habban geflit wið ða drymen;
 282.77. And hi dydon ða mid deofles cræfte þæt hi ealle
wurdon adumbode. and cwædon to ðam cyninge;
 282.78. Þæt ðu wite þæt we sind of ðæra goda
getele. we lætað hi nu sprecan. ac we gedoð þæt hi gan ne magon;
 282.80. Þa ða hi ðis gedon hæfdon. ða cwædon hi eft;
 282.81. We forgifað him nu gang. ac we doð þæt hi openum
eagum naht ne geseoð;
 282.82. Ða ða hi ðis dydon. þa forhtode ðæs cynges
heorte. and ðæs ealdormannes. and hyra frynd sædon þæt hi ne
scoldon ða drymen forseon. þi læs ðe hi þas lefunge on heora limum
gebrohton;
 282.86. Þa gebrohte se ealdorman ða alefedan men micclum
gedrehte to ðam apostolum. and cwæð;
 282.87. Ic hæbbe afunden þa menn þæt eow wyllað
læran and tæcan. hu ge magon þæra drymanna scincræft
oferswiðan. swa þæt hi gescynde heonon fleoð;
 282.89. Ða astrehton hi ealle hi æt his fotum biddende
þæt he þæt behat mid weorcum gefylde;
 282.91. Þa ongunnon ða apostoli hi to lærenne. and to
secgenne hu adam for his ofergægednysse. wearð on deofles ðeowdome
gebroht. and þæt se mildheorta god swa ðeah forgeaf þam mannum ðe
hine ænne wurðiað þæt se deofol him derian ne mæg. nu sind ge
ðurh deofl bepæhte þæt ge gelyfað on ydelum anlicnyssum. and
forlætað eowerne scyppend þe eow geworhte. and he forlæt eow. and se
deofol eow tawode þurh his drymen swa swa he wolde. for ðan ðe ge
ungebletsode wæron;
 282.99. Behatað nu þæt ge wyllað þam deofolgyldum
wiðsacan. and ðone soðan god þe eow gesceop wurðian. and to him eow
gebiddan. and we mearciað eowere foranheafdu mid cristes rodetacne. and
soðlice hi ne magon siððan eow oferswyðan;
 283.103. Ða astrehton hi ealle hi æt ðæra apostola fotum.
þus cweðende;
 283.104. Doð huru þæt hi ne magon ure tungan gehreman. ne us
alefian. and beo siððan godes grama ofer us. gif we æfre to hæðenum
gylde bugað;
 283.106. Þa apostoli ða æfter ðisum behate gebletsodon
þa gedrehtan men. and hi gode betæhton. and se ealdorman hi gelædde to
ðam drymannum;
 283.109. Ða woldon hi don swa swa hi ær dydon. ac hi ne
mihton;
 283.110. Þa clypode an ðæra manna Zebeus gehaten. and
cwæð to ðam cyninge;
 283.111. Eala ðu cyning. þas fulan wuhta ðu scoldest awurpan
of ðinum rice. ðylæs ðe hi mid heora fylðe us ealle besmiton;
 283.113. Hi habbað mid him awyriedne engel. mancynnes feond. and
se hæfð andweald on ðam mannum ðe heora scyppend forseoð. and to
deofolgyldum bugað;
 283.115. Godes apostolas us bletsodon mid cristes rodetacne. and
efne we nu ðurh þa bletsunge ðas drymen gebysmriað;
 283.117. Hi ealle cwædon. Gif ge aht magon. doð nu swa swa ge
gyrstondæg dydon;
 283.118. Þa drymen ða wurdon geyrsode. and gemacodon ðurh
heora scincræft þæt him comon to creopende fela næddran;
 283.120. Ða cwædon hi ealle to ðam cyninge;
 283.121. La leof hat clypigan ða godes apostolas;
 283.122. Hi wurdon ða hrædlice gecigde. and gemetton ðæra
drymanna basingas mid næddrum afyllede;
 283.123. Þa apostoli ða heton ða næddran on cristes naman.
þæt hi scoldon ða drymen toslitan. and hi ðærrihte ongunnon
toceowenne heora lichaman swa þæt hi ðotorodon swilce oðre wulfas;
 283.126. Ða cwæð se cyning xerxes. to ðam apostolum;
 283.127. Lætað hi abitan oð deað;
 283.127. Hi andwyrdon;
 283.128. We sind asende to gecigenne mancynn fram deaðe to life.
na to scufenne fram life to deaðe;
 283.129. Þa cwædon ða apostoli to ðam næddrum;
 283.130. On cristes naman gewitað to eowere wununge. and ateoð
þæt atter ut of ðisum dryum. þæt ge him on aguton;
 283.132. Ða ongunnon ealle ða næddran toceowenne heora
flæsc. and heora blod sucan. þæt hi þæt attor ut atugon;
 283.134. Þa ða þa næddran aweg tugon. þa cwædon ða
apostoli to ðam drymannum;
 283.135. Ge arleasan. gehyrað þæt halige gewrit ðe þus
cweð;
 283.136. Se ðe oðerne wyle beswican. ærest he beswicð hine
sylfne;
 283.137. Ðyssera næddrena geslit eow mihte to deaðe
gebringan. oþþe langlice geswencan. ac nu binnon ðrim dagum ge beoð
þyssera wunda gehælede. þæt ge huru eower arleasnysse geswicon.
ðonne ge godes godnysse on eow sylfum afandiað;
 284.141. Þas ðry dagas ge beoð gedrehte þæt eow
ofðince eower gedwyld;
 284.142. Ða heton ða apostoli hi aberan to heora inne. and hi
ðrim dagum ne onbirigdon ætes. ne wætes. ac symle hrymdon. and
grimetedon. for ðam ormætum tintregum;
 284.144. Æfter ðan ðriddan dæge þa þa hi fornean
wæron adydde. ða comon begen þa apostoli. and cwædon him to;
 284.146. Nele se ælmihtiga god habban genydne þeowdom.
arisað nu hale. and habbað eow agenne cyre. to gecyrrenne fram yfele to
gode. gif ge wyllað;
 284.148. Hi ða þurhwunodon on heora geleafleaste. and
ætflugon þam apostolum swa swa hi ær ætflugon þam godspellere
matheo. fram ðæra silhearwena rice;
 284.152. Þa bæd se cyning Xerxes. and his ealdorman uuarardah
ða apostolas þæt hi ðær wunian sceoldon. and hi ða wunodon binnon
ðære scire Babilonia. wyrcende miccle wundra. onlihtende ða blindan. and
deafum hlyst forgeafon. reoflige geclænsodon. and deoflu fram wittseocum
mannum afligdon;
 284.156. Hi hæfdon him mid fela leorningcnihta. of ðam hi
hadodon mæssepreostas. and diaconas. and fela cyrcan arærdon;
 284.158. Þa wearð an ðæra diacona eufrosinus betogen
forligres. ac ða apostoli heton lædan forð þone diacon. and þæt
cild forð beran þe ðær acenned wæs. and wæs ða anre nihte
eald;
 284.161. Ða apostoli cwædon to ðam cilde;
 284.162. We halsiað þe on naman hælendes cristes. þæt
ðu sprece and secge gif ðes diacon þas unrihtwisnysse gefremode;
 284.164. Hwæt þæt cild ða getingelice spræc. and
cwæð;
 284.165. Þes diacon is halig wer and clæne. and næfre his
lichaman ne besmat;
 284.166. Ða bædon ða magas þæt hi sceoldon befrinan hwa
þæt forligr gefremode;
 284.167. Þa apostoli andwyrdon;
 284.167. Us gedafenað þæt we ða unscæððigan alyson.
and us ne gebyrað to ameldigenne ða scyldigan;
 284.170. Æfter ðison gelamp þæt ðæs cyninges mæg
Nicanor wearð gescoten mid anre fla on ðam cneowe æt sumon gefeohte. swa
þæt nan man hi ne mihte of ðam bane ateon. ac se eadiga apostol Simon on
cristes naman hi ut adyde. swa hraðe swa he hi hrepode. and seo wund wearð
ðærrihte gehæled. swa þæt ðær nan dolhswaðu næs gesyne;
 284.175. Eac siððan gelamp þæt twa hreðe deor þe sind
tigres gehatene þær urnon and abiton swa hwæt swa hi gemetton;
 285.177. Þa fleah þæt folc eal to ðam apostolum. and hi
ðurh godes mihte ða deor swa getemedon. þæt hi him fyligdon to heora
inne. and mid him unscæððige wunodon;
 285.180. Ða cwædon ða apostoli to ðam folce. þas reðan
deor gehyrsumiað godes mihte. and sind eow to gewitnysse. þæt he is
ælmihtig god se ðe eow gesceop. and sylð eow renas of heofenum. and hlaf
of eorðan. win and ele of treowum. and eac oðre wæstmas;
 285.184. Nu mynegiað þas deor eow mid sumon gemete þæt ge
nænne oðerne ne wurðion eow to gode. buton ðone ðe we bodiað.
þurh ðæs naman sind þas reðan tigres betwux eow swa tame swa scep;
 285.187. We sceolon nu faran to oðrum scirum. godspel bodigende.
and ðone soðan geleafan;
 285.189. Þæt folc ða weop. and bædon þæt hi. ðanon
ne gewendon. and hi ða be heora bene feowertyne monað þær wunodon. and
þæt folc gefullodon. and fela wundra geworhton. and eac ða deadan to
life arærdon;
 285.192. And gesetton ðær ænne biscop Abdias gehaten. se
ðe mid him ferde fram Iudea lande. and se ylca geseah þone hælend mid
his eagum;
 285.194. Þæt land wearð ða to geleafan awend. and heora
burh mid cyrcan afylled. and ða apostoli ferdon swa swa him godes gast
gewissode to ðam twelf scirum on ðam earde persida. and ðær feowertyne
gear on heora burgum godes geleafan bododon. mid micclum tacnum;
 285.199. Þa foresædan drymen Zaroes. and arfaxað. ferdon him
ætforan. mid heora scincræfte. þæt folc dweliende;
 285.200. Swa lange hi wunodon on gehwilcere byrig. oð þæt hi
geaxodon þa apostolas towearde;
 285.202. Hi becomon ða æt nextan to anre heafodbyrig. Suanir
gehaten;
 285.203. On ðam wæs micel tempel. and hundseofontig
hæðengyldan þe ðæs temples begymdon. and heora ælcum gesceat an
pund goldes. swa oft swa man þære sunnan feorme worhte;
 285.206. Þa cwædon ðas drymen to þæs temples
hæðengildum;
 285.207. Her cumað to eow niwlice twegen ebreisce men. ða sind
ealra goda fynd. hi tæcað eow oðerne geleafan. and to oðrum gode
gewemað. þonne beo ge eower æhta bedælede. and to nahte forsewene;
 285.210. Forsprecað hi foran to ðisum folce. þæt swa
hraðe swa hi becumað to ðyssere byrig. gehæftað hi and doð
þæt hi to eowerum godum bugon. oððe ge sceolon sylfe forfaran;
 285.213. Hit gelamp ða þæt ða apostoli becomon to
þære foresædan byrig. Suanir. and wunodon æt sumes mannes huse. se
wæs Semmeus gehaten;
 286.215. Efne ða on ærnemerigen comon ða hæðengildan
mid ungerimum folce. and atugon ða apostolas mid þam semmege to þære
sunnan temple;
 286.217. Þa ongunnon ða deoflu grimetian and cweðan;
 286.218. Hwi come ge to us ðæs lifigendan godes apostolas. for
eowerum tocyme we sind mid ligum forswælede;
 286.220. Ða stod þære sunnan cræt mid feower horsum of
golde agoten. on ane healfe þæs temples. on oðre healfe stod ðæs
monan cræt of seolfre agoten. and ða oxan ðær to;
 286.222. Þa ongunnon ða hæðengildan neadian ða
apostolas. þæt hi sceoldon hi gebiddan to ðære sunnan anlicnysse. and
to þæs monan. and þa twegen foresædan drymen ðær oferstodon;
 286.225. Ða betwux ðisum gesawon ða apostolas drihten on
heofenum. betwux his engla ðrymme. hi clypigende. and sum engel him
æteowode and cwæð;
 286.227. Beoð gehyrte and geceosað eow oððe ðyssera
hæðenra færlican deað. oþþe ge mid bylde godes gewinnes efstað
to wulderbeage eoweres martirdomes;
 286.230. Þa apostoli andwyrdon ðam engle ðe him to spræc;
 286.231. Us is to biddenne drihtnes mildheortnysse. þæt he
ðisum mannum miltsige. and us fultumige. þæt we moton to ðam
wulderbeage becuman;
 286.233. Ðas word ne gehyrde nan man buton ða apostoli sylfe.
and se engel ðe him to spræc;
 286.235. Þa ongunnon ða hæðengildan hi þearle
ðreatian. þæt hi scoldon hi gebiddan to þære sunnan anlicnysse. and
þæs monan;
 286.237. Þa apostoli bædon stilnysse. and cwædon;
 286.237. Gehyrað ealle. we witon þæt sunne and mona sind
godes gesceafta. and on heofenum scinende his hæsum gehyrsumiað;
 286.239. We bebeodað þam deoflum þe on ðisum anlicnyssum
sticiað þæt hi ut faron. and ða anlicnysse tocwyson. þæt ge magon
swa tocnawan. þæt sunne and mona. ne sind on ðisum anlicnyssum. ac sind
mid deoflum afyllede;
 286.243. Hi ða ealle micclum wundrodon þyssera worda. and se
apostol simon cwæð to þære sunnan anlicnysse;
 286.245. Þu wyresta deofol ðises folces bepæcend. Ic ðe
bebeode gewit of ðære leasan anlicnysse. and tobryt hi eall and hire
cræt samod;
 286.247. Iudas se apostol cwæð ealswa to þæs monan
anlicnysse. and ðærrihte eodon ut on ealles ðæs folces gesihðe.
twegen blace silhearwan of ðam anlicnyssum. and hi tobræcon. and mid
wanunge aweg flugon;
 286.250. Hwæt ða þa hæðengildan scuton endemes to ðam
halgum apostolum. and hi acwealdon;
 287.251. Ða eadigan apostoli ðancodon gode mid bliðum mode.
þæt hi moston for his naman ðrowian;
 287.253. Semmeus eac ðe hi ær underfeng wearð mid him
gemartirod. for ðan ðe he nolde þam deofolgyldum his lac offrian;
 287.255. On ðære tide wæs micel smyltnys on ðære
upplican lyfte. ac god asende færlice swa micel liget. þæt þæt
hæðene templ tobærst fram ufweardan. oð neoðeweardan. and ða
twegen drymen wurdon mid þam lige forswælede. and awende to cola
gelicnyssum;
 287.260. Æfter ðrim monðum ðises asende se cyning xerxes.
and bereafode ealle ða hæðengildan heora æhta. and ðæra apostola
lic mid micclum wurðmynte to his byrig gebrohte;
 287.262. He arærde ða on ðære ylcan byrig mære cyrcan.
ofer ðæra apostola lic him to wurðmynte;
 287.264. Seo cyrce wæs eahta hyrnede. an hund fota and twentig
fota heah. six hund fota. and feowertig.heo wæs ymbeganges. eal of
fiðerscitum marmstanum geworht;
 287.266. Ealle ðas getimbrunge geendode se cyning xerxes binnon
ðrim gearum. and beworhte ða bigelsas mid gyldenum læfrum. and worhte
ane ðruh on hwitum seolfre to þæra apostola lice. and gesette hi on
middan þam temple mid micelre arwurðnysse;
 287.271. On ðisum dæge wearð seo cyrce gehalgod. þam godes
apostolum to wurðmynte;
 287.272. On ðære stowe begytað þa ðe on god gelyfað
his weldæda þurh ðæra apostola ðingunge þe on ðisum dæge for
his naman ðrowodon;
 287.275. Þas race awrat se biscop Abdias. se ðe þam apostolum
folgode fram Iudea lande;
 287.276. He awrat hi on ebreiscum gereorde. and his leorningcniht
eutropus hi awende eft on greciscum gereorde. and africanus hi awrat eft on tyn
bocum. ac us genihtsumað on urum gereorde þas scortan race to getrymminge
urum geleafan;
 287.280. Uton nu biddan þas eadigan apostolas Simon and Iudan.
þæt hi us abiddon godes miltsunge. se ðe leofað and rixað on ealra
worulda woruld. amen:

END_TEXT

ÆCHom II, 39.1

Martin: Godden 1979, 288-97.



 288.1. <foreign> 3. IDUS NOUEMBRIS. DEPOSITIO SANCTI MARTINI EPISCOPI: </foreign>
MARTINUS se wuldorfulla godes andetere wæs acenned of æþelborenum
magum. on ðam earde þe is gehaten Pannonia. on þære byrig ðe is
gecweden Sabaria. and he wæs siððan afed on Italia. þæt is Romana
rice;
 288.4. His fæder wæs æðelboren. ærest cempa. and
siððan cempena ealdor. on hæðenscipe wunigende. and his gemæcca
samod;
 288.6. Ða gestryndon hi þone gecorenan godes cempan martinum.
and he mærlice geðeah;
 288.7. Witodlice ða ða he tyn wyntre on ylde wæs. ða arn
he to cyrcan buton his freonda foresceawunge fulluhtes biddende. and he wearð
þa gecristnod. and on wunderlicum gemete gecyrred. smeagende symle ymbe godes
cyrcan. and hu he on westene wunian mihte;
 288.12. Þa asprang þæs caseres geban þæt ðæra
cempena bearn þe forealdode wæron. wurdon genamode to ðam ylcan gewinne
þe heora fæderas on wæron;
 288.14. Hwæt ða martinus wearð ameldod fram his agenum
fæder. ðe on his weorcum andode. and he wearð þa gelæht to þam
laðum gecampe. and on racenteagum gelæd. þa ða he fyftyne geara
wæs;
 288.17. Ænne cniht he hæfde to his ðenungum forð. ðam
he sylf ðenode swa swiðe swa he him;
 288.19. He folgode þam casere ærest constantium. and
siððan Iuliane þam wælhreowan wiðersacan. and he on ðam folgode
ealle fulnysse forbeah. lybbende swa swa munuc. na swa swa modig cempa;
 288.22. He æteowode ða soðan lufe symle his geferum. and
ormæte eadmodnysse mid eallum geðylde. and his efencempan ða hine
endemes wurðodon;
 288.24. He wæs swiðe geswæs eallum swincendum. and on
mislicum yrmðum mannum geheolp. wædligum and wanscryddum. and næs
ðeah ða gyt gefullod;
 289.27. Þa gemette martinus on middes wintres cyle ænne
nacodne ðearfan. and his nan man ne gymde. þeah ðe he mid hreame. ða
riddan þæs bæde;
 289.29. Ða næfde martinus nan ðing to syllenne þam nacedan
ðearfan. þe ðær swa ðearle hrymde buton his gewædum þe he wel
behofode. and hæfde ær his ðing þearfum gedælede;
 289.32. He ne mihte swa ðeah on his mode afindan. þæt he
ðone nacodan mid nahte ne gefrefrode. ac tocearf his basing on emtwa mid
sexe. and sealde oðerne dæl þam earman wædlan. and mid þam ofcyrfe
hine eft bewæfde;
 289.35. Þa hlogon ða cempan sume ðæs basinges. sume eac
geomerodon swiðe on mode. þæt hi naht ðyllices ðam ðearfan ne
gebudon. ða ða hi eðelicor hine mihton scrydan;
 289.38. On þære ylcan nihte æteowode crist hine sylfne
martine on swefne mid ðam basinge gescrydne. and het hine sceawian gif he
ða sylene oncneowe. and se hælend sona his englum ðus sæde;
 289.41. Martinus me bewæfde efne mid ðyssere wæde. þeah
ðe he ungefullod gyt farende sy;
 289.42. Martinus ða fægnode þære fægeran gesihðe.
and wearð þa gefullod forhraðe on criste ða ða he on ylde eahtatyne
geara wæs;
 289.45. Æfter ðisum gelamp on ðære leode gewinn. þæt
Iulianus se casere gecwæð to gefeohte. and dælde his cempum cynelice
sylene. þæt hi on ðam gewinne werlice ongunnon;
 289.47. Þa nolde martinus geniman his gife. ne on ðam gefeohte
his handa afylan. ac cwæð þæt he wolde criste ðeowian. on gastlicum
gecampe æfter his cristendome;
 289.50. Ða cwæð se wælhreowa þæt he wære afyrht
for ðan toweardan gefeohte. na for criste eawfæst;
 289.51. Þa andwyrde martinus unforht ðam casere;
 289.52. Ic wille ðurhgan orsorh ðone here mid rodetacne
gewæpnod. na mid readum scylde. oððe mid hefegum helme. oþþe heardre
byrnan;
 289.54. Ða het se hæðena cyning healdan martinum þæt he
wurde aworpen ungewæpnod ðam here;
 289.56. Þa nolde se hælend his ðegen forlætan. ac
gesibbode þæt folc sona þæs on merien. þæt hi to ðæs
caseres cynegyrde gebugon;
 289.59. Hwæt ða martinus ðone wælhreowan forlet. and beah
to hilarium þam gelæredan biscope. se ðe ða on worulde wuldorful
wæs gehæfd. scinende swa swa tungel. on soðre lare;
 289.61. Mid ðam he wunode on weligre lare to langum fyrste. oð
þæt he his frynd geneosode on fyrlenum earde. wolde hi feondum
ætbredan. ðurh halwendum fulluhte. ðe ða gyt hæðene wunodon;
 290.65. Þa ða he com to munton ða gemetton hine sceaðan.
and heora an hine sloh mid æxe on his heafod;
 290.66. He wearð þa gebunden. and heora anum betæht;
 290.67. Ða befran se sceaða þe hine onsundron heold hwæt
he manna wære. oððe wære ofdræd;
 290.68. Martinus him to cwæð. þæt he cristen wære. and
on eallum his life nære swa orsorh;
 290.70. Begann ða to secgenne þam sceaðan geleafan. and mid
boclicere lare hine læran ongann;
 290.71. Hwæt ða se sceaða sona gelyfde. on ðone lifigendan
god. and tolysde ða bendas. his halwendan lareowes. and him swa filigde on
eawfæstum ðeawum. siððan .a. lybbende;
 290.74. Æfter ðisum gemette martinus þone deofol. se axode
ardlice hwider he siðode. sæde þæt he wolde his wiðerwinna beon. on
eallum his færelde. swa hwider swa he ferde;
 290.77. Þa andwyrde se halga sona ðan deofle. Ne ondræde ic
ðe. Drihten is min gefylsta. and se sceocca fordwan of his gesihðe ða;
 290.79. Martinus ða siððan siðode to his magum. and awende
his moder of manfullum hæðenscipe. and manega hire to eacan eac to gode
gebigde. þeah ðe se fæder ana hæðengilda wunode;
 290.82. Be ðam we magon tocnawan þæt gehwilce geðeoð to
heofenan rice. þeah ðe heora frynd losian. þa ða se mæra wer swa
micclum geðeah. and his fæder forwearð on fulum hæðenscipe;
 290.86. On ðam timan asprang Arrianes gedwyld wide geond
eorðan. þam martinus wiðfeaht. oð þæt he forwel oft yfele wearð
geswenct;
 290.88. He ðygde unlybban eac on his mete. ac he ða frecednysse
þæs færlican attres mid gebedum afligde. þurh fultum drihtnes;
 290.90. Þa cyrde martinus ongean to hilarium swa swa he mid wope
hine georne bæd. þæt he æfter ðam siðe. hine gesecan sceolde;
 290.92. Hilarius ða eft mid estfullum mode hine underfeng.
fægen his cymes. and martinus siððan him mynster arærde. buton
ðære byrig mid munuclicere onbryrdnysse;
 290.95. Æfter ðisum geðeodde sum hæðen wer him to. and
se binnon feawum dagum swa færlice swealt. þæt he on fulluhte
underfangen næs. for ðan ðe martinus ða on neawiste næs. ac com
ða to huse hearde gedrefed. and hine sylfne astrehte. sona ofer ðone
deadan. drihten biddende. þæt he him lif sealde. and he wearð ða
geedcucod æfter lytlum fyrste. and sona gefullod. gesundful leofode to
manegum gearum. and gewisslice sæde þæt he wære gelæd to
leohtleasre stowe. and swærlice geswenct. on sweartum witum;
 291.103. Ða comon þær fleogende twegen fægre englas. and
hine gelæddon ongean to life for martines bene. swa swa he bæd æt
gode;
 291.105. Sum ungesceadwis man hine sylfne aheng þæt he fotum
span. and his feorh forlet. þæt wearð ða mid wope þam halgan were
gecydd. and he genealæhte þam lifleasan men. and hine unwurðne of
deaðe arærde. þurh his ðingrædene wið þone soðan god;
 291.110. Þæt turonisce folc hine ða geceas him to
leodbiscope. ðeah ðe he lange wiðcwæde. and of mynstre nolde nawar
beon gemet. oð þæt sum fæmne hi facenlice hiwode sarlice seoce. and
asende wið his;
 291.113. Þa ferde martinus and þæt folc his cepte. and hine
gelæhton swa swa hi ær geleornodon ealle clypigende mid anre stemne.
þæt martinus wære wyrðe þæs hades. and þæt folc gesælig
ðurh swilcne biscop;
 291.116. He wearð ða gehalgod swa swa hi ealle gecuron. and
ðone had geheold mid soðre eadmodnysse on ðære ylcan anrædnysse
þe he ær on leofode;
 291.118. He heold his ðeawas swa swa healic biscop. and his
muneclice ingehyd swa þeah betwux mannum;
 291.120. He arærde him munuclif on micelre digelnysse twa mila
fram ðære ceastre turoniscre ðeode;
 291.122. Þæt mynster he gelogode mid wellybbendum mannum.
þæt wæron hundeahtatig muneca. þe him anmodlice gehyrdon. and him
eallum wæron heora ðing gemæne. æfter regollicere gesetnysse ne hi
naht synderlices næfdon;
 291.125. Næs heora nanum alyfed on ðam life ænig cræft.
buton halgum gebedum. and heora gewritum;
 291.127. Seo yld hi gebæd. and seo iuguð wrat;
 291.128. Symle hi sæton ætsomne to gereorde. næs þær
wines drenc buton wannhalum mannum;
 291.129. Heora forwel fela wæron mid waces olfendes hærum to
lice gescrydde. and þær laðode softnys;
 291.131. Of ðam mynstre geðugon æðele biscopas. þurh
martines lare gehwilcum leodum;
 291.133. Ðær wæs ða gehæfd gehende ðære byrig
swilce halig stow. mid healicum gedwylde. and weofod geset mid micclum
wurðmynte swilce ðær gereste sum halig cyðere;
 292.135. Þa befran martinus æt þam mæssepreostum ðæs
martires naman. þe hi swa micclum wurðodon;
 292.137. Ða nyste heora nan his naman to secgenne. ne on hwæs
timan he ðrowunge underhnige;
 292.138. Hwæt ða se biscop mid his gebroðrum ferde to
þære ylcan stowe. and þone ælmihtigan bæd þæt he geswutelode
mid soðre gebicnunge. hwæne ðær swa mærne þæt mennisc
wurðode;
 292.141. Þa wearð þær æteowod an atelic sceadu on
sweartum hiwe. and sæde þæt he wære for stale ofslegen. na for
soðum geleafan. and wunode on wite mid wælhreawum sceaðum. for his
mandædum. na mid drihtnes cyðerum;
 292.145. Ða towende se biscop þæt weofod sona. and þa
dwollican socne mid ealle adwæscte;
 292.146. Hit gelamp eac swilce on oðrum timan. þæt anre
wydewan sunu wearð to deaðe gebroht. and hrædlice gewat fram woruldlicum
bricum. and se halga martinus for hine gebæd on ðæs folces gesihðe.
and he sona aras to ðam lænan life þe he ær forlet;
 292.150. Þurh ðam tacne gelyfdon of ðære leode gehwilce on
ðone lifigendan god. ðe hine to life arærde;
 292.152. On ðære ylcan byrig he gehælde an mæden mid
halwendum smyrelse gehalgodes eles. þæt ðe fram cildhade symle ær
dumb wæs;
 292.154. He ferde eft siððan embe sumere neode. þa ofseah he
feorran ða hæðenan ferian an lic to eorðan. mid anþræcum gehlyde.
and he ealle gefæstnode heora fet to eorðan on ðære stowe þe hi
steppende bæron mid his strangan bene swilce mid bende;
 292.158. Hi tyrndon mid bodige gebigedum sceancum. and heora
fotwylmas awendan ne mihton. oð þæt se halga hi eft alysde. and let hi
forðgan. for his godnysse;
 292.161. Se halga towearp eac sum hæðengyld. and wolde aheawan
ænne heahne pinbeam. se wæs ær gehalgod þam hæðenum godum;
 292.163. Ða noldon ða hæðenan þam halgan geðafian.
þæt he swa halig treow æfre hynan sceolde;
 292.164. Cwæð þeah heora an þæt he hit underfenge
feallende to foldan. and hi hit forcurfon. gif he on god truwode þurh trumne
geleafan;
 292.166. Þa geðafode martinus. þæt mid gebylde. and
wearð gebunden under ðam beame geset ðider ðe he bigde mid healicum
bogum. and næs him nan wen þæt he ahwar wende buton to ðam halgan.
swa swa he ahyld wæs;
 293.170. Hwæt ða ða hæðenan aheowon þæt treow mid
ormætre blisse. þæt hit brastliende sah to ðam halgan were. hetelice
swiðe;
 293.172. Þa worhte he ongean ðam hreosendum treowe þæs
hælendes rodetacn. and hit ðærrihte ætstod. wende ða ongean. and
hreas underbæc. and fornean offeoll ða ðe hit ær forcurfon;
 293.175. Þa awurpon ða hæðenan sona heora gedwyld. and to
heora scyppende sæmtinges gebugon mid micclum geleafan ðurh martines
lare;
 293.178. Eft he ontende sum hæðen templ. ða gewende se lig
ðurh þæs windes blæd to sumes mannes huse ðe þær gehende stod.
ac martinus astah on ðam sticelan hrofe. and sette hine sylfne ongean ðam
swegendum lige. and he sona ðreow ðwyres wið þæs windes mid micclum
gewinne for ðæs weres mihte. and wæs ða geholpen ðam unscyldigum
huse;
 293.183. Gelome he towearp gehwær hæðene gyld. þa wolde
he æne an eald hus tocwysan þe wæs mid gedwylde. deoflum gehalgod. ac
mennisce handa hit ne mihton towurpan. for ðam fæstum gefege þæs
feondlican temples;
 293.187. Þa comon ðær fleogende færlice englas of
healicre heofenan. and hi þæt hus towurpon. þurh gastlicne cræft.
ðam godan to blisse;
 293.189. Sum hæðen man wolde hine acwellan mid atogenum
swurde. and se halga aleat and astrehte his swuran under ðam scinendan
brande. ða feoll se cwellere afyrht underbæc arleas oð þæt. and
ða bæd forgifenysse. gecnæwe his manes to ðam mæran were;
 293.193. Eac sum oðer arleas hine wolde slean on his halgan
heafde mid heardum isene. ac þæt wæpen wand aweg mid þam slege of
ðæs reðan handum þe hine hynan wolde;
 293.196. Sum mæden he gehælde mid gehalgodum ele. þæt
þe langlice læg on legerbedde seoc. toslopen on limum. samcucu geðuht.
and aras ða gesund on gesihðe þæs folces;
 293.198. Tetradius hatte sum hæðen þegen his ðeowcnapena
an wearð þearle awed. þa sette martinus his handa him onuppon. and se
feond fleah forht for ðam halgan. and se ðeowa siððan gesundful
leofode. and his hlaford beah mid geleafan to gode mid eallum his hirede. þe
ær ðan hæðen wæs;
 294.204. Martinus eac com to anes mannes huse his cnapa wæs awed
wunderlice ðurh deofol. and arn him togeanes mid gyniendum muðe;
 294.206. Þa bestang se halga his hand him on muð. het hine
ceowan mid scearpum toðum. his liðegan fingras. gif him alyfed wære;
 294.208. Se woda ða awende aweg his ceaflas fram ðære halgan

 294.221. Seo halige MARIA eac swilce gecom to ðam halgan were on

and Agna. and mid hire geneosunge hine gearwurðode. and micclum gehyrte.

 294.226. Eac se halga biscop geseah gelome þa awyrigedan deoflu

 294.227. He nateshwon ne ondred heora deofellican hiw. ne he næs

 294.229. Hwilon com se deofol on anre digelnysse mid purpuran

and cwæð þæt he wære witodlice se hælend;
 294.231. Þa beseah martinus wið þæs sceoccan leoht.

 295.245. Þa wæs ðær an cnapa geættrod þurh

 295.253. Gif him ænig heafodman hwilces ðinges forwyrnde.

 295.272. Þa wæron on ðam timan. ungeðwære preostas. on

 296.275. Ða geseah he swymman. scealfran on flode. and gelome

 296.276. Þa cwæð se halga wer to his geferan;
 296.277. Þas fugelas habbað feonda gelicnysse. ðe gehwilce

 296.279. Ða het martinus ða mæðleasan fugelas. ðæs

 296.282. Æfter ðisum becom se biscop to ðam mynstre. and
ða ungeðwæran preostas ðreade for gyltum. and on sibbe gebrohte mid

 296.284. Ða wearð he geuntrumod eallum lymum. and sæde his

 296.286. Þa wurdon hi ealle endemes astyrede. and mid micelre
heofunge hine befrinon;
 296.287. Hwi forlætst þu fæder. ðine fostorcild? Oððe

gewisse. gemiltsa us swiðor. and swa gyt ne forlæt;
 296.292. Martinus ða wende mid ðisum wordum to gode. Ne

 296.296. Æfter ðisum gebede he abad on ðam legere ane feawa

 296.300. He geseah ðone deofol standan swiðe gehende. and hine

 296.301. Þu wælhreowe nyten to hwi stenst ðu þus gehende?

 296.304. Æfter ðisum worde gewat seo sawul of ðam geswenctan

 296.305. Hwæt ða gehyrdon gehwilce on life halige englas

Excusatio dictantis: Godden 1979, 297-8.



 297.1. <foreign> EXCUSATIO DICTANTIS: </foreign> Fela fægere godspel we
forlætað on ðisum gedihte. ða mæg awendan se ðe wile;
 297.2. Ne durre we ðas boc na miccle swiðor gelengan. ði
læs ðe heo ungemetegod sy. and mannum æðryt þurh hire micelnysse
astyrige;
 297.4. We willað swa ðeah gyt. ane feawa cwydas on ðissere
bec geendebyrdian. gemænelice be apostolum. and martirum. andeterum. and
halgum fæmnum. þam hælende to lofe;
 298.7. Thomes ðrowunge we forlætað unawritene. for ðan
ðe heo wæs gefyrn awend. of ledene on englisc on leoðwison. ac swa
ðeah se wisa Augustinus sæde on sumore his trahtnunge. þæt an ðing
wære ungeleaflic on ðære race geset. þæt is be ðam byrle þe
ðone apostol earplætte. and be ðam hunde ðe his hand eft inn abær;
 298.12. Be ðam cwæð augustinus. þis rædað mid micelre
gecneordnysse ða ðe wrace lufiað. ac us is alyfed be ðisum to
twynienne. þæt se apostol wolde gewrecan. swa wælhreawlice his teonan;
 298.15. For ðyssere twynunge nolde we hreppan his ðrowunge;
 298.16. Heo is swa ðeah eall full geleaflic. buton ðam anum
þe augustinus wiðsæcð;

 299.1. <foreign>IN NATALE UNIUS APOSTOLI.</foreign> Þes apostolica freolsdæg
manað us to sprecenne. and sum ðing eow to secgenne. be ðam gesæligan

fornumen. on fyre. oððe on sæ. oððe þurh deora geslit. þæt he
ne sceole eft arisan ansund þurh ðæs scyppendes mihte ðe ealle ðing
of nahte gesceop;
 314.122. He cwæð;
 314.122. On eowerum geðylde. ge geahniað eow eowere sawla;
 314.123. Soðlice geðyld is wyrtruma and hyrdræden. ealra
haligra mægna. and ungeþyld is ealra mægna tostencednys;
 314.125. Hit is awriten. þæs mannes wisdom bið oncnawen
þurh geðyld;
 314.126. Eft cwæð Salomon;
 314.126. Selre is se geðyldiga wer þonne se stranga. and se
ðe his mod gewylt is betera. ðonne se ðe burh oferwinð;
 314.128. Mare sige bið þæt se man hine sylfne ðurh
geðyld gewylde. ðonne he wiðutan him burga oferfeohte;
 314.129. Witodlice ðurh geðyld we magon beon martiras. þeah
ðe we on sibbe godes gelaðunge ure lif geendion;
 314.132. Twa cynn sind martirdomes. An dearnunge. oðer eawunge;
 314.133. Se ðe on ehtnysse for cristes geleafan his lif alæt.
se bið openlice martir;
 314.134. Eft se ðe forberð ðurh geðyld hosp. and teonan.
and ðone lufað þe hine hatað. and his agene unlustas. and þæs
ungesewenlican deofles tihtinge forsihð. se bið untwylice martyr on digelre
dæde;
 314.137. Þissere segene we nimað us crist to gewitnysse. se
ðe cwæð to his twam apostolum. Iacobum. and Iohannem;
 314.139. Mage ge drincan þone calic þe ic drincan sceall;
 314.140. Hi sædon þæt hi mihton;
 314.140. Drihten sæde. Witodlice ge drincað minne calic;
 314.141. Hwæt is se calic þe crist dranc buton seo ðrowung
ðe he for mancynne ðrowade? Be ðære he cwæð to his heofenlican
fæder;
 314.143. Fæder min gif hit gewurðan mæg afyrsa þisne
calic fram me;
 314.144. Þas twegen apostolas Iacobus. and Iohannes. gehyrdon
æt cristes muðe þæt hi sceoldon his calic drincan. ac swa ðeah hi
begen næron geendode ðurh openne martirdom;
 315.146. We witon þæt iacobus wæs beheafdod for þæs
hælendes geleafan. and Iohannes his broðor geendode his lif on sibbe
unofslegen. ac he wæs ðeah martir. for ðan ðe he heold ða digelan
ðrowunge on his mode. þeah ðe he on lichaman gemartirod nære;
 315.150. And we magon beon martiras ðeah ðe we mid isene
acwealde ne beon. gif we þæt geðyld on urum mode unleaslice healdað;
 315.153. Godes gelaðung hæfð on sibbe lilian. þæt is
clæne drohtnung. on ðam gewinne rosan. þæt is martyrdom;
 315.155. Us is to witenne þæt on ðreo wisan bið geðyld
æteowod. oðre ðing sind þe we fram gode ðoliað. oþre fram ðam
ealdan wiðerwinnan. oðre fram urum nextum;
 315.157. Fram gode we þoliað swingla. fram ðam deofle
costnunga. fram urum nextum ehtnyssa and teonan;
 315.159. Ac us gedafenað þæt we mid wacelum eagum. þas
ðreo gemetu behealdan. swa þæt we nateshwon ne ceorion. ongean godes
swinglum. ne we eac ne geðafion ðæs deofles tihtinga to urum forwyrde.
ne we ures nextan yfel. mid yfele forgyldon. þes is se digela martirdom.
healde se ðe wille;
 315.164. Gregorius awrat be sumum geðyldigan were Stephanus
gehaten. se forlet ealle woruldðing. and forfleah manna gehlyd. beeode his
gebedu on sumum mynstre drohtniende;
 315.166. He hæfde swa micel geðyld þæt he ðancian wolde
þam ðe him teonan dyde. and þone he tealde him to frynd þe him sume
hefigtymnysse on belædde. and ælc ungelimp he tealde him to gestreone.
and ealle his wiðerwinnan swa swa his gefylstan hæfde;
 315.170. Eft on fyrste þa ða him forðsið getimode. þa
comon ðær fela manna for his mæran drohtnunge. and hi sume gesawon
englas instæppende. and wurdon swa ealle afyhrte. ge ða þe ða englas
gesawon. ge ða þe nane ne gesawon. þæt ðær nan æt his
forðsiðe standan ne mihte;
 316.176. Eft rehte Gregorius oðre bysne be sumere mynecyne.
Romula gehaten. seo wæs swiðe geðyldig. and þearle gehyrsum. singan on
gebedum. and swigan lufode;
 316.178. Hire becom æt nextan seo coðu þe læcas hatað
paralisin. and heo læg manega gear alefed on micclum geðylde;
 316.180. Witodlice hire lima lyre hire becom to eacnunge haligra
mægna. for ðan ðe heo hi gebysgode mid gebedum þæs ðe swiðor
þe heo nan ðing elles don ne mihte;
 316.183. Ða on sumere nihte com færlice micel leoht of
heofenum. and gefylde ða cytan ealle ðe heo on læg;
 316.184. Hire gastlice modor Redempta gehaten mid anre sweoster
stod hire ofer. micclum afyrht. for ðam heofenlican leohte. and hi gehyrdon
sweg cnucigende þa duru swilce ðær micel menigu inn eode. and wynsum
bræð hi ealle gefylde. mid micelre swetnysse;
 316.188. Þa cwæð seo romula to hire gastlican meder. þe
ðær afyrht stod;
 316.189. Min modor ne ondræd þu ðe ne swelte ic gyt;
 316.190. Æfter ðisum gewat þæt leoht aweg. ac se wynsum
bræð þær belaf;
 316.191. Eft siððan on ðære feorðan nihte clypede heo
hire to þa ylcan lærestran Redempta. and bæd husles;
 316.193. Efne ða æfter þære huslunge stodon twa
heofenlice werod ætforan ðære cytan dura. singende heofenlicne sang.
and hi tocneowon þæt werhades men ongunnon symle þone dream. and
wifhades men him sungon ongean andswariende. and seo geðyldige romula ageaf
hire gast mid þam heofenlicum sange;
 316.198. Ða gewende eal se sang upweard to heofenum mid þære
sawle. and swa hi ufor ferdon swa mihton ða licmen læs þæs sanges
gehyran. oð þæt he mid ealle heora earum ætbroden wearð;
 316.202. Se ælmihtiga god beswingð and ðreað þa ðe he
lufað. þæt hi ðurh ða hwilwendlican geswencednysse wuldorfulle
becumon to ðam ecan life. þe he ær middaneardes frymðe his
geleaffullum gearcode. Sy him wuldor and wurðmynt on ealra worulda woruld.
Amen:
