 318.1. <foreign>IN NATALE UNIUS CONFESSORIS.</foreign> <foreign> Homo quidam peregre
proficiscens. Et reliqua;</foreign> Ure drihten sæde þis bigspel his
leorningcnihtum;
 318.2. He cwæð þæt sum rice man wolde faran on
ælðeodigne eard. þa clypode he his ðeowan him to. and betæhte him
his god;
 318.4. Sumon he betæhte fif pund. sumum twa pund. sumum an.
ælcum be his agenre mihte. and het hi mid þam feo him mare gestrynan. and
ferde siððan on ælðeodignysse swa swa he gemynt hæfde;
 318.7. Hi ða teolodon mid þam feo;
 318.8. And se ðe fif underfeng gestrynde þær to oðre fif
pund. and se ðe twa pund underfeng. gestrynde eac oðre twa;
 318.10. Ða ferde se ðridda se ðe þæt an pund underfeng.
and bedealf hit on eorðan. and swa his hlafordes feoh bediglode;
 318.12. Eft ða æfter langsumum fyrste com heora hlaford. and
het him gelangian to þa ðeowan þe he þæt feoh ær befæste;
 318.14. Þa genealæhte se ðe ær fif pund underfeng. and
cwæð;
 318.15. Hlaford. þu befæstest me fif pund. efne nu ic hæbbe
þe gestryned þær to eacan oðre fif pund;
 318.16. Ða cwæð se hlaford him to;
 318.17. Eala ðu goda ðeowa. and getrywe. þu wære getrywe
on lytlum ðingum. ic wille ðe settan ofer maran. far nu into ðines
hlafordes gefean;
 318.19. Ða com se oðer ðeowa se ðe twa pund underfeng and
cwæð;
 318.20. Hlaford. þu betæhtest me twa pund þines feos. and
efne nu ic hæbbe þe gestryned oðre twa þær to;
 319.21. Ða cwæð se hlaford;
 319.22. Eala ðu godes ðeowa and getrywe. ðu wære getrywe
on lytlum ðingum. ic wille ðe settan ofer maran. far nu into ðines
hlafordes gefean;
 319.24. Þa com se ðridda and cwæð;
 319.24. Hlaford. efne her is ðin pund. þe ic hæfde behyd on
minum swatclaðe. Ic ondred me for ðan þe ðu eart swiðe styrne. and
wylt niman þæt þe ðu ær ne sealdest. and wylt ripan þæt
þæt ðu ær ne seowe;
 319.28. Ða cwæð se hlaford. Eala ðu lyðra þeowa. Nu ic
þe deme æfter ðinre agenre tungan. wystest ðu þæt ic wæs
styrne man. nimende þæt ic ær ne sealde. and ripende þæt þæt
ic ær ne seow. hwi noldest ðu syllan min feoh myneterum to sleanne. and ic
wolde mid gafole hit ofgan æt him? He cwæð þa to ðam ymstandendum.
Nimað þæt pund him æt. and syllað þam þe me brohte tyn pund;
 319.34. Hi cwædon la leof he hæfð tyn pund;
 319.34. Se hlaford cwæð. Ic secge eow to soðan ælc
ðæra ðe hæfð him bið mare geseald and he genihtsumað. Se ðe
næfð. him bið ætbroden þæt þæt he hæfð;
 319.38. Se eadiga Gregorius papa trahtnode þis godspel and
cwæð;
 319.39. Hwæt is se man ðe ferde on ælðeodignysse buton
ure drihten se ðe mid þam lichaman ðe he on eorðan underfeng ferde to
heofenum? Witodlice flæsces wunung is eorðe. and cristes lichama wæs
gelæd swilce to ælðeodignysse ða ða he wæs ahafen to ðære
heofenlican wununge. þær ðær næfre ær nan lichama ne becom;
 319.44. Se mennisca crist dælde his god his ðeowum. for ðan
ðe he forgeaf his geleaffullum þa gastlican gife;
 319.45. Sumon he betæhte fif pund. sumon twa pund. sumon an;
 319.46. Þa fif pund getacniað þa fif andgitu ures lichaman.
þæt is Gesihð. and hlyst. swæcc. and stenc. and hrepung;
 319.48. Ðas fif pund underfehð ælc þæra þe ða fif
lichamlican andgitu ansunde hæfð;
 319.49. On ðam twam pundum is mare getacnung. þonne on ðam
fif pundum sy;
 319.51. Witodlice on þam twam pundum is getacnod ægðer ge
þæt yttre andgit. ge þæt inre;
 320.52. On ðam anum punde is an andgit getacnod;
 320.54. Se goda ðeowa þe ða fif pund underfeng. gestrynde his
hlaforde þær to oðre fif. for ðan þe sume læwede men sind swa
geworhte. þæt hi mid onbryrdnysse þæs upplican eðles syllað gode
bysne oðrum geleaffullum. and symle tæcað riht þæs ðe hi magon
tocnawan be ðam yttrum andgitum. þeah ðe hi ne cunnon ða incundan
deopnysse godes lare asmeagan;
 320.59. And ðonne hi on heora flæsclicum lustum gemetegode
beoð. and on woruldlicum gewilnungum ne beoð to grædige. and eac wið
oðrum unðeawum þurh godes ege hi sylfe healdað. þonne styrað hi eac
oðrum mannum ðurh heora lifes rihtwisnysse. and gestrynað gode sumne
oðerne mannan oððe ma. se ðe swa deð. se gebrincð gode tyn pund. of
ðam fif yttrum andgitum þe he underfeng;
 320.66. Sume sind eac on godes gelaðunge þe sind mid twam
pundum gewelgode. þæt is þæt hi habbað þa fif yttran andgitu. and
ða incundan lare. ðurh ða hi asmeagað þone heofenlican wisdom. and
eac syllað gode bysne þurh ða yttran andgitu. þonne hi awendað hi on
godum ðeawum him sylfum to ecere hælðe. and oðrum to bysne;
 320.71. Þas ðyllice ðonne hi oðrum bodiað and wel
bysniað. bringað þam heofenlican hlaforde twyfealde gestreon. of
ðære teolunge þe he him befæste;
 320.74. Rihtlice is gecweden þæt heora an underfenge fif pund.
and oðer twa. for ðan ðe ða pund beoð getwyfylde. þonne hi twam
hadum þæt is werhade. and wifhade beoð befæste;
 320.77. Se lyðra ðeowa se ðe þæt an pund underfeng ferde
and bedealf hit on eorðan. and swa his hlafordes feoh behydde;
 320.79. Se behit þæs heofonlican hlafordes feoh on eorðan.
se ðe þæt andgit þæt him god forgeaf awent eall to eorðlicum
dædum. and nele secan ða gastlican tylunga ne his heortan næfre
aræran of ðam eorðlicum smeagungum;
 320.82. Ðyllice habbað andgit. ac hi hit awendað eal to heora
flæsclicum lustum;
 321.83. Be swilcum cwæð se witega. Hi sind snotere þæt hi
yfel wyrcon. and hi soðlice ne cunnon naht to gode gewyrcan;
 321.86. Witodlice se drihten ðe ða gastlican pund his ðeowum
betæhte. cymð to ðam micclum dome. and wile witan hu gehwilc manna þa
gife atuge ðe he him ær forgeaf. ðonne cweð he to ðam godum
ðeowan. swa swa ðis godspell segð;
 321.90. Eala ðu goda ðeowa and getrywe. þu wære getrywe on
lytlum ðingum. Ic wylle ðe settan ofer maran. far nu into ðines hlafordes
gefean;
 321.92. Feawa sind ealle ðises andwerdan lifes god. þeah ðe
hi fela geðuhte sind. ac ðonne bið se holda þeowa geset ofer manegum
godum. þonne he buton ælcere gewemmednysse wuldrað mid gode on ðam
heofenlicum setle;
 321.95. Þonne he bið gelæd into his hlafordes blisse.
þonne he on ðam ecum eðele betwux engla heapum be his edleane blissað
wiðutan. swa þæt him nan ðing wiðinnan ne eglað ænigre
brosnunge oððe gewæcednysse;
 321.99. Se asolcena ðeowa þe nolde tilian nan ðing his
hlaforde mid þam befæstum punde com him to. mid beladunge and cwæð;
 321.101. La leof ic wat þæt ðu eart swiðe styrne mann. and
wilt niman þæt ðu ær ne sealdest. and wilt ripan þæt ðu ær
ne seowe. þa wearð ic for ði afyrht. and behydde ðin pund on eorðan.
efne ðu hæfst nu ðin agen;
 321.104. Forwel menige sind on godes gelaðunge þe ðurh
ungecnyrdnysse þisum ðeowan geefenlæcað. hi anðraciað to gefarenne
lifes wegas. and swa ðeah ne wandiað to licgenne on stuntnysse heora
asolcennysse;
 321.108. Hi geseoð þæt hi synfulle beoð. and þeah ne
forhtiað to wunigenne on heora unrihtwisnyssum. swilce hi on heora
gedrefednysse nænne ræd nabbon. and sweltende him lif ondrædon;
 322.112. Se hlaford cwæð to ðam lyðran ðeowan;
 322.112. Ðu yfela ðeowa and sleac. þe gedafenode þæt
ðu befæstest min feoh myneterum to sleanne. and ic wolde min agen ofgan
mid ðam gafole;
 322.115. Se ælmihtiga god forbead þurh his witegan þæt
nan ðæra manna þe rihtwis beon wile. ne sceal syllan his feoh to
gafole;
 322.117. Ðis gafol þe we embe sprecað nis na woruldlic. ac is
gastlic. and mid gastlicum andgite to understandenne;
 322.118. Godes feoh þæt is seo halige lar. bið befæst
myneterum to sleanne. þonne godes word bið ðam mannum gebodod. þe hit
magon mid wordum gemenigfyldan. and mid weorcum began;
 322.121. Mine gebroðra swa swa ge gehyrað ure frecednysse gif
we godes lare eow ofteoð. swa ge sceolon eac smeagan carfullice eowere
frecednyssa. for ðan þe god ofgæð his feoh æt eow mid þam
gastlicum gafole;
 322.125. Ge gehyrað godes beboda æt lareowa muðum. and ge
agyfað hi eft gode mid ðam gafole. gif hi beoð þurh eower gecnyrdnysse
gemenigfylde. and ðurh goddre fremminge gode betæhte. and ge sylfe him
gegað þurh godum geearnungum;
 322.130. Se hlaford cwæð. Nimað þæt pund of ðam
yfelan ðeowan. and syllað þam ðe me brohte tyn pund;
 322.131. Hi cwædon. La leof he hæfð tyn pund;
 322.132. Hit wære geðuht swiðe gedafenlic æfter menniscum
andgite. þæt þæt pund ðe wæs genumen æt ðam yfelan ðeowan
wære geseald ðam þe twa pund hæfde. swiðor þonne þam ðe tyn
pund hæfde;
 322.135. Ac ða twa pund hæfdon swa swa we eow ær sædon
maran getacnunge ðonne þa fif pund þe he brohte his hlaforde getwyfylde;
 322.137. Þurh ða twa pund wæs getacnod ægðer ge
þæt yttre andgit. ge þæt inre. and se ðe ða fif pund hæfde
wæs wiðutan geglenged mid ðam fif andgitum. þæt is Gesihð. and
hlyst. swæcc. and stenc. and hrepung. and wæs ða gyt æmtig fram
ðam incundan andgite. ða het se hlaford for ði syllan þæt an pund.
þæt þæt andgit getacnode þam holdum ðeowan þe him gestrynde mid
ðam fif yttrum andgitum oðre fif pund;
 323.144. Ðis gelimpð dæghwomlice on godes gelaðunge.
þæt gehwilce geleaffulle ðe gode gecwemað mid ðam yttrum andgitum
ðe hi underfengon beoð gebrohte ðurh maran godes gife to ðam incundum
andgite. and ðonne geðeoð on ðam gastlicum andgite. for ðan ðe hi
ær ða yttran andgitu getreowlice aspendon;
 323.150. Se hlaford cwæð. Ic secge eow to soðan. ælc
ðæra ðe hæfð him bið mare geseald. and he genihtsumað. Se ðe
næfð him bið ætbroden. þæt þæt he hæfð;
 323.152. Witodlice se ðe hæfð þa soðan lufe. he
underfehð oðre gife æt gode;
 323.153. And se ðe ða soðan lufe næfð. þæt he
oðrum fremige on worde and on weorce. se forlyst ða gife þe he
unnytwurðlice underfeng;
 323.155. Ealle godnyssa forlyst se ðe ða soðan lufe
næfð. to Gode and to mannum;
 323.156. Se unholda ðeowa wearð ða aworpen on ðam yttrum
þeostrum. for ðan ðe he ðolode ðurh wite þa yttran blindnysse. se
ðe ær ðurh his gylt on ðam inrum þeostrum befeoll;
 323.159. Ðær he ðolað neadunge þeostra ðurh wrace. se
ðe ær lustlice forbær his unlustes þeostra;
 323.162. Eow is soðlice to gewitenne þæt furðon nan
asolcen man nis orsorh. be onfangennysse godes feos;
 323.163. Ne mæg nan man soðlice cweðan þæt he þæs
pundes bedæled sy. and ne ðurfe gode agyldan gescead þære sylene ðe
he underfeng;
 323.165. Sum underfehð andgit boclicere lare. and se sceal
oðrum cyðan ða gerynu ðe he of godes punde gleawlice oncneow;
 323.167. Sum underfehð eorðlice æhta. and se sceal ðæs
pundes spendunge gode agifan of his æhtum;
 323.169. Sum ne underfeng naðor ne þæt gastlice andgit ne
ða eorðlican speda. leornode swa ðeah sumne cræft þe hine afet.
witodlice se cræft him bið for ðæs pundes onfangennysse geteald;
 324.172. Sum næfð nan ðyssera ðinga begyten. ac hæfð
sume cyððe to ricum men. ðonne sceal se þær ðær he mæg
earmum ðingian to ðam rican þe he cyððe to hæfð. þy læs
ðe he geniðerod beo. gif he ðæs pundes rihtlice ne bricð;
 324.176. Hwæt wylle we furðor ymbe ðis smeagan. buton
þæt we secgað þæt nan ðearfa nis ðyses pundes bedæled. and
for ði sceal gehwa hogian þæt he þæt gastlice feoh mid ðam gafole
gode agife;
 324.179. Þonne se heofenlica dema cymð on egeslicum
mægenðrymme betwux engla. and heahengla werodum. þonne sceal gehwa him
æteowian hwæt he mid ðam punde geteolod hæfð;

 342.245. Gold and seolfor and deorwurðe stanas beoð on fyre
afandode. ac hi ne beoð swa ðeah mid ðam fyre fornumene. Swa eac ða
ðe habbað gode weorc. ne þoliað nane pinunge. on þam bradum fyre þe
ofergæð ealne middaneard. ac hi farað þurh þæt fyr to criste
buton ælcere dare. swilce hi on sunnan leoman faron;
 343.250. Se ðe getimbrað ofer ðam grundwealle treowa.
oþþe streaw. oððe ceaf. untwylice he mæg witan þæt his weorc
sceal on ðam micclum fyre forbyrnan. and he hæfð þonne hearm his
weorces. and bið swa ðeah gehealden þurh þæt fyr;
 343.254. Ðurh ða treowu. and ðam streawe. and þam ceafe.
sind getacnode leohtlice synna. þe beoð þurh þæt fyr afeormode. and
se wyrhta hæfð wite þæs weorces. bið swa ðeah afeormod ðurh
þæt fyr. and siððan becymð ðurh maran earfoðnysse to godes
rice;
 343.258. Soðlice se ðe ða heafodleahtras wyrcð and on ðam
geendað. he mot forbyrnan on ðam ecum fyre. and swa ðeah þa swæran
synna ne beoð næfre afeormode. for nanes fyres ælincge;
 343.261. Þa leohtan gyltas sind ydele spræca. and þæt man
underfo on æte and on wæte mare ðonne his lichaman neod sy. and
þæt he oftor wifes bruce. ðonne he do for bearnes gestreone. and
þæt man cyde buton steore intingan. oþþe oðrum olæce mid leasre
lyffetunge. oþþe man biddendne ðearfan misræce. oððe ær mæle
hine gereordige. oððe ungemetlice gæmnige;
 343.267. Ðas and ðyllice sind ðas lytlan gyltas þe magon
beon ðurh ðam fyre fornumene. swa swa treowa. oþþe streaw. oððe
ceaf;
 343.269. Ðas þyllice gyltas ne magon ure sawla ofslean. ac hi
magon hi awlætan and gode laðettan. and gif we hi sylfwilles on andwerdum
life ne gebetað. we sceolon neadunge on þam witniendlicum fyre hi
geðrowian;
 343.272. Nu us ðincð swiðe teart wite þæt an ure fingra
on fyr becume. and hwæt bið þonne eal se lichama and seo sawul samod
ðrowiað on þam bradum fyre. þe ealne middaneard ofergæð? Fela sind
eac witniendlice stowa. þe manna sawla for heora gymeleaste on ðrowiað.
be heora gylta mæðe ær ðam gemænelicum dome. swa þæt hi sume
beoð fullice geclænsode. and ne þurfon naht ðrowian on ðam
foresædan fyre;
 344.279. Þa heafodleahtras sind. mansliht. cyrcbræce. and
þæt man oðres mannes wif hæbbe. and leas gewitnys. Stala. reaflac.
Gitsung. ydel gylp. Modignys. anda. and singal oferdrenc. hæðengyld.
drycræft. wiccecræft;
 344.282. Ðas synna and oðre ðyllice ne beoð na afeormode on
ðam witnigendlicum fyre. ac ða þe on swilcum leahtrum heora lif
geendiað. beoð betæhte to ðan ecan fyre þonne crist cwyð;
 344.285. <foreign>Discedite a me maledicti. Et reliqua;</foreign> Gewitað fram me
ge awyrigedan into ðan ecan fyre. þe ðam deofle is gegearcod and his
awyrigedum englum;
 344.288. Is nu for ði micel neod gehwilcum men þæt he his
gyltas ægðer ge ða læssan ge ða maran sylfwilles gebete. and mid
soðre behreowsunge his scyppend gegladige. þone ðe he ær mid
forsewennysse geæbiligde. þæt he ne ðurfe becuman to ðam teartum
bryne. ne huru to ðan ecan forwyrde. ac geearnige swiðor þæt ece lif
mid gode. and mid eallum his halgum;
 344.293. Wite gehwa cristenra manna þæt nan man ne sceal
sceattas niman for godes cyrcan;
 344.295. Gif hit ðonne hwa deð þæt he godes bryde þæt
is seo cyrce wið feo sylle. ðonne bið he Iudan gelic þe for criste
æt ðam Iudeum feoh genam. and he sceal mid iudan on ecnysse ðrowian.
buton he hit on life wið god ær gebete;
 344.298. Ne gedyrstlæce nan læwede man þæt he wissunge
oððe ealdordom healde ofer godes ðeowum;
 344.300. Hu mæg oððe hu dear ænig læwede man him to
geteon þurh riccetere cristes wican? Ne furðon nan gehadod man ne sceal him
to geteon þæt he crist spelige ofer his halgan hired buton him seo notu
fram godes lareowum betæht sy;
 344.304. Gif se læweda man wile sum mynster aræran. oððe
gegodian. betæce he gode swa hwæt swa he þærto deð. and gesette
ðone hired be healicra lareowa ræde. and næfre se læweda man ne
healde ealdorscipe ofer gehadodum godes ðeowum;
 345.308. Gif hit ðonne hwa deð. wite he þæt he deð
ongean cristes gesetnysse. and ealra his halgena;
 345.309. For worulde he mot godes ðeowum fylstan. and lætan hi
lybban be heora boca wissunge. and heora gastlican ealdres tæcunge;
 345.311. We habbað nu gesæd be godes cyrcan. ægðer ge be
ðære ealdan. ge be ðære niwan;
 345.313. Nu bidde we ðone ælmihtigan hælend. þæt he us
ðurh his mildheortnysse geclænsige fram urum synnum. and us gelæde to
ðære ecan gelaðunge heofenan rices. on ðam þe he rixað mid his
gecorenum halgum. mid his ælmihtigan fæder. and ðam halgan gaste. on
ealra worulda woruld;
 345.316. Amen:

ÆLS (Pref)

English Preface: Skeat 1881-1900, I, 4-6.
  



 1. ÆLFRIC GRET EADMODLICE ÆÐELWERD EALDORMAN and ic secge
þe leof, þæt ic hæbbe nu gegaderod on þyssere bec þæra halgena
þrowunga þe me to onhagode on englisc to awendene, for þan þe ðu leof
swiðost and æðelmær swylcera gewrita me bædon, and of handum
gelæhton eowerne geleafan to getrymmenne, mid þære gerecednysse, þe
ge on eowrum gereorde næfdon ær.
 7. Þu wast leof þæt we awendon on þam twam ærrum bocum
þæra halgena þrowunga and lif, þe angelcynn mid freolsdagum
wurþað.
 9. Nu gewearð us þæt we þas boc be þæra halgena
ðrowungum and life, gedihton þe mynstermenn mid heora þenungum betwux him
wurðiað.
 12. Ne secge we nan þincg niwes on þissere gesetnysse, forþan
ðe hit stod gefyrn awriten on ledenbocum þeah þe þa læwedan men
þæt nyston.
 15. Nelle we eac mid leasungum þyllic liccetan, forþan þe
geleaffulle fæderas and halige lareowas hit awriton on ledenspræce, to
langum gemynde, and to trymmincge þam towerdum mannum.
 19. Sum witega clypode þurh þone halgan gast and cwæð,
<foreign>Mirabilis deus in sanctis suis, et cet</foreign>: Wundorlic is god on his halgum; he
sylf forgifð mihte and strengðe his folce; gebletsod is he god.
 22. We awritað fela wundra on þissere bec, forþan þe god is
wundorlic on his halgum swa swa we ær sædon, and his halgena wundra
wurðiað hine, forþan þe he worhte þa wundra þurh hi.
 25. An woruldcynincg hæfð fela þegna and mislice wicneras;
he ne mæg beon wurðful cynincg buton he hæbbe þa geþincðe þe
him gebyriað, and swylce þeningmen, þe þeawfæstnysse him gebeodon.
 29. Swa is eac þam ælmihtigan gode þe ealle þincg gesceop;
him gerisð þæt he hæbbe halige þenas þe his willan gefyllað,
and þæra is fela on mannum anum þe he of middanearde geceas, þæt
nan bocere ne mæg þeah he mycel cunne, heora naman awriten, forþan þe
hi nat nan man.
 35. Hi synd ungeryme swa swa hit gerisð gode; ac we woldon
gesettan be sumum þas boc, mannum to getrymminge and to munde us sylfum,
þæt hi us þingion to þam ælmihtigan gode, swa swa we on worulde
heora wundra cyðað.
 40. Ic bidde nu on godes naman gif hwa þas boc awritan wille,
þæt he hi wel gerihte be þære bysne, and þær namare betwux ne
sette þonne we awendon.
 43. <foreign>UALE IN DOMINO</foreign>.

Nativity of Christ: Skeat 1881-1900, I, 10-24.<P>

 1. <foreign>UIII KALENDAS IANUARII</foreign>.
 1. <foreign>NATIUITAS DOMINI NOSTRI IESU CHRISTI</foreign>.
 3. MEN ðA LEOFESTAN HWILON æR WE SæDON EOW HU URE hælend
crist on þisum dæge on soðre menniscnysse acenned wæs of þæm
halgan mædene marian.
 5. Nu wylle we swa þeah for ðyses dæges mærðe eower mod
mid þære gastlican lare onbryrdan eow to blisse þurh god.
 7. Sume gedwolmenn wæron þuruh deoful beswicane swa þæt
hi cwædon þæt crist godes sunu nære æfre mid þam halgan
fæder wuniende, ac wære sum tima ær þan þe he acenned wære, ac
þæt halige godspell hæfð oferswiðod swylcera gedwolena andgit
foroft.
 11. Þa iudeiscan axodon crist hwæt he wære.
 11. Ða andwyrde he him þus, <foreign>Ego sum principium, qui et loquor
uobis</foreign>.
 13. Ic eom anginn, þe eow to spræce.
 13. Nu ge habbað gehered hu se hælend be him sylfum spræc,
þæt he is ordfruma and angin ealra þinga mid his heofonlican fæder
and mid þam halgan gaste.
 16. Se fæder is angin, and se sunu is angin, and se halga gast
is angin; ac hi ne synd na þreo anginnu, ac hi ealle þry synden an angin,
and an ælmihtig god æfre unbegunnen and ungeændod.
 18. Ac se man wet þe wyle habban ænig þincg ær anginne,
forþan ðe seo halige þrynnes is anginn and an scyppend ealra gesceafta
and nan þing næs ne nys wuniende þe se an wyrhta ne gesceope.
 21. Gif hwylc gedwola oððe awoffod man wyle furðor smeagen
and þæt anginn oferstigan mid dysilicere dyrstignesse, þonne bið he
þam men gelic þe arærþ sume heage hlæddre and stihð be þære
hlæddre stapum oðþæt he to ðæm ænde becume; and wylle þonne
git stigan ufor, astihð þonne buton stapum, oð þæt he stedeleas
fylþ mid mycclum wyrsan fylle swa he furðor stah.
 27. Ðreo þing synd on middanearde: an is hwilwendlic, þe
hæfð ægðer ge ordfrumman ge ende; þæt synd nytenu and ealle
sawullease þing þe ongunnan þa þa hi god gesceop, and æft
geændiað and to nahte gewurðaþ.
 30. Oðer þing is ece, swa þæt hit hæfð ordfruman and
næfð nenne ende; þæt synd ænglas and manna saula, þe ongunnen
ða þa hi god gesceop, ac hi ne geendiað næfre.
 33. Ðridde þing is ece, swa þæt hit næfð naðor ne
ordfruman ne ende; þæt is se ana ælmihtiga god on þrynnesse and on
annysse, æfre wuniende unasmeagendlic and unasæcgendlic.
 35. Se fæder is angin of nanum oðrum, and se sunu is angin
æfre of þam fæder acenned, and se halga gast is angin æfre of þam
fæder and of þam sunu, na acenned ac forðstæppende; forðan þe se
sunu is þæs fæder wisdom, of him and mid him, and se halga gast is
heora begra wylle and lufu, of him bam and mid him bam.
 40. On ðisne enne god we sceolon geleafan, and hine mid weorcum
wurðian, forðan þe ealle þa halgan bec ægðer ge on þære
ealdan æ ge on þære niwan soðlice sprecað be þere halgan
ðrynnysse and soðre annysse.
 43. Þæs an scyppend wat ealle þing and gesihð ge þæt
gedon is, ge þæt þe nu is, ge þæt ðe toweard is; ne he nan þing
ne forgit, ne him nan þing ætfleon ne mæg.
 46. Ne ondret he him nanes þinges, forðan þe he næfð
nenne riccran, ne furðon nanne him gelicne.
 47. Symble he bið gyfende, and he ne wanað swaþæh nan
þing his, ne him nanes þinges nis neodþearf.
 49. Symble he bið ælmihtig god, forðan ðe he symble wyle
god and næfre nan yfel, ac he hatað þa yfelwyrcendan and þa
unrihtwisan.
 51. Ða gesceafta þe þæs an scyppend gesceop synden
mænigfealde and mislices hiwes and ungelice farað.
 53. Sume sindon ungesewenlice gastas butan lichoman swa swa synd
ænglas on heofonum.
 54. Sume syndan creopende on eorðan mid eallum lichoman, swa swa
wurmas doð.
 55. Sume gað on twam fotum, sume on feower fotum.
 56. Sume fleoð mid fyðerum, sume on flodum swimmað, and hi
ealle swaþæh alotene beoð to þære eorðan weard and þider
wilniað oððe þæs þe him lyst oððe þæs þe hi beþurfon;
ac se man ana gæð uprihte, þæt getacnað þæt he sceall ma
þæncan upp þonne nyðer, þelæs þe þæt mod sy neoðer
þonne se lichoma and he sceal smeagen embe þæt æce lif þe he to
gesceapen wæs swiðor þonne embe þa eorðlican þing, swa swa his
wæstm him gebicnað.
 63. Ealle þas gesceafta habbað anginn, and sume eac ende swa
swa we ær cwædon, ac se soða scyppend næfð nan angin, forðan
þe he is him sylf angin na gesceapen ne geworht.
 66. Se geworhte ealle þing and wunað a on æcnysse.
 66. Hine ne mihte nan þing gewyrcean, for ðon þe nan þing
næs ær he, and gif he geworht wære ne wurde he næfre ælmihtig
god.
 69. Æft gif hwylc gewytleas man wenð þæt he hine sylfne
geworhte, þonne axie we hu he mihte hine sylfne gewyrcean gif he ær nes.
 71. He wæs æfre ungeworht, and æfre wunað ungeendod.
 72. His we magon wundrian, and we ne magon ne ne motan na furðor
embe þis smeagan, gif we nellað us sylfe forpæran.
 73. Seo sunne þe onliht ealne mideard is godes gesceaft, and we
magon understandan þæt hyre leoht is of hyre, na heo of þam leohte, and
seo hætu gæð of þære sunnan and of hire leohte gelice.
 76. Swa eac þæs ælmihtigan godes sunu is æfre of
þæm fæder acenned, soð leoht and soð wisdom; and se halga gast is
æfre of him bam, na acenned ac forðsteppende; and se sunu ana underfæng
menniscnysse and on þisum dege wearð to menn geboren, to þi þæt he
wolde us to his rice gefæccan.
 81. Nis nanum menn on ðisum deadlican life libbendum nanes
þinges swa mycel neod swa him biþ þæt he cunne þonne ælmihtigan
god mid geleafan, and siþþan his agene sawle.
 84. We habbað eow oft gesæd eowerne geleafan be þære
halgan ðrynnysse; nu wylle we eow sum þing be eowre sawle sæccgan
sceortlice gif we magon.
 86. Ealle þa geleaffullan fæderas þe godes lare awriton,
sædon untwylice and geþwærlehton on þam anum, þæt god gescypð
ælces mannes sawle, and seo sawl nis na of godes agenum gecynde.
 89. Gif heo wære of godes gecynde genumen, witodlice ne mihte
heo singian.
 90. Þam men is gecyndelic þæt he lufige þæt þæt
god is.
 91. Hwæt is god butan gode anum se þe is healic godnisse,
butan þam ne mæg nan man nan þing godes habban.
 93. Ðas godnysse we sceolan simble lufian þe us ælc god
ofcymþ, ac þissere godnysse lufu ne mæg beon butan on þære sawle,
and seo an sawul is æðelboren þe ðonne lufað þe heo fram com, þe
hi þyllice gesceop þæt heo on hire andgyte habban mihte godes anlicnesse
and gelicnesse, and þæs wyrðe wære þæt hyre god onwunode.
 98. Uþwytan sæcgað þæt þære sawle gecynd is
ðryfeald: An dæl is on hire gewylnigendlic, oðer yrsigendlic, þrydde
gesceadwislic.
 100. Twægen þissera dæla habbað deor and nytenu mid us,
þæt is gewylnunge and yrre.
 101. Se man ana hæfð gescead and ræd and andgit.
 102. Gewylnung is þam menn forgifen to gewilnienne þa ðing
þe him fremiað to nitwyrðum þingum and to þære ecan hæle.
 104. Þonne gif seo gewylnung miswent, þonne acenð he
gyfernesse and forlygr and gitsunge.
 105. Yrre is ðære sawle forgifen to ðy þæt heo yrsige
ongean leahtres, and ne beo na synnum underþeodd, for þan ðe crist
cwæð, ælc þæra þe synna wyrcð is þæra synna ðeow.
 108. Gif þæt yrre bið on yfel awend, þonne cymð of þam
unrotnisse and æmylnysse.
 109. Gescead is ðære sawle forgifen to gewyssienne and to
styrenne hire agen lif and ealle hire dæda.
 111. Of þam gesceade gif hit miswænt, cymð modignysse and
ydel gylp.
 112. Gescead wexð on cildrum na seo sawul; and seo sawul þihþ
on mægenum and ne bið namare þonne heo æt fruman wæs ac bið
betere ne heo ne underfæhð lichomlice mycelnysse.
 114. Seo sawul hæfð swa swa we ær cwædon on hire gecynde
þære halgan þrynnysse anlicnysse, on þan þe heo hæfð gemynd and
andgit and wyllan.
 116. An sawul is and an lif and an edwist, þe þas ðreo þing
hæfð on hire; and þas ðreo þing na synd na ðreo lif ac an, ne
þreo ædwiste ac an.
 119. Seo sawul oððe þæt lif oððe seo edwist synd
gecwædene to hyre sylfra, and þæt gemynd oððe þæt andgit
oþþe seo wylla beoð gecwædene to sumum þinga edlesendlice, and þas
ðreo þing habbað annysse him betwynan.
 122. Ic undergyte þæt ic wylle undergytan and gemunan, and ic
wylle þæt ic undergyte and gemune.
 124. Þær þær þæt gemynd bið, þær bið
þæt andgyt and se wylla.
 124. Uton nu behealden þa wundorlican swyftnysse þære sawle:
heo hæfð swa mycele swyftnysse þæt heo on anre tide gif heo swa wyle,
besceawað heofonan and ofer sæ flyhð, land and burga geondfærð.
 128. And ealle þas þing mid geþohte on hire sihðe gesæt;
and swa hraðe swa heo gehyrð þære burge naman þe heo ær cuðe,
swa hraðe heo mæg þa burh on hire geþohte gescyppan hwylc heo bið.
 131. Eal swa be gehwylcum oðrum þingum þe heo ær cuðe
oððe ne cuðe, heo mæg on hire mode gescyppan þonne heo gehyrð be
þam spræcan.
 133. And swa styrigende is seo sawul þæt heo furðon on
slæpe ne gestylþ; ac ðonne he smeað be rome byrig ne mæg heo þa
hwile smeagen be hierusalem, oððe þonne heo smeað be anum þing ne
mæg heo þa hwyle be oðrum þinge smeagen, ac biþ gebysgod mid þam
anum ðinge oðþæt þæt geþoht gewyte and oðer cume.
 138. Witodlice god ælmihtig wat ealle þing togædere, and
ealle þing hæfð on his andwerdnysse, and hi æfre beoþ on his
gesihþe and næfre him uncuþe, and þis is þæt gecwæden is
þæt god is æghwær eall; forðan ðe ealle þing þe æfre
wæron oððe nu synd oþþe ða þe towearde synd, ealle hi synd on
godes gesihðe anwearde, na æne ac æfre.
 143. Seo sawul soðlice is þæs lichoman lif and þære
sawle lif is god.
 144. Gif seo sawul forlæt þonne lichoman þonne swælt seo
lichoma, and gif god forlæt þa sawle for ormættum synnum þonne
swælt heo on þam sælran dæle swa þæt heo bið forloren þam
ecan life, and swa þeah næfre ne geendað on þam ecum wytum.
 148. Þes dæð hire gelimpð gif heo læt rixian on hire
þa gewilnunge and þæt yrre swiðor þonne þæt gescead þe hi
gewysigen sceall to weldædum a.
 150. Ðuruh þæt gescead ana we synd sælran þonne þa
ungesceadwysan nytenu.
 152. Mid twam wurðscipum geglængde se ælmihtiga scyppend
þæs mannes sawle, þæt is mid eccnysse and eadignysse, ac heo forleas
þa eadignysse þa ða he agylte, and heo ne mihte þa ecnysse forleosan
forðan þe heo ne geendað næfre.
 155. Þære sawle wlyte is þæt heo hæbbe mihte, swa
þæt heo leahtres forbuge; and heo bið atelic þurh leahtras gif he him
underlið.
 157. Ðære sawle mihta syndon þas feower fyrmestan and
sælestan; <foreign>prudentia</foreign>, þæt is snoternysse, þurh þa heo sceal hyre
scippend understandan and hine lufian, and tosceaden god fram yfele.
 160. Oðer mægen is <foreign>Iustitia</foreign>, þæt is rihtwisnys, þurh
þa/ heo sceal god wurðigan and rihtlice libban.
 162. Þæt ðrydde mægen is <foreign>temperantia</foreign>, þæt is
gemetegung, mid þære sceall seo sawul ealle þing gemætegian, þæt
hit to swiþe ne sy, ne to hwonlice, forðan þe hit is awryten, <foreign>Omnia
nimia nocent</foreign>, þæt is ealle oferdone þing dæriað.
 165. Witodlice gemetegung is eallra mægena modor.
 166. Þæt feorðe mægen is <foreign>Fortitudo</foreign>, þæt is
strængð oððe anrednyss, þurh þa sceal seo sawul forbæran
earfoðnysse mid anrædum mode for godes lufan, and næfre þam deofle ne
abugan to forwyrde.
 169. Ðas feower mægenu habbað ænne kynehelm, þæt is
seo soðe lufu godes and manna, forðan þe seo sawul is gesælig ðe
þonne scyppend lufað þe hi gesceop and hire gefæran and him fremian
wile/ swa heo fyrmest mæge.
 173. Seo sawul is gesceadwis gast æfre cucu and mæg underfon
ge godne wyllan and yfelne æfter agenum cyre.
 174. Se welwillende scyppend læt hi habben agenes cyres geweald,
þa wearð heo be agenum wyllan gewæmmed þurh þæs deofles lare.
 176. Heo wærð æft alysad þuruh godes gife, gif heo gode
gehyrsumað.
 178. Heo is ungesæwenlic and unlichomlice, butan hæfe and
butan bleo, mid þam lichaman befangen and on eallum limum wunigende.
 180. Ne heo ne mæg be hyre agenre mihte of þam lichoman
gewytan, ne æft ongean cyrran, butan se wylle þe hi geworhte and on
þonne lichaman asænde.
 182. Heo is on bocum manegum naman gecyged be hyre weorces
þenungum.
 183. Hyre nama is <foreign>anima</foreign>, þæt is sawul, and seo nama
gelympð to hire life; and <foreign>spiritus</foreign>, gast, belimpð to hire ymbwlatunge.
 185. Heo is <foreign>sensus</foreign>, þæt is andgit oððe felnyss, þonne
heo gefret.
 186. Heo is <foreign>animus</foreign>, þæt is mod, þonne heo wat.
 186. Heo is <foreign>mens</foreign>, þæt is mod þonne heo understent.
 187. Heo is <foreign>memoria</foreign>, þæt is gemynd, þonne heo gemanð.
 188. Heo is <foreign>ratio</foreign>, þæt is gescead, þonne heo toscæt.
 189. Heo is <foreign>uoluntas</foreign>, þæt is wylla, þonne heo hwæt
wyle.
 190. Ac swa þeah ealle þas naman syndon sawul; ælc sawul is
gast ac swa þeah nis na ælc gast sawul.
 191. Se apostol paulus totwæmde þæs gastes naman and
þæs modes þus cwæðende, <foreign>Psallam spiritu psallam et mente</foreign>.
 193. Þæt is on ænglisc, Ic singe mid gaste and ic singe mid
mode.
 194. Se singð mid gaste se ðe clypað þa word mid muðe and
ne understænt þæs andgites getacnunge, and se singð mid mode se ðe
þæs andgites getacnunge understænt.
 197. Seo sawul is þæs lichoman hlæfdige, and heo gewissað
þa fif andgitu þæs lichaman swa swa of cynesætle.
 198. Þa andgitu sint gehatene þus: <foreign>Uisus</foreign>, þæt is
gesihð; <foreign>auditus</foreign>, hlyst; <foreign>Gustus</foreign>, swæc on þam muðe, <foreign>Odoratus</foreign>,
stænc on þæra nosa; <foreign>tactus</foreign>, hrepung oððe grapung on eallum limum
ac þeah gewunelicost on þam handum.
 202. Ðas fif andgitu gewisseð seo sawul to hire wyllan, and
hyre gedafnað þæt heo swa swa hlæfdige geornlice foresceawige hwæt
heo gehwylcum lime bebeode to donne, oððe hwæt heo gehwylcum lime
geþafige on gewylnunge his gecyndes þæt þær nan þing
unþæslice ne gelympe on nanes limes þenunge.
 207. Swa swa god ælmihtig oferstihð ealle gesceafta, swa
oferstihð seo sawul ealle lichamlice gesceafta mid wurðfulnysse hyre
gecyndes, and nan lichamlic gesceaft ne mæg beon hyre wiðmeten.
 210. We cwæden ær þæt heo wære butan bleo, forþan
ðe heo nis na lichamlic.
 211. On lichaman bið bleoh, and seo sawul bið swa gewlitegod
swa heo on worulde geearnode.
 212. Be þam cwæþ crist on his godspelle, <foreign>Tunc iusti
fulgebunt sicut sol in regno patris eorum</foreign>.
 214. Þæt ys on ænglisc, þonne scinað þa rihtwisan swa
swa sunne on heora fæder rice.
 215. Witodlice þa arleasan beoð heora yfelum weorcum gelice.
 216. Nis seo orþung þe we ut blawaþ and in ateoð oþþe
ure sawul, ac is seo lyft þe ealle lichamlice þing on lybbað butan fixum
anum þe on flodum lybbað.
 218. Oft bið seo sawul on anum þinge oððe on anum geþohte
swa bysig þæt heo ne gymð hwa hyre gehende bið, þeah ðe heo
onlocie; ne þeah heo sume stemne gehyre, heo hit ne understent; ne þeah hi
hwa hreppe heo hit ne gefret.
 222. Hwilon heo besargað hyre lichoman sarnissa; hwilon heo
gladað on godum gelimpum; hwilon heo þæncð þa ðing þe heo ær
cuðe; hwilon heo wyle wytan þa ðing þe heo ær ne cuðe.
 225. Sume þing heo wyle, sume ðing heo nele; and ealle
lichamlicra þinga hiw heo mæg on hyre sylfre gehiwian, and swa gehiwode on
hyre mode gehealden.
 227. Ðære sawle wlyte is þæt heo wisdom lufie; na ðone
eorðlican wisdom be þam þe þus awriten is, <foreign>Sapientia huius mundi
stultitia est apud deum</foreign>: þysses middaneardes wysdom is stuntnis ætforan
gode.
 231. Ac þonne wisdom heo sceal leornian: þæt heo lufie god,
and hine æfre wurðige on eallum hyre weorcum, and þa þing leornige
þe gode liciað, and þa þing forlæte þe him laðe syndon.
 233. Þæs wisdom is awryten on halgum bocum, and be ðam is
þus gecwæden, <foreign>Omnis sapientia a domino deo est</foreign>: ælc wisdom is of
gode.
 236. Is nu forðy ælc man eadig and gesælig se ðe for gode
wis bið, and gif heo his weorc mid wisdome gefadað.
 237. Be þæm cwæð se ædiga iob, þæs mannes wisdom
is arfæstnys, and soð ingehyd þæt heo yfel forbuge.
 239. Witodlice þæt is soþ wysdom, þæt man gewylnige
þæt soðe lif on þam þe he æfre lybban mæg mid gode on wuldre
gif he hit on þyssere worulde geearnað.
 241. To þam us gelæde seo leofa drihten crist, se ðe is
soð wysdom and sawla lif, se ðe mid his ecan fæder and mid þam halgan
gaste a on ecnysse leofað.
 244. AMEN.

ÆLS (Eugenia)
B1.3.3.
Saint Eugenia: Skeat 1881-1900, I, 24-50.



 1. MÆG GEHYRAN SE ÐE WYLE BE ÞAM HALGAN mædene Eugenian,
Philyppus dæhter; hu heo ðurh mægðhad mærlice þeah, and þurh
martyrdom þisne middaneard oferswað.
 5. Sum æþelboren þægn wæs Philippus gehaten, ðone
asende se casere Commodus, þe on ðam dagum rixode, fram Rome byrig to
ðære byrig ðe is gehaten Alexandria.
 9. And he hine gesette to heahgerefan ofer Alexandrian and
ægyfto lande, and het þæt he heolde þa romaniscan gesætnysse.
 12. Ðæs ðægn philippus næs na gefullod on gode,
forþan þe cristendom næs þagyt geond eall cuð, and seo reþe
æhtnyss þagyt næs gestylled.
 15. His wif wæs gecyged Claudia, be þære he gestrynde
twægen suna, Auitum and Særgium, and ane dohtor, Eugenian, þe we embe
spræcaþ.
 19. Ða befæste se fæder Philippus to lare þæt heo on
woruldwysdome wære getogen, æfter greciscre uðwytegunge and lædenre
getingnysse.
 22. Eugenia þa, þæt æðele mæden, wel þeah on
wisdome and on uðwytegunge.
 24. Þa becom hyre on hand þæs halgan apostoles lar Paules
þæs mæran ealles manncynnes lareowes.
 26. Þa wearð hyre mod mycclum onbryrd þuruh þa halgen lare,
þeah ðe heo þa gyt hæðen wære.
 28. Heo bæd þa hyre fæder þæt heo færen moste geond
his hames on Alexandiscre scyre.
 30. Wolde swa cepan þære cristenra lare, forðan þe heo
næfde on ðære byrig nænne geleaffulne mann þe hi læren cuþe,
forðan Philippus aflygde þa cristenan of Alexandrian ealle on ær.
 35. Hwæt þa EVGENIA ardlice færde oð þæt heo becom
þær ða cristenan sungen mid mycelre blisse þus mærsigende god,
<foreign>Omnes dii gentium demonia; dominus autem cælos fecit</foreign>: Ealle þære
hæðenra godas syndon deofla, and dryhten soðlice heofonas geworhte.
 41. Eugenia þa mycclum wearð onbryrd and mid wope gespræc
hire twægen cnihtas, þære naman wæron Protus <foreign>et</foreign> Iacinctus.
 44. Þa wæron gelærede on leden and on grecisc, mid eugenian
mid woruldlicra lare, and wæron <foreign>eunuchi</foreign>, þæt synt belisnode, and
wæron heora hlæfdige holde and getrywe.
 48. Ða nam Eugenia hi on sundorspræce, het hi gebroðra, and
bæd þæt hi hyre fæx forcurfon on wæpmonna wysan, and mid wædum
gehiwodon swylce heo cniht wære.
 52. Wolde ðam cristenan genealecan on wærlicum hiwe þæt
heo ne wurde ameldod.
 54. Hi færdon ða þry and heora gefæran forleton
oðþæt hi becoman to ðære cristenra wununge, þær hi dæges
and nihtes heora drihten heroden.
 57. On ðam ylcan dæge com sum bisceop Helenus gehaten, haliges
lifes, mid mycelre meniu anmodlice singende, <foreign>Uia iustorum recta facta est, et
iter sanctorum preparata est</foreign>: þæt is, þæra rihtwisra wæg is
gerihtlæced, and þæra halgena siðfæt is gegearcod.
 63. Þes bisceop worhta fæla wundra þuruh god, and him
wearð geswutelod on swæfne be þysum, and eall þæs mædenes mod
him wearð ameldod.
 66. Ða gespræc þæt mæden sumne messepreost, Eutropius
gehaten, þæt he hyre ærende abude þam bisceope þysum wordum
geornlice, we ðry gebroðra wyllað gecyrran fram þam fulan
hæðenscype to hælende Criste, and we nellað nates hwon us næfre
totweman.
 72. Þa þæs on mergen se mæssepreost abead þæs
mædenes word þam mæron bisceope.
 74. Þa het se bisceop hi gelangian, mycclum þanciende þam
ælmihtigan gode þæt he wolde him onwreon þæs mædenes wyllan.
 77. He genam hi þa onsundron and sæde hyre gewislice hwæt
heo man ne wæs, and hwylcere mægþe, and þæt heo þurh
mægðhad mycclum gelicode þam heofonlican cyninge þe heo gecoren
hæfde; and cwæð þæt heo sceolde swiðlice æhtnyssa for
mægðhade ðrowian, and þeah beon gescyld þurh þone soðan drihten
þe gescylt his gecorenan.
 84. To hire twam cnihtum he cwæð þæt hi heoldan
æþelborennyss on mode, þeah þe hi mannum þeowdon, and cwæð
þæt hi Crist gespræce þysum godspellicum wordum, Ne hate ic eow na
þeowan, ac ge synd mine freond.
 87. Þa bebead se biscop þam gebogenan mædene þæt heo
swa þurhwunade on þam wærlicum hiwe, oþþæt hi on fante gefullode
wurdon, and mynsterlicre drohtnunge dearnunge geþeodde.
 92. Eugenia þa wunode on þam mynstre mid wærlicum mode
þeah þe heo mæden wære, mid hyre twam cnihtum, uncuð gehwam, And
heold on hyre þeawum halige drohtnunge ðurh modes liþnesse and mycelre
eadmodnesse, and þurh halige mægnu þam hælende gecwæmde.
 98. Heo þeah on lare þæs rihtan geleafan and on godcundlicum
gewrytum mid godum wyllan, and wearð awend of wulfe to sceape.
 101. Hyre geeuenlæhton eac hyre cnihtas, Protus <foreign>et</foreign> Iacinctus,
on synderlicre drohtnunge, and hyre digolnysse eallum bedyrndon.
 104. Philippus ða se fæder forwearð on mode, and seo modor
Claudia mid murcnunge wæs fornumen, and eall seo mægð on mode wearð
astyred and sohten þæt mæden mid mycelre sarnysse.
 108. Hi axoden æt wyccum and æt wisum dryum, eac æt heora
leasum godum be þære godes þinene.
 110. Him wearð þa gesæd to soþum þinge, þæt ða
godes hi gegripon for hyre godnysse.
 112. Þa gelyfde se fæder þære leasunga and het
asmiðigen of smætum golde hyre anlycnysse, and þa wurðode swa swa
halige gydenan, ac hit wæs gold swa þeah.
 116. Þa æfter þrym gearum þæs þe heo gecyrred wæs
gewat se abbod þe hyre ealdor wæs.
 118. And þa gebroðra sona ceosan ongunnen Eugenian to abbude,
for hyre arfæstan life, and nyston þæt heo wæs wimman swa þeah.
 121. Ða wearð þæt mæden mycclum hohful, hu heo æfre
wæras wissian sceolde.
 123. Ne dorste swa þeah hi ealle gedrefan and hyra geþeaht
forseon, ac fæng to ðam hade.
 125. Hwæt ða Eugenia hym eallum gebysnode mid goddre
gedrohtnunge to godes þeowdome, and mid carfulnysse þonne hyred gewissode.
 128. Hyre geuðe þa se ælmihtiga wealdend þæt heo
untrume menn mihte gehælan, swa hwylcne swa heo geneosode licgende on sare.
 131. Heo aflygde eac swylce þa fulan deofla fram ofsættum
mannum þurh soðne geleafan.
 133. Þa wæs sum wif wælig on æhtum, Melantia gecyged,
swiðe þearle gedreht mid langsumum feofore, and com to ðære femnan.
 136. Eugenia þa hi gesmyrode mid gehalgodum ele and eac
gemearcode mid rodetacne.
 138. And heo þæt reðe attor eall ut aspaw, þe hyre
dærede, and wearþ gehæled þurh þæt halige mæden.
 140. Þa bead seo wydewe þam mædene sceattas for hyre
hæle, ac heo hi forsoc, and tihte ða oþre þæt heo hi dælde
þearfum and wædlum for ðam gewissan eadleane.
 144. Ða gewænde seo wydewe ham to hyre agenum and com
siððan gelome mid leasum mode to þam wlytegan mædene, wende þæt
heo cniht wære, and mænigfealde sceattas hyre unmæðlice bead.
 148. Ac þa þa heo geseah þæt seo soðfæste fæmne
hyre laca ne rohte, ne hyre rununga, þa wearð heo mid yfele eall afylled,
and gebræd hi seoce mid bysmorfullum geþance.
 152. Heo bæd þa Eugenian þæt heo hi geneosode, and ongan
hyre sæcgan hyre sweartan geþohtas.
 154. Cwæð þæt heo wære wydewe on þam geare, and hyre
wer læfde unlytle æhta on lande and on feo and on forewyrcendum.
 157. And unc næs gemæne man on ðysum lyfe.
 158. Nu is min mod awend mycclum to ðe, þæt þu hlaford beo
þæra æhta and min.
 160. Ic wene þæt hit ne sy unrihtwisnysse ætforan gode
þeah ðe þu wifes bruce and blysse on life.
 162. Ða andwyrde Eugenia þyssere olecunge, and cwæð to
þam wife mid þisum ingehyde, þæt ða gewylnunga þissere andweardan
worulde synt swiðe swicole, þeah þe hi geswæse beon.
 166. And þæs lichoman lustas gelome bepæceð and to
sarnissum gelædað þa þe hi swiðost lufiað.
 168. Æfter þissere tihtinge and on oðrum larum, beclypte seo
myltestre þæt clæne mæden, and wolde hi gebygan to bismorlicum
hæmede.
 171. Hwæt ða Eugenia hi gebletsode, and cwæð to ðære
sceande þæt heo soðlice wære galnysse ontendnyss and gramena mæge,
þeostra gefæra and mid sweartnysse afylled, deaðes dohtor and deofles
fætels.
 176. Habban þine æhta þine gelican.
 177. We habbað ealle ðing mid þam ælmihtigan drihtne.
 178. Ða wearð Melantia micclum ofsceamod, wende þæt heo
wolde hyre word ameldian buton heo sylf on ær hit openlice cydde.
 181. Færde þa ardlice to Alexandrian byrig, to þam
heahgeræfan, þe wæs gehaten Philippus, Eugenian fæder, þeah seo
fule þæt nyste, and begann hi to wrægenne, and wolde forsæcgan.
 185. Cwæð þæt heo eode to hyre licgendre, on læces
hiwe, and hi wolde forlycgan, gif heo þæt bysmor forberan wolde.
 188. Ac ic hrymde sona mid sarlicre stæmne oþþæt an minra
wimmanna me wið hine ahredde.
 190. Ða gelyfde Philippus þære facenfyllan segene, and
swiðe gehatheort het hi gefæccan, and eac ða gebroðra, ealle
gebundene, and heold hi on bendum and on blindum cwearterne, oðþæt he
mid wytum þæt wif gewræce.
 195. Þa com se dæg þe se dema gesætte.
 196. And wæron gegeorcode þa reðan wyta.
 197. And wurdon gefætte ætforan þam deman þa unscildigan
cristenan on swærtum racentægum.
 199. Ða cwæð Philippus mid fullum graman to Eugenian his
agenre dehter, Sege þu forscyldeguda hwi woldest ðu beswican þæt
mære wif Melantian mid forligre and on læces hiwe hi forlicgan woldest.
 204. Ða cwæð Eugenia þæt heo eaþe mihte þæs
forlyres unhlisan hi beladian, and Melantian onsage mid soðe oferdrifan, gif
Philippus wolde gefæstnian mid aþe þæt seo lease wrægistre ne
wurde fordæmed.
 209. Ða swor Philippus þæt he friðian wolde þa leasan
wudewan, ðeah þe heo gelignod wurðe.
 211. Þa bæd Eugenia þæt seo wyln sceolde sæcgan þam
deman hu hit gedon wære, and hu heo hyre hlæfdian wið hyre lustas
ahrædde.
 214. And se gerefa het eac þa cnihtas Melantian hyredes cyðan
be ðison gif hi þis gehyrdon.
 216. Þa cwæð seo wyln þæt heo wyste gefyrn hu Eugenia
ferde fracodlice on forlygre, and wolde þa æt nehstan hyre hlæfdian
gebysmrian, butan heo mid hreame hyre hræddinge ofclypode; þis witan þas
hyredmen þe ic þider clypode.
 221. Ða sædon þa hyredmenn þæt hit soð wære, and
ealle mid aðe Eugenian forlugan.
 223. Þa wearð se geræfa þearle gebolgen, and axude
Eugenian hu heo ana mihte ealle þa gewytan awægan mid aðe, oððe
þurh ænige swutelunge hi sylfe aclænsian.
 227. Hwæt ða Eugenia seo æþele fæmne cwæð
þæt heo wolde hi sylfe bediglian, and criste anum hyre clænnysse
healdan, on mægðhade wuniende, mannum uncuð, and forðy underfænge
æt fruman þa gyrlan wærlices hades and wurde geefsod.
 233. Æfter þysum wordum heo totær hyre gewædu and
ætæwde hyre breost þam breman Philippe, and cwæð him to, þu eart
min fæder, and þin gebædda Claudia gebær me to mannum, and þas
ðine gesætlan synd mine gebroðra, Auitus and Særgius, and ic
soðlice eom Eugenia gehaten, þin agen dohtor.
 240. And ic for cristes lufe forlæt eow ealle, and
middaneardlice lustas swa swa meox forseah.
 242. Her synd eac þa cnihtas þe ic cydde mine digolnysse,
Protus <foreign>et</foreign> Iacinctus, þine fostercyld, mid ðam ic becom to cristes scole,
and þær on drohtnode oð þisne andwærden dæg, and ðam ic wylle
æfre oð ende þeowian.
 247. Ða oncneow Philippus swa swa fæder Eugenian, and Auitus
and Særgius hyra agene swyster, and hyra hyredcnihtas hi eadmodlice cyston.
 250. Þis wearð sona gecyd Claudian þære mæder, and heo
mid wundrunge wearð befangen, and to Eugenian com mid ealre blysse.
 253. Hi þa gefretewodon þa fæmnan mid golde hyre unþances,
and up gesætton to him.
 255. Þa clypode þæt folc þæt Crist wære soð god,
and hi ealle herodon þonne hælend mid wuldre.
 257. Eugenia hæfde ær geþingod þære leasan Melantian
to hyre leofan fæder, þæt heo mid wytum ne awræce hyre welhreowan
ehtnysse.
 260. Ac Crist sylf asende swægende fyr ufan of heofonum,
þæt menn onhawoden, to Melantian botle and hit mid ealle forbernde, swa
þæt ðær næs to lafe nanðing þe hyre wæs.
 264. Þa wurdon gefullode Philippus and Claudia and heora
twægen suna mid soðum geleafan, and seo mæste mæniu þæs
mennisces gebeah to Cristes bigengum and þa cristenan gegododon.
 268. Ða wurdon geædniwode on ðam eahteoðan geare þa
forlætenan cyrcan, and seo geleaffulnyss weox.
 270. Philippus þa asende to Seuero þam casere, and sæde
þæt þa Cristenan swiðe fremoden his cynerice and romaniscere leode,
and hi wæl wyrðe wæron þæt hi wunodon butan æhtnysse on
ðære ylcan byrig, þe he hi ær of adræfde.
 275. Þa geþafode se casere þæt ðam geræfan, and
Alexandria seo burh sona wearð afylled mid mycclum cristendome and manegum
cyrcum.
 278. And on gehwylcum burgum blissoden þa cristenan and mid
wurðfulnysse God wurðodon, eac for þysum intingan, þæt ægyptisce
folc, forlætenum gedwylde, gelyfde on drihten.
 282. And Philippus forgeaf fæla eahta þam cristenum him to
gemænan brice, and hi gemundode.
 284. Æfter þisum gelamp þæt ða leasan hæðenan
wrægdon Philippum to ðam foresæden casere, sædon þæt he forlete
þa lifiendan godas, and ealle þa burhwaræ gebigde to Criste.
 288. Þa wearð se casere sona geyrsod, and bebead Philippe
þæt he buge to his godum, oððe wære benæmed wurðscipes and
æhta.
 291. Þa dælde Philippus digollice his æhta geond ealle þa
scyre cyrcum and þearfum, and þurh mycelne geleafan manega oðre
getrymode, swa þæt ða cristenan hine gecuron to bisceope.
 295. Ða æfter twælf monðum gemunde se casere hwæt him
gesæd wæs and sænde fram rome oðerne gerefan mid reðum bebode, swa
þæt he het acwellan þone cristenan Philippum, gif hit soð wære swa
him gesæd wæs.
 300. Ða com se gerefa and hine acwællan ne dorste on þæs
folces gewytnysse for heora freondrædene, ac asende sume þe sædon
þæt hi wæran on Criste gelyfede, ac hi lugon swa þeah.
 304. Ða eoden to cyrcean mid swiðlicum facne, and ðone
mæran biscop on his gebædum ofslogan.
 306. Ac he wunade swa ðeah on þam wundum cucu geond þreora
daga fæc and gefrefrode þa cristenan, and swa mid martyrdome siþþan
gewat to ðam lifigendan drihtne þe he on life wurðode.
 310. Eugenia hæfde ær þan asteald mynecena mynster mid
mycelre gehealdsumnysse, and seo modor Claudia hit micclum gegodode; and hi
þær bebyrgdon þone bisceop Philippum.
 314. And hi siþþan ealle endemes færdon, seo modor and seo
dohtor, to ðære mæran Rome byrig, and ða gebroðru samod, Særgius
and Auitus.
 317. And þa romaniscan wytan hi wel underfængon, and for
þære ealdan cyððe þæs æðelan Philippes.
 319. Þa gesætton þa wytan sona þa cnihtas on twam
heafodburgum on healicum wurðmynte, ænne on Affrican and oðerne on
Cartagine.
 322. Eugenia þa wunode on Rome, and hire coman to gehwylce
mædenu, and heo hi gebegde mid hyre gebysnunge to Criste, and hi on
mægðhade wunodon þurh hyre mynegunge.
 326. Þa wæs on Rome byrig sum cyneboren mæden, Basilla
gehaten, on hæðenscype wunigende, seo wolde gehyran þa halgan lare of
Eugenian muþe, ac heo ne mihte hire genealecean, forðan þe Cristendom
wæs þær onscunigendlic.
 331. Ða sende Eugenia þa twægen halgan, Protum and
Iacinctum, to ðam hæðenen mædene.
 333. Hwæt þa Basilla mid blysse hi underfæng, and deges and
nihtes mid þam deorwurðum halgum godes lare beeode, and hyre gebæda ne
geswac oððæt Cornelius, þæra cristenra biscop, hi dearnunga
gefullode fram eallum fulnyssum.
 338. Þa wurdon gelome þa leofan mædenu Eugenia and Basilla,
and eac se biscop, on sunderspræce swiðe gebysgode, and digellice on
nihtum hi symble geneosodon and hæfdon heora gerihtu mid þam halgen
biscope.
 343. Þurh ðas twa mædena manega oðre becoman to Cristes
geleafan, and to clænre drohtnunge.
 345. Ðurh Claudian becoman eac clæne wudewan mid godum wyllan
to godes geleafan.
 347. And fæla cnihta on Crist gelyfden þurh ða twægen
halgan Protum <foreign>et</foreign> Iacinctum.
 349. Basilla hæfde enne hæðene wogere, Pompeius gecyged,
swiðe æðelboren, þam geuðe se casere þæt kyneborene mæden,
ac heo hæfde gecoren Crist hyre to brydguman, and þone hæðenan wogere
forþi habban nolde.
 354. Þa gesohte se cniht þæs kaseres fett, and þa
Romaniscan wytan mid woplicre ceorunge him mid spræcon and ða mædena
wregdon, Eugenian and Basillan, biddende his fultumes.
 358. Hwæt þa se casere cwæð him to andsware þæt
Basilla sceolde gebugan to ðam cnihte, oþþe hi man toheowe mid heardum
swurde on twa.
 361. And Eugenian he het his godum geoffrian, oððe hi man mid
wytum welreowlice acwealde.
 363. He het eac acwællan ealle þa cristenan, gif hi noldon
bugan to ðam bysmorfullum hæðenscype.
 365. Þa nolde Basilla brydguman geceosan nænne butan Crist
þe heo gecoren hæfde, and wearð þa gemartyrod for hyre mægðhade,
æt ham on hire huse mid heardum sweorde.
 369. Æfter þysum wordum þa twægen godes halgan, Protus
and Iacinctus, wurdon sona gelæhte, and hi sceoldon geoffrian heora lac
þam godum, oððe hi sylfe sceoldon him beon geoffrode.
 373. Hi wurdon þa gelædde to þære laðan anlicnysse, ac
heo tofeol sona to heora fotum formolsnod, swa raðe swa þa halgan hi to
Gode gebædon.
 376. Þa cwæþ se dema þæt hi mid drycræfte þa
anlicnyssa towurpon, and wearð gebolgen.
 378. Het þa behæfdian ða halgan cyðeras, and hi swa ferdon
mid sige to Criste.
 380. Ðas martyras næron næfre on life þurh wif besmytene,
ac hi wunedon on clænnysse oð heora lifes ænde, mid mycclum geleafan.
 383. Æfter þysum wearð geleaht seo geleaffulla Eugenia, and
to þam hæðenan temple getogen mid geðreate, þæt heo þære
gydenan Diane Godes wurðmynt gebude.
 386. Ða gebæd Eugenia hi to ðam ælmihtigan Gode, and
þæt deofles tempel grundlunga tofeoll, and on eorðan besanc mid eallum
his anlicnyssum.
 389. Þa het se casere ahon anne weorcstan on hyre halgan swuran,
and hi bescufan on ða ea.
 391. Eac se stan tobærst and heo sæt up on þam wætere,
þæt ða cristenan tocneowan þæt Crist wæs mid hyre, seðe hwilon
ær þone halgan Petrum be ðære handa gelædde upp on þam heagan
brymme, þæt þæt ða sælican yða hine forswelgan ne mihton.
 396. Ða het se casere hi siððan bescufan on byrnende ofen,
þær þær hate baðu wæron, ac þæt fyr wearð acwænced and
þa baðu acolode and ealle ða ontendnyssa mid hyre tocyme adwæscte.
 400. Heo wearð þa gebroht into blindum cwearterne, and geond
twæntig daga hyre næs getyðod æniges bigleofan binnan ðam
þeostrum.
 403. Ac se Hælend com mid heofonlicum leohte, and brohte ðam
mædene mærne bigleofon, snawhwitne hlaf, and onlihte ðæt cweartern.
 406. Þa cwæð se Hælend to ðam halgan mædene, Eala
ðu Eugenia, ne beo þu afyrht.
 408. Ic eom þin hælend, þe þu healice wurðost, and mid
eallum mode and mægne lufast.
 410. On þam dæge þa scealt cuman to me þe ic com to
mannum, and on minre gebyrdtide ðu bist on heofonum gebroht.
 412. Þa com se cwællere on cristes akennednysse dæge, asend
fram þam casere, and he þæt mæden acwealde.
 414. Heo wearð þa gemartyrod and cristene menn hi bebyrgdon.
 415. Ða weop seo modor mid mycelre sarnysse æt hyre byrgene,
oþ þæt heo hi geseah on gastlicre gesihðe mid golde gefrætewode mid
ðam heofonlicum werode þus hi frefrigende: Min modor Claudia, me hæfð
gebroht min hælend Crist to his halgena blysse, and minne fæder gelogode
on þære heahfædera getele, and þu cymst to us nu on sunnandæg.
 423. Seo modor gewat ða of worulde to heofonum on ðam
sunnandæge, and þa suna hi bestodon, Sergius and Auitus, and hi siððan
þurhwunodon on ðam soðan geleafan oð heora lifes ende.
 427. Sy wuldor and lof þam welwyllendan drihtne, on ealra worulda
woruld, ealra his weldæda; AMEN.
